顺风行船
shùnfēng xíngchuán
sail with the wind
风筝顺风而上，很快就飞升到了空中。
Fēng zhe ng shùnfēng ér shàng，hěn kuài jiù fēishēng dào le kōng zhōng。
The kite flies upward in the sky with the wind.
顺风吹火的机会你不及时把握，难道偏要逆水行舟？
Shùnfēng chuīhuǒ de jīhuì nǐ bùjíshí bǎwò，nándào piānyào nìshuǐ xíngzhōu？
Why didn\'t you take such a favorable opportunity? Do you really want to go against the current?
他是个顺风转舵的人，世故圆滑得很。
Tā shì gè shùnfēng zhuǎnduò de rén，shìgù yuánhuá de hěn。
He is a worldly wise and cunning man, who can take his cue from changing conditions
今天这顿饭算作给你饯行，祝你一路顺风！
Jīntiān zhè dùn fàn suànzuò gěi nǐ jiànxíng，zhù nǐ yílù shùnfēng！
Just take this meal as a farewell party, we wish you a smooth journey!
那天知道他要走，我只能在心里祝他一路顺风。
Nàtiān zhīdào tā yào zǒu，wǒ zhǐnéng zài xīnlǐ zhù tā yílù shùnfēng。
That day I heard that he was leaving, I could not but wish him a nice trip in my mind.
祝你一路顺风。
Zhù nǐ yílùshùnfēng。
Have a safe journey!
一路顺风
yílùshùnfēng
Bon voyage!
望一路顺风。
Wàng yílùshùnfēng。
I hope you have a safe journey.
风调雨顺，五谷丰登。
Fēngtiáoyǔshùn，wǔgǔfēngdēng。
Good weather brings good harvests.

他们正顺风航行。

顺风潮对小船来说是危险的。

màoyì shùnchā
favourable balance of trade

贸易顺差

顺便
shùnbiàn
on the way
你去超市时顺便帮我到邮局寄封信吧。

这点活儿顺便就干了，不费事
既然时间还早，何不顺便逛逛书店？
路过商店，顺便买点儿东西。
路过邮局顺便把这封信发了。
Drop in before you go.
你走前请顺便来串门。
Stop by on your way home.
在你回家的路上(顺便)来访。
a passing remark
顺便讲的话
They stopped at the store to get a few things.
他们顺便去商店买了些东西。
I will stop at the grocery store and buy a liter of milk.
我要顺便在杂货店买一公升牛奶。
I just stopped by to say hello.
我只是顺便过来问候一下。
I wanted to go for a walk yesterday and by taking my dog with me, I killed two birds with one stone.
我昨天想出去走走，顺便带上了我的狗，真是一举两得啊。
I\'m going by the store tomorrow after work.
明天下班后，我要顺便去趟商店。
in passing
[mention，note+] 顺便地
by the way...
顺便提一下…
passing reference or indirect mention.
顺便提及或间接提及。
By the by, he is not my son.
Shùnbiàn tí yíjù，tā búshì wǒ érzi。
顺便提一句，他不是我儿子。
The show is on Thursday evening，by the way.
Shùnbiàn shuō yíxià，biǎoyǎn jiāng yú xīngqīsì wǎnshang jìnxíng。
顺便说一下，表演将于星期四晚上进行。
Would it be possible for you to drop by tomorrow?
Míngtiān nǐ néng shùnbiàn guòlái ma？
明天你能顺便过来吗？
They will drop into the office for a visit.
Tāmen huì shùnbiàn qù bàngōngshì cānguān yíxià。
他们会顺便去办公室参观一下。
My mother in law dropped over unexpectedly for dinner.
Chūhūyìliào de shì，wǒ de pópo shùnbiàn guòlái chīfàn le。
出乎意料的是，我的婆婆顺便过来吃饭了。
The next day, Dan dropped round to Steven\'s flat.
Dì-èr tiān，Dān shùnbiàn bàifǎngle Shǐdìfēn de gōngyù。
第二天，丹顺便拜访了史蒂芬的公寓。
He went by at the end of the day.
Yìtiān jiéshù de shíhou，tā shùnbiàn zǒufǎngle yíxià。
一天结束的时候，他顺便走访了一下。
I have had it said to me in passing.
Wǒ bùdébù shuō wǒ shùnbiàn。
我不得不说我顺便。
Incidentally, that was the first track off the record.
Shùnbiàn shuō yí jù，nà shì dì-yī shǒu fēi zhèngshì fābiǎo de gēqǔ。
顺便说一句，那是第一首非正式发表的歌曲。
By the way, I really love the smell of your perfume.
Shùnbiàn shuō yíxià，wǒ zhēn de hěn xǐhuan nǐ xiāngshuǐ de wèidào。
顺便说一下，我真的很喜欢你香水的味道。
She went around China for a few months before going home.
Tā zài Zhōngguó shùnbiàn dāi le jǐ gè yuè，ránhòu cái huíjiā。
她在中国顺便待了几个月，然后才回家。
He dropped by for a visit.
Tā shùnbiàn láifǎng。
他顺便来访。
Incidentally, I won\'t go to the party.
Shùnbiàn shuō yíxià，wǒ búhuì cānjiā zhège jùhuì de。
顺便说一下，我不会参加这个聚会的。
He made this remark in passing.
Tā shùnbiàn zuòle zhège pínglùn。
他顺便作了这个评论。
The princess was powerless: when he beckoned to her，she went to him like a lamb.
Gōngzhǔ fēicháng ruǎnruò：tā yì zhāoshǒu，tā biàn shífēn wēnshùn de pǎodào le tā gēnqián。
公主非常软弱：他一招手，她便十分温顺地跑到了他跟前。
这篇文章还得顺一顺。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng hái děi shùnyishùn。
This essay needs polishing.
把这些讲义顺一顺，不要放得乱七八糟的。
Bǎ zhèxiē jiǎngyì shùnyishùn，búyào fàng de luànqībāzāo de。
Please put these teaching materials in order and don\'t leave them in a mess.
不知我这些菜你吃来顺口不顺口？
Bùzhī wǒ zhèxiēcài nǐ chīlái shùnkǒu bú shùnkǒu?
I wonder if my dishes are to your taste.
按年顺序排列
àn niánshùnxù páiliè 
arrange in chronological order

shùnyìng shìjiè zhī cháoliú

Bǎ zhèliǎnggèzì diāndǎo guòlái jùzi jiù shùn le。

duìwài màoyì shùnchā

这个计划能否顺利实施，还没有定准。

风筝顺风而上，很快就飞升到了空中。
Fēng zhe ng shùnfēng ér shàng，hěn kuài jiù fēishēng dào le kōng zhōng。

Lily\'s score was far above this year\'s cut-off mark and was successfully enrolled by her dream university.

Yǒuxiē hǎishòu de xìngqíng hěnwēnshùn。

他神色和悦，应该是顺利通过考试了。

His happy expression means that he should have passed the examination.

shùnshízhēn
clockwise
顺便
shùnbiàn
on the way
顺心
shùnxīn
as one would wish

顺便问一下，他给你回电话了吗？
Shùnbiàn wènyíxià，tā gěi nǐ huí diànhuà le ma？

Jiāotōng hěnshǎo yǒu shùnchàng de shíhou。

一路顺风
yílùshùnfēng

He revealed our secret without thinking.

Nǐmen de jìhuà zhíxíng de shùnlì ma？

下班后你能顺路到医院去看他吗？
Xiàbān hòu nǐ néng shùnlù dào yīyuàn qù kàn tā ma？

Wǒ shùnshǒu bǎ dēngguān shàng。

Tā xiànzài rìzi guò de hěn shùnxīn。

咱们出去走走，忘掉那些不顺心的事。

Zhètào jiājù kànqǐlái tǐng shùnyǎn。

Tā duì nánpéngyǒu kàn bú shùnyǎn。

顺应时代的变化
shùnyìng shídài de biànhuà
change with the times
这家工厂顺利地完成了由国营到私营的转变。

docile

开头顺利/开头不顺利

Wǒ xīwàng nǐ suǒyǒu de jìhuà dōuhuì shùnshùnlìlì de jìnxíng。
我希望你所有的计划都会顺顺利利地进行。

Shùnlì de wánchéngle rènwù，tā xīnzhōng hěn āntiē。
Now that the task is completed, he feels relieved.
安顺场是大渡河上的要津。
事先安排好顺序。
顺次安装。
We have too many things to do and must prioritize.
Wǒmen yǒu xǔduō shìqing yào zuò，bìxū ānpái chū yōuxiān shùnxù。
我们有许多事情要做，必须安排出优先顺序。
She was one of the tamest and most abject creatures imaginable with no will or power to act but as directed.
Tā shì nǐ néng xiǎngxiàng de zuì wēnshùn zuì kělián de rénqún zhōng de yì yuán——méiyǒu yìyuàn、 yě méiyǒu nénglì qù zuò，zhǐnéng tīngcóng biérén de ānpái。
她是你能想象的最温顺最可怜的人群中的一员——没有意愿、也没有能力去做，只能听从别人的安排。
做买卖的
zuò mǎimai de 
businessman; trader; merchant
他是做学问的人，不会做买卖。
Tā shì zuò xuéwèn de rén，bú huì zuò mǎimai。
He\'s a scholar and no businessman.
串乡做买卖的人现在几乎看不到了。
Chuànxiāng zuòmǎimai de rén xiànzài jīhū kànbúdào le。
We can hardly ever see peddlers traveling from village to village on business now.
隔行如隔山，对做买卖我真是一窍不通。
Géháng rú géshān，duì zuò mǎimai wǒ zhēnshì yíqiàobùtōng。
Differences in profession makes one feel worlds apart. I know nothing about business.
他做买卖总是微利多销，因此生意很好。
Tā zuò mǎimai zǒngshì wēilì duōxiāo，yīncǐ shēngyì hěnhǎo。
He is always gaining quick returns with a small profit, and so has a booming business.
做小买卖
zuò xiǎo mǎimai
do small business
现在走街串巷做小买卖的不多见了。
Xiànzài zǒujiē chuàn xiàng zuò xiǎomǎimai de bùduōjiàn le。
Peddlers going through streets and alleys are rarely seen nowadays.
这位老太太的两个姑爷都是做大买卖的。
Zhèwèi lǎotàitai de liǎnggè gūye dōushì zuò dà mǎimai de。
Both sons-in-law of this old lady are running big businesses.
这家小店将要改弦更张，做别的买卖。
Zhèjiā xiǎodiàn jiāngyào gǎixián gēngzhāng，zuò bié de mǎimai。
The small shop is going to change to a new business.
你与其攥着这点儿死钱，还不如做个小买卖，以钱生钱。
Nǐ yǔqí zuàn zhe zhè diǎnr sǐqián，hái bùrú zuò gè xiǎomǎimai，yǐ qián shēng qián。
You\'d do better to start a business to earn money than cling to this little static money.
做这个买卖不但不挣钱，我还得贴钱呢。
Zuò zhège mǎimai búdàn bú zhèngqián，wǒ hái děi tiēqián ne。
I not only fail to make profits out of the business, but have to run it at a loss.
做成一笔买卖
zuòchénɡ yì bǐ mǎimai 
make a deal
他买卖做得很好，现在越来越称钱了。
Tā mǎimai zuò de hěnhǎo，xiànzài yuèláiyuè chènqián le。
His business is prospering, and he is becoming increasingly wealthy.
公司刚刚开业就做成了这笔买卖，真是讨了个利市呀！
Gōngsī gānggāng kāiyè jiù zuòchéng le zhè bǐ mǎimai，zhēnshì tǎo le gè lìshì ya！
The company got business when it just opened. What an auspicious sign!
送上门的买卖你还不做？
Sòng shàng mén de mǎimai nǐ hái bú zuò?
A business right at the door, and you refuse to do it?
虽然只是小宗买卖，可他依然用心去做。
Suīrán zhǐshì xiǎozōng mǎimai，kě tā yīrán yòngxīn qù zuò。
Though it is only a small business, he devotes himself to it.
他的买卖近来像滚雪球似的，越做越大。
Tā de mǎimai jìnlái xiàng gǔn xuě qiú shì de，yuè zuò yuè dà。
His business has snowballed recently.
做买卖亏了本儿
做买卖折了本
这样做买卖还能有赚儿？
你好好做买卖，别搞那些邪门歪道
做买卖哪能没有一点活钱儿。
做买卖，你是内行；修汽车，你可是个老外！
做买卖
做买卖，还要有人牵线。
我们要合伙做买卖，你也算一把手吧。
他在做大买卖，挣大钱。
做了几年买卖，钱包变得充实了
不能做亏本的买卖
贴钱买卖不能做。
做成了一小宗买卖。
to do/make/strike a deal with sb
和某人做买卖
The only reason they sucked up to them was for business.
Tāmen zhīsuǒyǐ fèngchéng tāmen shì wèile zuòchéng mǎimai。
他们之所以奉承他们是为了做成买卖。
She is running her small business in India.
她在印度自己做些小买卖。
His parents sell refrigerators.
Tā de fùmǔ zuò bīngxiāng mǎimai。
他的父母做冰箱买卖。
The company deals in real estate.
Zhè jiā gōngsī zuò dìchǎn mǎimai。
这家公司做地产买卖。
She got a bargain at the auction.
Tā zài pāimàihuì shàng zuòle yì bǐ hésuàn de mǎimai。
她在拍卖会上做了一笔合算的买卖。
Both industries trade in the currency of ideas and information.
Liǎng gè hángyè dōushì zuò gàiniàn hé xìnxī de mǎimai。
两个行业都是做概念和信息的买卖。
Yesterday I got such a good bargain, I\'m really proud of myself.
昨天我做了一笔很上算的买卖，我真为我自己感到自豪。

Suīrán méiyǒu dú guò jǐtiān shū，hé biérén jiāoliú shí tā hái xǐhuan zhuǎnwén，màinòng zìjǐ。
Though not in school for ages, he likes to use fancy words to show off while talking to others.

Huòwù bèi péiběn zhuǎn mài le。
货物被赔本转卖了。

monopoly

卖方市场
màifāngshìchǎng
a seller\'s market
在弹性市场中交易的灵活性是由买卖双方共同掌握的。
Zài tánxìng shìchǎng zhōng jiāoyì de línghuóxìng shì yóu mǎimài shuāngfāng gòngtóng zhǎngwò de。
In an elastic market, it is up to both the seller and the buyer to decide whether a transaction takes place.
买卖双方要交纳百分之三的间接税给房屋中介公司。
Mǎimài shuāngfāng yào jiāonà bǎifēn zhī sān de jiānjiēshuì gěi fángwū zhōng jiè gōngsī。

The organizer put many valuable works of calligraphy, and paintings up for auction.
买卖房屋的任何一方不得轰撵住户搬家。
Mǎimài fángwū de rènhé yì fāngbùdé hōngniǎn zhùhù bān jiā。
Both parties to a housing-contract are forbidden to evict the current occupant of the house.

买卖双方正在签约
ex warehouse

it\'s a seller\'s market

buy (sell) wholesale

Chūmài qí tóngxué de xuésheng shòudàole dàjiā de xiūrǔ。
出卖其同学的学生受到了大家的羞辱。
Sent to jail for two years, he has quixotically refused to clear himself by betraying his colleagues.
Zài jiānyù de liǎngnián，tā xiàng táng jí hē dé yíyàng jùjué tōngguò chūmài zìjǐ de tóngháng lái wèi zìjǐ xǐtuō zuìmíng。
在监狱的两年，他像唐吉诃德一样拒绝通过出卖自己的同行来为自己洗脱罪名。
He would sell his soul for filthy lucre.
Tā wèile búyìzhīcái ér chūmài línghún。
他为了不义之财而出卖灵魂。
His men acted disloyally and betrayed him in the end.
Tā de shǔxià duì tā bù zhōngchéng，bìng zuìzhōng chūmàile tā。
他的属下对他不忠诚，并最终出卖了他。
She whored herself to Hollywood.
Tā bǎ zìjǐ chūmài gěi le Hǎoláiwū。
她把自己出卖给了好莱坞。
He gave us the old double cross.
Tā chūmàile wǒmen。
他出卖了我们。
We were allowed to buy in from a third party.
Tāmen kěyǐ tōngguò dì-sānfāng mǎihuí zìjǐ sòngchū pāimài de dōngxi。
他们可以通过第三方买回自己送出拍卖的东西。
She then called her house and learned it had been put up for sale.
Tā ránhòu dǎ diànhuà dào tāwūzi，cái huòzhī fángzi yǐ bèi tíchū pāimài le。
她然后打电话到她屋子，才获知房子已被提出拍卖了。
The old print fetched a high price at the auction.
Zhè bù jiù yìnshuāpǐn zài pāimàihuì shàng pāichūle hǎo jiàqián。
这部旧印刷品在拍卖会上拍出了好价钱。
After her death, her diary was offered at the auction.
她死后，日记被拿出来拍卖。
He is bidding in for the remaining goods at the auction house.
Zài pāimàiháng， tā zhèngzài chūjià jìngmǎi shèngyú huòwù。
在拍卖行，他正在出价竞买剩余货物。
The dealer put up three of his most valuable paintings for auction.
Zhè míng shāngrén bǎ tā zuì zhēnguì de huìhuà zhōng de sānfú ná chūlái pāimài。
这名商人把他最珍贵的绘画中的三幅拿出来拍卖。
Stoves sold at cost in a sale.
炉子在拍卖中按成本费出售。
They had sold out; you couldn\'t get them for love or money!
Tāmen yǐjīng màiwánle,wúlùn nǐ fùchū shénme，dōu débúdào tāmen le。
它们已经卖完了，无论你付出什么，都得不到它们了。
The house has been on the market almost a year and is still unsold.
Fángzi zài shìchǎng shàng màile yì nián le hái wèi chūshòu chūqù。
房子在市场上卖了一年了还未出售出去。
This vase is not for sale at any price.
这个花瓶不管出多少钱都不卖。
He ran his own small business，but then about five or six years ago it all started to go wrong.
Tā jīngyíngzhe zìjǐ de xiǎo mǎimai，dàn wǔ-liù nián qián，yíqiè dōu chūxiànle wèntí。
他经营着自己的小买卖，但五六年前，一切都出现了问题。
Next time, ask the butcher to bone the meat.
下次让卖肉的把肉里的骨头剔出来。
Such pills are on sale in London for £4 for a bottle of 50.

这些药片在伦敦廉价出售，五十粒一瓶的卖四英镑。
The shill bid for the expensive carpet during the auction in order to drive the price up.

在拍卖期间，这个雇来的“托”将为这块昂贵的地毯出价，以期推动价格不断上升。
别卖嘴了，有本事练两下让我们开开眼。

Don\'t go on chatting about your skill but do a few stunts to entertain us.

这件古董残损的很厉害，不会卖出好价钱的。
Zhèjiàn gǔdǒng cánsǔn de hěnlìhai，búhuì màichū hǎo jiàqián de。
The antique is too damaged to sell at a good price.
工厂门口经常有一个老汉卖茶鸡蛋。
Gōngchǎng ménkǒu jīngcháng yǒu yígè lǎohàn mài chájīdàn。
An elderly man is always selling boiled tea eggs in front of the factory gates.
这套茶具可以拆卖吗？
Zhètào chájù kěyǐ chāi mài ma？
Can I just buy parts of this tea set?
他买卖做得很好，现在越来越称钱了。
Tā mǎimai zuò de hěnhǎo，xiànzài yuèláiyuè chènqián le。
His business is prospering, and he is becoming increasingly wealthy.
他为了吸毒，开始斥卖家产。
Tā wèi le xīdú，kāishǐ chìmài jiāchǎn。
Addicted to the drug, he began to sell the real estate.
每卖出一份保险，她都可以从中抽成。
Měi màichū yífèn bǎoxiǎn，tā dōu kěyǐ cóng zhōng chōuchéng。
For each insurance policy she has sold, she earns a percentage of the policies\' total value.
卖报纸的还没出摊儿，待会儿再去买吧。
Mài bàozhǐ de hái méi chūtānr，dāihuìrzài qù mǎi ba。
The news vender hasn\'t open yet, lets buy it later.
现在走街串巷做小买卖的不多见了。
Xiànzài zǒujiē chuàn xiàng zuò xiǎomǎimai de bùduōjiàn le。
Peddlers going through streets and alleys are rarely seen nowadays.
串乡做买卖的人现在几乎看不到了。
Chuànxiāng zuòmǎimai de rén xiànzài jīhū kànbúdào le。
We can hardly ever see peddlers traveling from village to village on business now.
他垂怜卖唱的父女，多给了他们一些钱。
Tā chuílián màichàng de fùnǚ，duō gěi le tāmen yìxiē qián。
He felt pity for the father and his daughter, so he gave them more money.
这家商店是磁器专卖店。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn shì cíqì zhuānmàidiàn。
This shop is an exclusive porcelain shop.
他好赌成性，把家产都卖光了，有粗砺充饥已经不错了。
Tā hàodǔ chéngxìng，bǎ jiāchǎn dōu màiguāng le，yǒu cūlì chōngjī yǐjing búcuò le。
After gambling became second nature, he sold out all the family property. Having only unpolished rice to allay hunger is pretty good for him.
还有一些存底，就都卖给你吧。
Háiyǒu yìxiē cúndǐ，jiù dōu mài gěi nǐ ba。
We have some goods left in stock, you can have them all.
把这些存粮低价卖了吧。
Bǎ zhèxiē cúnliáng dījià mài le ba。
Sell all the grain in stock at a low price.
这些小商贩搭卖的东西往往有质量问题。
Zhèxiē xiǎoshāngfàn dāmài de dōngxi wǎngwǎng yǒu zhìliàng wèntí。
Those tie-ins from the small retailers are always poor quality.
节日期间，购卖此书者搭头送毛绒玩具。
Jiérì qījiān，gòu mài cǐ shū zhě dā tóu sòng máoróng wánjù。
During the festival, soft toys will be given to those who buy the book.
他们哥几个都是靠打把式卖艺为生。
Tāmen gē jǐgè dōushì kào dǎbǎshì màiyì wéishēng。
The brothers all live by practicing martial arts.
由于连年亏损，公司只能靠出卖土地抵补债务了。
Yóuyú liánnián kuīsǔn，gōngsī zhǐnéng kào chūmài tǔdì dǐbǔ zhàiwù le。
The company had to sell its land to pay off debts due to losses in successive years.
他为了抵还贷款，只能把房子卖掉了。
Tā wèi le dǐhuán dàikuǎn，zhǐnéng bǎ fángzi màidiào le。
In order to pay back the loan, he had no choice but to sell the house.
他把汽车卖了，抵缴了全部贷款。
Tā bǎ qìchē mài le，dǐjiǎo le quánbùdàikuǎn。
He sold his car and paid off all the loan.
他到处兜卖这些积压货物。
Tā dàochù dōumài zhèxiē jīyā huòwù。
He sells surplus goods everywhere.
这些都是豆猪，坚决不能卖杀。
Zhèxiē dōushì dòuzhū，jiānjué bùnéng mài shā。
These pigs have bean-sized cysts inside their bodies, so they cannot be sold.
隔行如隔山，对做买卖我真是一窍不通。
Géháng rú géshān，duì zuò mǎimai wǒ zhēnshì yíqiàobùtōng。
Differences in profession makes one feel worlds apart. I know nothing about business.
这家小店将要改弦更张，做别的买卖。
Zhèjiā xiǎodiàn jiāngyào gǎixián gēngzhāng，zuò bié de mǎimai。
The small shop is going to change to a new business.
我的这些商品都是按公价卖的。
Wǒ de zhèxiē shāngpǐn dōushì àn gōngjià mài de。
All these products of mine are sold according to the official price.
我们这些卖布的组建一个布业公所吧。
Wǒmen zhèxiē màibù de zǔjiàn yígè bùyè gōngsuǒ ba。
We cloth-sellers shall set up a cloth industry office.
青菜剩得不多了，他准备估堆儿卖了。
Qīngcài shèng de bùduō le，tā zhǔnbèi gūduīr mài le。
Without many green vegetables left, he planned to sell them in piles.
这位老太太的两个姑爷都是做大买卖的。
Zhèwèi lǎotàitai de liǎnggè gūye dōushì zuò dà mǎimai de。
Both sons-in-law of this old lady are running big businesses.
这幅古画要等待专家鉴定后才能进行拍卖。
Zhè fú gǔhuà yào děngdài zhuānjiā jiàndìng hòu cáinéng jìnxíng pāimài。
This ancient painting must be authenticated by specialists before its auction.
股价已经长了三倍，你还不打算卖？
Gǔjià yǐjing zhǎng le sān bèi，nǐ hái bùdǎsuàn mài？
The stock price has tripled, don\'t you plan to sell it?
他竟然鼓惑别人倒卖烟草。
Tā jìngrán gǔhuò biérén dǎomài yāncǎo。
To my surprise, he incited others to resell tobacco at a profit.
挂羊头卖狗肉是那些奸商常用的伎俩。
Guà yángtóu mài gǒuròu shì nàxiē jiānshāng chángyòng de jìliǎng。
Palming off goods inferior to what they purport to be is a common trick of unscrupulous merchants.
卖关子是评书中常用的手段技巧，术语称留扣子。
Màiguānzi shì píngshū zhōng chángyòng de shǒuduàn jìqiǎo，shùyǔ chēng liúkòuzi。
Keeping the audience guessing is a common technique in storytelling, the term for it is Liukouzi.
滚肥的牛犊一定能卖个好价钱。
Gǔnféi de niúdú yídìng néng mài gè hǎo jiàqián。
A round, and fat calf can sell for a high price.
我们行东想把买卖盘出去。
Wǒmen hángdōng xiǎng bǎ mǎimai pán chūqù。
The owner of our store wants to transfer ownership to another person.
这道菜很好吃，卖得很好。
Zhè dào cài hěnhǎo chī，mài de hěnhǎo。
This dish is delicious, and sells well.
你这样的杯子在何处有卖的？
Nǐ zhèyàng de bēizi zài héchù yǒu mài de？
Where can I buy a cup like yours?
小卖部里的荷兰豆很畅销。
Xiǎomàibùlǐ de hélándòu hěnchàngxiāo。
Snow peas are very popular in the small shop.
您这里卖盒装的玫瑰花吗？
Nín zhèlǐ mài hézhuāng de méiguīhuā ma？
Do you sell roses in cases?
卖水果的小贩告诉她，红青的李子很甜。
Mài shuǐguǒ de xiǎofàn gàosù tā，hóngqīng de lǐzi hěntián。
The fruit vendor told her plums of black-red color were very sweet.
世上没有卖后悔药的，早知今日，何必当初！
Shìshàng méiyǒu mài hòuhuǐyào de，zǎozhī jīnrì，hébì dāngchū！
There is no medicine to cure regret in the world. You shouldn\'t have behaved like that in the beginning when you knew what the result would be.
他靠卖胡麻为生，日子过得很清苦。
Tā kào mài húmá wéishēng，rìzi guò de hěnqīngkǔ。
Living on selling benne, he led a hard and poor life.
这里明文规定，禁止贩卖黄书。
Zhèlǐ míngwén guīdìng，jìnzhǐ fànmài huángshū。
It is proclaimed in writing here to forbid selling of pornographic books.
卖房子时立下活契，将来房子还是可以赎回的。
Mài fángzi shí lìxià huóqì，jiānglái fángzi háishi kěyǐ shúhuí de。
The house can be redeemed in the future if you make a redeemable contract when selling it.
小时候一听到货郎鼓就知道卖东西的来了。
Xiǎoshíhou yì tīngdào huòlánggǔ jiù zhīdào màidōngxī de lái le。
In my childhood, I knew that sellers were coming the moment I heard their rattle-drum.
我在寄卖行买了一辆旧自行车。
Wǒ zài jìmàiháng mǎi le yí liàng jiù zìxíngchē。
I bought an old bike at a secondhand store.
他为了帮父亲看病卖了家宅。
Tā wèi le bāng fùqīn kànbìng mài le jiāzhái。
He sold his house in order to get money for curing his father\'s disease.
商店的所有商品在进行贱卖，价格十分低廉。
Shāngdiàn de suǒyǒu shāngpǐn zài jìnxíng jiànmài，jiàgé shífēn dīlián。
All the goods in the store are on sale, the prices are really cheap.
这次任务他格外卖力，想将功折罪以弥补上次的失败。
Zhècì rènwù tā géwài màilì，xiǎng jiānggōng zhézuì yǐ míbǔ shàngcì de shībài。
This time he is going to do his utmost to make amends for the failure last time.
这家工艺品店卖的角雕很精美。
Zhèjiā gōngyìpǐndiàn mài de jiǎodiāo hěnjīngměi。
The horn carvings sold at the craftwork shop are very delicate.
国家法律规定，禁药不能随便买卖。
Guójiā fǎlǜ guīdìng，jìnyào bùnéng suíbiàn mǎimài。
The laws say that banned medicine is not allowed to be traded.
这家精品店的服装卖得很贵。
Zhèjiā jīngpǐndiàn de fúzhuāng mài de hěnguì。
The clothes in this boutique are very expensive.
这里卖的净是些没用的书。
Zhèlǐ mài de jìngshì xiē méiyòng de shū。
All the books they sell are useless.
拍卖会上，人们在竞买这个古董。
Pāimàihuì shàng，rénmen zài jìngmǎi zhège gǔdǒng。
People in the auction compete with each other for this antique.
商家竞卖这种高科技产品。
Shāngjiā jìngmài zhèzhǒng gāokējì chǎnpǐn。
The dealers compete with each other to sell these kinds of high-tech products.
这些卖艺的是九流三教，什么人都有。
Zhèxiē màiyì de shì jiǔliú sānjiào，shénme rén dōu yǒu。
These perfomers come from all walks of life.
他因卖假证而被带入拘留所。
Tā yīn mài jiǎzhèng ér bèi dàirù jūliúsuǒ。
He was held in custody for selling fake certificates.
名家书画拍卖会明天举槌。
Míngjiā shūhuà pāimàihuì míngtiān jǔchuí。
The auction of calligraphies and paintings of celebrities will be held tomorrow.
最终他们只好拍卖了这份没有继承人的绝产。
Zuì zhōng tāmen zhǐhǎo pāimài le zhèfèn méiyǒu jìchéngrén de juéchǎn。
Finally they had no choice but to auction the inheritance that had no-one to inherit it.
这么一大笔钱，就是绝卖了房子也凑不出来啊。
Zhème yí dà bǐ qián，jiùshì juémài le fángzi yě còu bùchūlái a。
This is such a large sum of money, it can\'t be raised even if I sell the house.
拍卖会开槌以后，还没拍出一件东西呢。
Pāimàihuì kāichuí yǐhòu，hái méi pāichū yíjiàn dōngxi ne。
Since the beginning of the auction, not a single article has been sold.
拍卖会上，这幅油画开叫1万元，可是没人应拍。
Pāimàihuì shàng，zhèfú yóuhuà kāijiào yíwànyuán，kěshì méirén yìngpāi。
During the auction, the bid price for this painting was 10,000 yuan, but no one responded to it.
这次拍卖会上，我拍到了一个精美的彩绘雕花的炕屏。
Zhècì pāimàihuì shàng，wǒ pāidào le yígè jīngměi de cǎihuì diāohuā de kàngpíng。
In this auction, I bought an exquisite screen with colored carvings for the kang.
一直到快过年了，它还只是一头壳郎猪，没法拿到集市上卖。
Yìzhí dào kuài guònián le，tā hái zhǐshì yì tóu kélángzhū，méifǎ nádào jíshìshàng mài。
As New Year approached, it was still a feeder pig and couldn\'t be sold in the market.
他从来没时间自己做午饭，总是叫快餐店里的外卖。
Tā cónglái méi shíjiān zìjǐ zuò wǔfàn，zǒngshì jiào kuàicāndiàn lǐ de wàimài。
He has never cooked lunch himself and always takes out from a fast-food restaurant.
他们两家公司一个是卖伞的，一个是买车的，你却硬要拉郎配，这样太勉强了吧！
Tāmen liǎng jiā gōngsī yígè shì màisǎn de，yígè shì mǎichē de，nǐ què yìngyào lālángpèi，zhèyàng tài miǎnqiǎng le ba！
The two companies sell umbrellas and cars respectively; it is nearly impossible for you to unite them.
他用喇叭筒叫卖，省劲多了！
Tā yòng lǎbātǒng jiàomài，shěngjìn duō le！
He hawks with a megaphone, saving a lot of effort.
这家店卖的缆绳很结实，我们一直都是从那里买的！
Zhèjiā diàn mài de lǎnshéng hěnjiēshi，wǒmen yìzhí dōushì cóng nàlǐ mǎi de！
We always buy cables from this shop, for they are sturdy.
这几粒琅玕的成色很好，可以卖个好价钱。
Zhè jǐ lì lánggān de chéngsè hěnhǎo，kěyǐ mài gè hǎo jiàqián。
The several pearl-like stones are of high purity and can fetch a high price.
公司刚刚开业就做成了这笔买卖，真是讨了个利市呀！
Gōngsī gānggāng kāiyè jiù zuòchéng le zhè bǐ mǎimai，zhēnshì tǎo le gè lìshì ya！
The company got business when it just opened. What an auspicious sign!
集市上有很多艺人撂地卖艺。
Jíshì shàng yǒu hěnduō yìrén liàodì màiyì。
In the market, there are many actors performing there by the stall.
拍卖的时候，这件商品的落槌价格是7万元。
Pāimài de shíhou，zhèjiàn shāngpǐn de luòchuí jiàgé shì qīwànyuán。
The closing bid in the auction for the merchandise was 70,000 yuan.
今天下午这个拍卖会就要落槌了。
Jīntiān xiàwǔ zhège pāimàihuì jiùyào luòchuí le。
The auction will wind up this afternoon.
从他的言谈举止中可以看出他是一个买卖人。
Cóng tā de yántán jǔzhǐ zhōng kěyǐ kànchū tā shì yígè mǎimairén。
It is clear from the way he talks and behaves that he is a businessman.
由于生活窘迫，她一直以卖春为生。
Yóuyú shēnghuó jiǒngpò，tā yìzhí yǐ màichūn wéishēng。
She has been living from selling sex due to poverty.
他由于利用职权卖大号，受到了领导的批评。
Tā yóuyú lìyòng zhíquán màidàhào，shòudào le lǐngdǎo de pīpíng。
He abused his power and profiteers by selling much-needed goods to individual buyers in batches, so he was criticized by the leaders.
他在会议上卖功，使得大家都很反感。
Tā zài huìyì shàng màigōng，shǐdé dàjiā dōu hěnfǎngǎn。
He boasted of his contributions in the meeting, which made others feel disgusted.
这种卖关节的行为，我们应当严厉打击。
Zhèzhǒng màiguānjié de xíngwéi，wǒmen yīngdāng yánlì dǎjī。
We should crack down on the action of taking bribes in secret and offering favors in return.
学生们走上街头，高喊打倒卖国贼的口号。
Xuéshēngmen zǒushàng jiētóu，gāohǎn dǎdǎo màiguózéi de kǒuhào。
Students walked onto the street and shouted “down with traitors”.
他是个实在人，干起活来很卖劲。
Tā shì gè shízairén，gànqǐhuólái hěnmàijìn。
He is an honest man, and goes all out in his work.
由于欠地主家的钱，她不得已签了卖身契。
Yóuyú qiàn dìzhǔ jiā de qián，tā bùdéyǐ qiān le màishēnqì。
She had to sign an indenture to sell herself, because she owed money to the landlord.
他失去了耕地，只能靠卖解度日了。
Tā shīqù le gēngdì，zhǐnéng kào màijiě dùrì le。
He lost his farmland, so he had to make a living by giving acrobatic performances in the street.
他为了这个职位不惜卖友求荣。
Tā wèi le zhège zhíwèi bùxī màiyǒu qiúróng。
He did not hesitate to betray his friend to obtain the position.
在最近破获的贩卖人口案中，我们逮捕了6个拍花的！
Zài zuìjìn pòhuò de fànmài rénkǒu àn zhōng，wǒmen dǎibǔ le liùgè pāihuā de！
In the white slavery case cracked recently, we captured six people who kidnapped children using knockout drops.
我在乐器专卖店买了一个二胡的琴弓。
Wǒ zài yuèqì zhuānmàidiàn mǎi le yígè èrhú de qíngōng。
I bought an erhu bow in a specialist instrument shop.
本店服装一律清库甩卖！
Běndiàn fúzhuāng yílǜ qīngkù shuǎimài！
All the clothes in our shop are on clearance sale!
刚学会这首歌他就当众唱了起来，他可真会热炒热卖呀。
Gāng xuéhuì zhèshǒugē tā jiù dāngzhòng chàng le qǐlái，tā kě zhēn huì rèchǎo rèmài ya。
He sung the song in public just after he had learned it, he is good at applying newly acquired skills in practice.
我午饭吃了十个肉馅的烧卖。
Wǒ wǔfàn chī le shí gè ròuxiàn de shāomai。
I ate ten shaomei with meat stuffing for lunch.
我打算在集市上设摊卖包子。
Wǒ dǎsuan zài jíshì shàng shètān mài bāozi。
I plan to set up a stand in the market to sell steamed stuffed buns.
我是实意想买那件衣服，可那卖家却没有实价。
Wǒ shì shíyì xiǎng mǎi nà jiàn yīfu，kě nà màijiā què méiyǒu shíjià。
I did want to buy that garment, but the seller didn\'t give me an acceptable price.
贩卖私盐是违法的。
Fànmài sīyán shì wéifǎ de。
It is illegal to sell salt without paying the tax.
你与其攥着这点儿死钱，还不如做个小买卖，以钱生钱。
Nǐ yǔqí zuàn zhe zhè diǎnr sǐqián，hái bùrú zuò gè xiǎomǎimai，yǐ qián shēng qián。
You\'d do better to start a business to earn money than cling to this little static money.
这家店卖的炒花生松脆可口。
Zhèjiā diàn mài de chǎohuāshēng sōngcuì kěkǒu。
The stir-fried peanuts sold by this shop are crisp and delicious.
他的摊床上摆满了要甩卖的货物。
Tā de tānchuáng shàng bǎimǎn le yào shuǎimài de huòwù。
There are many goods marked down for sale on the stand he has just set up.
这个摊群大部分都是卖粮食的摊位。
Zhège tānqún dàbùfen dōushì mài liángshí de tānwèi。
The group of stalls here sell grain.
在弹性市场中交易的灵活性是由买卖双方共同掌握的。
Zài tánxìng shìchǎng zhōng jiāoyì de línghuóxìng shì yóu mǎimài shuāngfāng gòngtóng zhǎngwò de。
In an elastic market, it is up to both the seller and the buyer to decide whether a transaction takes place.
看来只有把这些添箱卖了才能渡过难关了。
Kànlái zhǐyǒu bǎ zhèxiē tiānxiāng mài le cáinéng dùguò nánguān le。
I guess we have to sell these presents from the wedding to get through this difficultly.
做这个买卖不但不挣钱，我还得贴钱呢。
Zuò zhège mǎimai búdàn bú zhèngqián，wǒ hái děi tiēqián ne。
I not only fail to make profits out of the business, but have to run it at a loss.
我真恨不得把这个卖国贼投畀豺虎。
Wǒ zhēn hènbùdé bǎ zhège màiguózéi tóubì cháihǔ。
I can\'t wait to throw this traitor to the wolves and tigers to be eaten.
这种商品卖得太快，几天的工夫就脱档了。
Zhèzhǒng shāngpǐn mài de tàikuài，jǐ tiān de gōngfu jiù tuōdàng le。
This commodity sells very well, it went out of stock in just a few days.
春节期间，街上有很多卖小玩艺儿的。
Chūnjié qījiān，jiē shàng yǒu hěnduō mài xiǎowányìr de。
Many people sell souvenirs in the street during Spring Festival.
他做买卖总是微利多销，因此生意很好。
Tā zuò mǎimai zǒngshì wēilì duōxiāo，yīncǐ shēngyì hěnhǎo。
He is always gaining quick returns with a small profit, and so has a booming business.
街口拐角处新开了一家专卖西裤的商店。
Jiēkǒu guǎijiǎochù xīnkāi le yìjiā zhuānmài xīkù de shāngdiàn。
A shop that sells western style trousers just opened on the street corner.
因为老张几个月前就下定了，所以这房子必须卖给他。
Yīnwéi Lǎo Zhāng jǐgè yuè qián jiù xiàdìng le，suǒyǐ zhè fángzi bìxū mài gěi tā。
Lao zhang has already paid the down payment several months ago, so this house must go to him.
丽丽很小就被卖到大户人家当下女。
Lìlì hěn xiǎo jiù bèi màidào dàhù rénjiā dāng xiànǚ。
Lily was sold to a rich family as a servant when she was young.
菜场新开了一家专卖冷鲜肉的店铺。
Càichǎng xīnkāi le yìjiā zhuānmài lěngxiānròu de diànpù。
A fresh meat store recently opened in the food market.
自己刚刚学会了跳舞就去教别人，你可真是现买现卖。
Zìjǐ gānggāng xuéhuì le tiàowǔ jiù qù jiāo biérén，nǐ kě zhēnshì xiànmǎi xiànmài。
You teach others to dance right after you learnt it, which is really hand-to-mouth buying and selling.
街角那家店里卖的香干儿是我们这里最有名的。
Jiējiǎo nàjiā diàn lǐ mài de xiānggānr shì wǒmen zhèlǐ zuì yǒumíng de。
The been curd sold in the shop around the corner is well-known in this area.
因为家里穷，她从小就被卖去当像生。
Yīnwéi jiā lǐ qióng，tā cóng xiǎo jiù bèi mài qù dāng xiàng shēng。
She was sold to be an actress when she was young because her family was very poor.
路边有好多卖各种美食的小吃店。
Lùbiān yǒu hǎoduō mài gèzhǒng měishí de xiǎochīdiàn。
There are many snack bars along the roadside which serve delicious food.
我这只是小买小卖，成不了大气候。
Wǒ zhè zhǐshì mǎi xiǎomǎi xiǎomài，chéngbùliǎo dàqìhou。
This is only small business which is hard to branch out.
这条街专卖小食，所以被誉为“小吃第一街”。
Zhè tiáo jiē zhuānmài xiǎoshí，suǒyǐ bèi yùwéi“xiǎochī dìyī jiē”。
This street is famous for its snacks and is honored as &quot;the first snack street&quot;.
小摊儿上有很多小工艺品卖，价格不贵。
Xiǎotānr shàng yǒu hěnduō xiǎogōngyìpǐn mài，jiàgé búguì。
There are many small and cheap articles in the flea market.
虽然只是小宗买卖，可他依然用心去做。
Suīrán zhǐshì xiǎozōng mǎimai，kě tā yīrán yòngxīn qù zuò。
Though it is only a small business, he devotes himself to it.
这可是咱压仓的货，你也要拿出去卖吗？
Zhè kěshì zán yācāng de huò，nǐ yěyào ná chūqù mài ma？
This is our ballast. Do you want to sell even this?
他就是卖你妹妹的牙子，我们恨死他了。
Tā jiùshì mài nǐ mèimei de yázi，wǒmen hèn sǐ tā le。
We all hate him because he is the middleman in selling your little sister.
烟贩的话你也相信，他们卖的多半是假烟。
Yānfàn de huà nǐ yě xiāngxìn，tāmen mài de duōbàn shì jiǎyān。
Don\'t believe those cigarette peddlers.Their goods are fake most of the time.
路边有很多卖烤羊肉串的人。
Lùbiān yǒu hěnduō mài kǎo yángròuchuàn de rén。
There are many people who sell pieces of roast mutton on a skewer by the roadside.
洋装书很好卖，大家都图个新鲜。
Yángzhuāngshū hěn hǎomài，dàjiā dōu tú gè xīnxiān。
Books with Western-style bindings sell well, everyone looks for novelty.
空调缺货，连样子货都卖了。
Kōngtiáo quēhuò，lián yàngzihuò dōu mài le。
Air conditioners are out of stock. Even the samples have been sold.
餐馆最近出售野禽的菜肴，卖得很好。
Cānguǎn zuìjìn chūshòu yěqín de càiyáo，mài de hěnhǎo。
The restaurant sells dishes made of wild fowl, they sell well.
这笔买卖业外人士都不看好。
Zhèbǐ mǎimai yèwài rénshì dōu bú kànhǎo。
People outside the scope of the trade don\'t think the transaction has a good prospect.
现在卖保险的人都是一家一户上门服务的。
Xiànzài mài bǎoxiǎn de rén dōushì yìjiā yí hù shàngmén fúwù de。
Nowadays, people who sell insurance provide services door to door.
快过年了，妈妈决定卖掉家里的幼畜换点钱。
Kuài guònián le，māma juédìng màidiào jiālǐ de yòuchù huàndiǎnqián。
With the coming of the New Year, mother decided to sell the new stock so as to get some money.
妹妹最喜欢吃超市里卖的那种鱼片儿了。
Mèimei zuì xǐhuan chī chāoshì lǐ mài de nàzhǒng yúpiànr le。
My sister likes the kind of dried fish meat slices sold at the supermarkets best.
这小子长得很圆实，干起活来也很卖力。
Zhè xiǎozi zhǎng de hěn yuánshí，gànqǐhuólái yě hěn màilì。
This boy is robust and works very hard.
这筐梨约摸有300斤，估计能卖到500元。
Zhè kuāng lí yuēmō yǒu sānbǎijīn，gūjì néng màidào wǔbǎiyuán。
This basket of pears is probably 300 jin in weight; I guess that they can be sold for 500 yuan.
这家百年老店专卖云锦。
Zhèjiā bǎinián lǎodiàn zhuānmài yúnjǐn。
The old store, which has a history of hundreds of years, sells special cloud-pattern brocade.
虽然没有读过几天书，和别人交流时他还喜欢转文，卖弄自己。
Suīrán méiyǒu dú guò jǐtiān shū，hé biérén jiāoliú shí tā hái xǐhuan zhuǎnwén，màinòng zìjǐ。
Though not in school for ages, he likes to use fancy words to show off while talking to others.
坐商卖的东西一般不会有假冒产品。
Zuòshāng mài de dōngxi yìbān búhuì yǒu jiǎmào chǎnpǐn。
Products sold by shopkeepers are seldom fake.
现在小村庄的人们不但能自给自足，还把富裕的农产品卖到城市里去。
Xiànzài xiǎo cūnzhuāng de rénmen búdàn néng zìgěi zìzú，hái bǎ fùyù de nóngchǎnpǐn mài dào chéngshì lǐ qù。
Nowadays, people from small villages can not only support themselves but also sell surplus farm products to the city.
包装箱别乱扔，还是卖到废品收购站吧。
Bāozhuāngxiāng bié luànrēng，háishì màidào fèipǐn shōugòuzhàn ba。
Don\'t throw away the packing boxes. It\'s better to sell them to the recycling station.
这些出版物都是非法的，不能再卖了。
Zhèxiē chūbǎnwù dōushì fēifǎ de，bùnéng zài mài le。
These publications can no longer be sold because they are illegal.
买卖双方要交纳百分之三的间接税给房屋中介公司。
Mǎimài shuāngfāng yào jiāonà bǎifēn zhī sān de jiānjiēshuì gěi fángwū zhōng jiè gōngsī。
The buyer and seller are obliged to pay an indirect tax amounting to 3% of the price of the house to the real estate company.
自由市场里商贩们不停地叫卖着。
Zìyóu shìchǎng lǐ shāngfànmen bùtíng dì jiàomài zhe。
In a free market, retailers hawk their wares.
她被迫卖掉首饰。
Tā bèipò màidiào shǒushi。
She was forced to sell her jewellery.
这笔买卖多少能赚点钱。
Zhèbǐmǎimài duōshǎo néng zhuàndiǎnqián。
We\'re bound to earn some money from this deal.

卖方仓库交货价
an exclusive right to sell something
某物的专卖权
to sell a house for $20,000
把房子卖了20，000美元
to impose false cures on unsuspecting patients
把假药卖给轻信的病人
That venture made him
那次投机买卖使他成为暴发户。
plus sales
有利的买卖
a proprietary medicine
特许专卖药
the hit of the week
本周最轰动的消息；本周最卖座的电影(或戏剧)
traffic in drugs
非法的毒品买卖
a hack writer
穷文人，雇佣文人，卖身投靠的文人
She won\'t take less than $50 for that dress.
那条裙子她要价五十美元，少了就不卖。
Yesterday I got such a good bargain, I\'m really proud of myself.
昨天我做了一笔很上算的买卖，我真为我自己感到自豪。
The police found out they were selling arms to the terrorists.
警察发现他们正在向恐怖分子贩卖军火。

Joyside乐队演唱会的票已经卖完了，简还在找票。
There is a small hotdog stand outside.
外面有家卖热狗的小店。
Rice is sold in kilograms.
大米论公斤卖。

如果卖掉自己所有的艺术藏品，他会赚上不小一笔钱。

我在住宅区附近的小卖铺买了一包绿茶。
The salesclerk has sold a lot of cars.
这名店员卖掉了很多辆汽车。

我们到达商店时，大多数好的自行车已经卖完了，我只好选择了我不喜欢的那辆。
I suppose that all the CDs will be sold by next week.
我猜下周这些CD就得全部卖光。

拐卖妇女和走私毒品都是重罪。

她不得不卖掉自己所有值钱的东西。

你知道那家店也卖冰激凌吗？

这些新裤子卖得很快。

正值冬季特卖，所有服装五折销售。

这个花瓶不管出多少钱都不卖。

她在印度自己做些小买卖。

他打算卖掉他的车。

他是卖鞋的。

杂货店的蔬菜卖光了。

下次让卖肉的把肉里的骨头剔出来。

我们小区那家卖的肉堪称全市最物美价廉的了。

他要去中专学习，将来要去卖肉。

等你到那儿，吃的早就卖完了！

她死后，日记被拿出来拍卖。

这副画根本没卖到那么高的价钱

现在走街串巷做小买卖的不多见了。
Xiànzài zǒujiē chuàn xiàng zuò xiǎomǎimai de bùduōjiàn le。
Peddlers going through streets and alleys are rarely seen nowadays.
串乡做买卖的人现在几乎看不到了。
Chuànxiāng zuòmǎimai de rén xiànzài jīhū kànbúdào le。
We can hardly ever see peddlers traveling from village to village on business now.
隔行如隔山，对做买卖我真是一窍不通。
Géháng rú géshān，duì zuò mǎimai wǒ zhēnshì yíqiàobùtōng。
Differences in profession makes one feel worlds apart. I know nothing about business.
这家小店将要改弦更张，做别的买卖。
Zhèjiā xiǎodiàn jiāngyào gǎixián gēngzhāng，zuò bié de mǎimai。
The small shop is going to change to a new business.
这位老太太的两个姑爷都是做大买卖的。
Zhèwèi lǎotàitai de liǎnggè gūye dōushì zuò dà mǎimai de。
Both sons-in-law of this old lady are running big businesses.
我们行东想把买卖盘出去。
Wǒmen hángdōng xiǎng bǎ mǎimai pán chūqù。
The owner of our store wants to transfer ownership to another person.
国家法律规定，禁药不能随便买卖。
Guójiā fǎlǜ guīdìng，jìnyào bùnéng suíbiàn mǎimài。
The laws say that banned medicine is not allowed to be traded.
公司刚刚开业就做成了这笔买卖，真是讨了个利市呀！
Gōngsī gānggāng kāiyè jiù zuòchéng le zhè bǐ mǎimai，zhēnshì tǎo le gè lìshì ya！
The company got business when it just opened. What an auspicious sign!
从他的言谈举止中可以看出他是一个买卖人。
Cóng tā de yántán jǔzhǐ zhōng kěyǐ kànchū tā shì yígè mǎimairén。
It is clear from the way he talks and behaves that he is a businessman.
你与其攥着这点儿死钱，还不如做个小买卖，以钱生钱。
Nǐ yǔqí zuàn zhe zhè diǎnr sǐqián，hái bùrú zuò gè xiǎomǎimai，yǐ qián shēng qián。
You\'d do better to start a business to earn money than cling to this little static money.
在弹性市场中交易的灵活性是由买卖双方共同掌握的。
Zài tánxìng shìchǎng zhōng jiāoyì de línghuóxìng shì yóu mǎimài shuāngfāng gòngtóng zhǎngwò de。
In an elastic market, it is up to both the seller and the buyer to decide whether a transaction takes place.
做这个买卖不但不挣钱，我还得贴钱呢。
Zuò zhège mǎimai búdàn bú zhèngqián，wǒ hái děi tiēqián ne。
I not only fail to make profits out of the business, but have to run it at a loss.
他做买卖总是微利多销，因此生意很好。
Tā zuò mǎimai zǒngshì wēilì duōxiāo，yīncǐ shēngyì hěnhǎo。
He is always gaining quick returns with a small profit, and so has a booming business.
虽然只是小宗买卖，可他依然用心去做。
Suīrán zhǐshì xiǎozōng mǎimai，kě tā yīrán yòngxīn qù zuò。
Though it is only a small business, he devotes himself to it.
这笔买卖业外人士都不看好。
Zhèbǐ mǎimai yèwài rénshì dōu bú kànhǎo。
People outside the scope of the trade don\'t think the transaction has a good prospect.
买卖双方要交纳百分之三的间接税给房屋中介公司。
Mǎimài shuāngfāng yào jiāonà bǎifēn zhī sān de jiānjiēshuì gěi fángwū zhōng jiè gōngsī。
The buyer and seller are obliged to pay an indirect tax amounting to 3% of the price of the house to the real estate company.
这笔买卖多少能赚点钱。
Zhèbǐmǎimài duōshǎo néng zhuàndiǎnqián。
We\'re bound to earn some money from this deal.
当地市场的买卖很兴隆。
Dāngdì shìchǎng de mǎimài hěn xīnglóng.
Business is brisk at the local market.
趸批买进(卖出)
dǔnpī mǎijìn(màichū)
buy (sell) wholesale
公买公卖
gōngmǎi gōngmài
be fair in buying and selling; buy and sell at reasonable prices
自己刚刚学会了跳舞就去教别人，你可真是现买现卖。
Zìjǐ gānggāng xuéhuì le tiàowǔ jiù qù jiāo biérén，nǐ kě zhēnshì xiànmǎi xiànmài。
You teach others to dance right after you learnt it, which is really hand-to-mouth buying and selling.
我这只是小买小卖，成不了大气候。
Wǒ zhè zhǐshì mǎi xiǎomǎi xiǎomài，chéngbùliǎo dàqìhou。
This is only small business which is hard to branch out.
我在寄卖行买了一辆旧自行车。
Wǒ zài jìmàiháng mǎi le yí liàng jiù zìxíngchē。
I bought an old bike at a secondhand store.
我在乐器专卖店买了一个二胡的琴弓。
Wǒ zài yuèqì zhuānmàidiàn mǎi le yígè èrhú de qíngōng。
I bought an erhu bow in a specialist instrument shop.

Wèile mǎi fángzǐ，tā bǎ chē màile。
He sold his car in order to buy a house.
我是实意想买那件衣服，可那卖家却没有实价。
Wǒ shì shíyì xiǎng mǎi nà jiàn yīfu，kě nà màijiā què méiyǒu shíjià。
I did want to buy that garment, but the seller didn\'t give me an acceptable price.
他们两家公司一个是卖伞的，一个是买车的，你却硬要拉郎配，这样太勉强了吧！
Tāmen liǎng jiā gōngsī yígè shì màisǎn de，yígè shì mǎichē de，nǐ què yìngyào lālángpèi，zhèyàng tài miǎnqiǎng le ba！
The two companies sell umbrellas and cars respectively; it is nearly impossible for you to unite them.
卖花的女孩沿街叫卖，可惜没有人买她的花。
Màihuā de nǚhái yánjiē jiàomài，kěxī méiyǒu rén mǎi tā de huā。
The flower girl sold alongside the road, but no one bought her flowers.
拍卖会上，人们在竞买这个古董。
Pāimàihuì shàng，rénmen zài jìngmǎi zhège gǔdǒng。
People in the auction compete with each other for this antique.
卖报纸的还没出摊儿，待会儿再去买吧。

The news vender hasn\'t open yet, lets buy it later.

There is an upswing of prices on the stock market.

Zài dàilái jùdà jīngjì sǔnshī de tóngshí，gǔshì de bēngpán hái huì yǐnqǐ shèhuì dòngdàng。
In addition to generating huge economic losses, a stock market crash will cause social turbulence.
近期股市震荡，我已经把仓位降到了二分之一。
Jìnqī gǔshì zhèndàng，wǒ yǐjing bǎ cāngwèi jiàngdào le èr fēn zhīyī。
I have reduced the empty space of the storehouses by a half beacause of the unstable stock market.
这两天股市的成交额明显提高了。
Zhè liǎngtiān gǔshì de chéngjiāoé míngxiǎn tígāo le。
Recently, the volume of business has obviously increased.
股市再吹跌风，她十分紧张。
Gǔshì zài chuī diēfēng，tā shífēn jǐnzhāng。
She is very nervous because stock market prices are likely to fall.
他可以在股市中控盘，说明他有很强的经济实力！

He can manipulate stock quotations on the stock market, so he must have great economic power.
今天股市达到了有史以来的浪谷，许多人都为此倾家荡产。
Jīntiān gǔshì dádào le yǒushǐ yǐlái de lànggǔ，xǔduō rén dōu wèicǐ qīngjiā dàngchǎn。
Stocks tumbled to their lowest level today, and many people have been reduced to poverty and ruin.
最近股市不断地盘跌，震荡不大。
Zuìjìn gǔshì búduàn de pándiē，zhèndàng búdà。
Recently, the stock market has been falling slightly in price, with small fluctuations.
年后股市盘面乐观，都在看涨。
Niánhòu gǔshì pánmiàn lèguān，dōu zài kànzhǎng。
The stock market is bullish after the new year, all stocks are rising in price.
因为股市不景气，他不得不斩仓。
Yīnwéi gǔshì bùjǐngqì，tā bùdébùzhǎncāng。
As the stock market is in recession, he has to sell his shares at a low price.
他对股市变化反应迟钝。
Tā duì gǔshìbiànhuà fǎnyìngchídùn。

controlling interest
[商] 控股权益
These shares have not been cancelled and are being held as treasury shares.

这些股权并未被取消，而是作为基金份额持有。

Many investors in shares gathered together in the stock exchange.

Gǔpiào de jiàgé suí zhe shìchǎng cháozhǎng cháoluò。
The price of stock moves up and down with the market.
这只股票今天的开盘价是六元整。
Zhèzhī gǔpiào jīntiān de kāipánjià shì liù yuán zhěng。
The opening price of this stock today is only 6 yuan.
准确判断股价的峰位与底位。
股价猛涨
股价暴跌。
股价劲升。
股价狂跌。
股价刚一攀升，便有人抛盘。
前市股价指数上扬后又有小幅回落。
今日股价升幅较大。
股价近日稳步扬升。
钢铁、汽车等类股价近日全线上涨。
股票价格暴跌后开始反弹。
股市价格坚俉。
收盘价独居股市榜首。
Bad news drives the price of the stock downwards, and good news upwards.
Huàixiāoxī dàidòng gǔjià xiàjiàng，hǎoxiāoxī tuīdòng gǔjià shàngzhǎng。
坏消息带动股价下降，好消息推动股价上涨。
The two companies conspired to cause the value of the stock to fall.
Liǎng jiā gōngsī mìmóu kòngzhì gǔjià，lìng gǔjià dàfú xiàdiē。
两家公司密谋控制股价，令股价大幅下跌。
Stocks were overpriced and the crash brought the share prices back to a normal level.
Gǔjià yuánběn tài gāo le，zhè cì bàodiē bǎ gǔpiào dàihuíle zhèngcháng shuǐpíng。
股价原本太高了，这次暴跌把股票带回了正常水平。
During that month, Fidelity\'s share price fell sharply.
那个月富达的股价狂跌。
Intelligence from reliable sources said the share price will go up.
有可靠来源的消息说股价会上涨。
Suddenly we get a takeover bid and its share price has risen sharply.
Wǒmen tūrán shōudàole jiēguǎn yāoyuē，qí gǔjià jíjùshàngshēng。
我们突然收到了接管要约，其股价急剧上升。
When investing look for broken stocks not broken compnaies.
Zài jìnxíng tóuzī shí，yào xúnzhǎo nàxiē gǔjià zài dīwèi dàn jīběnmiàn búcuò de gōngsī。
在进行投资时，要寻找那些股价在低位但基本面不错的公司。
Analysts predict the share price will now climb above £2m.

这些报告发表之后，股价就不再坚挺了。
Bidding up share prices is a common practice to make an instant gain.

哄抬股价是取得即时利益的一种普遍做法。
We were advised to buy in before the price skyrocketed.

Gǔjià xiàjiàng。

We were acting on our responsibility to our shareholders.
Wǒmen zìzuòzhǔzhāng de duì gǔdōng cǎiqǔ xíngdòng。
我们自作主张地对股东采取行动。
Shareholders were precluded from intervening in the ordinary business of the company.
Gǔdōngmen bùnéng gānshè gōngsī de rìcháng yèwù。
股东们不能干涉公司的日常业务。
Continued trading will reduce the value of the assets to the prejudice of the company\'s creditors or shareholders.
Chíxù jiāoyìhuì jiǎnshǎo zīchǎn de jiàzhí，sǔnhài gōngsī zhàiquánrén hé gǔdōng de lìyì。
持续交易会减少资产的价值，损害公司债权人和股东的利益。
A major telecommunications company announced a tender for their shareholders.
Yì jiā zhǔyào tōngxìn gōngsī xuānbùle gǔdōng de yí xiàng tóubiāo。
一家主要通信公司宣布了股东的一项投标。
Shareholders don\'t want the company playing musical chairs with their investment.
Gǔdōngmen bù xīwàng nà jiā gōngsī bǎ tāmen de tóuzī yòng zài méiyǒu shíjì xiàoguǒ de huódòng tiáozhěng shàng。
股东们不希望那家公司把他们的投资用在没有实际效果的活动调整上。
Technically, a bank\'s reserves belong to the stockholders.
Cóng jìshù céngmiàn shàng jiǎng，yínháng de chǔbèijīn shǔyú gǔdōng。
从技术层面上讲，银行的储备金属于股东。
ACGA also calls for changes to shareholder meetings.
ACGA hái hūyù duì gǔdōngdàhuì jìnxíng gǎigé。
ACGA还呼吁对股东大会进行改革。
股本
炒股票赔了老本。
The process of stake purchase has been simplified.
购买股本的手续简化了。
Hedge funds\' assets have increased more than thirtyfold since l990, and they are now competing with traditional financial companies such as banks and private equity firms.
1990年以来，对冲基金的资产规模扩大了30多倍，现在，他们正与银行、私有股本公司这样的传统金融企业一拼高下。
Stocks were overpriced and the crash brought the share prices back to a normal level.
Gǔjià yuánběn tài gāo le，zhè cì bàodiē bǎ gǔpiào dàihuíle zhèngcháng shuǐpíng。
股价原本太高了，这次暴跌把股票带回了正常水平。
The stock market closed high this Friday.
Gǔshì zài běnzhōu wǔ yǐ gāojià shōupán。
股市在本周五以高价收盘。
Ben never invests in spot.
本从不投资股票。
When investing look for broken stocks not broken compnaies.
Zài jìnxíng tóuzī shí，yào xúnzhǎo nàxiē gǔjià zài dīwèi dàn jīběnmiàn búcuò de gōngsī。
在进行投资时，要寻找那些股价在低位但基本面不错的公司。
Many equity markets have set fresh highs this month.
běnyuè yǒu xǔduō gǔshì chuàngxià xīngāo。
本月有许多股市创下新高。
The spectacular flame-out of the company\'s stock cost many people their life savings.
Gōngsī gǔpiào de tiàoshuǐ ràng hěnduō rén xuèběn wú guī。
公司股票的跳水让很多人血本无归。
股利的主要发放形式有现金股利、股票股利、财产股利和建业股利。
Gǔlì de zhǔyào fāfàng xíngshì yǒu xiànjīn gǔlì、gǔpiào gǔlì、cáichǎn gǔlì hé jiànyè gǔlì。
The main granting forms for dividends include cash dividends, stock dividends, property dividends and construction dividends.
宣传股股长开会去了。
Xuānchuángǔ gǔzhǎng kāihuì qù le。
这只股的股票价格跌得一塌糊涂。
Zhèzhī gǔ de gǔpiào jiàgé diē de yìtāhútú。
The price of this stock is slumping.
股市不稳，很多股民开始减仓。
Gǔshì bùwĕn，hĕn duō gǔmín kāishǐ jiǎncāng.
The stock market is becoming volatile, so many shareholders begin to sell shares.
他之所以可以控股，是因为他拥有这家公司百分之60的股份！
Tā zhīsuǒyǐ kěyǐ kònggǔ，shì yīnwèi tā yōngyǒu zhè jiā gōngsī bǎifēnzhī liùshí de gǔfèn！
He can control the company because he holds 60 percent of its shares.
近来股市有些疲困，个股只跌不涨。
Jìnlái gǔshì yǒuxiē píkùn，gè gǔ zhǐdiē bùzhǎng。
Recently, the stock market is sluggish, shares of individual companies have dropped and haven\'t gone up.
近来股市全线飘绿，持续下跌，股民都很着急。
Jìnlái gǔshì quánxiàn piāolǜ，chíxù xiàdiē，gǔmín dōu hěnzháojí。
The stock market has fallen in price recently, stock investors are quite anxious.
股市的每一次涨跌都牵动着股民的心。
Gǔshì de měi yícì zhǎngdiē dōu qiāndòng zhe gǔmín de xīn。
Every up and down in the stock market affects the stock holders\' feelings.
股票价格暴跌。
Gǔpiào jiàgé bàodiē。
There was a slump in share prices.
背了一屁股债
bēi le yípìgǔzhài 
be heavily in debt; be up to one\'s eyes in debt
这两股线缠在一起了。
Zhè liǎng gǔ xiàn chánzài yìqǐ le。

冲他们这股子干劲儿，没有克服不了的困难。

With such drive, there\'s no difficulty that they can\'t overcome.
搞改革就要有一股不怕困难的闯劲。
Gǎo gǎigé jiùyào yǒu yìgǔ bú pà kùnnan de chuǎngjìn。

duìgǔpī

yì gǔ wúfǎ èzhǐ de jīqíng

Tā zuò gǔpiào shēngyì fā le dà cái。

fāxíng huòbì（zhàiquàn，gǔpiào）

gǔfèn fēnhóng

fēn gǔ

yì ɡǔ xiàn

yì ɡǔ quánshuǐ

这小伙子有一股子使不完的劲。
Zhè xiǎohuǒzi yǒu yì gǔzi shǐ bu wán de jìn。
The youngster just doesn\'t know what it is to be tired.
合股线
hégǔxiàn

huìchénɡ yì ɡǔ jùliú

kōngdòngwú wù de bāgǔdiào

Gǔpiào jiàgé kuángdiē。
The stocks slumped.
这屋子老不住人，有股霉味儿。
Zhè wūzi lǎo bú zhù rén，yǒu gǔ méiwèir。
This room has been left vacant for a long time, so there is a mouldy smell.
这些小伙子真有股子愣劲儿。
Zhèxiē xiǎohuǒzi zhēn yǒu gǔzi lèngjìnr。
These boys are really full of pep.
看你那股埋汰劲，不许你进屋。
Kàn nǐ nà gǔ máitaijìn，bùxǔ nǐ jìnwū。
Look, how dirty you are! You can\'t go inside.
我就喜欢你们这股扎扎实实埋头苦干的劲儿。

I like your down-to-earth and hardworking spirit.
箱子里有股霉味。

这小伙子干活有股子猛劲儿。

This young chap works with vim and vigour.
只要大伙儿拧成一股绳，没有克服不了的困难。

As long as we are united, there is no difficulty we cannot overcome.
这小伙子有股子牛劲，干一件事就非干到底不行。
Zhè xiǎohuǒzi yǒu gǔzi niújìn，gàn yíjiànshì jiù fēi gàn dàodǐ bùxíng。
The lad is strong-willed; once he starts doing something, he won\'t leave off until he\'s finished it.
听了她的一番劝慰，一股暖流涌上我的心头。

Her soothing words left me with a glow in my heart.

bǎ shéngzi pīchéng sāngǔ

她兴奋得很，把要讲的话一股脑儿都倒出来了。
Tā xīngfèn de hěn，bǎ yào jiǎng de huà yìgǔnǎor dōu dào chūlái le。
She got so excited that she poured out all she had to say at once.
她沉默着皱一皱眉头，露出一股极为憎厌的神情。

股市掀起了涨风。
Gǔshì xiānqǐ le zhǎngfēng。
There is an upswing of prices on the stock market.
这孩子身上有股霸气。
Zhè háizi shēnshàng yǒu gǔ bàqì。

Zài dàilái jùdà jīngjì sǔnshī de tóngshí，gǔshì de bēngpán hái huì yǐnqǐ shèhuì dòngdàng。
In addition to generating huge economic losses, a stock market crash will cause social turbulence.
近期股市震荡，我已经把仓位降到了二分之一。
Jìnqī gǔshì zhèndàng，wǒ yǐjing bǎ cāngwèi jiàngdào le èr fēn zhīyī。
I have reduced the empty space of the storehouses by a half beacause of the unstable stock market.
刚开始炒股的人出现亏损是常事。
Gāng kāishǐ chǎogǔ de rén chūxiàn kuīsǔn shì chángshì。
It is common for a stock operation novice to lose some money in the beginning.
股票的价格随着市场潮涨潮落。
Gǔpiào de jiàgé suí zhe shìchǎng cháozhǎng cháoluò。
The price of stock moves up and down with the market.
他是职业的股票炒手。
Tā shì zhíyè de gǔpiào chǎoshǒu。
He is a professional stock broker.
不知道他听到了什么消息，突然撤股了。
Bùzhīdào tā tīngdào le shénme xiāoxi，tūrán chègǔ le。
He suddenly withdrew his share.
这两天股市的成交额明显提高了。
Zhè liǎngtiān gǔshì de chéngjiāoé míngxiǎn tígāo le。
Recently, the volume of business has obviously increased.
他研究了许多年的股票，现在都快成精了。
Tā yánjiū le xǔduō nián de gǔpiào，xiànzài dōu kuài chéngjīng le。
He is almost an expert on the stock market after many years\' research.
一些股民持仓是有其自己的原因，你不必跟他们学。
Yìxiē gǔmín chícāng shì yǒu qí zìjǐ de yuányīn，nǐ búbì gēn tāmen xué。
Some shareholders have their own reasons to hold a position. You don\'t need to follow suit.
他是我们公司的持股者。
Tā shì wǒmen gōngsī de chígǔzhě。
He is a shareholder in our company.
樗蒲是古代的游戏名，类似于现在的掷股子。

Chupu is the name of an ancient game, similar to dice.
妈妈在房间洒的这种香水散发出一股醇香。
Māma zài fángjiān sǎ de zhèzhǒng xiāngshuǐ sànfā chū yìgǔ chúnxiāng。
The perfume mother put in this room is sending out a mellow aroma.
90年代初，弃官从商形成一股热潮。
90 niándài chū,qìguān cóngshāng xíngchéng yì gǔ rècháo.
In the early 90s, there was an increase of people resigning from office and entering into business.
只有从重处理这类案件，才能遏制住这股邪风。
Zhǐyǒu cóngzhòng chǔlǐ zhè lèi ànjiàn，cáinéng èzhìzhù zhè gǔ xiéfēng。
Only by giving serious punishment to this kind of case can this unhealthy trend be put under control.
你再不好好学习，小心被打屁股。
Nǐ zài bùhǎohǎo xuéxí，xiǎoxīn bèi dǎ pìgǔ。
Be careful. If you don\'t work hard, I\'ll spank your bottom.
股市再吹跌风，她十分紧张。
Gǔshì zài chuī diēfēng，tā shífēn jǐnzhāng。
She is very nervous because stock market prices are likely to fall.
他手中的持股已经接近顶位了。
Tā shǒu zhōng de chígǔ yǐjing jiējìn dǐngwèi le。
His shares are approaching their peak values.
这股浮夸风，必须遏制！
Zhè gǔ fúkuāfēng，bìxū èzhì！
We must stop such empty pomp and show.

Gōngsī gěi yōuxiù láodòngzhě pàifā le gāngǔ。
The company apportioned shares to excellent workers.
股指在高位震荡。
Gǔzhǐ zài gāowèi zhèndàng.
The stock index is fluctuating violently.
是否增发新股需要董事会公判决定。
Shìfǒu zēngfā xīngǔ xūyào dǒngshìhuì gōngpàn juédìng。
Whether or not to issue a new stock shall be decided by the board after public discussion.
古代数学书籍中有很多关于勾股形的记载。
Gǔdài shùxué shūjí zhōng yǒu hěnduō guānyú gōugǔxíng de jìzǎi。
There are many records on right-angle triangles in ancient mathematics books.
购得的股票全都赔了，他很着急。
Gòudé de gǔpiào quándōu péi le，tā hěnzháojí。
He is very worried after having lost all the money he spent buying stocks.
这些股匪在当地无恶不做，引起了当地百姓的公愤。
Zhèxiē gǔfěi zài dāngdì wúè búzuò，yǐnqǐ le dāngdì bǎixìng de gōngfèn。
This gang of bandits commit all sorts of crimes, arousing indignation among local residents.
股海风云变幻，谁也不能预测将来，出手一定要慎重。
Gǔhǎi fēngyún biànhuàn，shéi yě bùnéng yùcè jiānglái，chūshǒu yídìng yào shènzhòng。
The stock market is under constant change and no one is able to predict the future. Therefore one must be careful with investments.
股价已经长了三倍，你还不打算卖？
Gǔjià yǐjing zhǎng le sān bèi，nǐ hái bùdǎsuàn mài？
The stock price has tripled, don\'t you plan to sell it?
走着走着，几股人流就合拢在一起了。
Zǒu zhe zǒu zhe，jǐ gǔ rénliú jiù hélǒng zài yìqǐ le。
The streams of people walked, and gradually joined together.
证券交易所的红盘显示，股指略有上涨。
Zhèngquàn jiāoyìsuǒ de hóngpán xiǎnshì，gǔzhǐ lüèyǒu shàngzhǎng。
The red digital in the stock exchange indicates that the stock index has risen slightly.
现在的股票市场不稳定，投资者都很小心谨慎。
Xiànzài de gǔpiào shìchǎng bùwěndìng，tóuzīzhě dōu hěnxiǎoxīn jǐnshèn。
The stock markets are going wild and the investors are being prudent.
这个洞的洞口有一股浓烈的狐臊气味。
Zhège dòng de dòngkǒu yǒu yìgǔ nóngliè de húsào qìwèi。
There is a strong body ordor at the mouth of the cave.
如果我有她这股机灵劲儿，我也会受人欢迎的！
Rúguǒ wǒ yǒu tā zhè gǔ jīlíngjìnr，wǒ yě huì shòu rén huānyíng de！
I would be popular too if I had her intelligence!
公司的监事一般都是由股东担任。
Gōngsī de jiānshì yìbān dōushì yóu gǔdōng dānrèn。
Usually the supervisors of a company are its shareholders.
股民们总是逢低建仓，逢高就抛售。
Gǔmínmen zǒngshì féngdī jiàncāng，fénggāo jiù pāoshòu。
Stock investors buy shares when their prices are low and sell them when they go up.
这股怪味是那块焦烂的塑料发出的。
Zhè gǔ guàiwèi shì nà kuài jiāolàn de sùliào fāchū de。
An unpleasant smell is given off by that piece of burnt plastic.
这股顽匪已被劫灭净尽，再不能祸害百姓了。

Zhèzhī gǔpiào jīntiān de kāipánjià shì liù yuán zhěng。
The opening price of this stock today is only 6 yuan.
他可以在股市中控盘，说明他有很强的经济实力！
Tā kěyǐ zài gǔshì zhōng kòngpán，shuōmíng tā yǒu hěnqiáng de jīngjì shílì！
He can manipulate stock quotations on the stock market, so he must have great economic power.
有这股子狂劲，没准他真能赢得最后的胜利。

With his fanaticism, he may win at last.
今天股市达到了有史以来的浪谷，许多人都为此倾家荡产。
Jīntiān gǔshì dádào le yǒushǐ yǐlái de lànggǔ，xǔduō rén dōu wèicǐ qīngjiā dàngchǎn。
Stocks tumbled to their lowest level today, and many people have been reduced to poverty and ruin.
裁员这股冷风吹了有一阵，大家整天都提心吊胆的怕这事落在自己身上。
Cáiyuán zhègǔ lěngfēng chuī le yǒuyízhèn，dàjiā zhěngtiān dōu tíxīn diàodǎn de pà zhèshì luò zài zìjǐ shēnshàng。
The cold wind of staff trimming reduction has been blowing for a while. Everyone is in fear, and afraid it will befall on themselves.
今年我的股票赔钱了，生意又不好，里外里赔了不少钱。
Jīnnián wǒ de gǔpiào péiqián le，shēngyì yòu bùhǎo，lǐwàilǐ péi le bùshǎo qián。

这家公司由于有外商参股，所以是联营经济。

Because foreigners have shares in this company, it is a joint venture.
我打算填写一张卖单，卖出我手里的所有股票。

He is always so pigheaded. The more difficulties he encounters, the more fighting spirit he has.

A corporation may purchase its own common stock or preferred stock and retire it by canceling the stock certificates.
公司可以购买自己已发行的普通股或有限股，并将其取消以收回股票。

kāi xiānlì
set (or create) a precedent
有先例可援
yǒu xiānlì kě yuán
have a precedent to go by
先例

precedent

有先例可援。
万不可开此先例。

开创先例

唐人小说多以&quot;传奇&quot;为名，后人则泛称唐人小说及模拟其体例的作品为传奇
Take the case of that patient, he did not die from it.
以这个病人为例，这并不是他的死因。

以发展大涵道比涡扇发动机为例,说明了约束条件对设计循环参数的限制。

Wǒmen kěyǐ yǐ liǎng zhǒng guāndiǎn wéilì jiāyǐ shuōmíng。

It was a clear case of fools rushing in.

这个偶发事例不能作为他理论的例证。
Some examples are required, by way of explanation.

他说他可以举出这种行为的好几个例子。
The initial payment percentage has been set at 5%.

初次付款比例已被定为５％。
I will give you an example of why I have come to that conclusion.
Wǒ kěyǐ gěi nǐ jǔ yí gè lìzi，jiěshì wǒ wèishénme déchū nàgè jiélùn。
我可以给你举一个例子，解释我为什么得出那个结论。

这些例子可能会让你误以为试卷要比看起来的容易。

Roy thinks it\'s a case of sour grapes.

新律例的实行，需要若干部门的审批。
Xīn lǜlì de shíxíng，xūyào ruògàn bùmén de shěnpī。
The implementation of new laws, statutes and precedents needs the examination and approval of many agencies.
例举事实是最能说明问题的方法。
Lìjǔ shìshí shì zuì néng shuōmíng wèntí de fāngfǎ。
Giving examples is the most forceful way to explain a problem.
这些模型都是根据实物按一定比例微缩而成的。
Zhèxiē móxíng dōushì gēnjù shíwù àn yídìng bǐlì wēisuō ér chéng de。
These models are all scaled down from the original objects to a certain proportion.
用实例证明自己的观点。
考核事实，归纳例证。
条例苛细，实难推行。
例举了一连串不容否认的事实。
Turbulent motion can now be seen as an example of deterministic chaos.

涡流运动现在被视作决定性混沌理论的一个实例。
We should act up to those principles and examples.
Wǒmen yīng zūnxún yìxiē yuánzé hé shílì。

The chapter concludes with some examples.
Gāi zhāngjié yǐ yìxiē shílì zuòjié。
该章节以一些实例作结。

Shílì shì zuìhǎo de shuōmíng shǒuduàn。
实例是最好的说明手段。
They gathered a harvest of examples.
Tāmen sōujíle dàliàng de shílì。
他们搜集了大量的实例。

Zhǎodào duōshǎo gè shílì？

这样处理有前例可援，不算咱们独创。

shíjì de lìzi
a concrete instance

一个定语所有格的例子是，表示“John\'s mother”的“John\'s”。

本条例自即日起施行。

例行登记。

one\'s everyday routine
某人的日常工作(或每日的例行公事)

我需要休假，一天这样的例行工作也坚持不了了。

the daily round
[fig] 每天例行的公事
The boss\' influence allowed us to begin the project without routine procedures.
我们借助老板的影响越过例行程序直接开始了计划。

这是获得财政补助的例行手续。

例行的步骤在紧急情况下可以略过。

反意连词起着对比的作用，例如“but”、“or”或“though”。
An iambic foot consists of an unstressed syllable followed by a stressed syllable as in \'delay\'.
Yìyánggéshī zhōng de yīnbù shì yóu fēi zhòngdú yīnjié hòu gēnzhe yí gè zhòngdú yīnjié zǔchéng de，lìrú“delay\'。
抑扬格诗中的音步是由非重读音节后跟着一个重读音节组成的，例如“delay”。

quote (or cite) a precedent

Shēnghuó kùnnan，ànlì kěyǐ shēnqǐng bǔzhù。
The needy usually may ask for relief.
今天的办公会议照例还是在三楼会议室召开。
Jīntiān de bàngōng huìyì zhàolì háishì zài sān lóu huìyìshì zhàokāi。
Today the work meeting is being held in the meeting room on the third floor, as usual.
我国农业的比例税制有利于农民的安居乐业。
Wǒ guó nóngyè de bǐlì shuìzhì yǒulìyú nóngmín de ānjūlèyè。
The proportional taxation system in our country greatly benefits the people.
唐代律诗在定型化过程中和定型后，都存在变例。
Tángdài lǜshīzàidìngxínghuà guòchéng zhōng hé dìngxíng hòu，dōu cúnzài biànlì。
There were exceptions in the &quot;regulated&quot; verse of Tang dynasty during and after its shaping.
工作上，我的付出与收获有点不成比例。
Gōngzuò shàng，wǒ de fùchū yǔ shōuhuò yǒudiǎn bùchéng bǐlì。
What I put into my work, and what I get is a little bit disproportionate.
我们公司采用了按比例拆账分成的办法，这样就能提高大家的积极性。
Wǒmen gōngsī cǎiyòng le àn bǐlì chāizhàng fēnchéng de bànfǎ，zhèyàng jiùnéng tígāo dàjiā de jījíxìng。
Our company adopted the share-cropping system to boost our morale.
这个项目不能再继续进行，因为产出和投入不成比例。
Zhège xiàng mù bùnéng zài jìxù jìnxíng，yīnwèi chǎnchū hé tóurù bùchéng bǐlì。
This project has to be stopped, because investment and production are disproportionate.
没有个例，你的观点就说服不了别人。
Méiyǒu gèlì，nǐ de guāndiǎn jiù shuōfú bùliǎo biérén。
Your point of view can\'t persuade others if there is no specific example.
像他这样的文学天才只是个例。
Xiàng tā zhèyàng de wénxué tiāncái zhǐshì gèlì。
A literary prodigy like him is just an exception.
行院中的女子多薄情寡义，但也有例外，像杜十娘。
Hòngyuàn zhōng de nǚzǐ duō bóqíng guǎyì，dàn yě yǒu lìwài，xiàng Dù Shíniáng。
Though many prostitutes are faithless and heartless, Du Shiniang is one exception.
时代变了，这些旧例不再具有适用性。
Shídài biàn le，zhèxiē jiùlì búzài jùyǒu shìyòngxìng。
Time changes and these old regulations are no longer applicable.
这篇报道写得有点空泛，最好加点具体化的事例。
Zhèpiān bàodào xiě de yǒu diǎn kōngfàn，zuì hǎo jiā diǎn jùtǐhuà de shìlì。
This report is a little too vague, some specific examples shall be added.
这个班的课椅高度，不太符合小学生的身高比例。
Zhège bān de kèyǐ gāodù，bú tài fúhé xiǎoxuésheng de shēngāo bǐlì。
The height of the classroom chairs does not conform to the height of primary students.
如果家里有老人还是要讲究一些老例，他们的思想是没有办法改变的。
Rúguǒ jiā lǐ yǒu lǎorén háishi yào jiǎngjiū yìxiē lǎolì，tāmen de sīxiǎng shì méiyǒu bànfǎ gǎibiàn de。
Some old practices should be followed if you have old members in your family, because their customs can not be changed.
这幅画虽然有立体感，但看似有些比例失调。
Zhèfúhuà suīrán yǒu lìtǐgǎn，dàn kànsì yǒuxiē bǐlì shītiáo。
Though this picture has a sense of third dimension, its proportions look a little maladjusted.
现在取得银行存款收入，要交纳一定比例的利息所得税。
Xiànzài qǔdé yínháng cúnkuǎn shōurù，yào jiāonà yídìng bǐlì de lìxī suǒdéshuì。
Now to obtain income from bank deposits, we must pay a certain proportional interest income tax.
不成文的例规照样具有约束力。
bùchéngwén de lìguī zhàoyàng jùyǒu yuēshùlì。
Conventions without written forms still have sanctions.
今年颁布的交通例规得到了广大驾驶员的认可。
Jīnnián bānbù de jiāotōng lìguī dédào le guǎngdà jiàshǐyuán de rènkě。
The traffic rules announced this year have been ratified by most of the drivers.
这个出版社正在筹划一本名叫《论语例话》的书。
Zhège chūbǎnshè zhèngzài chóuhuà yìběn míng jiào《Lúnyǔlìhuà》 de shū。
The publishing house is planning on a book named Comment on the Analects by Using Examples.
例举事实是最能说明问题的方法。
Lìjǔ shìshí shì zuì néng shuōmíng wèntí de fāngfǎ。
Giving examples is the most forceful way to explain a problem.
春运期间火车乘警要对火车上的旅客的身份进行例行检查。
Chūnyùn qījiān huǒchē chéngjǐng yào duì huǒchē shàng de lǚkè de shēnfèn jìnxíng lìxíng jiǎnchá。
During the Spring Festival period, the train police should make routine checks regarding the identity of  the passengers.
新律例的实行，需要若干部门的审批。
Xīn lǜlì de shíxíng，xūyào ruògàn bùmén de shěnpī。
The implementation of new laws, statutes and precedents needs the examination and approval of many agencies.
老师让我们把书上的案例论列一番。
Lǎoshī ràng wǒmen bǎ shū shàng de ànlì lùnliè yì fān。
The teacher asked us to discuss the cases in the book point by point.
卫生部辟谣：中国内地从来没有发现过埃博拉病毒感染病例！
Wèishēngbù pìyáo：Zhōngguó nèidì cónglái méiyǒu fāxiàn guò āibólā bìngdú gǎnrǎn bìnglì！
The Ministry of Public Health denied the rumor, saying that there are no people affected by the Ebola virus in the mainland.
调配这个颜色的色度比例是：20%的蓝加80%的绿。
Tiáopèi zhège yánsè de sèdù bǐlì shì：bǎifēnzhī èrshí de lán jiā bǎifēnzhī bāshíde lǜ。
To get this color the proportion of the basic colors blue, and green is 20% and 80%.
他得的这种病目前在我国还尚属首例。
Tā dé de zhèzhǒng bìng mùqián zài wǒguó hái shàngshǔ shǒulì。
His disease is the first case in our country.
这些模型都是根据实物按一定比例微缩而成的。
Zhèxiē móxíng dōushì gēnjù shíwù àn yídìng bǐlì wēisuō ér chéng de。
These models are all scaled down from the original objects to a certain proportion.
这个班的学生无一例外地被传染了感冒。
Zhège bān de xuésheng wúyī lìwài de bèi chuánrǎn le gǎnmào。
All the students got infected with the cold.
例会将在下季度续会，你们还有什么意见吗？
Lìhuì jiāngzài xià jìdù xùhuì，nǐmen háiyǒu shénme yìjiàn ma？
The regular meeting will take place the next quater, any questions?
循例你是要坐牢的，算你幸运，遇到贵人了，可以躲过此劫。
Xúnlì nǐ shì yào zuòláo de，suàn nǐ xìngyùn，yùdào guìrén le，kěyǐ duǒguò cǐjié。
You were suppose to go to prison, according to past experience, but it is very lucky for you that someone helped you to dodge this misfortune.
老教授正在引例说明健康教育的重要性。
Lǎojiàoshòu zhèngzài yǐnlì shuōmíng jiànkāng jiàoyù de zhòngyàoxìng。
The old professor is illustrating the importance of health education.
今天你就可以去帐房领取这个月的月例了。
Jīntiān nǐ jiù kěyǐ qù zhàngfáng lǐngqǔ zhège yuè de yuèlì le。
You can go to the accountant\'s office to get your monthly allowance today.
月例时她总是感到很疲惫，让她休息下吧！
Yuèlì shí tā zǒngshì gǎndào hěn píbèi，ràng tā xiūxi xià ba！
She always feels tired during her period. Let her get some rest!
你来回答，这道题目中的比例中项是什么？

You answer the question; what is the middle term of the proportion in this problem?

Dìfāngshuì hé guójiāshuì de zhēngshōu bǐlì bùtóng。
There are different tax rates for local and national taxes.

&quot;Following the international practice&quot; has become a general consensus.

The police are subject to the law like the rest of us.

They expect an increase in the price of pork due to cases of disease.
由于发现了多例病猪，他们预计猪肉价格将会上涨。

我们将参加平安夜的午夜弥撒，这是我们家的惯例。

There are some liquids such as nitrogen which boil at very low temperatures.

你需要学些简单的算术，例如2乘2等于4这样的。

在化学课上，我们学习分子的构成，例如水分子的构成。
Amazingly, he has not faulted yet today.
太令人吃惊了，他到现在都还没有一例发球失误呢。

例如在国外旅行出了事故，绿卡可用作第三方保险的证明，很容易识别。
3,000 new cases of the disease are diagnosed every month.
每个月能查出3000个该病的新发病例。

The study used case histories from 600 teenage mothers.
使用的是对600名未成年妈妈进行的案例记录分析。

这篇文章指出，女性空闲时的活动一般是另一种形式的工作，例如购物和做家务。

卖臭豆腐的小贩们给与会成员们品尝了美味的臭豆腐后，他们撤销了禁止贩卖臭豆腐的条例。
His plan is an example of a well thought-out design.
他的计划是设计完善的一个例子。

罗马文明在技术方面十分先进，例如，他们当时已经有了地下中央供暖系统。

美国农业部禁止从出现过疯牛病病例的国家进口牛肉。

你能给出一个轭式搭配法的例子吗？

这个例句诠释了这个词的释义。

我们借助老板的影响越过例行程序直接开始了计划。

以这个病人为例，这并不是他的死因。
They expect an increase in the price of pork due to cases of disease.
由于发现了多例病猪，他们预计猪肉价格将会上涨。
The probable cause of the death in this child\'s case was a viral infection.
Zài zhège xiǎohái de ànlì zhōng，kěnéng de sǐwáng yuányīn shì bìngdú gǎnrǎn。
在这个小孩的案例中，可能的死亡原因是病毒感染。
按比例发展
ànbǐlì fāzhǎn 
develop in proportion; proportional development
不合比例
bùhé bǐlì 
out of proportion
按比例绘制
àn bǐlì huìzhì 
be drawn to scale
这个模型是按准确的比例做的。
Zhège móxíng shì àn zhǔnquè de bǐlì zuò de。
This model is made exactly to scale.
这张地图的比例尺是四十万分之一。
Zhèzhāng dìtú de bǐlìchǐ shì sìshí wàn fēn zhīyī。
The scale of the map is 1:400,000.
当量比例定律
dāngliàng bǐlì dìnglǜ
the law of equivalent proportions
分数值与分母值成反比例。
Fēnshùzhí yǔ fēnmǔzhí chéng fǎnbǐlì。
The value of a fraction is inversely proportional to that of the denominator.
比例失调
bǐlì shītiáo
disproportion
比例关系逐渐趋于协调。
Bǐlì guānxì zhújiàn qūyú xiétiáo。
The ratio is becoming more balanced.
国民经济有计划按比例的发展
guómínjīngjì yǒu jìhuà àn bǐlì de fāzhǎn
planned and proportionate development of the national economy
我国农业的比例税制有利于农民的安居乐业。
Wǒ guó nóngyè de bǐlì shuìzhì yǒulìyú nóngmín de ānjūlèyè。
The proportional taxation system in our country greatly benefits the people.
工作上，我的付出与收获有点不成比例。

Our company adopted the share-cropping system to boost our morale.
这个项目不能再继续进行，因为产出和投入不成比例。

这个班的课椅高度，不太符合小学生的身高比例。

他走近我一把抓住我的衣领。
I was walking down the street while suddenly somebody took my arm.
我正沿街走着，突然有人抓住了我的胳膊。
He went behind the bar，grabbing at her.
Tā zǒudào guìtái hòumiàn，zhuāzhùle tā。
他走到柜台后面，抓住了她。
Instead of a sit-down meal, everybody milled around, eating from trays of finger foods.
Rénmen búshì zuòxiàlái jiùcān，érshì biān sìchù zǒudòng，biān chīzhe tuōpán zhōng de shǒuzhuā shípǐn。
人们不是坐下来就餐，而是边四处走动，边吃着托盘中的手抓食品。
你抓住桄子，一下一下的往怀里带，风筝一会儿就能飞起来。
Nǐ zhuāzhù guāngzi，yíxià yíxià de wǎng huáilǐ dài，fēngzhēng yíhuìr jiùnéng fēiqǐlái。
You hold the reel and pull it towards yourself continuously. After a while, the kite will fly into the sky.
给人抓住把柄
gěi rén zhuāzhù bǎbǐng 
give sb. a handle (against oneself)
他抓住了你什么把柄？
Tā zhuāzhù le nǐ shénme bǎbǐng? 
What hold does he have on you?
他们把他抓住，不由分说，痛打一顿。
Tāmen bǎ tā zhuāzhù，bùyóufēnshuō tòngdǎ yídùn。
They seized him, and without waiting for an explanation gave him a severe beating.
当场抓住
dāngchǎng zhuāzhù 
catch red-handed (or in the act)
抓住绳子不放
zhuāzhù shéngzi bú fàng
won\'t let go of the rope
抓住问题的核心
zhuāzhù wèntí de héxīn
get to the heart of the matter
抓住阴谋家的狐狸尾巴
zhuāzhù yīnmóujiā de húli wěibā
seize hold of the evidence which gives the conspirator away
错过(抓住)机会
cuòguò（zhuāzhù）jīhuì
miss (seize) a chance
他两手交互地抓住野藤爬上崖顶。
Tā liǎngshǒu jiāohù de zhuāzhù yěténgpáshàngyádǐng。
Holding on to the creepers, he climbed hand over hand to the top of the cliff.
他紧紧抓住这个贼，不让他跑掉。
Tā jǐnjǐn zhuāzhù zhège zéi，bú ràng tā pǎodiào。
He grasped the thief firmly to stop him running away.
抓住篮板球投篮入网
zhuāzhù lánbǎnqiú tóulán rù wǎnɡ
grab the rebound and sink a basket
不良倾向一冒头就要抓住它。
Bùliángqīngxiàng yí màotóu jiùyào zhuāzhù tā。
Watch out for harmful tendencies and deal with them the moment they crop up.
劈胸一把抓住
pīxiōngyì bǎ zhuāzhù
grasp sb. by the front of his coat
在行窃时被抓住
zài xíngqiè shí bèi zhuāzhù
be caught in the act of stealing
一把抓住他的袖子
yì bǎ zhuāzhù tā de xiùzi
seize him by the sleeve
抓住要点
zhuāzhù yàodiǎn
grasp the main points
抓住要害
zhuāzhù yàohài
scratch where it itches
抓住一切机会
zhuāzhù yíqiè jīhuì 
seize every opportunity
抓住了这个主要矛盾，一切问题就迎刃而解了。
Zhuāzhù le zhège zhǔyào máodùn，yíqiè wèntí jiù yíngrènérjiě le。
Once this principal contradiction is grasped, all problems can be readily solved.
他抓住绳子悠了过去。
Tā zhuāzhù shéngzi yōu le guòqù。
He held on to the rope and swung across.
抓住问题的中心
zhuāzhù wèntí de zhōng xīn 
get to the heart of the matter
抓住个小偷
zhuāzhù gè xiǎotōu 
catch a thief
这出戏一开场就抓住了观众。
Zhè chū xì yì kāichǎngjiù zhuāzhù le guānzhòng。
The play gripped the attention of the audience from the moment the curtain rose.
抓住这个主题，把所有的材料组编起来，成为一个整体。
Zhuāzhù zhège zhǔtí，bǎ suǒyǒu de cáiliào zǔbiān qǐlái，chéngwéi yígè zhěngtǐ。
Keep to the theme; put all relevant material together and work it into a unified, organic whole.
抓住一点小事做文章
zhuāzhù yìdiǎn xiǎoshì zuòwénzhānɡ 
seize on a trifle and make an issue of it; make a fuss about something trivial
抓住机遇
zhuāzhù jīyù
grasp the opportunity
刚抓住的鱼跐溜一下就从我手中滑走了。
Gāng zhuāzhù de yú cīliū yíxià jiù cóng wǒ shǒu zhōng huázǒu le。
The fish I had just caught slipped out of my hand.
想到罪犯还没被抓住，他不禁打冷战。
Xiǎngdào zuìfàn hái méi bèi zhuāzhù，tā bùjīn dǎ lěngzhàn。
Thinking of the criminal who is still at large, he can\'t help but shiver.
我们要抓住要害，待机而动。
Wǒmen yào zhuāzhù yàohài，dàijī érdòng。
We should seize the essence, and wait for the right moment to go into action.
政策已经放活了，咱们应该抓住机遇，发展当地经济。
Zhèngcè yǐjing fànghuó le，zánmen yīnggāi zhuāzhù jīyù，fāzhǎn dāngdì jīngjì。
The policies are more flexible now, we should seize the chance to develop our local economy.
你抓住桄子，一下一下的往怀里带，风筝一会儿就能飞起来。
Nǐ zhuāzhù guāngzi，yíxià yíxià de wǎng huáilǐ dài，fēngzhēng yíhuìr jiùnéng fēiqǐlái。
You hold the reel and pull it towards yourself continuously. After a while, the kite will fly into the sky.
这个小偷已经是第5次被警察抓住了，真是累教不改。
Zhège xiǎotōu yǐjing shì dìwǔcì bèi jǐngchá zhuāzhù le，zhēnshì lěijiào bùgǎi。
This thief has been caught by the police five times. What a person who refuses to mend his ways, despite  repeated punishment.
他一个猛子扎下水，抓住了一条鲤鱼。
Tā yígè měngzi zā xià shuǐ，zhuāzhù le yìtiáo lǐyú。
With a dive, he caught a carp.
小偷被当场抓住后，便企图谋陷他身边的人。
Xiǎotōu bèi dāngchǎng zhuāzhù hòu，biàn qǐtú móuxiàn tā shēnbiān de rén。
After being caught in red, the thief attempted to plot a frame-up against people around.
据说小偷已经被抓住了，是一个未成年的少男。
Jùshuō xiǎotōu yǐjing bèi zhuāzhù le，shì yígè wèichéngnián de shàonán。
It is said that the thief, a juvenile, has been arrested.
接受媒体采访时一定要慎言，不要被抓住了把柄。
Jiēshòu méitǐ cǎifǎng shí yídìng yào shènyán，búyào bèi zhuāzhù le bǎbǐng。
You must be cautious when being interviewed by the press, or you might say something against yourself.
他没有抓住最好的胜机，结果被对手反败为胜了。
Tā méiyǒu zhuāzhù zuìhǎo de shèngjī，jiéguǒ bèi duìshǒu fǎnbài wéishèng le。
He didn\'t take the best winning chances, and was beaten by his opponent instead.
你只要抓住题意的突破口，就能轻易解题。
Nǐ zhǐyào zhuāzhù tíyì de tūpòkǒu，jiù néng qīngyì jiětí。
As long as you can find out the best place to start cracking this problem, you can solve it easily.
局长下命令了，务期抓住这个杀人犯！
Júcháng xià mìnglìng le，wùqī zhuāzhù zhège shārénfàn！
The head of the beareau give orders that we must catch this murderer.
写文章必须抓住重点，做到详略得当。
Xiě wénzhāng bìxū zhuāzhù zhòngdiǎn，zuòdào xiánglüè dédàng。
One must grasp the main idea and be consistent in writing.
他伸手抓住了一片虚飘的树叶。
Tā shēnshǒu zhuāzhù le yípiàn xūpiāo de shùyè。
He reached out his hand and grabbed a floating tree leaf.
老师巡查考试的时候正好抓住他作弊。
Lǎoshī xúnchá kǎoshì de shíhou zhènghǎo zhuāzhù tā zuòbì。
The teacher caught him cheating when making his rounds.
抓住线头的两端，我们开始做实验。
Zhuāzhù xiàntóu de liǎngduān，wǒmen kāishǐ zuò shíyàn。
Hold the two ends of the thrum. We will start the experiment.
他抓住了我的把柄。
Tā zhuāzhùle wǒde bǎbǐng。
He\'s got a hold over me.
别让任何人抓住你的把柄。
Biéràng rènhérén zhuāzhù nǐde bǎbǐng。
Don\'t let anyone get a handle on you.
抓住机会
zhuāzhù jīhuì
grasp an opportunity
商人要善于抓住稍纵即逝的市场机遇。
Shāngrén yào shànyúzhuāzhù shāozòngjíshì de shìchǎng jīyù。
Business people must be good at taking advantage of every fleeting window of opportunity.
外地来京人员应抓紧时间办暂住证。
Wàidì láijīng rényuán yīng zhuājǐn shíjiān bàn zànzhùzhèng。
People coming from other places to Beijing, should get their temporary residence certificate as soon as possible.
抓主要问题，不要被枝节问题牵掣住。
Zhuā zhǔyào wèntí，búyào bèi zhījié wèntí qiānchè zhù。
Let\'s focus our attention on the main problem and not get bogged down in minor issues.
谁抓住画圈的阄，戏团就归谁
抓住机会。
小说一开始就抓住了读者。
用搭钩扒住，然后抓住绳子往上爬。

抓住缰绳不放手
抓住机会。

谈问题应该抓住实质

一只铁腕紧紧抓住了他的胳膊。
抓住墒情，及时下种。

抓住要领，切中要害。
不要抓住枝叶忘了根本。
抓住重点。
滑溜溜的泥鳅，用手抓不住。
讲话、办事都抓不住要点。

她抓住我的手臂，给我带路。

zhuājǐn xuéxí 
attend to one\'s studies in earnest; study hard

抓紧时间
zhuājǐn shíjiān 
make the best use of one\'s time

Nǐ zhuājǐn，wǒ yào fàngshǒu le。
Hold tight. I\'m going to let go.
抓紧了，别松手。
Zhuājǐn le，bié sōngshǒu。
Hold it tight and don\'t let go.
这项工作得抓紧，不能老是往后推。
Zhè xiàng gōngzuò děi zhuājǐn，bùnéng lǎoshì wǎnghòu tuī。
We have to get on with this job, we can\'t put it off day after day.
这事儿不能老悬着，得抓紧解决。
Zhèshìr bùnéng lǎo xuán zhe，děi zhuājǐn jiějué。
We can\'t leave the matter unresolved any longer. Let\'s have it settled without delay.
这件事不能老悬空着，要抓紧解决。
Zhèjiànshì bùnéng lǎo xuánkōng zhe，yào zhuājǐn jiějué。
Let\'s deal with the matter now; it\'s hung in the air too long.
你这病要抓紧治，可不能一误再误了。
Nǐ zhè bìngyào zhuājǐn zhì，kě bùnéng yíwù zài wù le。
You should go and see a doctor at once. You mustn\'t put it off any more.
抓紧学习
zhuājǐn xuéxí 
attend to one\'s studies in earnest; study hard
抓紧时机
zhuājǐn shíjī 
seize (or grasp) the opportunity
抓紧时间
zhuājǐn shíjiān 
make the best use of one\'s time
晚上就要演出了，他们正抓紧对词呢。
Wǎnshàng jiùyào yǎnchū le，tāmen zhèng zhuājǐn duìcí ne。
They are going through a rehearsal, the show is to be staged at night.
主项要抓紧，副项也不能放松。
Zhǔ xiàng yào zhuājǐn，fù xiàng yě bùnéng fàngsōng。
We should really stress the major tasks without overlooking the minor tasks.
过吊桥的时候请大家用手抓紧绳缆。
Guò diàoqiáo de shíhou qǐng dàjiā yòng shǒu zhuājǐn shénglǎn。
Please keep a firm grasp on the cable when crossing the drawbridge.
你们要抓紧时间完成那个尾巴工程！
Nǐmen yào zhuājǐn shíjiān wánchéng nàge wěiba gōngchéng！
Hurry up to finish that protracted project!
窑顶坏了，要抓紧时间修理才不影响生产啊。
Yáodǐng huài le，yào zhuājǐn shíjiān xiūlǐ cái bùyǐngxiǎng shēngchǎn a。

他不抓紧时间。
Tā bù zhuājǐn shíjiān。
He didn\'t make the best use of his time.
如不抓紧处理，局面将一发不可收拾。
Rú bù zhuājǐn chǔlǐ，júmiàn jiāng yìfābùkěshōushí。
If we don\'t deal with the matter quickly, the situation will become even more unmanageable.
我们时间不多了，你得抓紧。
Wǒmen shíjiān bù duō le，nǐ děi zhuājǐn。
We don\'t have much time, you\'d better make the most of it.
抓而不紧，等于不抓。
Zhuā ér bùjǐn, děngyú bùzhuā。
Not to grasp firmly is not to grasp at all.
他紧紧抓住这个贼，不让他跑掉。
Tā jǐnjǐn zhuāzhù zhège zéi，bú ràng tā pǎodiào。
He grasped the thief firmly to stop him running away.

The traffic police chased the driver who had caused the accident, and finally caught him.

[+object] 对紧抓的某物稍稍松手
to hold/hang/cling onto sth
紧紧抓/握/揪住某物

Zhè míng táofàn bèi dìfang dāngjú zhuāzhù le。
这名逃犯被地方当局抓住了。
To avoid being caught，you must run like the wind.
Wèile bìmiǎn bèi zhuā，nǐ bìxū xùnsù de pǎodiào。
为了避免被抓，你必须迅速地跑掉。
Players must race against the clock to complete the task, which also include reading aloud and drawing.
Xuǎnshǒumen bìxū zhuājǐn shíjiān，xùnsù de wánchéng bāokuò lǎngdú hé huìhuà zàinèi de rènwù。
选手们必须抓紧时间，迅速地完成包括朗读和绘画在内的任务。
Don\'t scratch your insect bites!
Bié zhuānáo bèi chóngzi yǎo de Dìfang。
别抓挠被虫子咬的地方。
They were caught by her parents in a passionate clinch.
Tāmen zhèngzài jīqíng de yōngbào，bèi tā de fùmǔ zhuādào le。
他们正在激情地拥抱，被她的父母抓到了。
Children splashed gleefully in the shallow water, trying to catch crabs.
Háizǐmen huānkuài de pǎodào qiǎnshuǐtān，xiǎngyào zhuā xiē pángxiè。
孩子们欢快地跑到浅水滩，想要抓些螃蟹。
Toads, when they seize one end of a worm, methodically rake the length of it to remove any sticks or earth that might be stuck to it.
Chánchú zài zhuāzhù chóngzi de yìduān hòu，tā huì xìtǒng de sǎoshì tā de chángdù，yǐbiàn chúqù zhānzài chóngzi shēnshàng de shùzhī huòzhě nítǔ。
蟾蜍在抓住虫子的一端后，它会系统地扫视它的长度，以便除去粘在虫子身上的树枝或者泥土。
抓而不紧，等于不抓。
Zhuā ér bùjǐn, děngyú bùzhuā。
Not to grasp firmly is not to grasp at all.
大家抓小偷时，她只是空喊抓贼，不敢上前。
Dàjiā zhuā xiǎotōu shí，tā zhǐshì kōnghǎn zhuāzéi，bùgǎn shàngqián。
When people were catching the thief, she clamoured but did not take action.
案犯全部抓获。
Ànfàn quánbù zhuāhuò。 
The criminals in the case have all been captured.
给人抓住把柄
gěi rén zhuāzhù bǎbǐng 
give sb. a handle (against oneself)
他抓住了你什么把柄？
Tā zhuāzhù le nǐ shénme bǎbǐng? 
What hold does he have on you?
百无聊赖时我就随手抓过一本书来，强迫自己看下去。
Bǎiwúliáolài shí wǒ jiù suíshǒu zhuāguò yìběnshū lái，qiǎngpò zìjǐ kànxiàqù。
In times of sheer boredom I would pick up a book and force myself to read.
他们把他抓住，不由分说，痛打一顿。
Tāmen bǎ tā zhuāzhù，bùyóufēnshuō tòngdǎ yídùn。
They seized him, and without waiting for an explanation gave him a severe beating.
抓大头儿
zhuā dàtóur 
grasp the main part
抓好典型，带动全局
Zhuāhǎo diǎnxíng，dàidòng quánjú。
take firm hold of typical examples to promote the work as a whole
当场抓住
dāngchǎng zhuāzhù 
catch red-handed (or in the act)
抓紧时间，不要等待。
Zhuājǐn shíjiān，búyào děngdài。
Don\'t waste time. Go ahead.
抓典型
zhuā diǎnxíng 
grasp typical cases
抓住绳子不放
zhuāzhù shéngzi bú fàng
won\'t let go of the rope
你抓紧，我要放手了。
Nǐ zhuājǐn，wǒ yào fàngshǒu le。
Hold tight. I\'m going to let go.
千头万绪抓根本。
Qiāntóuwànxù zhuā gēnběn。
Faced with a great variety of problems, one must concentrate on what is of basic importance.
抓住问题的核心
zhuāzhù wèntí de héxīn
get to the heart of the matter
抓住阴谋家的狐狸尾巴
zhuāzhù yīnmóujiā de húli wěibā
seize hold of the evidence which gives the conspirator away
抓别人的话把儿做文章
zhuā biérén de huàbàr zuò wénzhāng
seize sb.\'s mistake to make an issue of it
错过(抓住)机会
cuòguò（zhuāzhù）jīhuì
miss (seize) a chance
他两手交互地抓住野藤爬上崖顶。
Tā liǎngshǒu jiāohù de zhuāzhù yěténgpáshàngyádǐng。
Holding on to the creepers, he climbed hand over hand to the top of the cliff.
他紧紧抓住这个贼，不让他跑掉。
Tā jǐnjǐn zhuāzhù zhège zéi，bú ràng tā pǎodiào。
He grasped the thief firmly to stop him running away.
抓住篮板球投篮入网
zhuāzhù lánbǎnqiú tóulán rù wǎnɡ
grab the rebound and sink a basket
不良倾向一冒头就要抓住它。
Bùliángqīngxiàng yí màotóu jiùyào zhuāzhù tā。
Watch out for harmful tendencies and deal with them the moment they crop up.
部长下去蹲点了，面上的工作他让我来抓。
Bùzhǎng xiàqù dūndiǎn le，miànshàng de gōngzuò tā ràngwǒ lái zhuā。
The minister has gone to work at a grass-roots unit and left me in charge of the ministry.
劈胸一把抓住
pīxiōngyì bǎ zhuāzhù
grasp sb. by the front of his coat
不能只抓一头，把别的事都撇在一旁。
Bùnéng zhǐ zhuā yìtóu，bǎ bié de shì dōu piēzài yìpáng。
We should not just concentrate on one thing to the neglect of everything else.
抓主要问题，不要被枝节问题牵掣住。
Zhuā zhǔyào wèntí，búyào bèi zhījié wèntí qiānchè zhù。
Let\'s focus our attention on the main problem and not get bogged down in minor issues.
侦察兵抓了个舌头。
Zhēnchábīngzhuā le gè shétou。
The scouts took a prisoner to get information.
你如果没有思想准备，事到临头就会抓瞎。
Nǐ rúguǒ méiyǒu sīxiǎng zhǔnbèi，shì dào lín tóu jiùhuì zhuāxiā。
If you don\'t anticipate what may happen, you\'ll find yourself at a loss when something crops up.
甩开膀子抓生产
shuǎikāi bǎngzi zhuā shēngchǎn
go all out to increase production
抓紧了，别松手。
Zhuājǐn le，bié sōngshǒu。
Hold it tight and don\'t let go.
摆脱这些琐碎的事，多抓些大问题。
Bǎituō zhèxiē suǒsuì de shì，duō zhuā xiē dàwèntí。
Don\'t get bogged down in these trivialities; try to grasp the essentials.
这项工作得抓紧，不能老是往后推。
Zhè xiàng gōngzuò děi zhuājǐn，bùnéng lǎoshì wǎnghòu tuī。
We have to get on with this job, we can\'t put it off day after day.
事先把要带的东西都准备好，免得临时瞎抓。
Shìxiān bǎ yào dài de dōngxi dōu zhǔnbèi hǎo，miǎn de línshí xiāzhuā。
Get everything ready beforehand so that you won\'t be in a rush when it\'s time to leave.
有小辫子给人抓
yǒu xiǎobiànzi gěi rén zhuā
have vulnerable points that others may capitalize on
在行窃时被抓住
zài xíngqiè shí bèi zhuāzhù
be caught in the act of stealing
一把抓住他的袖子
yì bǎ zhuāzhù tā de xiùzi
seize him by the sleeve
这事儿不能老悬着，得抓紧解决。
Zhèshìr bùnéng lǎo xuán zhe，děi zhuājǐn jiějué。
We can\'t leave the matter unresolved any longer. Let\'s have it settled without delay.
这件事不能老悬空着，要抓紧解决。
Zhèjiànshì bùnéng lǎo xuánkōng zhe，yào zhuājǐn jiějué。
Let\'s deal with the matter now; it\'s hung in the air too long.
他眼巴巴地看着老鹰把小鸡抓走了。
Tā yǎnbābā de kàn zhe lǎoyīngbǎ xiǎojī zhuāzǒu le。
He helplessly looked on when the hawk snatched the chick away.
抓住要点
zhuāzhù yàodiǎn
grasp the main points
抓住要害
zhuāzhù yàohài
scratch where it itches
抓住一切机会
zhuāzhù yíqiè jīhuì 
seize every opportunity
你这病要抓紧治，可不能一误再误了。
Nǐ zhè bìngyào zhuājǐn zhì，kě bùnéng yíwù zài wù le。
You should go and see a doctor at once. You mustn\'t put it off any more.
抓住了这个主要矛盾，一切问题就迎刃而解了。
Zhuāzhù le zhège zhǔyào máodùn，yíqiè wèntí jiù yíngrènérjiě le。
Once this principal contradiction is grasped, all problems can be readily solved.
他抓住绳子悠了过去。
Tā zhuāzhù shéngzi yōu le guòqù。
He held on to the rope and swung across.
抓住问题的中心
zhuāzhù wèntí de zhōng xīn 
get to the heart of the matter
抓一把糖
zhuā yìbǎ táng
take a handful of sweets
抓机会
zhuā jīhuì 
seize an opportunity
他抓起帽子就往外走。
Tā zhuāqǐ màozi jiù wǎngwài zǒu。
He grabbed (or snatched up) his cap and made for the door.
抓痒痒
zhuā yǎnɡyɑnɡ 
scratch an itch
猫把孩子的手抓了。
Māo bǎ háizi de shǒu zhuā le。
The cat scratched the child\'s hand.
抓小偷
zhuā xiǎotōu 
catch a thief
抓重点
zhuā zhòngdiǎn 
stress the essentials
抓思想问题
zhuā sīxiǎngwèntí
