zhuā miáotou 
watch out for the first signs
他是抓工会工作的。
Tā shì zhuā gōnghuì gōngzuò de。
He is in charge of trade union work.
抓捕逃犯
zhuābǔ táofàn 
arrest an escaped prisoner
你得把工作抓好。
Nǐ děi bǎ gōngzuò zhuāhǎo。
You must do a good job of it.
抓紧学习
zhuājǐn xuéxí 
attend to one\'s studies in earnest; study hard
抓紧时机
zhuājǐn shíjī 
seize (or grasp) the opportunity
抓紧时间
zhuājǐn shíjiān 
make the best use of one\'s time
抓挠几下就不痒了。
Zhuānao jǐ xià jiù bùyǎng le。
Scratch and it won\'t itch any more.
好孩子，别抓挠东西！
Hǎo háizi，bié zhuānao dōngxi！
Don\'t mess things about, my child.
他们俩又抓挠起来了。
Tāmen liǎ yòu zhuā nao qǐlái le。
The two of them have got into a fight again.
一下子来了这么多人吃饭，炊事员怕抓挠不过来吧！
Yíxiàzi lái le zhèmeduō rén chīfàn，chuīshìyuán pà zhuānao bú guòlái ba！
With so many people here all of a sudden for a meal, I wonder how the cook can hustle them up something to eat.
最好派个负责人来，咱好有个抓挠。
Zuìhǎo pài gè fùzérén lái，zán hǎo yǒu gè zhuānao。
We should have someone sent here to take responsibility, so that we can turn to him with our problems.
事前要慎重考虑，免得发生问题时没抓挠。
Shì qián yào shènzhòngkǎolǜ，miǎn de fāshēngwèntí shí méi zhuānao。
Think it over well beforehand so as to be prepared for all eventualities.
抓了好些人。
Zhuā le hǎo xiē rén。
A number of arrests were made.
早点儿做好准备，免得临时抓瞎。
Zǎo diǎnr zuòhǎo zhǔnbèi，miǎn de línshí zhuāxiā。
Arrange everything in advance so that you won\'t be in a rush at the last moment.
抓住个小偷
zhuāzhù gè xiǎotōu 
catch a thief
这出戏一开场就抓住了观众。
Zhè chū xì yì kāichǎngjiù zhuāzhù le guānzhòng。
The play gripped the attention of the audience from the moment the curtain rose.
抓住这个主题，把所有的材料组编起来，成为一个整体。
Zhuāzhù zhège zhǔtí，bǎ suǒyǒu de cáiliào zǔbiān qǐlái，chéngwéi yígè zhěngtǐ。
Keep to the theme; put all relevant material together and work it into a unified, organic whole.
抓住一点小事做文章
zhuāzhù yìdiǎn xiǎoshì zuòwénzhānɡ 
seize on a trifle and make an issue of it; make a fuss about something trivial
抓阄儿
zhuājiūr
draw lots
抓住机遇
zhuāzhù jīyù
grasp the opportunity
这些人暗偷明抢，活该被抓！
Zhèxiē rén àntōu míngqiǎng，huógāi bèi zhuā！
They deserved to get arrested, considering the crimes they committed.
警察将不法之徒当场抓获。
Jǐngchá jiāng bùfǎ zhī tú dāngchǎng zhuāhuò。
The police arrested the lawbreaker.
他回来就一把抓起香肠放到嘴里，好像个小馋猫。
Tā huílái jiù yìbǎ zhuāqǐ xiāngcháng fàng dào zuǐ lǐ，hǎo xiàng gè xiǎochánmāo。
He stuffed a sausage into his mouth the moment he got home, just like a little greedy cat.
警察在毒贩出货的时候将他们抓获。
Jǐngchá zài dúfàn chūhuò de shíhou jiāng tāmen zhuāhuò。
The police arrested the drug dealers in the act.
刚抓住的鱼跐溜一下就从我手中滑走了。
Gāng zhuāzhù de yú cīliū yíxià jiù cóng wǒ shǒu zhōng huázǒu le。
The fish I had just caught slipped out of my hand.
你的伤口快愈合时会有刺痒的感觉，千万不要抓。
Nǐ de shāngkǒu kuài yùhé shí huì yǒu cìyǎng de gǎnjué，qiānwàn búyào zhuā。
While the wound is getting better, it will feel a little itchy but you must not scratch it.
想到罪犯还没被抓住，他不禁打冷战。
Xiǎngdào zuìfàn hái méi bèi zhuāzhù，tā bùjīn dǎ lěngzhàn。
Thinking of the criminal who is still at large, he can\'t help but shiver.
我们要抓住要害，待机而动。
Wǒmen yào zhuāzhù yàohài，dàijī érdòng。
We should seize the essence, and wait for the right moment to go into action.
晚上就要演出了，他们正抓紧对词呢。
Wǎnshàng jiùyào yǎnchū le，tāmen zhèng zhuājǐn duìcí ne。
They are going through a rehearsal, the show is to be staged at night.
不要以为我是你哥哥就不敢抓你，要知道法不徇情！
Búyào yǐwéi wǒ shì nǐ gēge jiù bùgǎn zhuā nǐ，yào zhīdào fǎbúxùnqíng！
Although I am your elder bother, I warn you that I will arrest you , because the law knows no personal considerations.
小李见义勇为抓小偷，却被小偷反噬。
Xiǎo Lǐ jiànyìyǒngwéi zhuā xiǎotōu，què bèi xiǎotōu fǎnshì。
Xiao Li caught the thief to bring him to justice, but was accused by the thief himself.
政策已经放活了，咱们应该抓住机遇，发展当地经济。
Zhèngcè yǐjing fànghuó le，zánmen yīnggāi zhuāzhù jīyù，fāzhǎn dāngdì jīngjì。
The policies are more flexible now, we should seize the chance to develop our local economy.
主项要抓紧，副项也不能放松。
Zhǔ xiàng yào zhuājǐn，fù xiàng yě bùnéng fàngsōng。
We should really stress the major tasks without overlooking the minor tasks.
据已抓获的犯罪嫌疑人供称，他们的团伙一共有五十人左右。
Jù yǐ zhuāhuò de fànzuì xiányírén gòngchēng，tāmen de tuánhuǒ yígòng yǒu wǔshí rén zuǒyòu。
According to the captured suspects, there are about 50 people in their gang.
小偷故技重施，被守候在一旁的便衣警察抓了个正着。
Xiǎotōu gùjì chóngshī，bèi shǒuhòu zài yìpáng de biànyī jǐngchá zhuā le gè zhèngzháo。
When trying the same old trick, the thief was caught by the plainclothes policeman waiting at the side.
你抓住桄子，一下一下的往怀里带，风筝一会儿就能飞起来。
Nǐ zhuāzhù guāngzi，yíxià yíxià de wǎng huáilǐ dài，fēngzhēng yíhuìr jiùnéng fēiqǐlái。
You hold the reel and pull it towards yourself continuously. After a while, the kite will fly into the sky.
反腐败斗争关系国本，一定要长抓不懈。
Fǎnfǔbài dòuzhēng guānxì guóběn，yídìng yào chángzhuā búxiè。
We should persevere with the fight against corruption, one of the fundamental principles for governing a country.
要想把学习搞上去，就要狠抓基础。
Yào xiǎng bǎ xuéxí gǎoshàngqù，jiùyào hěnzhuā jīchǔ。
If you really want to make progress in your studies, you should make a desperate effort in learning basic knowledge.
为了方便抓捕和寄押犯罪嫌疑人，警方采取了有效的措施。
Wèile fāngbiàn zhuābǔ hé jìyā fànzuì xiányírén，jǐngfāng cǎiqǔ le yǒuxiào de cuòshī。
In order to arrest and temporarily imprison criminal suspects, the police have taken effective measures.
警察抓他时他非常后悔，但已是江心补漏，为时已晚。
Jǐngchá zhuā tā shí tā fēicháng hòuhuǐ，dàn yǐshì jiāngxīn bǔlòu，wéishí yǐwǎn。
He felt deeply regretful when he was arrested by the police, but it was too late for him to mend his ways.
抓过接力棒他奋力向终点跑去。
Zhuāguò jiēlìbàng tā fènlì xiàng zhōng diǎn pǎoqù。
Grabbing the relay baton, he darted off towards the finishing point.
交警紧追不舍，终于将肇事司机抓获。
Jiāojǐng jǐnzhuī bùshě，zhōng yú jiāng zhàoshì sījī zhuāhuò。
The traffic police chased the driver who had caused the accident, and finally caught him.
这些溃兵，我们抓到以后要宽大处理。
Zhèxiē kuìbīng，wǒmen zhuādào yǐhòu yào kuāndà chǔlǐ。
After catching those defeated and dispersed soldiers, we should treat them with mercy.
封建官府拉丁其实就是抓人去做苦力！
Fēngjiàn guānfǔ lādīng qíshí jiùshì zhuārén qù zuò kǔlì！
&quot;Impressment&quot; refers to feudal officials forcing civilians to serve as coolies.
他的弹跳很好，可以抓到篮筐。
Tā de tántiào hěnhǎo，kěyǐ zhuādào lánkuāng。
He bounces high and can catch the ring hoop.
这个小偷已经是第5次被警察抓住了，真是累教不改。
Zhège xiǎotōu yǐjing shì dìwǔcì bèi jǐngchá zhuāzhù le，zhēnshì lěijiào bùgǎi。
This thief has been caught by the police five times. What a person who refuses to mend his ways, despite  repeated punishment.
他曾经被猫的利爪抓伤过。
Tā céngjīng bèi māo de lìzhǎo zhuāshāng guò。
He was once scratched by the sharp claws of a cat.
我乃一良人，因何抓我到官衙。
Wǒ nǎi yì liángrén,yīnhé zhuā wǒ dào guānyá.
I am a civilian. Why did you arrest me, and bring me to yamen?
抓捕这样的流窜犯，有相当大的难度。
Zhuābǔ zhèyàng de liúcuànfàn，yǒu xiāngdāng dà de nándù。
It is quite difficult to capture a criminal on the run.
夏日的夜晚，流萤飞舞，惹得孩子们争着抓扑。
Xiàrì de yèwǎn，liúyíng fēiwǔ，rědé háizimen zhēng zhe zhuāpū。
Fireflies fly everywhere on summer nights, which attract children to chase after them.
他一个猛子扎下水，抓住了一条鲤鱼。
Tā yígè měngzi zā xià shuǐ，zhuāzhù le yìtiáo lǐyú。
With a dive, he caught a carp.
古时候，国家一打仗就要抓老百姓当民夫。
Gǔshíhou，guójiā yì dǎzhàng jiùyào zhuā lǎobǎixìng dāng mínfū。
In ancient times when a nation was at war, civilians would be captured and become conscripted labourers.
小偷被当场抓住后，便企图谋陷他身边的人。
Xiǎotōu bèi dāngchǎng zhuāzhù hòu，biàn qǐtú móuxiàn tā shēnbiān de rén。
After being caught in red, the thief attempted to plot a frame-up against people around.
为了尽快抓获那个流窜犯，警方再次提高了赏格。
Wèile jǐnkuài zhuāhuò nàge liúcuànfàn，jǐngfāng zài cì tígāo le shǎnggé。
In order to arrest the criminal on the run as soon as possible, the police increased the reward offered.
据说小偷已经被抓住了，是一个未成年的少男。
Jùshuō xiǎotōu yǐjing bèi zhuāzhù le，shì yígè wèichéngnián de shàonán。
It is said that the thief, a juvenile, has been arrested.
接受媒体采访时一定要慎言，不要被抓住了把柄。
Jiēshòu méitǐ cǎifǎng shí yídìng yào shènyán，búyào bèi zhuāzhù le bǎbǐng。
You must be cautious when being interviewed by the press, or you might say something against yourself.
过吊桥的时候请大家用手抓紧绳缆。
Guò diàoqiáo de shíhou qǐng dàjiā yòng shǒu zhuājǐn shénglǎn。
Please keep a firm grasp on the cable when crossing the drawbridge.
他没有抓住最好的胜机，结果被对手反败为胜了。
Tā méiyǒu zhuāzhù zuìhǎo de shèngjī，jiéguǒ bèi duìshǒu fǎnbài wéishèng le。
He didn\'t take the best winning chances, and was beaten by his opponent instead.
你只要抓住题意的突破口，就能轻易解题。
Nǐ zhǐyào zhuāzhù tíyì de tūpòkǒu，jiù néng qīngyì jiětí。
As long as you can find out the best place to start cracking this problem, you can solve it easily.
你们要抓紧时间完成那个尾巴工程！
Nǐmen yào zhuājǐn shíjiān wánchéng nàge wěiba gōngchéng！

我今天抓小偷时竟被人当成了小偷，真是窝心！

I was caught by the police, when I was trying to catch the real thief!

The head of the beareau give orders that we must catch this murderer.

You must target the principal contradiction, rather than the trivial matters.
写文章必须抓住重点，做到详略得当。

One must grasp the main idea and be consistent in writing.
民警们毫不畏惧，勇敢地抓捕凶顽。

The policemen had no fear, courageously running after the gangsters.

Gēnjù bàozhǐ shàng de xiāoxi，xiōngxián yǐjing bèi zhuābǔ guīàn le。
According to the news in the paper, the criminal suspect has been arrested.
他伸手抓住了一片虚飘的树叶。
Tā shēnshǒu zhuāzhù le yípiàn xūpiāo de shùyè。
He reached out his hand and grabbed a floating tree leaf.
老师巡查考试的时候正好抓住他作弊。

After a search lasting three days, the suspect was finally arrested.
苍鹰箭一般滑过天空，鹰爪上还抓着一只野兔。

An eagle with a rabbit in its talons is darting through the sky like an arrow.

The workers are using the grab bucket to transport concrete.

yánjiāfángfàn
take strict precautions
严密防范
yánmì fánɡfàn
take strict precautions against
工商局对黄贩进行严惩，防止他们再次违法犯罪。
Gōngshāngjú duì huángfàn jìnxíng yánchéng，fángzhǐ tāmen zàicì wéifǎ fànzuì。
The business administration bureau has chastised pornography vendors to prevent them from violating the law again.
沿边地区经常有毒贩出没，大家要严加防范。
Yánbiān dìqū jīngcháng yǒu dúfàn chūmò，dàjiā yào yánjiā fángfàn。
The drug dealers who constantly show up in the coastal areas must be kept away.
关防严密
ɡuānfánɡ yánmì
tight security measures
这个人心怀叵测，对他的一举一动，都要严加提防。
Zhègerén xīnhuáipǒcè，duì tā de yìjǔyídòng，dōuyào yánjiādīfang。
That man has sinister designs. You must guard against his every move.
防守严固。
fánɡshǒu yánɡù。
The defences are strong.
鼻疽病传染严重，养家畜的家庭一定要做好防范。
Bíjūbìng chuánrǎn yánzhòng，yǎngjiāchù de jiātíng yídìng yào zuòhǎo fángfàn。
Farcinia is spreading seriously and those families which raise cattles must take measures against it.
为了防止海匪的袭击，每个人都荷枪实弹，严阵以待。
Wèile fángzhǐ hǎifěi de xíjī，měigèrén dōu héqiāng shídàn，yánzhèn yǐdài。
Everyone is at attention at their stations with live ammunitions in order to prevent pirate attacks.
地震后，要严防病疫流行。
严防江堤溃口。
必须严防土地批租工作中的腐败行为。
严防证券市场运作失范
严防险象发生。
严防敌军再犯。
严防文物走私出境
严防残匪窜逃

严防敌人的反间活动
严防药物受热自燃

严防泄密。
严防偷盗。

严防走漏行为。
严加防范
对汉墓发掘现场要严加防护
严密防卫
本禁令所列上述种种，均应严加防范|
严格财务管理，防止跑冒滴漏。
a maximum security prison
实行最严格防备措施的监狱
That prison is maximum security and there is no way for any prisoner to escape.
那座监狱处于最严密的防卫状态，犯人不可能逃跑。
He couldn\'t get past the tight defense.
Tā wúfǎ chuānguò yánmì de fángshǒu。
他无法穿过严密的防守。
Postexposure prophylaxis is an integral part of the pharmacopeia in preventing severe disease after acute infections.
Zài yùfáng jíxìng chuánrǎn hòu de yánzhòng jíbìng fāngmiàn，bàolù hòu yùfáng shì yàodiǎn de yígè zhǔyào bùfen。
在预防急性传染后的严重疾病方面，暴露后预防是药典的一个主要部分。
Security in this fort is very tight.
这个堡垒的防卫非常森严。
Federals will be put under strict regulation precautioning graft.
联邦政府的官员将受到严格的约束以预防贪污腐败。
To prevent patchy coverage, keep the can parallel to the surface at all times.
Wèile fángzhǐ zhēgài bù yán，yīng bǎochí guàntǐ zǒngshì yǔ biǎomiàn píngxíng。
为了防止遮盖不严，应保持罐体总是与表面平行。
消防员从冲腾着火焰和浓烟的房子里救出了一个小孩。
Xiāofángyuán cóng chōngténg zhe huǒyàn hé nóngyān de fángzi lǐ jiùchū le yígè xiǎohái。
The house was covered with heavy flame and smoke when the firefighters saved the child..
消防员迅速卸下了水龙带，准备抽水救火。
Xiāofángyuán xùnsù xièxià le shuǐlóngdài，zhǔnbèi chōushuǐ jiùhuǒ。
The firefighters rapidly unload the water hose, ready to pump water to put out the fire.
消防员用太平斧砍破大门、救出了伤员。
Xiāofángyuán yòng tàipíngfǔ kǎnpò dàmén、jiùchū le shāngyuán。
The firefighters broke down the door with emergency axes and saved the wounded.
消防员们已把生死置之度外。
Xiāofángyuánmen yǐ bǎ shēngsǐ zhìzhīdùwài。
The firemen didn\'t give a thought to their personal safety.
消防员冒着生命危险扑灭森林大火。
Xiāofángyuán màozhe shēngmìngwēixiǎn pūmiè sēnlíndàhuǒ。
The firefighter put his life in danger to extinguish the forest fire.
消防队员正在救火。
Xiāofángduìyuán zhèngzài jiùhuǒ。
The firemen are fighting the fire.
消防队员
xiāofángduìyuán
fireman; fire fighter
3名消防队员在救火时殉职。
Sānmíng xiāofángduìyuán zài jiùhuǒ shí xùnzhí。
Three members of the fire brigade died in the line of duty.
消防队员迅速冲过火墙，入室救人。也说火网。
接到报警后，消防队员随即赶赴火灾现场。
He had also been a firefighter in the company and had attained the rank of captain.
Tā céng shì xiāofáng fēnduì de yì míng xiāofángyuán，bìngqiě zuòdàole duìzhǎng de wèizhi。
他曾是消防分队的一名消防员，并且做到了队长的位置。
The firemen entered the building on fire through the roof.
消防员从房顶进入了着火的建筑。
The fireman forced the door open to rescue the baby.
消防员强行破门，救出了婴儿。
The firefighters extinguished the fire.
Xiāofángyuán bǎ dàhuǒ pūmiè le。
消防员把大火扑灭了。
The alert sounded and the firemen awoke from their sleep.
Bàojǐngqì xiǎng le，xiāofángyuán cóng tāmen de shuìmèng zhōng jīngxǐng。
报警器响了，消防员从他们的睡梦中惊醒。
The firefighter banked the fire with dirt.
Xiāofángyuán yòng nítǔ mièhuǒ。
消防员用泥土灭火。
The firemen were killed when part of the building collapsed on them.
Jiànzhùwù de yí bùfēn tāntā xiàlái zádào tāmen Shēnshàng，duóqùle jǐ míng xiāofángyuán de shēngmìng。
建筑物的一部分坍塌下来砸到他们身上，夺去了几名消防员的生命。
We stand and watch a huge basket suspended from a crane take firefighters to the roof of the building.
Wǒmen zhànzhekàn diàochē bǎ xiāofángyuán yòng jùdà lánzi diào dào fángdǐng。
我们站着看吊车把消防员用巨大篮子吊到房顶。
He wants to act out his dream of becoming a fireman.
Tā xiǎng shíxiàn dāng xiāofángyuán de mèngxiǎng。
他想实现当消防员的梦想。
The fireman carried the cat down the tree.
Xiāofángyuán bǎ māo cóng shù shàng fàngle xiàlái。
消防员把猫从树上放了下来。
The firemen were called in to damp down the blaze.
Xiāofángyuán bèi jiàolái miè huǒ。
消防员被叫来灭火。
The firemen hosed down the affected areas.
Xiāofángyuán chōngxǐ shòu yǐngxiǎng de dìqū。
消防员冲洗受影响的地区。
I was told I would never get a job as a fireman.
Wǒ bèi gàozhī jiāng yǒngyuǎn bù néng cóngshì xiāofángyuán de gōngzuò。
我被告知将永远不能从事消防员的工作。
Firemen have to suit up in hurry.
Xiāofángyuánmen bìxū děi kuàisù chuānshàng zhìfú。
消防员们必须得快速穿上制服。
Fireman learn several different raises for getting ladders up.
Xiāofángyuán xuéle jǐ zhǒng shēngqǐ tīzi de fāngfǎ。
消防员学了几种升起梯子的方法。
Firemen struggled to put out  the blaze.
消防队员奋力扑灭了大火。

消防队员尽力解救受伤人员。

积极(消极)防御
jījí(xiāojí)fángyù
active (passive) defence
消极抵抗(防御)
xiāojí dǐkànɡ(fánɡyù)
passive resistance (defence)

turn away
走开，离开；转(或背)过脸去；把(脸)转过去；把…打发走；解雇；消除；避免；克制；防止

These bomb shelters are left over from the time of war.

老话儿都说，养儿防老。
Lǎohuàr dōu shuō，yǎng\'ér fánglǎo。

听说多吃新鲜的蔬菜水果，可以美容防老。
Tīngshuō duō chī xīnxiān de shūcài shuǐguǒ，kěyǐ měiróng fánglǎo。
Eating fresh vegetables and fruits can have the effect of making one look young and beautiful.
只有认真刷牙，经常漱口才能防龋。
Zhǐyǒu rènzhēn shuāyá，jīngcháng shùkǒu cáinéng fángqǔ。
You must brush your teeth carefully and gargle more often to prevent your tooth from decaying.
夏天来了，出门的时候一定要擦防晒油。
Xiàtiān lái le，chūmén de shíhou yídìng yào cā fángshàiyóu。
One must applying suntan lotion to one\'s skin when going outdoors in summer.
楼顶的防渗层已经老化，要请人来修理了。
Lóudǐng de fángshèn céng yǐjing lǎohuà，yào qǐng rén lái xiūlǐ le。
The impermeable layer has aged, we must find someone to repair it.
这个宝宝真勇敢，打防疫针的时候没有哭。

This baby didn\'t cry when having a injection. How brave he is!
地震发生后，灾区群众住进了临时的防震棚。

People living in the disaster area moved into temporary earthquake shelters after the earthquake.

这个古老建筑的风火墙早已无法承担防火的重任了。

We lost a chance of scoring due to the slow switch between attacking and defending.
植草固沙是防止沙尘暴的有效措施。

国防建设要有强大的经济实力作基础，高端的科技水平作后盾。

The building of national defense should be based on economic strength, science, and technology.

Guófáng jiàoyù shì wǒmen rùxué de bìxiū kèchéng。

他穿着件国防绿的上衣。

Having done well in preventing diseases, we had a successful harvest of late-grown crops.
医生正在采取有效措施防止发生危象。

The docter asked my father to have light diet to avoid angina.

We must build banks to prevent the flood from flowing downward.

为防止毛线缠在一起，妈妈要我帮她把线缠到线桄子上。

Mother asks me to help her to wind the wool around the reel to prevent it from getting entangled.

The Great Wall runs graciously across North China, it has worked well in preventing the nomads from attacking.
洪水来的时候，他们一天巡防河堤好几次。

As a popular saying goes: &quot;Those living on a mountain live off the mountain, those living near the water live off the water.&quot; Therefore he had the idea of making use of the sand and developed a special tourism item of desert exploration.

shāfā diànzi
sofa cushion
沙发套子
shāfā tàozi 
slipcover for a sofa; sofa cover

沙子晒得很热乎。
铁沙子。
眼里揉不得沙子。

嗓子发沙

沙子和树叶被水流冲走了。
The sand is deposited at the bank of the river.

沙子沉积在河岸上了。

从沙子里可以看出他的脚印。

The sand was tided off the beach.
Hǎitān shàng de shāzi suí cháoshuǐ chōng zǒu。

This plant requires a muddy soil, therefore a mixture of clay and sand is ideal.

这株植物需要泥浆状土，所以湿土和沙子的混合物是理想的。

Jiāng jīnzi hé shāzi fēnkāi shì yòng táojīncáo wánchéng de。
将金子和沙子分开是用淘金槽完成的。
The dry, white trickling sand of the dunes was warm to the touch.
Shāqiū shàng gānzào fànbái de shāzi mō qǐlái hěn nuǎnhuo。
沙丘上干燥泛白的沙子摸起来很暖和。

Tā chuīdiào shāzi。
他吹掉沙子。
She took off her boot to shake out the sand.

风吹树叶沙沙作响。
Fēngchuī shùyè shāshā zuòxiǎng。
The leaves rustled in the wind.
俗话说“靠山吃山，靠水吃水”，于是他就想出了靠沙吃沙的点子，开发出了沙漠探险的特色旅游项目。
Súhuà shuō“kàoshān chīshān，kàoshuǐ chīshuǐ”，yúshì tā jiù xiǎngchū le kàoshā chīshā de diǎnzi，kāifā chū le shāmò tànxiǎn de tèsè lǚyóu xiàng mù。
As a popular saying goes: &quot;Those living on a mountain live off the mountain, those living near the water live off the water.&quot; Therefore he had the idea of making use of the sand and developed a special tourism item of desert exploration.
在沙地里种植沙棘，可以起到固沙的作用。
Zài shādì lǐ zhòngzhí shājí，kěyǐ qǐ dào gùshā de zuòyòng。
Planting sea buckthorn on sandy soil can solidify sand.
我们要把细沙中的沙粒筛出去。
Wǒmen yào bǎ xìshā zhōng de shālì shāi chūqù。
We must screen the sand grains out of the silver sand.
沙漠的风沙吹得他皮肤燥裂。
Shāmò de fēngshā chuī de tā pífū zàoliè。
His skin became chapped from the desert wind.
植草固沙是防止沙尘暴的有效措施。
Zhícǎo gùshā shì fángzhǐ shāchénbào de yǒuxiào cuòshī。
Planting grass and fixing the sand is an effective way of preventing sand storms.
你们要做的就是把这些沙子中的粗沙筛出来。
Nǐmen yào zuò de jiùshì bǎ zhèxiē shāzi zhōng de cūshā shāi chūlái。
What you have to do is to remove the gravel from this sand.
由于刮起了沙尘暴，整个城市黄沙漫天。
Yóuyú guāqǐ le shāchénbào，zhěnggè chéngshì huángshā màntiān。
Because of the sweep of the sandstorm, sand was all over the sky of the entire city.
沙滩上有两只觅食的沙鸥。
Shātān shàng yǒu liǎng zhī mìshí de shāōu。
On the beach, there are two gulls looking for food.
河里的泥沙淤积在这里，年深日久便成了沙洲。
Hé lǐ de níshā yūjī zài zhèlǐ，niánshēnrìjiǔ biàn chéng le shāzhōu。
The bar was formed by the mud and sand deposited here over a long period of time.
忽听得林中沙沙作响。
白杨树沙沙作响
沙沙的脚步声。
把麦子里的麦糠沙一沙。
种草固沙，造林防沙。
His shoes were crunching on the gravel.
Tā de xiézǐ cǎi zài shālì shàng shāshā de xiǎng。
他的鞋子踩在沙粒上沙沙地响。
Then he heard the rustling in the bushes behind him.
Ránhòu，tā tīngdào shēnhòu de guànmùcóng zhōng chuánlái shāshā de xiǎngshēng。
然后，他听到身后的灌木丛中传来沙沙的响声。
The leaves rustled tremulously in the wind.
Shùyè zài fēng zhōng chàndǒuzhe，shāshāzuòxiǎng。
树叶在风中颤抖着，沙沙作响。
Some ancient towns in the Middle East are buried in desert sands.
一些中东的古城被沙漠的黄沙掩埋了。
The blazing sun crackled the desert sand.
Rúhuǒ de jiāoyáng kǎo liè le shāmò zhōng de shādì。
如火的骄阳烤裂了沙漠中的沙地。
Informal dress is accepted for most events, but beachwear should be confined to the beach .
Dàduōshù chǎnghé fēizhèngshì de yīfu shì kěyǐ jiēshòu de，dànshì shātānzhuāng jiù jǐnxiànyú shātān shàng chuānzhuó le。
大多数场合非正式的衣服是可以接受的，但是沙滩装就仅限于沙滩上穿着了。
The residents sandbagged the beach front.
Jūmínmen zài shātān qiányán duīqǐle shādài。
居民们在沙滩前沿堆起了沙袋。
The Sahara Desert is the world\'s largest desert.
撒哈拉大沙漠是世界第一大沙漠。
The dry, white trickling sand of the dunes was warm to the touch.
Shāqiū shàng gānzào fànbái de shāzi mō qǐlái hěn nuǎnhuo。
沙丘上干燥泛白的沙子摸起来很暖和。

朝鲜的沙尘暴现象是中国快速沙漠化的结果。
我们这个部门不需要新人来掺沙子。
Wǒmen zhège bùmén bùxūyào xīnrén lái chānshāzi。
Our department doesn\'t need newcomers to disturb the status quo.
The recent outbreak of salmonella soiled KFC\'s reputation.
最近的沙门氏菌事件玷污了肯德基的名誉。
Earth banks were piled against doors, sandbags, wood, even furniture, was used in an attempt to stop the rising waters.
Lùdī shàng duījīle mén，shādài，shùmù，shènzhì shì jiājù，wèile fángzhǐ shàngshēng de héshuǐ。
路堤上堆积了门，沙袋，树木，甚至是家具，为了防止上升的河水。
We\'ll have to upend the sofa to get it through the door.
我们得把沙发倒过来才能抬过这门。
学术沙龙
xuéshù shālóng
academic salon
文学沙龙
wénxué shālóng
literary salon
各种人都来参加，未免泥沙俱下，鱼龙混杂。

防沙林带
fángshā líndài
a sand-break forest belt
沙漠(森林)地带

a desert (forest) region

build a shelter belt against sandstorms
我们要加大植树造林的力度，防治沙害。

We should reinforce our efforts in tree planting, and forestation making to prevent and cure sandstorms.
植树造林可以有效地防治沙灾。

Tree planting, and forestation can effectively prevent sandstorms.
这片速生林有效地起到了防风固沙的作用。

This fast-growing forest effectively prevents windstorms and fastens sand in the land.
实行封山育林的办法以来，这里的土壤沙化问题有了明显缓解。

The silt is deposited in the riverbed.

He came home from work and collapsed on the sofa.
Tā shàngbān huílái，jiù wúlì de dǎozài shāfā shàng。

Zhícǎo gùshā shì fángzhǐ shāchénbào de yǒuxiào cuòshī。
Planting grass and fixing the sand is an effective way of preventing sand storms.
由于刮起了沙尘暴，整个城市黄沙漫天。
Yóuyú guāqǐ le shāchénbào，zhěnggè chéngshì huángshā màntiān。
Because of the sweep of the sandstorm, sand was all over the sky of the entire city.
我们要把细沙中的沙粒筛出去。
Wǒmen yào bǎ xìshā zhōng de shālì shāi chūqù。
We must screen the sand grains out of the silver sand.
沙滩上有两只觅食的沙鸥。
Shātān shàng yǒu liǎng zhī mìshí de shāōu。
On the beach, there are two gulls looking for food.
这张两用沙发没有合适的地方安放。
Zhèzhāng liǎngyòng shāfā méiyǒu héshì de dìfāng ānfàng。
There\'s nowhere to put the sofa bed.
北方刮来的风沙
běifāng guālái de fēngshā 
sand blown from the north
往沙子里搀石灰
wǎng shāzi lǐ chān shíhuī
mix lime into sand
这儿的春天，风沙是常见的。
Zhèr de chūntiān，fēngshā shì chángjiàn de。
Duststorms are common here in spring.
泥沙沉积河底。
Níshā chénjī hédǐ。
The silt is deposited in the riverbed.
粗沙
cūshā 
coarse sand; grit
这样粗细的沙子最合适。
Zhèyàng cūxì de shāzi zuì héshì。
Sand this fine will be just right.

jiànlì fángfēnglíndài dǐyù fēngshā de qīnxí

沙漠(森林)地带
shāmò（sēnlín）dìdài 
a desert (forest) region
沙发垫子
shāfā diànzi
sofa cushion
这里春天风沙很大。
Zhèlǐ chūntiān fēngshā hěn dà。
It\'s very windy and dusty here in spring.

Xīshā qúndǎo shì yóu shānhújiāo gòuchéng de。
The Xisha Archipelago is formed of coral reefs.
在广漠的沙滩上
zài guǎngmò de shātān shàng

含沙量
hánshāliàng

cǎiyòng hánshāshèyǐng de bēiliè shǒufǎ

hánshāshèyǐng，èyǔzhòngshāng

豆沙里和点儿糖

hàozhào xiàng shāmò jìnjūn

他们人多，虽然在沙漠中行进，也不感到枯寂。
Tāmen rén duō，suīrán zài shāmò zhōng xíngjìn，yě bùgǎndào kūjì。
They travelled in a large group, so they didn\'t feel bored or lonely while passing through the desert.
防沙林带
fángshā líndài
a sand-break forest belt
沙子眯了眼。
Shāzi mí le yǎn。
The dust has got into my eye.

Xīshāqúndǎo zìgǔ jí wéi wǒguó lǐngtǔ，zhèxiē wénwù jiùshì míngzhèng。

黄沙漠漠
Huáng shā mòmò
a vast stretch of yellow sand
各种人都来参加，未免泥沙俱下，鱼龙混杂。
Gè zhǒng rén dōu lái cānjiā，wèimiǎn níshājùxià，yúlónghùnzá。
People of all descriptions flocked to join in, so inevitably the waters were muddied and the bad became mixed with the good.
小孩儿爱弄沙土。
Xiǎoháir ài nòngshātǔ。
Children like to play with sand.

有沙文主义气味
yǒu shāwénzhǔyì qìwèi

小猫在沙发上蜷作一团睡觉。
Xiǎomāo zài shāfā shàng quánzuò yìtuán shuìjiào。
The kitten was sleeping curled up on the sofa.

róngxù níshā

jiǔ jīngshāchǎng

Shuǐqú lǐ yū le hěnduō níshā。

你帮我把这盘水果沙拉拌匀吧。
Nǐ bāng wǒ bǎ zhè pán shuǐguǒ shālā bànyún ba。
Please help me turn the fruit salad.
这次科学考察团的任务就是探测沙地下是否有石油。
Zhècì kēxué kǎochátuán de rènwù jiùshì tàncè shādìxia shìfǒu yǒu shíyóu。
The task of this scientific group is to explore whether there is oil under the ground.
地质学家对塔克拉玛干沙漠进行了察勘。
Dìzhì xuéjiā duì Tǎkèlāmǎgānshāmò jìnxíng le chákān。
Geologists carried out a survey of the Takla Makan Desert.
冒着飞扬的尘沙，他赶去看望一位朋友。
Mào zhe fēiyáng de chénshā，tā gǎnqù kànwàng yíwèi péngyou。
He hurried off to visit a friend even as dust, and sand blew outside.
出阵迎敌就有战死沙场的危险。
Chūzhèn yíngdí jiù yǒu zhànsǐ shāchǎng de wēixiǎn。
You may die on the battlefield when fighting the enemy.
国家对于沙尘暴的治理已经初见成效。
Guójiā duìyú shāchénbào de zhìlǐ yǐjing chūjiàn chéngxiào。
The country\'s measures to prevent sandstorms have begun to show their effects.
北方的春城景色虽美，但经常有沙尘暴。
Běifāng de chūnchéng jǐngsè suī měi，dàn jīngcháng yǒu shāchénbào。
Though spring cities in the north are very beautiful, sand storms strike there frequently.
今年春上的沙尘暴很严重。
Jīnnián chūnshàng de shāchénbào hěnyánzhòng。
The sand storms are very serious this spring.
这些月饼是澄沙馅的。
Zhèxiē yuèbǐng shì chéngshāxiàn de。
These moon cakes are stuffed with fine and smooth sweetened bean paste.
这个沙发的底部是木头的。
Zhège shāfā de dǐbùshì mùtou de。
The base of this sofa is made of wood.
他们用地磅称量这些沙子的重量。
Tāmen yòng dìbàng chēngliáng zhèxiē shāzi de zhòngliàng。
They are using a weighbridge to weigh the sand.
他打算把书桌和沙发掉过儿。
Tā dǎsuàn bǎ shūzhuō hé shāfā diàoguòr。
He intends to switch the places of the desk and sofa.
造成沙尘暴的主要原因是地面覆被严重破坏。
Zàochéng shāchénbào de zhǔyào yuányīn shì dìmiàn fùbèi yánzhòng pòhuài。
The main cause of sand storms is that vegetation has been badly damaged.
沙俄曾割占中国东北和西北的大片领土。
Shāé céng gēzhān Zhōngguó dōngběi hé xīběi de dàpiàn lǐngtǔ。
The tsar used to separate and occupy a vast territory of northeast and northwest China.
《凉州词》：“ 醉卧沙场君莫笑，古来征战几人回。”
《Liángzhōucí》：“Zuìwò shāchǎng jūnmòxiào，gǔlái zhēngzhàn jǐrénhuí。”
Liangzhou Ci :&quot;One should not laugh at drunk people that fall on the battlefield, as since time immemorial, few of those going to the battlefield can stay alive and return home.&quot;
广袤的沙漠空无一人。
Guǎngmào de shāmò kōngwú yì rén。
There is no-one in the vast desert.
我们正在选择水果沙拉中的果料。
Wǒmen zhèngzài xuǎnzé shuǐguǒ shālā zhōng de guǒliào。
We are choosing ingredients for fruit salad.
没有过筛子的沙子是不能入料的。
Méiyǒu guò shāizi de shāzi shì bùnéng rùliào de。
Sand can not be added into the material without being sieved.
《战长沙》是京剧中一出著名的红净戏。
《Zhànchángshā》 shì jīngjù zhōng yìchū zhùmíng de hóngjìngxì。
Zhanchangsha is a famous Peking opera featuring the role of Hongjing.
他写的《浣溪沙》描述的是初夏农村的景色。
Tā xiě de《Huànxīshā》miáoshù de shì chūxià nóngcūn de jǐngsè。
&quot;Huanxisha&quot; was written by him, described the scene of early summer in country.
老师要求我们背诵这首《浣溪沙》。
Lǎoshī yāoqiú wǒmen bèisòng zhè shǒu《Huànxīshā》。
The teacher asked us to recite &quot;Huanxisha&quot;.
仙人掌可以在荒沙中成活并且繁衍生长。
Xiānrénzhǎng kěyǐ zài huāngshā zhōng chénghuó bìngqiě fányǎn shēngzhǎng。
Cactus can survive, and multiply in desolate deserts.
他是名久经沙场的大将军，战功赫赫。
Tā shì míng jiǔjīng shāchǎng de dàjiāngjūn，zhàngōng hèhè。
He is a very experienced general and has made great contributions in battles.
小狗总想把一个滚落在沙发底下的肉骨头抠搜出来。
Xiǎogǒu zǒng xiǎng bǎ yígè gǔnluò zài shāfā dǐxià de ròugǔtou kōusōu chūlái。
Dogs can always search out a bone out which rolls under the sofa.
人类乱砍滥伐，终于酿成了沙尘暴这杯苦酒！
Rénlèi luànkǎn lànfá，zhōng yú niàngchéng le shāchénbào zhè bēi kǔjiǔ！
Man cuts trees at random, finally causing a deplorable consequence --- the sand storm.
他面色黧黑，大概是在沙漠里呆久了。
Tā miànsè líhēi，dàgài shì zài shāmò lǐ dāi jiǔ le。
His complexion is dark and yellow. Perhaps that is because he has stayed in desert too long.
阳澄湖畔的沙家浜生长着茫茫的芦荡。
Yángchéng húpàn de shājiābāng shēngzhǎng zhe mángmáng de lúdàng。
Shajia creek beside Yangcheng Lake is filled with boundless reed marshes.
据史料记载，长沙用麻石铺路始于清雍正年间，至清光绪元年左右就不再使用了。
Jù shǐliào jìzǎi，Chángshā yòng máshí pūlù shǐyú Qīng Yōngzhèng niánjiān，zhì Qīng Guāngxù yuánnián zuǒyòu jiù búzài shǐyòng le。
It is recorded in historical sources that Changsha paved road with chiseled stones from the Yongzheng reign to the Guangxu reign of the Qing dynasty.
他一直闷坐在那个沙发上，抽了不少烟。
Tā yìzhí mèn zuòzài nàge shāfā shàng，chōu le bùshǎo yān。
He has been sitting on the sofa silently, smoking many cigarettes.
为了防止沙子迷眼，我戴上了一副墨镜。
Wèile fángzhǐ shāzi míyǎn，wǒ dàishàng le yífù mòjìng。
In order to prevent sand getting in my eyes, I wear a pair of sun-glasses.
光看外形就知道，这是一条采沙用的民船。
Guāng kàn wàixíng jiù zhīdào，zhè shì yìtiáo cǎishā yòng de mínchuán。
Only from appearance do you know that this is a civil boat used for mining sand.
沙尘暴来临时，空气中飘浮着浓密的黄尘。
Shāchénbào láilín shí，kōngqì zhōng piāofú zhe nóngmì de huángchén。
When the sandstorms are coming, dense yellow dust floats in the sky.
这个沙发很结实，禁得住强力挤压。
Zhège shāfā hěnjiēshi，jìndézhù qiánglì jǐyā。
The sofa is firm, it can stand being squashed under high pressures.
我们这个冷餐会上有20多种沙拉，请你任选一种。
Wǒmen zhège lěngcānhuì shàng yǒu èrshí duō zhǒng shālā，qǐng nǐ rènxuǎn yìzhǒng。
There are over twenty kinds of salad in our buffet, please take whatever you like.
我参观了在海滩上举办的沙雕展览。
Wǒ cānguān le zài hǎitān shàng jǔbàn de shādiāo zhǎnlǎn。
I have taken part in the sand-sculpture exhibition held on the beach.
你今天就睡在我家的沙发床上吧。
Nǐ jīntiān jiù shuì zài wǒjiā de shāfāchuáng shàng ba。
Please sleep on our sofa tonight.
我昨天晚上吃了两斤沙肝儿。
Wǒ zuótiān wǎnshàng chī le liǎng jīn shāgānr。
Last night I ate two kilos of pork liver.
我们要加大植树造林的力度，防治沙害。
Wǒmen yào jiā dà zhíshù zàolín de lìdù，fángzhì shāhài。
We should reinforce our efforts in tree planting, and forestation making to prevent and cure sandstorms.
下一道工序是在墙面上涂抹一层沙浆。
Xià yídào gōngxù shì zài qiángmiàn shàng túmǒ yì céng shājiāng。
The next procedure is to daub a layer of mortar on the wall.
医生说我的腿痛应该尝试一下沙疗。
Yīshēng shuō wǒ de tuǐtòng yīnggāi chángshì yíxià shāliáo。
The doctor said I could try sand therapy to cure my leg ache.
在这里种植一些沙柳可以起到巩固堤坝的作用。
Zài zhèlǐ zhòngzhí yìxiē shāliǔ kěyǐ qǐ dào gǒnggù dībà de zuòyòng。
Planting some sand willows here can solidify the dyke.
再往北走就是一望无际的沙碛了！
Zài wǎng běi zǒu jiùshì yíwàngwújì de shāqì le ！
Continue walking north, and you will find the endless desert.
沙壤土不适合种植这种高大树木。
Shārǎngtǔ bú shìhé zhòngzhí zhèzhǒng gāodà shùmù。
Sand soil is not fit to plant such tall trees.
河水每年要从岸边冲走大量的沙石。
Héshuǐ měinián yào cóng ànbiān chōngzǒu dàliàng de shāshí。
Every way the river water washes away a lot of sand and gravel.
我们应该充分利用好这几亩沙田。
Wǒmen yīnggāi chōngfēn lìyòng hǎo zhè jǐ mǔ shātián。
We should make full use of the Mous of beach land.
有两个小孩儿正在沙土地上玩耍。
Yǒu liǎnggè xiǎoháir zhèngzài shātǔ dìshàng wánshuǎ。
There are two children playing on the sand land.
沙鱼被认为是海洋中最凶猛的动物。
Shāyú bèi rènwéi shì hǎiyáng zhōng zuì xiōngměng de dòngwù。
Sharks are considered as the most ferocious animal in ocean.
植树造林可以有效地防治沙灾。
Zhíshù zàolín kěyǐ yǒuxiào de fángzhì shāzāi。
Tree planting, and forestation can effectively prevent sandstorms.
她试手的这个水果沙拉很受朋友们欢迎。
Tā shìshǒu de zhège shuǐguǒ shālā hěnshòu péngyoumen huānyíng。
This fruit salad she tried is popular with her friends.
这一带种植大面积松墙是为了防止沙尘暴的侵袭。
Zhè yídài zhòngzhí dà miànjī sōngqiáng shì wèi le fángzhǐ shāchénbào de qīnxí。
The purpose of planting such a huge pine wall is to prevent sandstorms.
这片速生林有效地起到了防风固沙的作用。
Zhè piàn sùshēnglín yǒuxiào de qǐdào le fángfēng gùshā de zuòyòng。
This fast-growing forest effectively prevents windstorms and fastens sand in the land.
站在沙滩上可以看到海水冲击留下来的汀线。
Zhànzài shātān shàng kěyǐ kàndào hǎishuǐ chōngjī liúxiàlái de tīngxiàn。
When standing on the beach, you can see the waves in the sea.
岩石的透水性不如沙土。
Yánshí de tòushuǐxìng bùrú shātǔ。
Rocks have better water permeability than sand.
我只要细沙，把里面的土坷垃挑出来扔了吧！
Wǒ zhǐyào xìshā，bǎ lǐmian de tǔkělā tiāo chūlái rēng le ba！
I only need silver sand, so pick out and discard the clods of earth!
驮运曾在沙漠地区被广泛使用。
Tuóyùn céng zài shāmò dìqū bèi guǎngfàn shǐyòng。
Transferring goods by animals was once popular in the desert.
虽然“沙发”是个外来词，但大家都知道它的意思。
Suīrán“shāfā”shì gè wàiláicí，dàn dàjiā dōu zhīdào tā de yìsi。
Although &quot;sofa&quot; is a loanword, everyone knows its meaning.
在沙漠里建水库，这根本是无本之木，无稽之谈！
Zài shāmò lǐ jiàn shuǐkù，zhè gēnběn shì wúběnzhīmù，wújīzhītán！
It is groundless to build a reservoir in the desert.
塔克拉马干大沙漠是个人烟希少的地方。
Tǎkèlāmǎgān dà shāmò shì gè rényān xīshǎo de dìfāng。
The Taklamakan Desert is a deserted place with a sparce population.
狂风旋卷着大量的沙尘呼啸而过，路人纷纷闭上了眼睛。
Kuángfēng xuánjuǎn zhe dàliàng de shāchén hūxiào érguò，lùrén fēnfēn bìshàng le yǎnjīng。
The strong wind howled past with a lot of sand in it, which forces pedestrians to shut their eyes one after another.
沙滩上的人们穿着各式各样的泳衣。
Shātān shàng de rénmén chuān zhe gè shì gè yàng de yǒngyī。
People on the beach are wearing various kinds of swimming suits.

A person\'s managerial ability will improve more as a general manager of a small company than as a department manager in a big one. He therefore chose to be the beak of a chicken than the rump of an ox.

He was transferred to work in Liaoning province owing to the needs of his work.

He would rather have his children adopted by others than have them lead a miserable life with him.
他宁愿饿着肚子也不出来要饭，真是个穷棒子。

He prefers to be hungry rather than beg for food, he is really a poor person with high aspirations.

I\'d rather work all night than hand my homework in late.
对于买衣服，我的原则是宁缺毋滥。

When buying clothes, I go by the principle of quality over quantity.

I\'d rather walk than take the bus.

宁静
níngjìng
peaceful; tranquil; quiet; calm

a search for
[+object，person] 寻找
to send out a search party (for sb)
派搜索队（寻找某人）

人类终其一生来寻找其存在的意义。

闪电造成了金属不同寻常的融合。
Public opinion turned when it was revealed that the president had an affair with a white house intern.
Dāng zǒngtǒng bèi jiēshì yǔ yì míng Báigōng shíxíshēng zhījiān yǒu bù xúncháng guānxi shí，yúlùn zhuǎnxiàng le。
当总统被揭示与一名白宫实习生之间有不寻常关系时，舆论转向了。
This child impressed me as unusually mature.
Zhège háizi bù xúncháng de chéngshú gěi wǒ liúxiàle shēnkè yìnxiàng。
这个孩子不寻常的成熟给我留下了深刻印象。
This is a dead town; nothing ever happens here.
Zhè shì yí gè sǐqìchénchén de xiǎozhèn；Zhèer cóngwèi fāshēng guò shénme bù xúncháng de shì。
这是一个死气沉沉的小镇；这儿从未发生过什么不寻常的事。
He could always come up with some inspired off-the-wall conceit.
Tā zǒng néng tíchū yìxiē hěn yǒu qǐfāxìng de yìhūxúncháng de xiǎngfǎ。
他总能提出一些很有启发性的异乎寻常的想法。
He owed his greatest debt to his mother\'s uncommon character and ability.
Tā zhèzhǒng bùtóngxúncháng de pǐnxìng hé nénglì dàbùfèn láizì tā mǔqīn。
他这种不同寻常的品性和能力大部分来自她母亲。
The problem was a real snorter.
Nàgè wèntí zhēn de bùtóng xúncháng。
那个问题真得不同寻常。
He could feel the shimmy in the steering wheel.
Tā nénggòu gǎnjué dào fāngxiàngpán zhōng bù xúncháng de zhèndòng。
他能够感觉到方向盘中不寻常的震动。
Her cultivation was remarkable.
Tā de jiàoyǎng bùtóng-xúncháng。
她的教养不同寻常。
Were they out of their minds, he wondered.
Tāmen jīngshen bú zhèngcháng ma， tā xúnsīzhe。
他们精神不正常吗，他寻思着。
They are solitary creatures, usually feeding on their own, searching for prey on the river bed.
Tāmen shì dújū dòngwù，tōngcháng zìjǐ jìnshí，yán héchuáng xúnzhǎo shíwù。
它们是独居动物，通常自己进食，沿河床寻找食物。
他们为寻宝而来到北非。
Tāmen wèi xúnbǎo ér láidào běifēi。
They have come to the North Africa in the hope of finding treasure.
探寻地下宝藏。
The cross on the treasure map marks the location of the booty.
寻宝图上的十字标识出了宝藏的地点。
We stopped looking for the treasure and started looking for something to eat.
Wǒmen tíngzhǐ xúnzhǎo bǎozàng，bìng kāishǐ xúnzhǎo shíwù。
我们停止寻找宝藏，并开始寻找食物。
The pirates tore up the land in search of treasure.
Hǎidào wākāi dìmiàn，xúnzhǎo bǎozàng。
海盗挖开地面，寻找宝藏。
He searched for treasure on the ocean bed.
Tā zài dàhǎi hǎidǐ xúnzhǎo bǎozàng。
他在大海海底寻找宝藏。
她最爱寻根究底，寻求事物隐蔽的、内在的缘由。
Tā zuì ài xúngēn jiūdǐ，xúnqiú shìwù yǐnbì de、nèizài de yuányóu。
She liked to get to the root of a matter and find out its hidden and internal causes.
自寻短见
zìxúnduǎnjiàn
attempt suicide; commit suicide
刚过立春，天气就异乎寻常地热。
Gāng guò lìchūn，tiānqì jiù yìhūxúncháng de rè。
It got unusually hot just after the Beginning of Spring.
几次三番地前来寻衅
jǐcìsānfān de qiánlái xǘnxìn 
come repeatedly to pick a quarrel

Zhè shì yì zhǒng bùxúncháng de jì xiàng。
This is an unusual sign.

Yǔ pō juànyǒng，nàirénxúnwèi。
The remarks are meaningful and thought-provoking.

zì xún juélù

寻找解决问题的路子
xúnzhǎo jiějué wèntí de lùzi
seek ways to solve the problem
他寻思了半天，眉头一皱，计上心来。
Tā xúnsi le bàntiān，méitóu yí zhòu，jì shàngxīn lái。
He thought to himself for a while. He knit his brows heavily and at last a plan was born in his heart.
他的话是很耐人寻味的。
Tā de huà shì hěn nàirénxúnwèi de。
What he says gives one much food for thought.

xún wù qǐshì

xúnzhǎo xiāochú fēnqí de tújìng

她万般无奈，只好自寻短见。
Tā wànbānwúnài，zhǐhǎo zìxúnduǎnjiàn。

xúndì dǎodàn

Bié tài rènzhēn le，tā búguò shì zài xúnkāixīn bàle。

这幅古画我们已寻觅多年了。
Zhè fú gǔhuà wǒmen yǐ xúnmì duōnián le。

tōngguò gǎigé xúnqiú chūlù

我在远处听着像是你的说话声，所以就寻声而来了。
Wǒ zài yuǎnchù tīng zhe xiàng shì nǐ de shuōhuàshēng，suǒyǐ jiù xúnshēng érlái le。
I heard a voice like yours at some distance from here, so I followed it and found you here.
我寻思她最适合做这个工作。
Wǒ xúnsi tā zuì shìhé zuò zhège gōngzuò。

由于水源的匮乏，牧民们准备寻找新的定居点。
Yóuyú shuǐyuán de kuìfá，mùmínmen zhǔnbèi xúnzhǎo xīn de dìngjūdiǎn。
Due to the lack of water, the herdsmen are planning to look for a new settlement.
久居城市的人们都喜欢到乡村度假，就是为了追寻反璞归真的乐趣。
Jiǔjū chéngshì de rénmen dōu xǐhuan dào xiāngcūn dùjià，jiùshì wèi le zhuīxún fǎnpúguīzhēn de lèqù。
People living in the city like to spend their vacation in the countryside to pursue the pleasures of returning to nature.
为这点挫折，犯得上寻死吗？
Wèi zhè diǎn cuòzhé，fàn deshàng xúnsǐ ma?
Is it worthwhile committing suicide due to such a trivial setback?
仿生其实就是在大自然中寻找解决问题的方法。
Fǎngshēng qíshí jiùshì zài dàzìrán zhōng xúnzhǎo jiějué wèntí de fāngfǎ。
Bionics is the approach of finding solutions from nature.
我曾多次访寻，可还是没找到儿时的好友。
Wǒ céng duōcì fǎngxún，kě háishi méi zhǎo dào érshí de hǎoyǒu。
I tried many times but failed to find my childhood friends.
大家都在寻找解决问题的办法，他却在一边放横炮。
Dàjiā dōu zài xúnzhǎo jiějué wèntí de bànfǎ，tā què zài yìbiān fànghéngpào。
We are trying to find a solution, but he is making more trouble for us.
面对困难，她非特毫不退缩，还积极寻求解决办法。
Miànduì kùnnan，tā fēitè háo bùtuìsuō，hái jījí xúnqiú jiějué bànfǎ。
Instead of flinching from the difficulties, she strived to find solutions.
这部电影富于新意，耐人寻味。
Zhèbù diànyǐng fùyú xīnyì，nàirén xúnwèi。
The movie is rich in creativity and worth watching.
我在四处寻访高材。
Wǒ zài sìchù xúnfǎng gāocái。
I am searching for a person of remarkable all round ability.
经过两个小时的搜寻，终于找到漏乘的乘客。

After two hours’ search, they finally found the passengers who had missed the ship.
这个盲人正跪在地上摸索着寻找他的马竿。
Zhège mángrén zhèng guìzài dìshàng mōsuǒ zhe xúnzhǎo tā de mǎgān。
The blind man is kneeling on the ground and searching for his stick.
当我们的利益受到侵害的时候，要懂得寻求司法援助。
Dāng wǒmen de lìyì shòudào qīnhài de shíhou，yào dǒngdé xúnqiú sīfǎ yuánzhù。
When our rights are obstructed, we should know to seek for judicial help.
为了寻找失散的亲人，他踏访了全国各地。
Wèile xúnzhǎo shīsàn de qīnrén，tā tàfǎng le quánguó gèdì。
In the hope to find the relatives that he has lost touch with, he has been to many places in the country.
寻找了好久，我终于在荒山上看到了於菟。
Xúnzhǎo le hǎo jiǔ，wǒ zhōng yú zài huāngshān shàng kàndào le yútú。
Having searched for a long time, I finally spotted a tiger in the mountain.
爸爸到处为得了绝症的女儿寻求仙方。
Bàba dàochù wèi dé le juézhèng de nǚ\'ér xúnqiú xiānfāng。
Her father goes everywhere to find magic recipes to treat her incurable disease.
寻查过去的证据有利于破案。
Xúnchá guòqù de zhèngjù yǒulìyú pòàn。
It\'s preferable to crack the case by looking for evidence from the past.
他研究学问就喜欢寻根究底，很认真的。
Tā yánjiū xuéwen jiù xǐhuan xúngēn jiūdǐ，hěn rènzhēn de。
He is very serious about doing research. He often inquires deeply into the matter.
寻根文学很受欢迎，读者很多。
Xúngēn wénxué hěn shòu huānyíng，dúzhě hěnduō。
Literature on searching for one\'s roots is very popular among readers.
寻呼台的小姐很忙，你就长话短说吧。
Xúnhūtái de xiǎojiě hěn máng，nǐ jiù chánghuà duǎnshuō ba。
The beeper operators are very busy. You\'d better make what you want to say short.
他出去寻欢作乐，老婆也不管管。
Tā chūqù xúnhuān zuòlè，lǎopó yě bùguǎnguǎn。
His wife doesn\'t care even though he goes out and seeks pleasure with other women.
经过几天的搜查，还是没有寻获到证据。
Jīngguò jǐtiān de sōuchá，háishi méiyǒu xúnhuòdào zhèngjù。
After days of searching, there is still no evidence appearing.
这个歹徒贼头贼脑的，寻机作案。
Zhège dǎitú zéitóu zéinǎo de，xúnjī zuòàn。
This thief behaves stealthily and looks for an opportunity to steal something.
我打听了这么多年，终于寻见他了。
Wǒ dǎting le zhème duōnián，zhōng yú xúnjiàn tā le。
After years of searching, I finally found him.
警察在寻究事情的起因，大家都沉默。
Jǐngchá zài xún jiū shìqing de qǐyīn，dàjiā dōu chénmò。
When the police inquired about the cause of the matter, everyone remained silent.
乞丐出去寻摸吃的了，估计一时半会回不来。
Qǐgài chūqù xúnmō chī de le，gūjì yìshí bànhuì huí bùlái。
The beggar goes out to seek for food. He won\'t come back for a while.
有很多早年去台湾的人近年来大陆寻亲。
Yǒu hěnduō zǎonián qù Táiwān de rén jìnnián lái dàlù xúnqīn。
Many people who went to Taiwan decades ago now come back to the Chinese mainland to look for their relatives.
你别寻事，告诉你警察就在附近。
Nǐ bié xúnshì，gàosù nǐ jǐngchá jiùzài fùjìn。
Do not look for trouble. The police are around.
他总是寻隙找茬，我看就是欠揍。
Tā zǒngshì xúnxì zhǎochá，wǒ kàn jiùshì qiàn zòu。
He always takes advantage of things. I think that he needs a spanking.
他千里寻踪，一定要找到欺骗他的人。
Tā qiānlǐ xúnzōng，yídìng yào zhǎodào qīpiàn tā de rén。
He travelled all this way because he\'s determined to find the person that had deceived him.
狼总是出去寻找野食。
Láng zǒngshì chūqù xúnzhǎo yěshí。
Wolves always go out to search for food in the wild.
科考队一直致力于找寻原始人类的遗踪。
Kēkǎoduì yìzhí zhìlìyú zhǎoxún yuánshǐ rénlèi de yízōng。
The scientific investigation team devote themselves to seeking for traces of primitive man.
张教授一直致力于找寻佚诗的工作。
Zhāng jiàoshòu yìzhí zhìlìyú zhǎoxún yìshī de gōngzuò。
Professor Zhang has devoted himself to collecting poems that have disappeared.
寻找佚文的工作很困难，但我们会坚持做下去。
Xúnzhǎo yìwén de gōngzuò hěn kùnnan，dàn wǒmen huì jiānchí zuò xiàqù。
It\'s hard to collect anecdotes, but we will persist in doing it.
寻找轶文的工作正在紧张进行之中。
Xúnzhǎo yìwén de gōngzuò zhèngzài jǐnzhāng jìnxíng zhī zhōng。
The collection of anecdotes is being done intensely.
有些政治犯为躲避本国的法律制裁，到别国寻求政治避难。
Yǒuxiē zhèngzhìfàn wèi duǒbì běnguó de fǎlǜ zhìcái，dào biéguó xúnqiú zhèngzhì bìnàn。
Some political criminals went to other countries as political refuges to escape from their own countries\' legal punishments.
寻觅了很久之后，我才发现你就是我的知友。
Xúnmì le hěn jiǔ zhīhòu，wǒ cái fāxiàn nǐ jiùshì wǒ de zhīyǒu。
After searching for a long time, I finally realize that you are my intimate friend.
他为这次选举寻求奥援。
Tā wèi zhècì xuǎnjǔ xúnqiú àoyuán。
He sought illegitimate support from the government for the election.
自然界有很多未知的事物等着我们去探寻。
Zìránjiè yǒu hěnduō wèizhī de shìwù děng zhe wǒmen qù tànxún。
There are many unknown things in the natural world waiting for us to explore.

bù xúnchánɡ
unusual; out of the ordinary

head wind

顶头上司
dǐngtóu shàngsi
one\'s immediate superior

头顶
头顶。

经过一夜的攀登，我们终于登上了泰山的顶巅。

终于登上了泰山的顶峰，他不由得放怀高歌。

He couldn\'t help singing heartily when he finally reached the top of Mount Tai.
他以泰山压顶之势向我攻来，打得我措手不及。
Tā yǐ tàishān yādǐng zhī shì xiàng wǒ gōnglái，dǎ de wǒ cuòshǒu bùjí。

The beam holds up the roof.
Dàliáng chēng qǐ le fángdǐng。
大梁撑起了房顶。
The roof tiles imbricate.
Fángdǐng shàng de wǎpiàn yí kuài yāzhe yí kuài。
房顶上的瓦片一块压着一块。
He hauled at the roof and the house caved in.
Tā lāzhe wūdǐng， fángzi tāfāng le。
他拉着屋顶，房子塌方了。
The flames lapped over the top of the buildings.
Huǒyàn tūnmò le fángwū de dǐngbù。
火焰吞没了房屋的顶部。
The roof of the house can be plated with steel.
房子的屋顶可用钢板来铺设。
Her home was a large tent with partitioned-off sleeping quarters.
她的房子是一顶大帐篷，里面有隔开的寝室。
The hurricane tore the roof off our house.
飓风把我们房子的屋顶掀起来了。
The roofs of the houses overlap in this crowded city.
Zài zhè zuò yōngjǐ de chéngshì zhōng，fángzi de wūdǐng céngcéngdiédié。
在这座拥挤的城市中，房子的屋顶层层叠叠。
The hurricane left hundreds of house roofless.
Jùfēng xiānqùle xǔduō fángwū de wūdǐng。
飓风掀去了许多房屋的屋顶。
Houses bearded the top of the heights.
Fángwū zuòluò yú shāndǐng xiàmiàn。
房屋坐落于山顶下面。
My house has a nice overlook in the hills behind it.
Wǒ de fángzi cóng wūhòu de shāndǐng shàng fǔkàn qǐlái hěn piàoliang。
我的房子从屋后的山顶上俯瞰起来很漂亮。
The house stands alone on top of a hill.
那幢房子傲然耸立在山顶上。
All of houses on the street had a flat roof.
Jiēdào shàng suǒyǒu de fángzi dōuyǒu yí gè píng wūdǐng。
街道上所有的房子都有一个平屋顶。
The house has been lifted the roof by the windflaw.
房子被狂风掀掉了屋顶。
He got his style down and was ready for the big leagues.
Tā gǎijìnle tā de fāngshì，bìng wèi dǐngjí liánsài zuòhǎo zhǔnbèi。
他改进了他的方式，并为顶级联赛做好准备。
You can throw balls with an overhead throw.

它们如此高，以至于我不能从上方看到它们的顶端。
A dextral gastropod shell with the apex upward has its opening on the right when facing the observer.

顶嘴
顶嘴。
自己没理，还偏要顶嘴

她竟然跟我顶嘴！她怎么敢这样？

顶住压力
dǐngzhù yālì
withstand pressure
顶住逆流
dǐngzhù nìliú
stand up against an adverse current
顶住风浪
dǐngzhù fēnglàng
weather a storm
大坝好似铜墙铁壁，顶住了洪水的冲击。
Dàbà hǎosì tóngqiángtiěbì，dǐngzhù le hóngshuǐ de chōngjī。
Like an iron bastion, the dam withstood the rushing floodwaters.
顶住外界的种种压力
dǐngzhù wàijiè de zhǒng zhǒng yālì 
withstand all kinds of outside pressure
硬着头皮顶住
yìng zhe tóupí dǐngzhù 
brace oneself and bear it; hold out tenaciously

Tā chéngxiǔ de gōngzuò，shēntǐ dōu kuài dǐngbúzhù le。
He can hardily hold on after working all night for several days.

屁事不顶
事业发达的顶巅。
自己做错了事，不能让别人顶罪。
the top of one\'s career
某人事业的顶点
He is now at the summit of his career.
他目前正值事业的顶峰时期。
I was dragged into the theater thinking it was another horrible pointless love story.
Wǒ bèi rén qiángzhuài jìn xìyuàn，xīnxiǎngzhe zhè yòushì yí gè wúliáotòudǐng de àiqínggùshì。
我被人强拽进戏院，心想着这又是一个无聊透顶的爱情故事。
This was the victory which crowned his career.
Zhè shì shǐ tā shìyè dàodá dǐngfēng de shènglì。
这是使他事业到达顶峰的胜利。
It was pathetically bad.
Shìqing zāogāo tòudǐng。
事情糟糕透顶。
He was required to do extra chores to help cover the cost of his room and board.
Wèile dǐng tā de shísùfèi，tā bèi yāoqiú zuò éwài de jiāwù záshì。
为了顶他的食宿费，他被要求做额外的家务杂事。
在山顶上安设一个气象观测站
Zài shāndǐng shàng ānshè yígè qì xiàng guāncèzhàn。
set up a weather station on the mountaintop
橱顶上放着两只皮箱。
Chúdǐng shàng fàngzhe liǎngzhī píxiāng。
There are two suitcases on the top of the wardrobe.
屋顶上的雪化了，滴答着水。
Wūdǐng shàng de xuě huà le，dida zhe shuǐ。
The snow on the roof melted and dripped down.
雹子打在屋顶上乒乓乱响。
Báozi dǎzài wūdǐngshàng pīngpāngluànxiǎng。
Hailstones were rattling on the roofs.
山顶上
shāndǐngshàng
at the mountaintop
子弹咝咝咝地从头顶上飞过。
Zǐdàn sisisi de cóng tóudǐng shàng fēi guo。
Bullets whistled overhead.
我们站在坝埽的顶上往远处看。
Wǒmen zhànzài bàsào de dǐngshàng wǎng yuǎnchù kàn。
We stand on the top of the dam, casting our eyes far away.
自从在山顶上安放了电视差转台，居民可以接收到稳定的电视信号了。
Zìcóng zài shāndǐng shàng ānfàng le diànshì chāzhuǎntái，jūmín kěyǐ jiēshōu dào wěndìng de diànshì xìnhào le。
Since a television transposer station was installed on the mountain peak, residents have been able to receive stable television signals.
吊顶上沾满了灰尘，我们要把它清扫一下。
Diàodǐng shàng zhānmǎn le huīchén，wǒmen yào bǎ tā qīngsǎo yíxià。
The ceiling is covered with dust. We have to clean it.
屋顶上的明瓦，经过岁月的打磨已经不那么透明了。
Wūdǐng shàng de míngwǎ，jīngguò suìyuè de dǎmó yǐjing bú nàme tòumíng le。
The translucent tiles on the roof are no longer as transparent as before due to years of wear.
站在山顶上可以看到漫山遍野的山花。
Zhàn zài shāndǐng shàng kěyǐ kàndào mànshānbiànyě de shānhuā。
Standing on the hilltop, you can see beautiful flowers blanketing hill and dale.
房顶上的雨水顺着瓦垄流淌下来，形成了一个水帘。
Fángdǐng shàng de yǔshuǐ shùn zhe wǎlǒng liútǎng xiàlái，xíngchéng le yígè shuǐlián。
The rain on the roof of the house flew down the rows of tiles, forming a curtain of water.
顶头上司
dǐngtóu shàngsi
one\'s immediate superior
真是无巧不成书，我的顶头上司就是被我在街上撞倒的那个人。
Zhēnshi wúqiǎobùchéngshū，wǒ de dǐngtóu shàngsi jiùshì bèi wǒ zài jiē shàngzhuàngdǎo de nàge rén。
What a coincidence: My immediate superior was the man I had knocked down on the street.
从他所戴的顶珠上可以看出，他是个大官。
Cóng tā suǒ dài de dǐngzhū shàng kěyǐ kànchū，tā shì gè dàguān。
One can judge from his official cap button that he is a senior official.
他的顶子上有一颗名贵的夜明珠。
Tā de dǐngzi shàng yǒu yì kē míngguì de yèmíngzhū。
There is a rare legendary luminous pearl on his official cap button.
头上顶着一罐水
Tóu shàng dǐng zhe yí guàn shuǐ
carry a pitcher of water on one\'s head
这座山太峻陡了，据说很少有人能够登上顶峰。
Zhèzuò shān tài jùndǒu le，jùshuō hěnshǎo yǒurén nénggòu dēngshàng dǐngfēng。
This mountain is so steep that few people are said to have managed to get to the top.
登上峰顶
dēng shàng fēngdǐng 
reach the summit
他两手交互地抓住野藤爬上崖顶。
Tā liǎngshǒu jiāohù de zhuāzhù yěténgpáshàngyádǐng。
Holding on to the creepers, he climbed hand over hand to the top of the cliff.
登上山顶
dēngshàngshāndǐng
reach the summit
登上山顶向四周展望
dēngshàngshāndǐng xiàng sìzhōu zhǎnwàng
climb to the top of the mountain and get a view of the surrounding country
山顶的标石上刻着这座山的海拔高度。
Shāndǐng de biāoshí shàng kè zhe zhèzuò shān de hǎibá gāodù。
The mark stone on the top of the mountain is inscribed with its height above sea water of the mountain.
登上峰顶的那一刻，我的心里充满了成就感。
Dēngshàng fēngdǐng de nà yíkè，wǒ de xīnlǐ chōngmǎn le chéngjiùgǎn。
I was filled with a sense of achievement when I finally reached the mountain top.
大丈夫活在世上要顶天立地。
Dàzhàngfū huó zài shìshàng yào dǐngtiān lìdì。
A great man should live in this world with an indomitable spirit.
登上山顶的人都坐在山顶的亭子里歇乏呢。
Dēngshàng shāndǐng de rén dōu zuòzài shāndǐng de tíngzi lǐ xiēfá ne。
Those who have reached the mountain top are new resting in the pavilion there.
我够不到顶层书架上的书。
Wǒ gòubúdào dǐngcéngshūjiàshàngde shū。
I can\'t reach the books on the top shelf.
上不封顶，下不保底
shàng bù fēngdǐng，xià bù bǎodǐ 
set no maximum or minimum; impose no ceiling or floor figure
她领先登上了山顶。
Tā lǐngxiān dēngshàng le shān dǐng。
She was the first to reach the top of the hill.
登山队员在冲顶之前要穿上特制的衣服。
Dēngshān duìyuán zài chōngdǐng zhīqián yào chuānshàng tèzhì de yīfu。
Climbers should wear special clothes before they begin their journey to the mountain top.
经过一夜的攀登，我们终于登上了泰山的顶巅。
Jīngguò yíyè de pāndēng，wǒmen zhōng yú dēngshàng le tàishān de dǐngdiān。
After climbing for a whole night, we finally arrived at the peak of Mount Tai.
终于登上了泰山的顶峰，他不由得放怀高歌。
Zhōngyú dēng shàng le Tàishān de dǐngfēng，tā bùyóu de fànghuái gāogē。
He couldn\'t help singing heartily when he finally reached the top of Mount Tai.
你头上戴着的这顶帽子是在哪里买的？
Nǐ tóu shàng dài zhe de zhè dǐng màozi shì zài nǎlǐ mǎi de？
Where did you buy the hat you are wearing?
我们终于登上了泰山的极顶，战胜了自我。
Wǒmen zhōng yú dēngshàng le Tài Shān de jídǐng，zhànshèng le zìwǒ。
We finally triumphed over ourselves and climbed to the top of Mount Tai.
从这些阶石走上去我们就能到达山顶。
Cóng zhèxiē jiēshí zǒu shàngqù wǒmen jiùnéng dàodá shāndǐng。
We will be able to arrive at the top of the hill by climbing these steps.
你对上级的指示不能这样硬顶。
Nǐ duì shàngjí de zhǐshì bùnéng zhèyàngyìngdǐng。
You cannot disobey orders from above like this.
今天晚上我有急事，你能不能帮我顶岗？
Jīntiān wǎnshàng wǒ yǒu jíshì，nǐ néngbunéng bāng wǒ dǐnggǎng？
I have some urgent things to deal with tonight. Could you take over my shift?

Zhège dǐngguì kěyǐ zhuāng bùshǎo dōngxi。
This cabinet inside the wall has a large capacity.
作为家里的顶梁柱，此时他必须挺身而出。
Zuòwéi jiā lǐ de dǐngliángzhù，cǐshí tā bìxū tǐngshēn ér chū。
As the pillar of the family, he must step forward boldly now.
这座大厦的顶楼有一家餐厅。
Zhèzuò dàxià de dǐnglóu yǒu yìjiā cāntīng。
There is a restaurant on the top floor of this building.
这件事情本来进展很顺利，没想到遇到了这样一个顶门杠。
Zhèjiàn shìqing běnlái jìnzhǎn hěnshùnlì，méi xiǎngdào yùdào le zhèyàng yígè dǐngméngàng。
This project developed smoothly before, but then an obstacle unexpectedly presented itself.
你已经不小了，应该能够顶门立户了。
Nǐ yǐjing bùxiǎo le，yīnggāi nénggòu dǐngmén lìhù le。
You\'re no longer a child, you should be able to manage household affairs and provide for a family.
我们还需要再找几个人来顶数。
Wǒmen hái xūyào zài zhǎo jǐgè rén lái dǐngshù。
We have to find more people to make up the number.
他手中的持股已经接近顶位了。
Tā shǒu zhōng de chígǔ yǐjing jiējìn dǐngwèi le。
His shares are approaching their peak values.
这个菜是用卷心菜的顶心做成的。
Zhège cài shì yòng juànxīncài de dǐngxīn zuòchéng de。
This dish is made from the tops of cabbage.
这些办公用品根本不够顶账。
Zhèxiē bàngōng yòngpǐn gēnběn búgòu dǐngzhàng。
These office articles are not nearly enough to offset the debts.
这首诗运用了顶真的手法。
Zhèshǒushī yùnyòng le dǐngzhēn de shǒufǎ。
The end of one line and the start of the next are connected in this poem.
母亲退休后，他顶职进入了那家工厂。
Mǔqīn tuìxiū hòu，tā dǐngzhí jìnrù le nàjiā gōngchǎng。
After his mother\'s retirement, he took her place and became a member of that factory.
从他所戴的顶珠上可以看出，他是个大官。
Cóng tā suǒ dài de dǐngzhū shàng kěyǐ kànchū，tā shì gè dàguān。
One can judge from his official cap button that he is a senior official.
中国的古代建筑大部分都有一个很大的顶子。
Zhōngguó de gǔdài jiànzhù dàbùfen dōu yǒu yígè hěndà de dǐngzi。
Most buildings in ancient China had a huge roof.
他的顶子上有一颗名贵的夜明珠。
Tā de dǐngzi shàng yǒu yì kē míngguì de yèmíngzhū。
There is a rare legendary luminous pearl on his official cap button.
事情发展到这步，只有我去顶罪了。
Shìqíng fāzhǎn dào zhèbù，zhǐyǒu wǒ qù dǐngzuì le。
Now things are in such a condition that I have to bear the blame.
他们说还清欠款就可以顶罪了。
Tāmen shuō huánqīng qiànkuǎn jiù kěyǐ dǐngzuì le。
They said that they would drop the charges if we paid off the debt.
楼顶的防渗层已经老化，要请人来修理了。
Lóudǐng de fángshèn céng yǐjing lǎohuà，yào qǐng rén lái xiūlǐ le。
The impermeable layer has aged, we must find someone to repair it.
这个小区采用了房顶绿化，既环保美观又节省空间。
Zhège xiǎoqū cǎiyòng le fángdǐng lǜhuà，jì huánbǎo měiguān yòu jiéshěng kōngjiān。
This living community adopts roof greening measures which are environmental-friendly, pleasing to the eye, and can save space.
终于登上了泰山的顶峰，他不由得放怀高歌。
Zhōngyú dēng shàng le Tàishān de dǐngfēng，tā bùyóu de fànghuái gāogē。
He couldn\'t help singing heartily when he finally reached the top of Mount Tai.
一个足球忽然从头顶飞掠而过，差点砸到他。
Yígè zúqiú hūrán cóng tóudǐng fēilüè ér guò，chàdiǎn zá dào tā。
A football suddenly flew over his head and narrowly missed him.
到达峰顶，我们禁不住奋臂欢呼。
Dàodá fēngdǐng，wǒmen jīnbúzhù fènbì huānhū。
Reaching the mountain top, we raised our arms and cried for joy.
听说东北正在下雪，妻子为将要去那里出差的丈夫准备了一顶风雪帽。
Tīngshuō dōngběi zhèngzài xiàxuě，qīzǐ wèi jiāngyào qù nàlǐ chūchāi de zhàngfū zhǔnbèi le yì dǐng fēngxuěmào。
Hearing that it was snowing in the northeast, the wife made a cap for her husband, who will go there on business.
登上峰顶的那一刻，我的心里充满了成就感。
Dēngshàng fēngdǐng de nà yíkè，wǒ de xīnlǐ chōngmǎn le chéngjiùgǎn。
I was filled with a sense of achievement when I finally reached the mountain top.
考古学家在这座古墓中发现了三顶凤冠。
Kǎogǔxuéjiā zài zhèzuò gǔmù zhōng fāxiàn le sān dǐng fèngguān。
The archeologists found three phoenix coronets in this ancient tomb.
听了先生的高论，真好似醍醐灌顶，令我茅塞顿开。
Tīng le xiānshēng de gāolùn，zhēn hǎosì tíhú guàndǐng，lìng wǒ máosè dùnkāi。
Hearing your brilliant views has suddenly enlightened me.
这房子建得太久了，灰顶都破了个洞。
Zhè fángzi jiàn de tài jiǔ le，huīdǐng dōu pò le gè dòng。
The house was built too long ago, there is even a hole in the roof.
这种飞行器顶端安装了激光器。
Zhèzhǒng fēixíngqì dǐngduān ānzhuāng le jīguāngqì。
The top of this flying object is equipped with a laser.
这座塔岌岌直至云端，根本就看不到塔顶。
Zhèzuò tǎ jíjí zhízhì yúnduān，gēnběn jiù kànbúdào tǎdǐng。
This tower is so tall that it reaches the clouds, and its top cannot be seen at all.
我们终于登上了泰山的极顶，战胜了自我。
Wǒmen zhōng yú dēngshàng le Tài Shān de jídǐng，zhànshèng le zìwǒ。
We finally triumphed over ourselves and climbed to the top of Mount Tai.
他是一个极顶吝啬的人，谁也别想占他半点便宜。
Tā shì yígè jídǐng lìnsè de rén，shéi yě biéxiǎng zhàn tā bàndiǎn piányí。
He is such a high-level miser that no one can gain anything from him.
站在山顶，看着面前瘠薄的山地，他满脸愁容。
Zhànzài shāndǐng，kàn zhe miànqián jíbó de shāndì，tā mǎnliǎn chóuróng。
Standing on the top of the hill and looking at the sterile land before him, he looked very sad.
站在山顶可以看到远处细细长长的江流。
Zhànzài shāndǐng kěyǐ kàndào yuǎnchù xìxìchángcháng de jiāngliú。
Looking from the top of a hill, you can see long-stretched rivers in the distance.
他们三个人约好在山顶的停车场交车。
Tāmen sāngè rén yuēhǎo zài shāndǐng de tíngchēchǎng jiāochē。
They three made an appointment to drive their car to the parking lot of the hill top to meet each other.
从这些阶石走上去我们就能到达山顶。
Cóng zhèxiē jiēshí zǒu shàngqù wǒmen jiùnéng dàodá shāndǐng。
We will be able to arrive at the top of the hill by climbing these steps.
这座山太峻陡了，据说很少有人能够登上顶峰。
Zhèzuò shān tài jùndǒu le，jùshuō hěnshǎo yǒurén nénggòu dēngshàng dǐngfēng。
This mountain is so steep that few people are said to have managed to get to the top.
老爷们儿一般都是家里的顶梁柱。
Lǎoyémenr yìbān dōushì jiā lǐ de dǐngliángzhù。
Generally speaking, husbands are the pillar of a family.
大丈夫活在世上要顶天立地。
Dàzhàngfū huó zài shìshàng yào dǐngtiān lìdì。
A great man should live in this world with an indomitable spirit.
学校严禁学生们冒名顶替参加考试。
Xuéxiào yánjìn xuéshengmen màomíng dǐngtì cānjiā kǎoshì。
Sitting for an examination by masquerading under a false name is banned in schools.
他从帽筒里取出了一顶帽子，就出门了。
Tā cóng màotǒng lǐ qǔchū le yì dǐng màozi，jiù chūmén le。
He took  a hat from the tub-shaped hat container, and went out.
屋顶上的明瓦，经过岁月的打磨已经不那么透明了。
Wūdǐng shàng de míngwǎ，jīngguò suìyuè de dǎmó yǐjing bú nàme tòumíng le。
The translucent tiles on the roof are no longer as transparent as before due to years of wear.
风筝在头顶盘空飞翔，孩子们的笑声也跟着风筝飞向了天空。
Fēngzhēng zài tóudǐng pánkōng fēixiáng，háizimen de xiàoshēng yě gēn zhe fēngzhēng fēi xiàng le tiānkōng。
The kites were circling in the air over their heads. Children\'s laughter flew into the sky with the kites.
我们沿着盘曲的山路走了好久，才终于走到了山顶。
Wǒmen yán zhe pánqū de shānlù zǒu le hǎo jiǔ，cái zhōng yú zǒudào le shāndǐng。
We walked along the meandering mountain path for a long time. Finally, we arrived at the mountaintop.
才爬到山顶，他就已经气喘吁吁了。
Cái pádào shāndǐng，tā jiù yǐjing qìchuǎnxūxū le。
He was already out of breath, by the time he arrived at the mountain top.
站在山顶上可以看到漫山遍野的山花。
Zhàn zài shāndǐng shàng kěyǐ kàndào mànshānbiànyě de shānhuā。
Standing on the hilltop, you can see beautiful flowers blanketing hill and dale.
我要用这些泥灰苫背屋顶。
Wǒ yào yòng zhèxiē níhuī shànbèi wūdǐng。
I will lay the foundation of the roof with the marl.
这一带民居的屋顶都使用深灰色的瓦片。
Zhèyídài mínjū de wūdǐng dōu shǐyòng shēn huīsè de wǎpiàn。
Dark gray tiles are used on the roof of ordinary people\'s houses in this neighborhood.
站在山顶向下看，可以看到深幽的山谷。
Zhàn zài shāndǐng xiàng xià kàn，kěyǐ kàndào shēnyōu de shāngǔ。
Standing on the mountain top, one can have a bird\'s eye view of the deep valley.
他以泰山压顶之势向我攻来，打得我措手不及。
Tā yǐ tàishān yādǐng zhī shì xiàng wǒ gōnglái，dǎ de wǒ cuòshǒu bùjí。
He came at me with full force, so I was caught unprepared.
你头上戴着的这顶帽子是在哪里买的？
Nǐ tóu shàng dài zhe de zhè dǐng màozi shì zài nǎlǐ mǎi de？
Where did you buy the hat you are wearing?
房顶上的雨水顺着瓦垄流淌下来，形成了一个水帘。
Fángdǐng shàng de yǔshuǐ shùn zhe wǎlǒng liútǎng xiàlái，xíngchéng le yígè shuǐlián。
The rain on the roof of the house flew down the rows of tiles, forming a curtain of water.
屋顶漏雨了，我去买点望砖来修一修。
Wūdǐng lòuyǔ le，wǒ qù mǎi diǎn wàngzhuān lái xiūyixiū。
The roof is leaking, I\'ll go to buy some sheathing tiles to cover it.
对于顶风违法违纪的人，我们决不姑息！
Duìyú dǐngfēng wéifǎ wéijì de rén，wǒmen juébùgūxī！
We will never tolerate those who break the law and breach principles at the most critical moment.
爷爷家老宅的屋顶两端有吻兽。
Yéye jiā lǎozhái de wūdǐng liǎngduān yǒu wěnshòu。
There are decorative animal sculptures on the two sides of the roof of my grandfather\'s house.
听了他的话，小刚感觉如五雷轰顶，痛苦不堪。
Tīng le tā de huà，Xiǎo Gāng gǎnjué rú wǔléi hōngdǐng，tòngkǔ bùkān。
Xiao Gang felt like he was struck by a bolt of lightening when he heard what he said.
姐姐家的三间卧室装的都是吸顶灯。
Jiějie jiā de sān jiān wòshì zhuāng de dōushì xīdǐngdēng。
The three bedrooms in my sister\'s house are all equipped with ceiling lamps.
窑顶坏了，要抓紧时间修理才不影响生产啊。
Yáodǐng huài le，yào zhuājǐn shíjiān xiūlǐ cái bùyǐngxiǎng shēngchǎn a。
The roof of the cave dwelling is damaged, we should mend it soon so that it won\'t affect production.
老王突发心脏病去世了，他的遗缺至今无人顶替。
Lǎo Wáng tūfā xīnzàngbìng qùshì le，tā de yíquē zhìjīn wúrén dǐngtì。
Lao Wang had a sudden heart attack and died, his vacancy hasn\'t been filled yet.
探险队决定今晚在山顶扎营。
Tànxiǎnduì juédìng jīnwǎn zài shāndǐng zhāyíng。
The exploration team decided to pitch a camp at the hilltop tonight.
每天他都会去山顶看朝日。
Měitiān tā dōuhuì qù shāndǐng kàn zhāorì。
Every day, he goes up to the hilltop to see the sunrise.
登山队员在冲顶之前要穿上特制的衣服。
Dēngshān duìyuán zài chōngdǐng zhīqián yào chuānshàng tèzhì de yīfu。
Climbers should wear special clothes before they begin their journey to the mountain top.
工人们正在用升降机把建筑材料送到顶楼。
Gōngrénmen zhèngzài yòng shēngjiàngjī bǎ jiànzhù cáiliào sòngdào dǐnglóu。
Workers are using a lift to transfer building materials to the top floor.
成群的雁在头顶嗷嗷叫着。
Chéngqúnde yàn zài tóudǐng áo\'áojiàozhe。
Flocks of geese honked overhead.
从山顶向远处眺望
cóngshāndǐng xiàngyuǎnchù tiàowàng
look out into the distance from the top of the mountain

Fēijī cóng wǒmen tóudǐng fēiguò。
The plane passed over our heads.

tóudǐng

Tā tóudǐng yígè shuǐguàn。
She is carrying a water pot on her head.
我们把汽车顶了起来。
Wǒmen bǎ qìchē dǐngleqǐlái。
We lifted the car up.
小猫把土顶起来了。
Xiǎo māo bǎ tǔ dǐngqǐláile。
The kitten is pushing up the soil.
他们顶着烈日在训练。
Tāmen dǐngzhe lièrì zài xùnliàn。
They do their training facing the sun.
他干活一个人能顶两个。
Tā gànhuó yígèrén néngdǐng liǎnggè。
He can do as much work as two people.

Tā zǒule，shuílái dǐngtì tāde gǎngwèi？

封顶价格
fēngdǐngjiàgé

Wǒ gòubúdào dǐngcéngshūjiàshàngde shū。

绝顶聪明
juédǐng cōngmíng

Cóng shāndǐng kěyǐ niǎokàn quánchéng.

对她来说，这话如五雷轰顶。
Duì tā láishuō，zhè huà rú wǔléihōngdǐng.
The words hit her like a thunderbolt.
山顶设了个气象站。
Shāndǐng shèle gè Qìxiàngzhàn。
A weather station has been set up at the summit.
大风掀了房顶。
Dàfēng xiānle fángdǐng。
The gale blew the roof off.
他被雨淋得从头顶一直湿到脚底。
Tā bèi yǔ lín de cóng tóudǐng yìzhí shī dào jiǎodǐ。
The rain soaked him from head to foot.
安德鲁鱼跃冲顶打进一球。
ān dé lǔ yú yuè chōng dǐng dǎ jìn yī qiú。
Andrew scored a diving header from the ground.

登山队中午登顶。

他这几天没好气，见谁顶谁。

让登顶队员吸氧。
大风把棚顶的塑料薄膜掀掉了。

alive with
充满…
to be bubbling (over) with confidence/ideas
充满信心/想法
to be burning with impatience/ambition
充满极度的不耐/野心
to be confident of sth/of doing sth
对某事/做某事充满信心
to be confident about sth
对某事充满信心
to be crawling with
[inf] [+people，things] 充满了
full of
[+objects，people] 充满
I was full of confidence.
我充满了信心。
The town was full of life.
这座城市充满了活力。
in loving memory of...
充满爱意地追念…
to be steeped in history
充满历史气息
to swell with pride
[liter] 充满自豪
She was borned in a village that is a poem.
她出生在一个充满诗情画意的村庄。
I love the sentimental ending of this movie.
我喜欢这个电影充满柔情的结尾。
Peter wrote a sentimental song for his wife on their tenth wedding anniversary.
彼得在结婚十周年纪念日时给他的妻子写了一首充满柔情的歌。
It was said that big country is so-called varicolored world.
听说大城市是一个充满诱惑的花花世界。
The robust fragrance of potpourri filled the room.
大烩饭的浓香充满了整间屋子。
Princess Diana\'s funeral was an event filled with sorrow.
戴安娜公主的葬礼充满了哀伤的气氛。
As a result of a downsizing initiative and a major bank merger, his usually well-ordered life became fraught with changes.
由于一次裁员行动和一次重大的银行合并，他一贯有条不紊的生活变得充满了变化。
We must stay competitive in the competitive society.
我们必须在这个充满竞争的社会保持积极迎接竞争的心态。
His career as a politician was filled turmoil.
Tā nà zuòwéi yì míng zhèngzhìjiā de zhíyè shēngyá chōngmǎnle dòngdàng。
他那作为一名政治家的职业生涯充满了动荡。
It was a deep night filled with void.
Shēnyè mànmàn，chōngmǎn wújìn kōngxū。
深夜漫漫，充满无尽空虚。
My life is filled with many different types of experiences.
Wǒ de yìshēng chōngmǎnle gèzhǒng bùtóng de jīnglì。
我的一生充满了各种不同的经历。
I was joyed after winning the competition.
Yíngdé bǐsài zhīhòu，wǒ chōngmǎnle xǐyuè。
赢得比赛之后，我充满了喜悦。
Her mind was full of fears about his future.
Tā xīnlǐ duì wèilái chōngmǎnle yōulǜ。
他心里对未来充满了忧虑。
The jazz band trumpted with a lot of excitement.
Juéshìyuèduì chōngmǎn jīqíng de chuīzòuzhe lǎba。
爵士乐队充满激情地吹奏着喇叭。
She has a wonderful group of friends who hold her in such high regard.
Tā yǒu yì qún duì tā chōngmǎn jìngyì de jíhǎo de péngyou。
她有一群对她充满敬意的极好的朋友。
I feel indebted to people like you.
Wǒ duì nín zhèyàng de rén chōngmǎn gǎnjī zhī qíng。
我对您这样的人充满感激之情。
Nature is full of imperfection, and I prefer to avoid following a strict design.
Zìránjiè chōngmǎnle bù wánměi，wǒ nìngkě bú yào yángé de ànbùjiùbān。
自然界充满了不完美，我宁可不要严格地按部就班。
My life is full of disillusions.
Wǒ shēnghuó zhōng chōngmǎnle pòmiè de mèngxiǎng。
我生活中充满了破灭的梦想。

Tā de shēnghuó chōngmǎnle xìjùxìng。

我看着那些充满恐惧的脸。

chōngfèn jiùyè

chōngfèn zhèngjù 
ample evidence

chōngfèn lìyòng

This fully shows his ability.
充分发挥人民群众的聪明才智
chōngfèn fāhuī rénmínqúnzhòng de cōngmíngcáizhì
give full play to the wisdom and creativity of the people
这时老张插了话，补充了一些新例子。
Zhè shí Lǎo Zhāng chā le huà，bǔchōng le yìxiē xīn lìzi。
At this point Lao Zhang chipped in with some fresh examples.
充向导
chōnɡ xiànɡdǎo 
serve as a guide
充内行
chōngnèiháng
pretend to be an expert
充好汉
chōnghǎohàn 
pose as a hero
市场上充斥着外国商品。
Shìchǎngshàngchōngchì zhe wàiguó shāngpǐn。
The markets were flooded with foreign goods.
充当翻译
chōngdāng fānyì 
act as interpreter
充当辩护士
chōngdāng biànhùshì 
play the part of an apologist
对于别人的批评，他们是充耳不闻的。
Duìyú biérén de pīpíng，tāmen shì chōng\'ěrbùwén de。
They turned a deaf ear to other people\'s criticisms.
充分协商
chōngfèn xiéshāng
full consultation
充分证据
chōngfèn zhèngjù 
ample evidence
我们有充分理由相信这消息是可靠的。
Wǒmen yǒu chōngfèn lǐyóu xiāngxìn zhè xiāoxi shì kěkào de。
We have every reason to believe that the news is true.
充分利用
chōngfèn lìyòng
fully utilize; make full use of
他受贿的财物全部充了公。
Tā shòuhuì de cáiwù quánbùchōng le gōng。
The bribes and gifts that he took were all confiscated.
靠野菜充饥
kào yěcài chōnɡjī 
allay one\'s hunger with wild herbs
欢呼声充满了会场。
Huānhūshēngchōngmǎn le huìchǎng。
Loud cheers filled the assembly hall.
屋子里充满着阳光。
Wūzi lǐ chōngmǎn zhe yángguāng。
The room is full of sunshine.
大厅里充满了孩子们的欢笑声。
Dàtīnglǐ chōngmǎn le háizimen de huānxiàoshēng。
The hall resounded with the laughter of children.
雨水充沛
yǔshuǐ chōngpèi 
abundant rainfall
这点给养充其量只够维持三天。
Zhèdiǎn jǐyǎngchōngqíliàngzhǐ gòu wéichí sān tiān。
The provisions can last three days at most.
聘请老工程师充任顾问
pìnqǐnglǎogōngchéngshī chōngrèn gùwèn
ask senior engineers to be our advisers
他充任经理很合适。
Tā chōngrèn jīnglǐ hěn héshì。
He\'s well suited for the position of manager.
我心里充塞着喜悦的情绪。
Wǒ xīnlǐ chōngsè zhe xǐyuè de qíngxù。
My heart is filled with joy.
内容充实
nèirónɡ chōnɡshí 
substantial in content
充实论据
chōngshí lùnjù 
substantiate one\'s argument
充实库存
chōnɡshí kùcún 
replenish the stocks
参加你们队，我只能充个数。
Cānjiā nǐmen duì，wǒ zhǐnéng chōnggèshù。
I\'ll only be an also-ran in your team.
孩子们的脸上充溢着幸福的笑容。
Háizimen de liǎnshàngchōngyì zhe xìngfú de xiàoróng。
The children\'s faces beamed with happy smiles.
时间充裕
shíjiān chōngyù 
have ample (or plenty of) time
经济充裕
jīngjì chōngyù 
well-off
经费充足
jīngfèi chōngzú 
have sufficient (or ample) funds
阳光充足
yánɡɡuānɡ chōnɡzú 
full of sunshine; sunny
先搭好架子，再充实内容。
Xiān dāhǎo jiàzi，zài chōngshí nèiróng。
First make an outline, then fill in the content.
充当反动派的打手
chōngdāng fǎndòngpài de dǎshǒu 
serve as a hatchet man for the reactionaries
充分发挥中央和地方两个积极性
chōngfèn fāhuī zhōngyāng hé dìfāng liǎnggè jījíxìng 
give full play to the initiative of both central and local authorities
这屋子很宽敞，而且光线充足。
Zhè wūzi hěn kuānchǎng，érqiě guāngxiàn chōngzú。
The room is spacious and bright.
我们没有充分发挥他的才干。
Wǒmen méiyǒu chōngfèn fāhuī tā de cáigàn。
We\'re not doing justice to his talents.
给以充分的重视
gěiyǐ chōngfèn de zhòngshì
pay ample attention to
充实国库
chōnɡshí ɡuókù
augment the national treasury
作好充分准备，免得临时慌乱
Zuòhǎo chōngfèn zhǔnbèi，miǎn de línshí huāngluàn。
make ample preparations so as not to be in a rush at the last moment
他是个小伙子，充满活力。
Tā shì gè xiǎohuǒzi，chōngmǎn huólì。
He is a young lad with plenty of vigour.
大地充满了一片春耕的活气。
Dàdì chōngmǎn le yípiàn chūngēng de huóqì。
The land is alive with spring sowing activities.
这是一篇充满火药味的声明。
Zhè shì yì piān chōngmǎn huǒyàowèi de shēngmíng。
This statement has a strong smell of gunpowder.
货源充足
huòyuán chōnɡzú 
an ample supply of goods
他们的演出充满了爱国激情。
Tāmen de yǎnchū chōngmǎn le àiguó jīqíng。
Their performance was permeated with patriotic fervour.
给养充足
jǐyǎngchōngzú 
be abundantly provisioned
补充给养
bǔchōngjǐyǎng
replenish the provisions
假充内行
jiǎchōngnèiháng
pretend to be an expert
这个单位将补充自然减员约百人。
Zhège dānwèi jiāngbǔchōngzìrán jiǎnyuán yuē bǎi rén。
About 100 persons will replace those who retire or cannot work for various reasons in this unit.
经过充分讨论，大家取得了一致意见。
Jīngguò chōngfèn tǎolùn，dàjiā qǔdé le yízhì yìjiàn。
After thorough discussion unanimity was achieved.
充满惊涛骇浪的一生
chōngmǎn jīngtāohàilàng de yìshēng
a life full of hazards
充分就业
chōngfèn jiùyè
full employment
扩充实力
kuòchōnɡ shílì
expand (military or political) forces
扩充军备
kuòchōnɡ jūnbèi
engage in arms expansion
扩充设备
kuòchōnɡ shèbèi
augment the equipment
有充分理由相信
yǒu chōngfèn lǐyóu xiāngxìn
have every reason to believe
冒充内行
màochōngnèiháng
pretend to be an expert; pose as an expert
用次品冒充正品
yòngcìpǐn màochōngzhèngpǐn 
pass off defective goods as certified goods
他冒充记者。
Tā màochōngjìzhě。
He passed himself off as a journalist.
会议充满着浓厚的火药味。
Huìyì chōngmǎn zhe nónghòu de huǒyàowèi。
The meeting smelt strongly of gunpowder.
充分发挥潜力
chōngfèn fāhuī qiánlì
fully bring out latent potentialities; bring the potential into full play
要想办法使每个人的潜在力量充分发挥出来。
Yào xiǎngbànfǎ shǐ měigèrén de qiánzài lìliangchōngfèn fāhuī chūlái。
We must find a way to allow everyone to realize their potential.
充满着青春的活力
chōngmǎn zhe qīngchūn de huólì
be bursting with youthful vigour
这首曲子充满了哀伤的情调。
Zhèshǒu qǔzi chōngmǎn le āishāng de qíngdiào。
The music is full of pathos.
权充
quán chōng
act temporarily as; serve as a stopgap for
全心全意投身到工作里边，你的生活就会充实和快乐。
Quánxīnquányì tóushēn dào gōngzuò lǐbian，nǐ de shēnghuó jiùhuì chōngshí hé kuàilè。
If you set your whole mind and heart on your work, your life will be full and happy.
他充满热情地陈述了自己的意见。
Tā chōngmǎn rèqíng de chénshù le zìjǐ de yìjiàn。
He expressed his views with a great deal of warmth.
充气三极管
chōngqì sānjíguǎn
gas-filled triode
他的眼睛充满了喜悦的神采。
Tā de yǎnjing chōngmǎn le xǐyuè de shéncǎi。
His eyes beamed with joy.
春天来了，田野里充满了生机。
Chūntiān lái le，tiányě lǐ chōngmǎn le shēngjī。
Spring has come and the fields are full of life.
充满了胜利的信心
chōngmǎn le shènglì de xìnxīn
be fully confident of victory
事实充分说明这种做法是正确的。
Shìshí chōngfèn shuōmíng zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ shì zhèngquè de。
The results show clearly that this procedure is correct.
充分体谅人家的困难
chōngfèn tǐliàng rénjia de kùnnan 
make full allowances for their difficulties
不能听任黄色书刊充斥市场。
Bùnéng tīngrèn huángsè shūkān chōngchì shìchǎng。
We cannot allow pornographic books to flood the market.
证据充分，无可置疑。
Zhèngjù chōngfèn，wúkězhìyí。
The evidence is strong and admits of no doubt.
内心充满了喜悦
nèixīn chōngmǎn le xǐyuè
be filled with joy
充分发挥想像力
chōngfèn fāhuī xiǎngxiànglì
give full play to one\'s imagination
他们希望周围的小环境充满正气、友善和谅解。
Tāmen xīwàngzhōuwéi de xiǎo huánjìngchōngmǎn zhèngqì、yǒushàn hé liàngjiě。
They want the atmosphere to be positive, friendly and understanding.
充分发挥水、肥的效能
chōngfèn fāhuī shuǐ、féi de xiàonéng
make the best possible use of irrigation and fertilizer
逐步扩充劳动者休息和休养的物质条件
zhúbùkuòchōngláodòngzhě xiūxi hé xiūyǎng de wùzhì tiáojiàn
gradually expand material facilities for the working people to rest and recuperate
宁可虚位以待，也不要让不称职的人滥竽充数。
Nìngkě xūwèiyǐdài，yě búyào ràng bú chènzhí de rén lànyúchōngshù。
We\'d rather leave the place vacant than have someone incompetent fill the position.
一篇充满悬念的侦探小说
yì piān chōngmǎn xuánniàn de zhēntàn xiǎoshuō
a suspenseful detective story
硬充好汉
yìngchōnghǎohàn 
act the hero
充分
chōngfèn
full; ample; abundant
充电
chōngdiàn
charge (a battery)
充塞
chōngsè
fill (up); cram
混充
hùnchōng
pass oneself off as; palm sth. off as
滥竽充数
lànyúchōngshù
pass oneself off as one of the players in an ensemble—be there just to make up the number (used of incompetent people or inferior goods)
他对这件事充满了懊恨。
Tā duì zhèjiànshì chōngmǎn le àohèn。
This thing fills him with regret.
这种板状的太阳能可充电电池是新产品。
Zhèzhǒng bǎnzhuàng de tàiyángnéng kě chōngdiàn diànchí shì xīn chǎnpǐn。
The board-shaped solar charging battery is a new product.
他写的报告文学充分尊重了客观事实。
Tā xiě de bàogào wénxué chōngfèn zūnzhòng le kèguān shìshí。
His reportage fully complied with the facts.
因为准备充分，赛前他就抱定了必胜的信心。
Yīnwéi zhǔnbèi chōngfèn，sài qián tā jiù bàodìng le bìshèng de xìnxīn。
Because of good preparation, he is fully confident before the match that he will win.
生活艰苦的时候，人们只能靠秕谷充饥。
Shēnghuó jiānkǔ de shíhou，rénmen zhǐnéng kào bǐgǔ chōngjī。
When life was hard, people had to feed on blighted grains.
这篇文章的内容不够充实，需要进一步补写。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de nèiróng búgòu chōngshí，xūyào jìnyíbùbǔxiě。
This article is not informative enough, and should be expanded to include more details.
这首诗充分表现出了作者惨怛的心情。
Zhèshǒushī chōngfèn biǎoxiànchū le zuòzhě cǎndá de xīnqíng。
This poem well shows his depression.
这些长销产品，应该保证供应充足。
Zhèxiē chángxiāo chǎnpǐn，yīnggāi bǎozhèng gìngyīng chōngzú。
Supply should be guaranteed for these products which sell well over a long period of time.
虽然已是迟暮之年，但他依然精力充沛。
Suīrán yǐ shì chímù zhī nián,dàn tā yīrán jīnglì chōngpèi.
He is energetic, even though he is in his latter years.
我们一定要保证公司的货源充畅。
Wǒmen yídìng yào bǎozhèng gōngsī de huòyuán chōngchàng。
We must make sure that the supply of goods in our company is sufficient and smooth.
他写起文章思如泉涌，行文充畅。
Tā xiě qǐ wénzhāng sīrú quányǒng，xíngwén chōngchàng。
His written ideas have both rich content, and smooth style.
他的信用卡不能用了，银行的工作人员告诉他只需再充磁就行了。
Tā de xìnyòngkǎ bùnéng yòng le，yínháng de gōngzuò rényuán gàosù tā zhǐ xū zài chōngcí jiù xíng le。
His credit card couldn\'t be used. The bank clerk told him that he need to had it to be re-magnetized.
你这样打肿脸充胖子，到最后只能自己吃亏。
Nǐ zhèyàng dǎzhǒng liǎn chōng pàngzi，dào zuìhòu zhǐnéng zìjǐ chīkuī。
If you get beyond your depth like this , it is you who will suffer at last.
这个篮球该充气了，要不都拍不起来了。
Zhège lánqiú gāi chōngqì le，yàobùdōu pāi bùqǐlái le。
The basketball should be reinflated, or it won\'t bounce.
妈妈正在往做好的枕套里充填棉絮。
Māma zhèngzài wǎng zuòhǎo de zhěntào lǐ chōngtián miánxù。
Mother is filling the ready-made pillowslip with cotton wool.
他眼中已经充盈着激动的泪水。
Tā yǎn zhōng yǐjing chōngyíng zhe jīdòng de lèishuǐ。
His eyes are full of tears due to excitement.
改革开放以后，老百姓的口袋比以前充盈多了。
Gǎigé kāifàng yǐhòu，lǎobǎixìng de kǒudài bǐ yǐqián chōngyíng duō le。
Since the reform and opening up, people have more money in their pockets.
杨贵妃的体态充盈，是个唐代的美人。
Yáng guìfēi de tǐtài chōngyíng，shì gè Tángdài de měirén。
The high-ranking Imperial Concubine Yang was a plump beauty in Tang Dynasty.
很多学生从网上下载论文充作自己的论文发表。
Hěnduō xuésheng cóng wǎngshàng xiàzài lùnwén chōngzuò zìjǐ de lùnwén fābiǎo。
Many students download theses from the Internet and publish them as their own.
当地虫情十分严重，有关部门应充分重视。
Dāngdì chóngqíng shífēn yánzhòng，yǒuguān bùmén yīng chōngfèn zhòngshì。
The plague of vermin is very serious, the authorities should pay enough attention.
春华有限，我们需充分利用好这段美好的时光。
Chūnhuá yǒuxiàn，wǒmen xū chōngfèn lìyòng hǎo zhè duàn měihǎo de shíguāng。
We should make good use of this beautiful and precious time of spring.
葱葱的草木，让人感觉充满希望。
Cōngcōng de cǎomù，ràng rén gǎnjué chōngmǎn xīwàng。
Green grass makes people feel full of hope.
他好赌成性，把家产都卖光了，有粗砺充饥已经不错了。
Tā hàodǔ chéngxìng，bǎ jiāchǎn dōu màiguāng le，yǒu cūlì chōngjī yǐjing búcuò le。
After gambling became second nature, he sold out all the family property. Having only unpolished rice to allay hunger is pretty good for him.
她的理由不充分，所以对这个结论我要打问号。
Tā de lǐyóu bùchōngfèn，suǒyǐ duì zhège jiélùn wǒ yào dǎ wènhào。
Her reasons are not adequate, so I have doubts about the conclusion.
水灾后，灾民们靠代食品充饥。
Shuǐzāi hòu，zāimínmen kào dài shípǐn chōngjī。
After the flood, the victims allayed their hunger with food substitute.
对阵双方早就为这场决赛做了充分的准备。
Duìzhèn shuāngfāng zǎo jiù wèi zhèchǎng juésài zuò le chōngfèn de zhǔnbèi。
The two sides have already made sufficient preparations for the final.
东北有句俗话：“宁舍三顿饭，不舍二人转”，充分表达了人们对这个地方剧种的喜爱。
Dōngběi yǒu jù súhuà:“Nìng shě sāndùn fàn，bú shě èrrénzhuǎn”，chōngfèn biǎodá le rénmen duì zhège dìfāngjùzhǒng de xǐ\'ài。
As the saying goes in Norheastern China, &quot;We\'d rather give up our three meals than our song and dance duets.&quot; Local people enjoy going to these kind of operas
在封装贵重易碎品时，应有抗震填充物。
Zài fēngzhuāng guìzhòng yìsuìpǐn shí，yīng yǒu kàngzhèn tiánchōngwù。
When packing valuable and fragile items, we should put anti-earthquake filling materials inside.
登上峰顶的那一刻，我的心里充满了成就感。
Dēngshàng fēngdǐng de nà yíkè，wǒ de xīnlǐ chōngmǎn le chéngjiùgǎn。
I was filled with a sense of achievement when I finally reached the mountain top.
为获高利，他们不惜以次充好。
Wèi huò gāolì，tāmen bùxī yǐ cì chōnghǎo。
To obtain higher profit, they have no hesitation in replacing superior quality products with shoddy products.
本期杂志的稿源充足。
Běnqī zázhì de gǎoyuán chōngzú。
This magazine has sufficient manuscripts submitted for publication.
谷芽萌发后，需要充足的雨水才能生长良好。
Gǔyá méngfā hòu，xūyào chōngzú de yǔshuǐ cáinéng shēngzhǎng liánghǎo。
After the rice sprouts, it needs abundant rain water to grow well.
由于大量食用观音土充饥，他开始腹涨。
Yóuyú dàliàng shíyòng guānyīntǔ chōngjī，tā kāishǐ fùzhàng。
After eating a large amount of white clay to ease his hunger, he began to have abdominal distension.
我们要充分利用光能这个可再生资源。
Wǒmen yào chōngfèn lìyòng guāngnéng zhège kě zàishēng zīyuán。
We should make good use of light power, which is renewable.
你不要冒充鬼物吓唬人了，没人怕你。
Nǐ búyào màochōng guǐwù xiàhǔ rén le，méi rén pà nǐ。
Stop pretending to be a ghost, you frighten no one.
多吃海产品能够补充大脑消耗，使人变聪明。
Duōchī hǎichǎnpǐn nénggòu bǔchōng dànǎo xiāohào，shǐ rén biàn cōngmíng。
Eating sea products frequently can supplement cerebral consumption, and make people cleverer.
别人一吵架，他总要充当和事佬这一角色。
Biérén yì chǎojià，tā zǒngyào chōngdāng héshìlǎo zhèyì juésè。
He will be a peacemaker whenever a quarrel happens.
我们两个人的性格互为补充。
Wǒmen liǎnggè rén de xìnggé hùwéi bǔchōng。
Our characters are complimentary.
春天的公园花香鸟语，充满了生机。
Chūntiān de gōngyuán huāxiāng niǎoyǔ，chōngmǎn le shēngjī。
Parks in spring are filled with the vital force of floral fragrance, and singing birds.
荤食制作的时候一定要充分加热。
Hūnshí zhìzuò de shíhou yídìng yào chōngfèn jiārè。
Meat must be heated thoroughly during cooking.
这种植物在石子充塞的瘠土里，仍能顽强生长。

充气轮胎

补充阅读

不充分的证据

充满离奇思想的诗

我希望我能够像你祖父那样充满活力，他看起来就像十几岁的年轻人。

ānfǔ zhèngcè 
a policy aimed at appeasing the people
安民政策
ānmín zhèngcè

duìwài zhèngcè

fèngxíng bùjiéméng zhèngcè

执行宽待俘虏的政策
zhíxíng kuāndài fúlǔ de zhèngcè

gànbùzhèngcè

zhèngcè gōngxīn

怀柔政策
huáiróu zhènɡcè

价格政策
jiàgé zhèngcè

zhènɡcè jiānɡyìnɡ

通货膨胀政策解救不了经济危机。

bǎochí zhèngcè de liánxùxìng

luòshí zhèngcè

núhuà zhènɡcè

Zài yídìng de lìshǐ shíqī，shǐyòng yánxíng jùnfǎ bǐ kuānsōng zhèngcè gèng yǒuxiào。
During a certain period of time in history, severe punishments were much more effective that lax policies.
国家对于老少边穷地区进行政策扶持是十分必要的。
Guójiā duìyú lǎoshǎobiānqióng dìqū jìnxíng zhèngcè fúchí shì shífēn bìyào de。
It is very necessary for the country to support old liberation areas, minority areas, frontier areas, and poverty stricken areas through favorable policies.
改革开放是利国利民的政策。
Gǎigé kāifàng shì lìguó lìmín de zhèngcè。
The policy of reform and opening is beneficial to both the country, and people.
市里出台了农工商共同合作共同发展的政策。
Shì lǐ chūtái le nónggōngshāng gòngtóng hézuò gòngtóng fāzhǎn de zhèngcè。
The municipality carried out a policy on agricultural-industrial-commercial cooperation and joint development.
汉武帝推行罢黜百家，独尊儒术的政策。
Hànwǔdì tuīxíng bàchù bǎijiā，dúzūn rúshù de zhèngcè。
Emperor Wu in the Han Dynasty carried out a policy of proscribing all non-Confucian schools of thought and espousing Confucianism as the orthodox state ideology.
我们一定要把三农政策落实下去。
Wǒmen yīdìng yào bǎ sānnóngzhèngcè luòshí xiàqù。
We must carry out the &quot;Policy about the agriculture, country and farmers.&quot;
坦白从宽、抗拒从严是我们的一贯政策。
Tǎnbái cóngkuān、kàngjù cóngyán shì wǒmen de yíguàn zhèngcè。
It is our consistent policy to give leniency to those who confess their crimes and severity to those who refuse to do so.
他总是采用鸵鸟政策，不敢接受现实。
Tā zǒngshì cǎiyòng tuóniǎo zhèngcè，bùgǎn jiēshòu xiànshí。
He always adopts an ostrich policy, and dares not face the reality.
政府施行的惠民政策得到万民称颂。
Zhèngfǔ shīxíng de huìmín zhèngcè dédào wànmín chēngsòng。
The policies benefiting the people that are carried out by the government are universally praised.
国家制定的政策是不能轻易移易的。
Guójiā zhìdìng de zhèngcè shì bùnéng qīngyì yíyì de。
The policies formulated by the government shouldn\'t be changed informally.
众所周知，我军的政策一向是优容俘虏。
Zhòngsuǒ zhōuzhī，wǒ jūn de zhèngcè yí xiàng shì yōuróng fúlǔ。
As known to all, the policy of our armed forces is always to treat captives with leniency.
我国的计划生育政策鼓励优生优育。

The birth control policy of our country encourages bearing and rearing better children.
优生优育是我国计划生育政策的一个重要内容。
