Bearing and rearing better children is an important part of the birth control policy of our country.
国家对征购粮有优惠政策。
Guójiā duì zhēnggòuliáng yǒu yōuhuì zhèngcè。
The State has some preferential policies for grain purchased by the state.

Protecting middle-income farmers is one of the land reform policies.
县政府出台了新的土地审批的政策，这无疑是筑巢引凤之举。

The state policy of purchasing grain at a protected price has effectively secured the interests of farmers.

政府策略一向都是拒绝和恐怖分子谈判。
Political decisions sometimes come down to the judgement and wisdom of individuals.
Zhèngzhì juécè yǒushíhòu kě guījiéwéi gèrén de pànduàn hé ruìzhì。
政治决策有时候可归结为个人的判断和睿智。
Political choices are swept aside by the power of money.
Jīnqián de lìliàng zuǒyòu le zhèngzhì juécè。
金钱的力量左右了政治决策 。
Local states are not accorded a leading role in decisions about welfare.
Dāngdì gègè zhèngfǔ zài fúlì juécè fāngmiàn méiyǒu bèi shòuyǔ qǐ zhǔdǎo zuòyòng。
当地各个政府在福利决策方面没有被授予起主导作用。
They plotted the overthrow of the government.
Tāmen cèhuà tuīfān zhèngfǔ。
他们策划推翻政府。
The government made an announcement about changes in the drug war.
Zhèngfǔ zhēnduì jìndú cèlüè de biànhuà fābiǎo yí xiàng shēngmíng。
政府针对禁毒策略的变化发表一项声明。
The Governor never lets politics intrude on his decision making process prior to signing or vetoing a bill.
Zài qiānshǔ tóngyì huòzhě fǒujué yí xiàng yì\'àn zhī qián，zhōuzhǎng cónglái bú huì ràng zhèngzhì yīnsù yǐngxiǎng tā juécè de guòchéng。

《〈战国策〉校补》。
校注《战国策》。
More than twenty years after it introduced its one-child policy, China is keeping its promise, allowing only-children who marry each other to have a second child.
在宣布独生子女政策后的二十多年以来，中国政府一直履行着承诺，允许由独生子女组成的家庭有第二个孩子。
执行独立自主的外交政策
zhíxíngdúlì zìzhǔ de wàijiāo zhèngcè 
pursue (or implement, follow) an independent foreign policy
The new foreign minister reshaped the foreign policy of his country.
Xīnrèn wàijiāobùzhǎng chóngxīn zhìdìng gāiguó de wàijiāo zhèngcè。
新任外交部长重新制定该国的外交政策。
a bankrupt foreign policy
破产的外交政策
The Middle East has become perhaps the most crucial regional arena for American foreign policy.
中东大概已经成为美国施展外交政策时最为重要的区域性舞台。
Peace and equality are our constant diplomatic policies.
和平与平等是我们一贯的外交政策。
The new president claims that he will pursue the diplomatic policy of his predecessor.
新任总统宣称他将继续实行前任总统的外交政策。
A foreign policy success was needed to take the wind out of the sails of the radicals.
Jíxū chénggōng de wàijiāozhèngcè yǐ cuòbài jījìnfènzǐ de jìhuà。
亟需成功的外交政策以挫败激进分子的计划。
Secret activities offer presidents the alluring but often illusory promise that they can achieve foreign policy goals without the bothersome debate and open decision that are staples of democracy.
Mìmì de xíngdòng gěi zǒngtǒng tígōngle mírén dàn wǎngwǎng xūhuàn de yǔnnuò —— tāmen kěyǐ zài méiyǒu fánnǎo zhēnglùn hé gōngkāi juédìng děng mínzhǔ chéngfèn de qíngkuàng xià biàn nénggòu dádào wàijiāo zhèngcè de mùdì。
秘密的行动给总统提供了迷人但往往虚幻的允诺——他们可以在没有烦恼争论和公开决定等民主成分的情况下便能够达到外交政策的目的。
Containment of communist expansion was a central principle of United States\' foreign policy from 1947 to the 1975.
Qiānzhì gòngchǎn zhǔyì mànyán shì měiguó cóng 1947 nián dào 1975 nián jiān wàijiāo zhèngcè de héxīn yuánzé。
牵制共产主义蔓延是美国从1947年到1975年间外交政策的核心原则。
This policy advantages the lower income working class families.
Zhè yī zhèngcè duì jiào dīshōurù de gōngxīn jiātíng yǒusuǒ bāngzhù。
这一政策对较低收入的工薪家庭有所帮助。
Tax policy may have a profound effect on those on low incomes.
Shuìshōu zhèngcè huòxǔ huì duì nàxiē dīshōurù rénqún chǎnshēng shēnkè de yǐngxiǎng。
税收政策或许会对那些低收入人群产生深刻的影响。
这样做非常失策。
Zhèyàng zuò fēicháng shīcè。
It was a very unwise move.
公司投资失策。
Gōngsī tóuzī shīcè。
The company invested unwisely.
由于决策失误，我们错过了最好的戎机。
Yóuyú juécè shīwù，wǒmen cuòguò le zuìhǎo de róngjī。
Due to mistakes in decision-making, we missed the best opportunity to win the battle.
由于营销策略失误，今年商品的利润下滑50%。
Yóuyú yíngxiāo cèlüè shīwù，jīnnián shāngpǐn de lìrùn xiàhuá bǎifēnzhī wǔshí。
Due to the wrong sales strategy, the profit of this year\'s goods dropped by 50%.
你失策了，当初就不应该这样做。
由于决策失误，现在弄得很被动。
决策失误。
This failed project was a result of our defect in decision making.
Cǐ xiàngmù de shībài shì yīnwèi wǒmen juécè de shīwù。
此项目的失败是因为我们决策的失误。
a policy secures against loss
不会招致损失的政策
Sterling is falling because the financial markets no longer have faith in government policy.
Yīngbàng xiàdiēle，yīnwèi jīnróng shìchǎng duì zhèngfǔ zhèngcè shīqù xìnxīn。
英镑下跌了，因为金融市场对政府政策失去信心。

Cǐwài，zhèngfǔ zhèngcè xiànzài néng yònglái wěndìng shīyèlǜ。
此外，政府政策现在能用来稳定失业率。
The new marketing policy of the company has proved to be a failed effort.
公司的新市场策略已被证明为是一次失败的尝试。

决策者需要深谋远虑。
Juécèzhě xūyào shēnmóuyuǎnlǜ。
Policy makers need to think ahead.
Policy makers often make the right decision for the wrong reason.
Juécèzhě jīngcháng yóuyú cuòwù de yuányīn què zuòchū zhèngquè de juédìng。
决策者经常由于错误的原因却做出正确的决定。
Many diverse factors have been shown to have influenced the decision makers.
Hěn duō bùtóng de yīnsù yǐ xiǎnshì huì yǐngxiǎng juécèzhě。
很多不同的因素已显示会影响决策者。
This is an approach that can be commended to policy makers.

国家保护价粮食收购政策有效保障了农民的利益。

The state policy of purchasing grain at a protected price has effectively secured the interests of farmers.

这项政策会影响到整个国家、省以至县。

The economic policy of a country influences not only its domestic economy but also international economy to some extent.
一个国家的经济政策不仅影响本国经济，对国际经济也有一定程度的影响。
The Department of Energy oversees and maintains the national energy policy.
Néngyuánbù jiānguǎn hé wéihù guójiā de néngyuán zhèngcè。

The US has not been alone in its interventionism.
Měiguó bìngfēi wéiyī cǎiqǔ gānyù zhèngcè de Guójiā。
美国并非唯一采取干预政策的国家。
The policies will vary depending on the circumstances in each country.
Zhèngcè huì gēnjù měi gè guójiā bùtóng de jīngjì zhuàngkuàng ér zuòchū gǎibiàn。
政策会根据每个国家不同的经济状况而作出改变。

在宣布独生子女政策后的二十多年以来，中国政府一直履行着承诺，允许由独生子女组成的家庭有第二个孩子。
This policy excludes people who have a criminal record from entering the country.
Zhè xiàng zhèngcè bù yǔnxǔ yǒu fànzuìjìlù de rén jìnrù zhège Guójiā。
这项政策不允许有犯罪记录的人进入这个国家。
得益于藏富于民的国策，我国民间资本的规模大大增加。
Déyìyú cángfù yú mín de guócè，wǒguó mínjiān zīběn de guīmó dàdà zēngjiā。
Benefitting from the national policy of storing treasures in the public, our civil capital grew greatly.
他费尽心血，写成了数十万字的治国长策。
Tā fèijìn xīnxuè，xiěchéng le shù shí wàn zì de zhìguó chángcè。
He devoted himself to writing out a long-term policy to govern the country.
晚清朝廷的闭关锁国政策封禁了人们的眼界和思想。
Wǎnqīng cháotíng de bìguān suǒguó zhèngcè fēngjìn le rénmen de yǎnjiè hé sīxiǎng。
The closed-door policy of the Qing dynasty closed people\'s visions and minds.
改革开放是利国利民的政策。
Gǎigé kāifàng shì lìguó lìmín de zhèngcè。
The policy of reform and opening is beneficial to both the country, and people.
国家制定的政策是不能轻易移易的。
Guójiā zhìdìng de zhèngcè shì bùnéng qīngyì yíyì de。
The policies formulated by the government shouldn\'t be changed informally.
优生优育是我国计划生育政策的一个重要内容。
Yōushēng yōuyù shì wǒguó jìhuá shēngyù zhèngcè de yígè zhòngyào nèiróng。
Bearing and rearing better children is an important part of the birth control policy of our country.
我国的计划生育政策鼓励优生优育。
Wǒ guó de jìhuá shēngyù zhèngcè gǔlì yōushēng yōuyù。
The birth control policy of our country encourages bearing and rearing better children.
沙皇俄国对邻国采取了蚕食政策。
Shāhuáng\'éguó duì línguó cǎiqǔle cánshízhèngcè。
Tsarist Russia adopted a policy of encroaching on its neighbours.
这项政策会影响到整个国家、省以至县。
Zhè xiàng zhèngcè huì yǐngxiǎngdào zhěnggè guójiā、shěng yǐzhì xiàn。
This policy will effect the whole country, down to province and county level.
国家对征购粮有优惠政策。
Guójiā duì zhēnggòuliáng yǒu yōuhuì zhèngcè。
The State has some preferential policies for grain purchased by the state.
国家保护价粮食收购政策有效保障了农民的利益。
Guójiā bǎohùjià liángshí shōugòu zhèngcè yǒuxiào bǎozhàng le nóngmín de lìyì。
The state policy of purchasing grain at a protected price has effectively secured the interests of farmers.
国家对于老少边穷地区进行政策扶持是十分必要的。
Guójiā duìyú lǎoshǎobiānqióng dìqū jìnxíng zhèngcè fúchí shì shífēn bìyào de。
It is very necessary for the country to support old liberation areas, minority areas, frontier areas, and poverty stricken areas through favorable policies.
国家出台了一项有关计划生育问题的政策。
Guójiā chūtáile yíxiàng yǒuguān jìhuàshēngyù wèntí de zhèngcè。
The government has issued a policy on family planning.
《〈战国策〉校补》。
校注《战国策》。
改革开放是治国长策。
太平天国运动的策源地在广西桂平市金田村
文章精辟地申论了我国的人权状况和有关政策。
我国一贯实行睦邻友好政策。
The US has not been alone in its interventionism.
Měiguó bìngfēi wéiyī cǎiqǔ gānyù zhèngcè de Guójiā。
美国并非唯一采取干预政策的国家。
Government is the one who establishes national policy framework.
国家政策体系的是由政府建立的。
Isolationism is a strictly national policy.
Gélí zhǔyì shì yí xiàng yángé de guójiā zhèngcè。
隔离主义是一项严格的国家政策。
The immorality of basing the defense of the west on the threat of mutual assured destruction.
Bǎ wēixié quèbǎo xiānghù huǐmiè zuòwéi dǐyù xīfāng guójiā zhèngcè de búdàodéxìng。
把威胁确保相互毁灭作为抵御西方国家政策的不道德性。
The economic policy of a country influences not only its domestic economy but also international economy to some extent.
一个国家的经济政策不仅影响本国经济，对国际经济也有一定程度的影响。
The government stated its willingness to abide by the UN sanctions policy.
Zhèngfǔ shēngmíng yuànyì jiēshòu gāi xiàng liánhéguó zhìcái zhèngcè。
政府声明愿意接受该项联合国制裁政策。
Scepticism about US financial policy is widespread in China.
zài Zhōngguó，rénmen pǔbiàn duì Měiguó jīnróngzhèngcè huáiyǒu yílǜ。
在中国，人们普遍对美国金融政策怀有疑虑。
The UK Government\'s policy must be seen against the background of the past.
Yīngguó zhèngfǔ de zhèngcè bìxū kǎolǜ dào guòqù de bèijǐng。
英国政府的政策必须考虑到过去的背景。
He opposed a policy of American isolation.
Tā fǎnduì měiguó de gūlì zhèngcè。
他反对美国的孤立政策。
The new foreign minister reshaped the foreign policy of his country.
Xīnrèn wàijiāobùzhǎng chóngxīn zhìdìng gāiguó de wàijiāo zhèngcè。
新任外交部长重新制定该国的外交政策。
The Middle East has become perhaps the most crucial regional arena for American foreign policy.
中东大概已经成为美国施展外交政策时最为重要的区域性舞台。
The Department of Energy oversees and maintains the national energy policy.
Néngyuánbù jiānguǎn hé wéihù guójiā de néngyuán zhèngcè。
能源部监管和维护国家的能源政策。
The policies will vary depending on the circumstances in each country.
Zhèngcè huì gēnjù měi gè guójiā bùtóng de jīngjì zhuàngkuàng ér zuòchū gǎibiàn。
政策会根据每个国家不同的经济状况而作出改变。
The most obvious example is China\'s monetary and fiscal stimulus.
zuì míngxiǎn de lìzi shì Zhōngguó de huòbì hé cáizhèng cìjī zhèngcè。
最明显的例子是中国的货币和财政刺激政策。
In early 1998, China began to adopt policies to expand domestic demand.
在1998年年初，中国开始实施扩大内需的政策。
Containment of communist expansion was a central principle of United States\' foreign policy from 1947 to the 1975.
Qiānzhì gòngchǎn zhǔyì mànyán shì měiguó cóng 1947 nián dào 1975 nián jiān wàijiāo zhèngcè de héxīn yuánzé。
牵制共产主义蔓延是美国从1947年到1975年间外交政策的核心原则。

在宣布独生子女政策后的二十多年以来，中国政府一直履行着承诺，允许由独生子女组成的家庭有第二个孩子。
The United States has pursued a beggar-my-neighbor policy.
Měiguó zhèngzài shíshī yì zhǒng sǔnrénlìjǐ de zhèngcè。
美国正在实施一种损人利己的政策。
This country has an aggressive foreign policy.
这个国家采用的是一种侵略性的外交策略。
Domestically, the president proposes a more moderate economic policy.
Zǒngtǒng tíyì zài guó nèi tuīxíng yí xiàng gèngwéi shìdù de jīngjì zhèngcè。
总统提议在国内推行一项更为适度的经济政策。
The Chancellor of the Exchequer announced the government\'s new tax policies.
Yīngguó cáizhèng dàchén xuāndúle zhèngfǔ xīn de shuìshōu zhèngcè。
英国财政大臣宣读了政府新的税收政策。
What the country lacks in natural resources it makes up for in bright ideas.

China once adopted the mechanism that combined economic planning with market regulation.
中国曾采用计划经济与市场调节相结合的政策。
Germany once had a solid economy，good fiscal and monetary policies，and a hard currency.
Déguó céngjīng yōngyǒu qiángdà de jīngjì、 liánghǎo de cáizhèng hé huòbì zhèngcè，yǐjí yìnghuòbì。
德国曾经拥有强大的经济、良好的财政和货币政策，以及硬货币。
Local states are not accorded a leading role in decisions about welfare.
Dāngdì gègè zhèngfǔ zài fúlì juécè fāngmiàn méiyǒu bèi shòuyǔ qǐ zhǔdǎo zuòyòng。
当地各个政府在福利决策方面没有被授予起主导作用。
The housing policy exemplifies the shift from collective to individualized welfare provision.
Zhùfáng zhèngcè jǔlì shuōmíngle cóng jítǐ fúlì xiàng gèrén fúlì de zhuǎnyí。

chóushānɡ duìcè 
discuss what countermeasures to take
酌定对策
zhuódìnɡ duìcè

我们必须商量对策，看怎么才能打下这场战役。
Wǒmen bìxū shāngliáng duìcè，kàn zěnme cáinéng dǎxià zhèchǎng zhànyì。
We must discuss how to win the battle.
你别只顾着干急，还是想想对策吧。
Nǐ bié zhǐgù zhe gānjí，háishi xiǎngxiǎng duìcè ba。
Don\'t act anxious and unable to do anything, find ways to circumvent the problem.
别借酒浇愁了，还是快想对策吧。
Bié jièjiǔ jiāochóu le，háishi kuài xiǎng duìcè ba。
It\'s no using drowning your sorrows; you\'d better work out a plan.

He plotted vindictively against his former superiors.

We decided to adopt a policy that was ethical for all of our employees.

政策已经放活了，咱们应该抓住机遇，发展当地经济。

chóushānɡ duìcè 
discuss what countermeasures to take
躲在背后出谋划策
duǒ zài bèihòu chūmóuhuàcè 
mastermind a scheme from behind the scenes
对内政策
duìnèi zhèngcè
domestic (or internal) policy
对外政策
duìwài zhèngcè
external (or foreign) policy
方针政策
fāngzhēn zhèngcè
general and specific policies
奉行不结盟政策
fèngxíng bùjiéméng zhèngcè
pursue a policy of nonalignment
执行宽待俘虏的政策
zhíxíng kuāndài fúlǔ de zhèngcè
carry out the policy of lenient treatment of prisoners of war
干部政策
gànbùzhèngcè
policy towards cadres; cadre policy
反动政权的高压政策
fǎndòng zhèngquán de gāoyā zhèngcè
the high-handed policy of a reactionary regime
政策攻心
zhèngcè gōngxīn
try to win over or obtain a confession from a person by explaining the Party\'s policy
怀柔政策
huáiróu zhènɡcè
policy of control through conciliation; policy of mollification
制定政策不能急功近利，要有长远的观点。
Zhìdìngzhèngcè bùnéng jígōngjìnlì，yào yǒu chángyuǎn de guāndiǎn。
In formulating policies, we must not be seeking short-term successes and quick profits. We should take a long-range view of things.
定下了诱敌深入的计策
dìngxià le yòu dí shēnrù de jìcè 
make a plan to lure the enemy in
价格政策
jiàgé zhèngcè 
price policy
政策僵硬
zhènɡcè jiānɡyìnɡ 
an inflexible policy
两种策略交互使用
liǎngzhǒng cèlüè jiāohù shǐyòng
use the two tactics alternately
通货膨胀政策解救不了经济危机。
Tōnghuò péngzhàngzhèngcè jiějiù bùliǎo jīngjì wēijī。
Inflationary policies are no remedy for an economic crisis.
经贸政策
jīngmào zhèngcè
policies for economic and trade activities
运筹决策
yùnchóu juécè
devise strategies
战略决策
zhànlüè juécè
strategic decision
开放政策
kāifànɡ zhènɡcè
the policy of opening to the outside world; the open policy
保持政策的连续性
bǎochí zhèngcè de liánxùxìng
maintain the continuity of a policy
落实政策
luòshí zhèngcè 
implement a policy
策划于密室
cèhuà yú mìshì 
plot behind closed doors
奴化政策
núhuà zhènɡcè
policy of enslavement
虐待俘虏是违反政策的。
Nüèdài fúlǔ shì wéifǎn zhèngcè de。
Any maltreatment of prisoners of war is against our policy.
任人驱策
rèn rén qūcè
allow oneself to be ordered about
全面落实党的各项政策
quánmiàn luòshí dǎng de gè xiàng zhèngcè
implement the Party\'s policies in an all-round way
软化政策
ruǎnhuà zhèngcè
soft tactics
善策
shàncè
a wise policy; the best policy
善邻政策
shànlín zhènɡcè
good-neighbour policy
上上策
shàngshàngcè
the best plan
这样做非常失策。
Zhèyàng zuò fēicháng shīcè。
It was a very unwise move.
实行精兵简政的政策
shíxíng jīngbīng jiǎnzhèng de zhèngcè
put into effect the policy of better staff and simpler administration
这个政策搞得企业死不死，活不活的。
Zhège zhèngcè gǎo de qǐyè sǐ bu sǐ，huó bu huó de。
This policy is making it difficult for all enterprises.
推行新的政策
tuīxíngxīn de zhèngcè

威慑政策
wēishè zhènɡcè

违反政策
wéifǎn zhènɡcè

一系列政策
yíxìliè zhèngcè
a whole set of policies
为何出此下策？
Wèihé chū cǐ xiàcè?
Why do you resort to such an unwise move?
现行政策
xiànxíngzhèngcè
present policies
在技术革新中人人献计献策。
Zài jìshù géxīn zhōng rénren xiànjì xiàncè。
Everyone suggested ways and means for technical innovation.
研拟新政策
yánnǐ xīnzhènɡcè
formulate a new policy
一贯政策
yíɡuàn zhènɡcè 
consistent policy
英明决策
yīnɡmínɡ juécè

远见卓识的决策
yuǎnjiànzhuōshí de juécè

越出政策界限
yuèchū zhènɡcè jièxiàn

政策教育
zhèngcè jiàoyù

提高政策水平
tígāo zhèngcè shuǐpíng

zhènɡcèxìnɡ kūisǔn

zhíxíngdúlì zìzhǔ de wàijiāo zhèngcè

制定政策
zhìdìnɡ zhènɡcè 
formulate a policy
终非良策。
Zhōnɡ fēi liánɡcè。 
It\'s not a good plan after all.
重要政策
zhòngyào zhèngcè 
major policy
酌定对策
zhuódìnɡ duìcè 
work out (or develop) countermeasures
策略
cèlüè
tactics
他光会耍笔杆，碰到实际问题就束手无策。
Tā guānghuì shuǎ bǐgǎn，pèngdào shíjì wèntí jiù shùshǒuwúcè。
He knows only how to wield a pen and is helpless in the face of practical problems.
子女们为父母的宝石婚纪念日策划了一个有趣的活动。
Zǐnǚmen wèi fùmǔ de bǎoshíhūn jìniànrì cèhuà le yígè yǒuqù de huódòng。
They arranged a very interesting event to celebrate their parents\' fortieth wedding anniversary.
项目策划已经编列出各项目支出，准备上交审批部门。
Xiàngmù cèhuà yǐjing biānlièchū gè xiàng mù zhīchū，zhǔnbèi shàngjiāo shěnpī bùmén。
The project proposal has included the expense of each item, and is ready to be submitted to the authorities for examination
对于这项部颁政策，下级单位都很拥护。
Duìyú zhè xiàng bùbān zhèngcè，xiàjí dānwèi dōu hěnyōnghù。
The subordinate units are supportive of this newly issued policy.
得益于藏富于民的国策，我国民间资本的规模大大增加。
Déyìyú cángfù yú mín de guócè，wǒguó mínjiān zīběn de guīmó dàdà zēngjiā。
Benefitting from the national policy of storing treasures in the public, our civil capital grew greatly.
他策马飞奔在这片辽阔的草原上。
Tā cèmǎfēi bēnzài zhèpiàn liáokuò de cǎoyuán shàng。
He is riding a horse on this vast plain.
我们应该给予学生更多的策勉鼓励。
Wǒmen yīnggāi jǐyǔ xuésheng gèngduō de cèmiǎn gǔlì。
We should give more encouragement to the students.
他费尽心血，写成了数十万字的治国长策。
Tā fèijìn xīnxuè，xiěchéng le shù shí wàn zì de zhìguó chángcè。
He devoted himself to writing out a long-term policy to govern the country.
他的话语如同晨钟暮鼓，鞭策我上进。
Tā de huàyǔ rútóng chén zhōng mùgǔ，biāncè wǒ shàngjìn。
His words are like the morning bell and evening drum, drive me to make progress.
有他为你出谋献策，事情就好办了。
Yǒu tā wèi nǐ chūmóu xiàncè，shìqing jiù hǎobàn le。
Now that he will provide tactics, and a strategy for you it should be much easier.
我们正在反复磋磨这套策划方案。
Wǒmen zhèngzài fǎnfù cuōmó zhètào cèhuà fāngàn。
We are exchanging views on this plan.
我们必须商量对策，看怎么才能打下这场战役。
Wǒmen bìxū shāngliáng duìcè，kàn zěnme cáinéng dǎxià zhèchǎng zhànyì。
We must discuss how to win the battle.
科技创新政策给科技工作者提供了发挥才智的大舞台。
Kējì chuàngxīn zhèngcè gěi kējì gōngzuòzhě tígōng le fāhuī cáizhì de dàwǔtái。
The policy of innovation through science and technology provides a stage for scientists, and technicians to put their full talents to use.
由于营销策略的改变，第三季度的销售额陡增。
Yóuyú yíngxiāo cèlüè de gǎibiàn，dìsān jìdù de xiāoshòu\'é dǒuzēng。
The sales volume in the third quarter skyrocketed, which should be attributed to the change in marketing strategy.
政策已经放活了，咱们应该抓住机遇，发展当地经济。
Zhèngcè yǐjing fànghuó le，zánmen yīnggāi zhuāzhù jīyù，fāzhǎn dāngdì jīngjì。
The policies are more flexible now, we should seize the chance to develop our local economy.
晚清朝廷的闭关锁国政策封禁了人们的眼界和思想。
Wǎnqīng cháotíng de bìguān suǒguó zhèngcè fēngjìn le rénmen de yǎnjiè hé sīxiǎng。
The closed-door policy of the Qing dynasty closed people\'s visions and minds.
他通过复盘给我讲解下棋策略。
Tā tōngguò fùpán gěi wǒ jiǎngjiě xiàqí cèlüè。
He explains the tactics of chess to me by replaying the original situations of the chessboard.
你别只顾着干急，还是想想对策吧。
Nǐ bié zhǐgù zhe gānjí，háishi xiǎngxiǎng duìcè ba。
Don\'t act anxious and unable to do anything, find ways to circumvent the problem.
公私兼顾，劳资两利曾是我们对民族资本主义工商业的政策。
Gōngsī jiāngù，láozī liǎnglì céng shì wǒmen duì mínzú zīběnzhǔyì gōngshāngyè de zhèngcè。
Giving concurrent consideration to public and private interests and benefiting both labor and capital used to be our policy towards national capitalist industry and commerce.
政府对条件困难的家庭实行贷款减息政策。
Zhèngfǔ duì tiáojiàn kùnnan de jiātíng shíxíng dàikuǎn jiǎnxī zhèngcè。
The government has reduced the lending rate for poor families.
新年晚会快举办了，经理希望大家都能积极主动地建言献策。
Xīnnián wǎnhuì kuài jǔbàn le，jīnglǐ xīwàng dàjiā dōu néng jījí zhǔdòng de jiànyán xiàncè。
The manager wishes us to offer advice on the coming new year party.
市委讲师团分三路下乡宣传党的方针政策。
Shìwěi jiǎngshītuán fēn sān lù xiàxiāng xuānchuán dǎng de fāngzhēn zhèngcè。
The publicizing troop of the Municipal Party Committee divides themselves into three groups to inform people in the countryside about the policies of the Chinese Communist Party.
别借酒浇愁了，还是快想对策吧。
Bié jièjiǔ jiāochóu le，háishi kuài xiǎng duìcè ba。
It\'s no using drowning your sorrows; you\'d better work out a plan.
政府的工业化政策遭到了环保主义者的诘难。
Zhèngfǔ de gōngyèhuà zhèngcè zāodào le huánbǎozhǔyìzhě de jiénàn。
The government\'s industrialization policies were questioned by environmentalists.
军师苦思着拒敌良策。
Jūnshī kǔsī zhe jùdí liángcè。
The military counselor is thinking hard about a good way to resist the enemy.
自从蠲免了政策中不太合理的成份，人人称快。
Zìcóng juānmiǎn le zhèngcè zhōng bú tài hélǐ de chéngfèn，rénrén chēngkuài。
Since the unreasonable parts of the policy have been removed, everyone is very satisfied.
他喜欢用这些名言隽语来鞭策自己。
Tā xǐhuan yòng zhèxiē míngyán juànyǔ lái biāncè zìjǐ。
He likes to encourage himself with these famous words and meaningful sentences.
在一定的历史时期，使用严刑峻法比宽松政策更有效。
Zài yídìng de lìshǐ shíqī，shǐyòng yánxíng jùnfǎ bǐ kuānsōng zhèngcè gèng yǒuxiào。
During a certain period of time in history, severe punishments were much more effective that lax policies.
国家对于老少边穷地区进行政策扶持是十分必要的。
Guójiā duìyú lǎoshǎobiānqióng dìqū jìnxíng zhèngcè fúchí shì shífēn bìyào de。
It is very necessary for the country to support old liberation areas, minority areas, frontier areas, and poverty stricken areas through favorable policies.
改革开放是利国利民的政策。
Gǎigé kāifàng shì lìguó lìmín de zhèngcè。
The policy of reform and opening is beneficial to both the country, and people.
公侯家中往往有很多门下，为他出谋划策。
Gōnghóu jiā zhōng wǎngwǎng yǒu hěnduō ménxià，wèi tā chūmóu huàcè。
Marquises all have many hangers-on seeking advice.
骑在马上，他心情舒畅，不住地策马鸣鞭。
Qízài mǎ shàng，tā xīnqíng shūchàng，búzhù de cèmǎ míngbiān。
Riding on the horse, he feels happy, and keeps spurring the horse on.
市里出台了农工商共同合作共同发展的政策。
Shì lǐ chūtái le nónggōngshāng gòngtóng hézuò gòngtóng fāzhǎn de zhèngcè。
The municipality carried out a policy on agricultural-industrial-commercial cooperation and joint development.
我空军采取强击策略，将目标定在了敌军指挥部。
Wǒ kōngjūn cǎiqǔ qiángjī cèlüè，jiāng mùbiāo dìngzài le díjūn zhǐhuībù。
Our air force adopted a forceful attacking strategy, and fixed our targets on the enemy\'s headquarters.
由于决策失误，我们错过了最好的戎机。
Yóuyú juécè shīwù，wǒmen cuòguò le zuìhǎo de róngjī。
Due to mistakes in decision-making, we missed the best opportunity to win the battle.
汉武帝推行罢黜百家，独尊儒术的政策。
Hànwǔdì tuīxíng bàchù bǎijiā，dúzūn rúshù de zhèngcè。
Emperor Wu in the Han Dynasty carried out a policy of proscribing all non-Confucian schools of thought and espousing Confucianism as the orthodox state ideology.
我们一定要把三农政策落实下去。
Wǒmen yīdìng yào bǎ sānnóngzhèngcè luòshí xiàqù。
We must carry out the &quot;Policy about the agriculture, country and farmers.&quot;
他不是一个遇到困难就束手无策的人。
Tā búshì yígè yùdào kùnnan jiù shùshǒuwúcè de rén。
He is not a man without resources when running into trouble.
坦白从宽、抗拒从严是我们的一贯政策。
Tǎnbái cóngkuān、kàngjù cóngyán shì wǒmen de yíguàn zhèngcè。
It is our consistent policy to give leniency to those who confess their crimes and severity to those who refuse to do so.
我们要策划一档贴合老年人兴趣爱好的电视节目。
Wǒmen yào cèhuà yí dàng tiēhé lǎoniánrén xìngqù àihào de diànshì jiémù。
We\'ll plan a TV program which older people will like.
这项政策出台之前，市政府已经听证了多位专家学者。
Zhè xiàng zhèngcè chūtái zhīqián，shìzhèngfǔ yǐjing tīngzhèng le duō wèi zhuānjiā xuézhě。
Before the policy came out, the city government listened to many experts and scholars.
他总是采用鸵鸟政策，不敢接受现实。
Tā zǒngshì cǎiyòng tuóniǎo zhèngcè，bùgǎn jiēshòu xiànshí。
He always adopts an ostrich policy, and dares not face the reality.
政府施行的惠民政策得到万民称颂。
Zhèngfǔ shīxíng de huìmín zhèngcè dédào wànmín chēngsòng。
The policies benefiting the people that are carried out by the government are universally praised.
由于营销策略失误，今年商品的利润下滑50%。
Yóuyú yíngxiāo cèlüè shīwù，jīnnián shāngpǐn de lìrùn xiàhuá bǎifēnzhī wǔshí。
Due to the wrong sales strategy, the profit of this year\'s goods dropped by 50%.
国家制定的政策是不能轻易移易的。
Guójiā zhìdìng de zhèngcè shì bùnéng qīngyì yíyì de。
The policies formulated by the government shouldn\'t be changed informally.
侵略者来势汹汹，我们要尽快想好应敌之策。
Qīnlüèzhě láishì xiōngxiōng，wǒmen yào jǐnkuài xiǎnghǎo yìngdí zhī cè。
The invaders attacked in full fury, and we must think out a strategy to deal with them.
众所周知，我军的政策一向是优容俘虏。
Zhòngsuǒ zhōuzhī，wǒ jūn de zhèngcè yí xiàng shì yōuróng fúlǔ。
As known to all, the policy of our armed forces is always to treat captives with leniency.
我国的计划生育政策鼓励优生优育。
Wǒ guó de jìhuá shēngyù zhèngcè gǔlì yōushēng yōuyù。
The birth control policy of our country encourages bearing and rearing better children.
优生优育是我国计划生育政策的一个重要内容。
Yōushēng yōuyù shì wǒguó jìhuá shēngyù zhèngcè de yígè zhòngyào nèiróng。
Bearing and rearing better children is an important part of the birth control policy of our country.
由于策略正确，正大集团今年坐收余利。
Yóuyú cèlüè zhèngquè，zhèngdà jítuán jīnnián zuòshōu yúlì。
Thanks to the correct strategy, the CP Group can sit idly and collect profit this year.
国家对征购粮有优惠政策。
Guójiā duì zhēnggòuliáng yǒu yōuhuì zhèngcè。
The State has some preferential policies for grain purchased by the state.
保护中农是土地改革的政策之一。
Bǎohù zhōngnóng shì tǔdì gǎigé de zhèngcè zhīyī。
Protecting middle-income farmers is one of the land reform policies.
县政府出台了新的土地审批的政策，这无疑是筑巢引凤之举。
Xiàn zhèngfǔ chūtái le xīn de tǔdì shěnpī de zhèngcè，zhè wúyí shì zhùcháo yǐnfèng zhī jǔ。
The county government has released a new policy for land examination and approval, which is undoubtedly for the purpose of attracting outside investment and talent.
不愧是一代宗师，他走棋的策略千变万化。
Búkuì shì yídài zōngshī，tā zǒuqí de cèlüè qiānbiàn wànhuà。
With an ever-changing strategy for playing chess, he is really worthy of being called a master.
国家保护价粮食收购政策有效保障了农民的利益。
Guójiā bǎohùjià liángshí shōugòu zhèngcè yǒuxiào bǎozhàng le nóngmín de lìyì。
The state policy of purchasing grain at a protected price has effectively secured the interests of farmers.
由于公司今年营销策略得当，利润源源而来。
Yóuyú gōngsī jīnnián yíngxiāo cèlüè dédàng，lìrùn yuányuán érlái。
Thanks to a proper marketing strategy, the company\'s profit comes in a steady stream.
参与决策制定
cānyù juécèzhìdìng
participate in policy formulation
沙皇俄国对邻国采取了蚕食政策。
Shāhuáng\'éguó duì línguó cǎiqǔle cánshízhèngcè。
Tsarist Russia adopted a policy of encroaching on its neighbours.
内战的策源地
nèizhànde cèyuándì
the place where the civil war started
新政策出笼后，倍受抨击。
Xīnzhèngcè chūlónghòu，bèishòu pēngjī。
When the new policies came out, they were heavily criticized.
放任政策
fàngrènzhèngcè
laissez-faire policy
高压政策
gāoyāzhèngcè
high-handed policy
这项政策应该贯穿于整个工程。
Zhèxiàng zhèngcè yīnggāi guànchuānyú zhěnggègōngchéng。
This policy should run through the whole project.
这项政策加剧了贫富差距。
Zhè xiàng zhèngcè jiājùle pínfùchājù.
This policy exacerbates the gap between rich and poor.
你要把有关政策交代清楚。
Nǐ yào bǎ yǒuguānzhèngcè jiāodài qīngchu.
You need to explain the relevant policy clearly.
不结盟政策
bùjiéméng zhèngcè
policy of non-alignment
精心策划的阴谋
jīngxīn cèhuà de yīnmóu
a meticulously planned plot

他们针对在校园中饮酒的行为制定了控制性政策。
The rebels had planned turmoil and confusion.
Pànmín cèdòngle sāoluàn。
叛民策动了骚乱。
The writer is plotting a new novel.
Zhè míng zuòjiā zhèngzài cèhuà yì běn xīn xiǎoshuō。
这名作家正在策划一本新小说。
This factor played only a minor part in his decision.
Zhèxiē yīnsù zhǐ duì tā de juécè yǒu shǎoxǔ yǐngxiǎng。
这些因素只对他的决策有少许影响。
The company matched the discount policy of its competitors.
Gāi gōngsī cǎiqǔle yǔ qí jìngzhēng duìshǒu xiāngtóng de zhékòu zhèngcè。
该公司采取了与其竞争对手相同的折扣政策。
The rider spurred his horse.
Qíshǒu cèmǎ fēibēn。
骑手策马飞奔。
We must hear the expert before we make a decision.
Zài juécè zhīqián，wǒmen bìxū tīngtīng zhuānjiā de yìjiàn。
在决策之前，我们必须听听专家的意见。
They plotted the overthrow of the government.
Tāmen cèhuà tuīfān zhèngfǔ。
他们策划推翻政府。
His black heart has concocted yet another black deed.
Yīnxiǎn de tā yòu cèhuàle yí xiàng yīnxiǎn de xíngdòng。
阴险的他又策划了一项阴险的行动。
His search for a move that would avoid checkmate was unsuccessful.
Tā méiyǒu zhǎodào yíbù nénggòu bìmiǎn bèi jiāng sǐ de cèlüè。
他没有找到一步能够避免被将死的策略。
The predominant mood among policy-makers is optimism.
Juécèrén zhōngjiān de zhǔdǎo qíngxù shì lèguān。
决策人中间的主导情绪是乐观。
She trotted the horse home.
Tā cèmǎ jí pǎo huíjiā。
她策马急跑回家。
She railed against the bad social policies.
Tā pīpíng nàxiē bù liáng de shèhuì zhèngcè。
她批评那些不良的社会政策。
We clashed over the new farm policies.
Wǒmen dǐzhì xīn de nóngyè zhèngcè。
我们抵制新的农业政策。
I approve of his educational policies.
Wǒ zàntóng tā de jiàoyùzhèngcè。
我赞同他的教育政策。
His policies were a disaster.
Tā de zhèngcè shì yì chǎng zāinàn。
他的政策是一场灾难。
His decision had depressing consequences for business.
Tā de juécè gěi yèwù zàochéngle bùliáng hòuguǒ。
他的决策给业务造成了不良后果。
This policy excludes people who have a criminal record from entering the country.
Zhè xiàng zhèngcè bù yǔnxǔ yǒu fànzuìjìlù de rén jìnrù zhège Guójiā。
这项政策不允许有犯罪记录的人进入这个国家。
Germany once had a solid economy，good fiscal and monetary policies，and a hard currency.
Déguó céngjīng yōngyǒu qiángdà de jīngjì、 liánghǎo de cáizhèng hé huòbì zhèngcè，yǐjí yìnghuòbì。
德国曾经拥有强大的经济、良好的财政和货币政策，以及硬货币。
Secret activities offer presidents the alluring but often illusory promise that they can achieve foreign policy goals without the bothersome debate and open decision that are staples of democracy.
Mìmì de xíngdòng gěi zǒngtǒng tígōngle mírén dàn wǎngwǎng xūhuàn de yǔnnuò —— tāmen kěyǐ zài méiyǒu fánnǎo zhēnglùn hé gōngkāi juédìng děng mínzhǔ chéngfèn de qíngkuàng xià biàn nénggòu dádào wàijiāo zhèngcè de mùdì。
秘密的行动给总统提供了迷人但往往虚幻的允诺——他们可以在没有烦恼争论和公开决定等民主成分的情况下便能够达到外交政策的目的。
Newscasters speculated about the president\'s game plan for an invasion.
Xīnwén pínglùnyuán jìngxiāng cāicè zǒngtǒng duì shíshī rùqīn de cèlüè。
新闻评论员竞相猜测总统对实施入侵的策略。
He is believed to be the principal designer of the terrorist bombing attack.
Tā bèi rènwéi shì kǒngbù zhǔyì zhàdàn xíjī de zhǔyào cèhuàzhě。
他被认为是恐怖主义炸弹袭击的主要策划者。
He sets policy and leaves all the administrivia to his assistant.
Tā zhìdìng wán zhèngcè zhīhòu jiāng suǒyǒu de jùtǐxìng gōngzuò dōu jiāogěile zìjǐ de mìshū。
他制定完政策之后将所有的具体性工作都交给了自己的秘书。
A good executive must be good at decision making.
Yōuxiù de lǐngdǎozhě bìxū shànyú juécè。
优秀的领导者必须善于决策。
The United States has pursued a beggar-my-neighbor policy.
Měiguó zhèngzài shíshī yì zhǒng sǔnrénlìjǐ de zhèngcè。
美国正在实施一种损人利己的政策。
He opposed a policy of American isolation.
Tā fǎnduì měiguó de gūlì zhèngcè。
他反对美国的孤立政策。
The agency was created for the implementation of the policy.
Nàgè jīgòu shì wèi shíshī nà xiàng zhèngcè ér chénglì de。
那个机构是为实施那项政策而成立的。
The new recycling policy is environmentally safe.
Xīn de fèiwù lìyòng zhèngcè duì huánjìng hěn ānquán。
新的废物利用政策对环境很安全。

Cèhuàrényuán gòuxiǎng le wànyīfāshēng gōngjī de jǐzhǒng qíngkuàng。
策划人员构想了万一发生攻击的几种情况。
This company is the great white hope of the nuclear industry\'s waste management policy.
Zhè jiā gōngsī shì hégōngyè fèiliào guǎnlǐzhèngcè de jùdà xīwàng。
这家公司是核工业废料管理政策的巨大希望。

They questioned the advisability of our policy.
Tāmen huáiyí wǒmen de zhèngcè shìfǒu míngzhì。
他们怀疑我们的政策是否明智。
The result of this pacific policy was that no troops were called up.

It was a policy of desperation.
Nà shì yí xiàng gūzhùyízhì de zhèngcè。

The newspaper\'s proclaimed adherence to the government\'s policy.

History has clearly shown the folly of that policy.
Lìshǐ yǐjīng míngquè xiǎnshìle nà yí zhèngcè de yúchǔnxìng。

He adopted wholeheartedly some of the policies that he had previously criticized.

他全心全意地采纳了一些他先前批评过的政策。

Tā cèhuàzhe yào duì tā yuánlái de shàngsi jìnxíng bàofù。
他策划着要对他原来的上司进行报复。

Tā tǎnshuài de pīpíngle zhèngfǔ xīn de shèhuì zhèngcè。

The suggester of this absurd strategy was a fool.
Zhège huāngmiù cèlüè de tíyìzhě shì gè shǎguā。
这个荒谬策略的提议者是个傻瓜。
The altered policy promised success.
Xiūgǎi hòu de zhèngcè kànlái nénggòu qǔdé chénggōng。
修改后的政策看来能够取得成功。

Tā bānbù nà xiàng zhèngcè de shíjī bèi zhèngmíng shì bù chéngshú de。

He masterminded the robbery.
Tā cèhuàle zhè cì qiǎngjié。

The new teacher tends to steamroller.

Zhè cì yuèyù shì jīngxīn cèhuà de。

Tā bù yǔ tóngshì shāngliang jiù zuòle suǒyǒu de zhòngdà juécè，zhè shì hěn bù mínzhǔ de。
他不与同事商量就做了所有的重大决策，这是很不民主的。
Domestically, the president proposes a more moderate economic policy.
Zǒngtǒng tíyì zài guó nèi tuīxíng yí xiàng gèngwéi shìdù de jīngjì zhèngcè。

zuì míngxiǎn de lìzi shì Zhōngguó de huòbì hé cáizhèng cìjī zhèngcè。

这些策略为经纪自营商带来收益。

huòbìzhèngcè juébùnéng hūshì zīchǎn jiàgé zǒushì。

The ECB has an exit strategy from its non-standard measures in place.
ōuzhōu Yāngháng mùqián yōngyǒu tuìchū fēichángguī cuòshī de cèlüè。

zhè shì guānfāng de zhèngcè lùxiàn。

gòuzhì shūjí、zhǐzhāng、wénjùděng

纸张的正面
Zhǐzhāng de zhèngmiàn
the right side of the paper
把一张纸裁成条儿
bǎ yìzhāngzhǐ cáichéngtiáor 
cut a sheet of paper into strips
这张纸两边长短不齐。
Zhèzhāng zhǐ liǎngbiān chángduǎn bùqí。
The two edges of this piece of paper aren\'t even in length.
这张纸两面都写满了字。
Zhè zhāngzhǐ liǎngmiàn dōu xiěmǎn le zì。
Both sides of the paper were covered with writing.
先把两张纸取齐了再裁。
Xiān bǎ liǎng zhāng zhǐ qǔqí le zài cái。
Even up the edges of the two sheets of paper before you cut them.
请把这几张纸贴在一块儿。
Qǐngbǎ zhè jǐ zhāngzhǐ tiē zài yíkuàir。
Please paste these sheets of paper together.
一张纸
yì zhānɡ zhǐ 
a piece (or sheet) of paper
这张纸上的草体是修改过的汉字读音。
Zhèzhāng zhǐ shàng de cǎotǐ shì xiūgǎi guò de hànzì dúyīn。
The handwritten characters on this piece of paper are the corrected pronunciations of those Chinese characters.
这两张纸大小不等，不能完全叠合在一起。
Zhè liǎng zhāng zhǐ dàxiǎo bùděng，bùnéng wánquán diéhé zài yìqǐ。
These two pieces of paper are of different sizes and cannot completely overlap each other.
不要在那张纸上胡乱划拉。
Búyào zài nàzhāngzhǐ shàng húluàn huála。
Don\'t doodle on this piece of paper.
他用回形针将两张纸固定住。
Tā yòng huíxíngzhēn jiāng liǎng zhāng zhǐ gùdìng zhù。
He attached the two pieces of paper with a clip.
他把两张纸用浆糊粘在一起。
Tā bǎ liǎng zhāng zhǐ yòng jiànghú zhānzài yìqǐ。
He sticks two pieces of paper with paste.
我把生辰八字写在一张纸上，交给了算命先生。
Wǒ bǎ shēngchén bāzì xiě zài yìzhāng zhǐ shàng，jiāogěi le suànmìng xiānshēng。
I wrote my birth time on a piece of paper and handed it to the fortune-teller.
请大家拿出一张纸，默写化学元素周期表。
Qǐng dàjiā náchū yìzhāng zhǐ，mòxiě huàxué yuánsù zhōuqībiǎo。
Everybody please take out a piece of paper and write the periodic table from memory.
把这两张纸胶合在一起吧。
Bǎ zhè liǎngzhāng zhǐ jiāohé zài yìqǐ bā.
Let\'s glue these two pieces of paper together.
这张纸太大，用剪子铰一下。
Zhèzhāng zhǐ tài dà，yòng jiǎnzǐ jiǎo yíxià.
This piece of paper is too big, so let\'s cut it down with the scissors.
这张图纸有几个数据对不上号。
Zhèzhāng túzhǐ yǒu jǐgè shùjù duì bu shàng hào。
There are a few figures on this blueprint that don\'t tally.
这张报纸反映知识分子的看法和意见。
Zhèzhāng bàozhǐ fǎnyìng zhīshifènzǐ de kànfǎ hé yìjiàn。
The newspaper reflects the intellectuals\' views and opinions.
他们的那个条约不过是一张废纸而已。
Tāmen de nàgè tiáoyuē búguò shì yìzhāng fèizhǐ éryǐ。
That treaty of theirs is a mere scrap of paper.
我一共刻记了十张蜡纸。
Wǒ yígòng kèjì le shí zhānglàzhǐ。
I cut ten stencils altogether.
在美术方面他是一张白纸，得从头学起。
Zài měishù fāngmiàn tā shì yìzhāng báizhǐ，děi cóngtóu xuéqǐ。
He knows practically nothing about art, so he has to learn from scratch.
他在这张白纸上划了个道子。
Tā zài zhèzhāng báizhǐ shàng huà le gè dàozi。
He drew a line on this white piece of paper.
这张报纸的第一版是套色版。
Zhèzhāng bàozhǐ de dìyī bǎn shì tàosèbǎn。
The first page of the newspaper is chromatically printed.
这张图纸显示的是那座大楼的侧视图。
Zhèzhāng túzhǐ xiǎnshì de shì nà zuò dàlóu de cèshìtú。
This drawing shows the side elevation of that building.
请再给我两张晒图纸，我的已经用完了。
Qǐng zài gěi wǒ liǎng zhāng shàitúzhǐ，wǒ de yǐjing yòngwán le。
Please give me two more pieces of blueprint paper. Mine has run out.
在这张建筑图纸上，我却没找到标图。
Zài zhèzhāng jiànzhù túzhǐ shàng，wǒ què méi zhǎodào biāotú。
I didn’t find the scale in this architectural drawing.
这张建筑图纸满是红线，我实在看不懂。
Zhèzhāng jiànzhù túzhǐ mǎnshì hóngxiàn，wǒ shízai kàn bùdǒng。
The construction blueprint is full of borderlines. I am really blind to them.
张老师每天都到传达室去拿报纸。

Teacher Zhang goes to the reception office every day to get newspapers.

Papers need to be correctly imposed prior to printing so that they are correctly oriented and readable.
在印刷之前纸张要正确拼版，才能确保印出的正确、可读。
I looked at the sheet of paper in the typewriter.
Wǒ kànlekàn dǎzìjī lǐ de zhǐzhāng。
我看了看打字机里的纸张。
The brochure was printed on 100 % recycled paper.
Zhè běn xiǎocèzǐ shì yòng 100% kě huíshōu zhǐzhāng yìnshuā de。
这本小册子是用100%可回收纸张印刷的。
He clipped the sheets together and put them into an envelope.
Tā bǎ zhèxiē dānyè zhǐzhāng biézài yìqǐ，zhuāngjìn yí gè xìnfēng。
他把这些单页纸张别在一起，装进一个信封。
To be valuable, prints must be good impressions on good quality paper.

要保证高品质，印刷品必须使用高质量的印版和纸张。
Old paper falls apart very easily.
Chénjiù de zhǐzhāng fēicháng róngyì pòliè。
陈旧的纸张非常容易破裂。
Let recycled papers be conserved for the many purposes they are more fit for.

Zhuō shàng de zhǐ jiào fēnggěi guāpǎo le。
The paper blew off the table.
三篇纸
sān piān zhǐ
three sheets (or pieces) of paper
报纸用大量篇幅报道了这次会议的情况。
Bàozhǐ yòng dàliàng piānfú bàodào le zhècì huìyì de qíngkuàng。
The press gave the conference wide coverage.
碎纸片
suì zhǐpiàn
scraps of paper
档案中并无片纸只字提及此事。
Dàng\'àn zhōng bìngwú piànzhǐzhīzì tíjí cǐ shì。
There is no reference at all to this case in the files.
把纸铺平
bǎ zhǐ pūpíng

先把两张纸取齐了再裁。
Xiān bǎ liǎng zhāng zhǐ qǔqí le zài cái。
Even up the edges of the two sheets of paper before you cut them.
全国性报纸
quánguóxìng bàozhǐ

bōli shāzhǐ

jīnɡānɡ shāzhǐ

报纸上

咱们把这些废纸烧掉吧。
Zánmen bǎ zhèxiē fèizhǐ shāodiào ba。

石蕊试纸
shíruǐ shìzhǐ

万用试纸
wàn yòng shìzhǐ

姜黄试纸
jiānghuáng shìzhǐ
turmeric test paper
撕纸不动刀剪，仅用手去撕。
Sī zhǐ bú dòng dāo jiǎn，jǐn yòng shǒu qù sī。
Paper-tear pictures are not made with knife or scissors but by tearing with the hands.
他们每天都把报纸及时送达各家各户。
Tāmen měitiān dōu bǎ bàozhǐ jíshí sòngdá gè jiā gè hù。
Every day, they deliver the newspapers promptly to each household.
纸条子
zhǐtiáozi 
a narrow strip of paper; a slip of paper
请把这几张纸贴在一块儿。
Qǐngbǎ zhè jǐ zhāngzhǐ tiē zài yíkuàir。
Please paste these sheets of paper together.
在硬纸盒上捅个洞
zài yìngzhǐhé shàngtǒnggè dòng

建筑物的图纸
jiànzhùwù de túzhǐ

团纸团儿
tuán zhǐtuánr

Gěi nǐmen shí fèn bàozhǐ，wài jiā sān běn xiǎocèzi。

信纸用完了。
Xìnzhǐ yòngwán le。
The writing pad is used up.
一叠五颜六色的纸
yì dié wǔyánliùsè de zhǐ

zhǐxiānɡ
cardboard box; carton
纸屑
zhǐxiè
scraps of paper
把纸条从门缝里掖进去
bǎ zhǐtiáo cóng ménfènglǐ yējìnqù

协定如不执行，只是一纸空文。
Xiédìngrú bùzhíxíngzhǐshì yìzhǐkōngwén。
An agreement, if not implemented, is a mere scrap of paper.
这种纸写字容易洇。
Zhè zhǒng zhǐ xiě zì róngyì yīn。
Ink blots on this paper.
把报纸办得引人入胜
bǎ bàozhǐ bàn de yǐnrénrùshèng

yǒuguāngzhǐ

义愤之情跃然纸上。
Yìfènzhīqíngyuèránzhǐshàng。

今天报纸摘登了他的发言。
Jīntiān bàozhǐ zhāidēng le tā de fāyán。

yì zhānɡ zhǐ

bú duìxiàn zhǐbì

在美术方面他是一张白纸，得从头学起。
Zài měishù fāngmiàn tā shì yìzhāng báizhǐ，děi cóngtóu xuéqǐ。
He knows practically nothing about art, so he has to learn from scratch.
这期报纸为春节特别报道而增加了版面。
Zhè qī bàozhǐ wèi chūnjié tèbié bàodào ér zēngjiā le bǎnmiàn。

这种包装纸是可以回收再生的。
Zhèzhǒng bāozhuāng zzhǐ shì kěyǐ huíshōu zàishēng de。
This kind of wrapping paper can be recycled.
随着书法家们笔走龙蛇，一幅幅字画跃然纸上。

With vigorous and graceful strokes, the calligraphers create their excellent works.
今天报纸的标题新闻吸引了不少的读者。
Jīntiān bàozhǐ de biāotí xīnwén xīyǐn le bùshǎo de dúzhě。
Today’s news headlines attracted a lot of readers.
在这张建筑图纸上，我却没找到标图。
Zài zhèzhāng jiànzhù túzhǐ shàng，wǒ què méi zhǎodào biāotú。
I didn’t find the scale in this architectural drawing.
餐巾纸是每一个餐厅都必备的。
Cānjīnzhǐ shì měiyígè cāntīng dōu bìbèi de。
Every restaurant must provide napkins for its customers.
这张纸上的草体是修改过的汉字读音。
Zhèzhāng zhǐ shàng de cǎotǐ shì xiūgǎi guò de hànzì dúyīn。
The handwritten characters on this piece of paper are the corrected pronunciations of those Chinese characters.
总经理在纸上草写了一行字，交给了秘书。
Zǒngjīnglǐ zài zhǐ shàng cǎoxiě le yì háng zì，jiāogěi le mìshū。
The general manager scratched some words on the piece of paper, and handed it to his secretary.
卖报纸的还没出摊儿，待会儿再去买吧。
Mài bàozhǐ de hái méi chūtānr，dāihuìrzài qù mǎi ba。
The news vender hasn\'t open yet, lets buy it later.
古代的窗棂都是用纸做的，一捅就破。
Gǔdài de chuānglíng dōushì yòng zhǐ zuò de，yìtǒng jiù pò。
In ancient times, window lattices were all made of paper, which could be broken with just one prod.
窗纸的质地要有韧性，这样才耐用。
Chuāngzhǐ de zhìdì yào yǒurènxìng，zhèyàng cái nàiyòng。
We should choose tough materials for window paper because they are durable.
这些旧报纸打趸儿给我吧。
Zhèxiē jiù bàozhǐ dǎdǔnr gěi wǒ ba。
Would you please give me all of these old newspapers at the same time?
你把那期报纸单另给我送过来。
Nǐ bǎ nà qī bàozhǐ dānlìng gěi wǒ sòng guòlái。
Please bring me that issue of the newspaper.
他在这张白纸上划了个道子。
Tā zài zhèzhāng báizhǐ shàng huà le gè dàozi。
He drew a line on this white piece of paper.
报纸上的这条新闻标题用的是等线体。
Bàozhǐ shàng de zhètiáo xīnwén biāotí yòng de shì děngxiàntǐ。
This news headline is written in equal-line face letters.
这是图纸的底样，一定不能遗失。
Zhè shì túzhǐ de dǐyàng，yídìng bùnéng yíshī。
This is the rough draft of the blueprint and mustn\'t be lost.
今天的报纸刊登了关于这件事情的调查报告。
Jīntiān de bàozhǐ kāndēng le guānyú zhèjiàn shìqing de diàochá bàogào。
Today\'s newspaper published the report of this matter.
他把看过的旧报纸都叠放在书柜里。
Tā bǎ kàn guò de jiù bàozhǐ dōu diéfàng zài shūguì lǐ。
He folded all the old newspapers and put them in the book cabinet.
这两张纸大小不等，不能完全叠合在一起。
Zhè liǎng zhāng zhǐ dàxiǎo bùděng，bùnéng wánquán diéhé zài yìqǐ。
These two pieces of paper are of different sizes and cannot completely overlap each other.
断七这天我们烧纸祭奠亡灵。
Duànqī zhè tiān wǒmen shāo zhǐ jìdiàn wánglíng。
Seven weeks after their death, we hold a memorial ceremony for the dead.
她刚开始学习书法，只能使用仿纸进行摹写。
Tā gāng kāishǐ xuéxí shūfǎ，zhǐnéng shǐyòng fǎngzhǐ jìnxíng móxiě。
She has just begun to learn calligraphy and can only use the practice paper to copy model characters.
照相馆的人告诉他，这里没有这么大的放大纸。
Zhào xiàng guǎn de rén gàosù tā，zhèlǐ méiyǒu zhème dà de fàngdàzhǐ。
There is no enlarging paper large enough for his use in the photo shop.
刘大爷每天都要把分拣好的报纸、信件，送到各个办公室。
Liú dàye měitiān dōuyào bǎ fēnjiǎn hǎo de bàozhǐ，xìnjiàn，sòngdào gègè bàngōngshì。
Uncle Liu sorts out newspapers and letters and sends them to each office every day.
爷爷常跟我说起小时候用粉连纸糊风筝的趣事。
Yéye cháng gēn wǒ shuōqǐ xiǎoshíhou yòng fěnliánzhǐ hú fēngzhēng de qùshì。
My grandfather often tells me about his childhood experiences of making kites with thin white paper.
有了复印机之后，我就再也没用过这些复写纸。
Yǒu le fùyìnjī zhīhòu，wǒ jiù zài yě méi yòngguò zhèxiē fùxiězhǐ。
I have never used carbon paper since I have had the copier.
你快把这些复印纸装入复印机。
Nǐ kuài bǎ zhèxiē fùyìnzhǐ zhuāngrù fùyìnjī。
Please quickly put these duplicating papers into the duplicator.
感光纸可以用来处理和存储图像。
Gǎnguāngzhǐ kěyǐ yònglái chǔlǐ hé cúnchǔ tú xiàng。
Sensitive paper can be used to process and store images.
那个杠房出售香火和纸马。
Nà gè gàngfáng chūshòu xiānghuǒ hé zhǐmǎ。
The old-fashioned undertaker\'s sells burning incense and  paper horses.
老师要求我们用格纸写作文。
Lǎoshī yāoqiú wǒmen yòng gézhǐ xiě zuòwén。
The teacher asks us to write compositions on squared paper.
这张建筑图纸满是红线，我实在看不懂。
Zhèzhāng jiànzhù túzhǐ mǎnshì hóngxiàn，wǒ shízai kàn bùdǒng。
The construction blueprint is full of borderlines. I am really blind to them.
我手里的报纸被风吹得呼啦呼啦地响。
Wǒ shǒulǐ de bàozhǐ bèi fēng chuī de hūlā hūlā de xiǎng。
The newspapers in my hands were blown violently by the wind, and made a loud sound.
家里的墙很脏，爸爸买来糊墙纸准备装修一下。
Jiā lǐ de qiáng hěnzāng，bàba mǎilái húqiángzhǐ zhǔnbèi zhuāngxiū yíxià。
The wall of our house is very dirty. Father has bought some wall paper, preparing to decorate it.
不要在那张纸上胡乱划拉。
Búyào zài nàzhāngzhǐ shàng húluàn huála。
Don\'t doodle on this piece of paper.
道士在祭祀时点燃了黄表纸。
Dàoshì zài jìsì shí diǎnrán le huángbiǎozhǐ。
The Taoist ignited the loess-made yellow paper when offering sacrifice.
他用回形针将两张纸固定住。
Tā yòng huíxíngzhēn jiāng liǎng zhāng zhǐ gùdìng zhù。
He attached the two pieces of paper with a clip.
赶上清明节，去火葬场烧纸的人会特别多。
Gǎnshàng Qīngmíngjié，qù huǒzàngchǎng shāozhǐ de rén huì tèbié duō。
A lot of people go to the crematory to burn paper as a sacrificial offering on Tomb-sweeping Day.
火纸由于轻便，很多人都会用它做火媒。
Huǒzhǐ yóuyú qīngbiàn，hěnduōrén dōuhuì yòng tā zuò huǒméi。
Touch paper is often used as fire kindling thanks to its lightness.
这个消息明早就会见诸报端，你记得看一看报纸。
Zhège xiāoxi míngzǎo jiùhuì jiànzhū bàoduān，nǐ jìde kànyikàn bàozhǐ。
The news will be in tomorrow\'s newspaper, don’t forget to read it then.
建筑师在给工人讲解图纸。
Jiànzhùshī zài gěi gōngrén jiǎngjiě túzhǐ。
The architect is explaining the blueprint to workers.
包裹软糖的江米纸是由糯米做成的。
Bāoguǒ ruǎntáng de jiāngmǐzhǐ shì yóu nuòmǐ zuòchéng de。
The coat covering the soft candies is made from glutinous rice.
他把两张纸用浆糊粘在一起。
Tā bǎ liǎng zhāng zhǐ yòng jiànghú zhānzài yìqǐ。
He sticks two pieces of paper with paste.
你把计划表用胶纸粘在墙上。
Nǐ bǎ jìhuàbiǎo yòng jiāozhǐ zhānzài qiáng shàng。
Glue the plan on the wall with sticky paper.
请不要再迷恋金迷纸醉的生活了。
Qǐng búyào zài míliàn jīnmí zhǐzuì de shēnghuó le。
Do not cling to a life of luxury and dissipation.
化学课上，老师让我们把试纸在溶液中浸湿。
Huàxuékè shàng，lǎoshī ràng wǒmen bǎ shìzhǐ zài róngyè zhōng jìnshī。
Our chemistry teacher asked us to immerse the test paper in the liquid.
关于这次比赛，报纸上已经刊布了参赛启示。
Guānyú zhècì bǐsài，bàozhǐ shàng yǐjing kānbù le cānsài qǐshì。
The newspaper has already published the notice for this competition.
每天花块儿八毛的买份报纸看看，能长很多见识。
Měitiān huā kuàirbāmáo de mǎi fèn bàozhǐ kànkàn，néng zhǎng hěnduō jiànshí。
A newspaper a day costs you only 0.8 yuan, but it widens your knowledge greatly.
他写的评论文章力透纸背，对问题有很独到的见解。
Tā xiě de pínglùn wénzhāng lìtòu zhǐbèi，duì wèntí yǒu hěndúdào de jiànjiě。
His reviews are very penetrating, and contain original opinions about a problem.
连史纸早在元代就被誉为“妍妙辉光、皆世称也”的精品，至今已有600多年的历史。
Liánshǐzhǐ zǎo zài Yuándài jiù bèi yùwéi“yánmiàohuīguāng、jiēshìchēngyě”de jīngpǐn，zhìjīn yǐ yǒu liùbǎi duōnián de lìshǐ。
Lianshi Paper was famed as a delicate object that was &quot;Beautiful, fine, bright, smooth and was widely praised.&quot;  So far it has already had a history of more than 600 years.
出席婚礼的人都要在红纸上留名。
Chūxí hūnlǐ de rén dōuyào zài hóngzhǐ shàng liúmíng。
All people present at the wedding ceremony should write their names on the red paper.
纸短情长，我仅在这里敬祝你曼福。
Zhǐduǎn qíngcháng，wǒ jǐn zài zhèlǐ jìngzhù nǐ mànfú。
The letter can not carry my feelings. I just wish you long-lasting happiness.
她喜欢用毛笔在毛太纸上书写。
Tā xǐhuan yòng máobǐ zài máotàizhǐ shàng shūxiě。
She likes writing on maotai paper with a brush.
这些都是毛头纸，质量太差了。
Zhèxiē dōushì máotóuzhǐ，zhìliàng tài chà le。
This is all maotou paper, which is of poor quality.
这盒巧克力外面有一层玫瑰色的包装纸。
Zhè hé qiǎokèlì wàimiàn yǒu yì céng méiguīsè de bāozhuāngzhǐ。
The box of chocolate is wrapped in rose paper.
我们从这个库房里领取了十箱美浓纸。
Wǒmen cóng zhège kùfáng lǐ lǐngqǔ le shí xiāng měinóngzhǐ。
We took ten boxes of Mino paper from the storehouse.
纸上的字迹矇矇不清，很难辨认。
Zhǐ shàng de zìjì méngméng bùqīng，hěnnán biànrèn。
The handwriting on the paper is obscure and hard to understand.
我一般都会随身携带一些面巾纸。
Wǒ yìbān dōuhuì suíshēn xiédài yìxiē miànjīnzhǐ。
I often take some tissues with me.
小时候我们自己做过捻捻转儿，剪一个圆纸片儿，中间插个竹签做轴，一捻就转了。
Xiǎoshíhou wǒmen zìjǐ zuòguò niǎnniǎnzhuànr，jiǎn yígè yuán zhǐpiànr，zhōng jiān chā gè zhúqiān zuò zhóu，yì niǎn jiù zhuàn le。
In our childhood, we made wooden tops: cut out a round strip of paper, insert a bamboo stick as a shaft, twist it, and it will rotate at once.
她吃冰糖葫芦之前，总要先吃掉外面包着的那层糯米纸。
Tā chī bīngtáng húlu zhīqián，zǒng yào xiān chīdiào wàimiàn bāo zhe de nà céng nuòmǐzhǐ。
She always eats the glutinous rice paper on the outside before she eats the candied haws.
老屋的排杈儿用料很好，就是上边的纸太破旧了。
Lǎowū de páichàr yòngliào hěnhǎo，jiùshì shàngbiān de zhǐ tài pòjiù le。
The partitions of the old house are of good quality, but the paper on them is old and worn.
他大胆地喷涂各种颜色，纸上呈现出的效果好看。
Tā dàdǎn de pēntú gèzhǒng yánsè，zhǐ shàng chéngxiàn chū de xiàoguǒ hǎokàn。
He sprayed all sorts of colors daringly, and they looked really fantastic on paper.
这个可以入戏的好题材是我从报纸上看到的。
Zhège kěyǐ rùxì de hǎo tícái shì wǒ cóng bàozhǐ shàng kàndào de。
I saw a good theme in a newspaper, which can be put into a drama.
请再给我两张晒图纸，我的已经用完了。
Qǐng zài gěi wǒ liǎng zhāng shàitúzhǐ，wǒ de yǐjing yòngwán le。
Please give me two more pieces of blueprint paper. Mine has run out.
我把生辰八字写在一张纸上，交给了算命先生。
Wǒ bǎ shēngchén bāzì xiě zài yìzhāng zhǐ shàng，jiāogěi le suànmìng xiānshēng。
I wrote my birth time on a piece of paper and handed it to the fortune-teller.
《京华时报》在北京属于发行量较大的报纸。
《Jīnghuáshíbào》zài Běijīng shǔyú fāxíngliàng jiàodà de bàozhǐ。
Jinghua Times is a newspaper with a comparatively large circulation in Beijing.
他一生气把纸撕成了碎屑。
Tā yì shēngqì bǎ zhǐ sīchéng le suìxiè。
He tore the piece of paper into pieces in his anger.
他用炭笔在纸上勾勒出了一个建筑物的轮廓。
Tā yòng tànbǐ zài zhǐ shàng gōulè chū le yígè jiànzhùwù de lúnkuò。
He sketched the contours of a building with a charcoal pencil.
这块糖的糖纸也是可食用的。
Zhèkuài táng de tángzhǐ yěshì kě shíyòng de。
This kind of sugar paper is edible.
这张报纸的第一版是套色版。
Zhèzhāng bàozhǐ de dìyī bǎn shì tàosèbǎn。
The first page of the newspaper is chromatically printed.
今天报纸上刊登了一条耸人听闻的消息。
Jīntiān bàozhǐ shàng kāndēng le yìtiáo sǒngrén tīngwén de xiāoxi。
A piece of sensational news appeared in today\'s newspaper.
卫生纸就放在卫生间的盒子里，伸手就能拿到。
Wèishēngzhǐ jiù fàngzài wèishēngjiān de hézi lǐ，shēnshǒu jiùnéng nádào。
The toilet paper is in the case of the toilet, so you can easily reach it.
一定要买经过严格消毒的卫生纸才安全卫生。
Yídìng yào mǎi jīngguò yángé xiāodú de wèishēngzhǐ cái ānquán wèishēng。
Only sterilized sanitary towels are safe to use.
每次祭祀祖先时，祖父都会提前将香纸准备好。
Měi cì jìsì zǔxiān shí，zǔfù dōuhuì tíqián jiāng xiāngzhǐ zhǔnbèi hǎo。
My grandfather always prepares the joss sticks and candles in advance every time we go to make a sacrifice to our ancestors.
报纸头版头条刊登了这篇新闻述评。
Bàozhǐ tóubǎn tóutiáo kāndēng le zhèpiān xīnwén shùpíng。
This news review appears on the front page of the newspaper.
这些新闻纸都过期了。
Zhèxiē xīnwénzhǐ dōu guòqī le。
The newspapers are all out-dated.
根据报纸上的消息，凶嫌已经被抓捕归案了。
Gēnjù bàozhǐ shàng de xiāoxi，xiōngxián yǐjing bèi zhuābǔ guīàn le。
According to the news in the paper, the criminal suspect has been arrested.
她万万没想到丈夫递给她一纸修书。
Tā wànwàn méi xiǎngdào zhàngfū dìgěi tā yìzhǐ xiūshū。
It had never occurred to her that her husband would hand her a letter of divorce.
报纸选登了一批新新人类的文学作品，很有人气。
Bàozhǐ xuǎndēng le yìpī xīnxīnrénlèi de wénxué zuòpǐn，hěn yǒurénqì。
A series of  literary works by the X Generation have been published in the paper. They are quite popular.
现在已经不用羊皮纸书写文案了。
Xiànzài yǐjing búyòng yángpízhǐ shūxiě wénàn le。
Official documents are no longer written on lambskin.
如果有意见，可以写在纸上放进意见箱。
Rúguǒ yǒu yìjiàn，kěyǐ xiězài zhǐ shàng fàngjìn yìjiànxiāng。
If you have any suggestions, you can write them down on paper and put the paper into the suggestion box.
店里的印像纸快用完了，请你再去买一点。
Diàn lǐ de yìn xiàng zhǐ kuài yòngwán le，qǐng nǐ zài qù mǎi yìdiǎn。
The shop is running out of printing paper; please go and buy some!
邮递员每天上午9点的时候都会来送报纸。
Yóudìyuán měitiān shàngwǔ jiǔdiǎn de shíhou dōuhuì lái sòng bàozhǐ。
The mailman would come to deliver the newspaper every morning at 9.
这本书从头至尾都是用有光纸印刷而成的。
Zhèběnshū cóng tóu zhì wěi dōushì yòng yǒuguāngzhǐ yìnshuā érchéng de。
This whole book is printed with glazed paper.
专家发现这项工程对原纸的需求量很大。
Zhuānjiā fāxiàn zhè xiàng gōngchéng duì yuánzhǐ de xūqiúliàng hěndà。
Specialists have found that this project has a huge demand for raw paper.
全市的照相馆用的照相纸都是他们公司生产的。
Quánshì de zhào xiàng guǎn yòng de zhào xiàng zhǐ dōushì tāmen gōngsī shēngchǎn de。
All the photo studios in the city use the photographic paper produced by their company.
邻居爷爷因病逝世，门口摆放着花圈、纸马。
Línjū yéye yīnbìng shìshì，ménkǒu bǎifàng zhe huāquān、zhǐmǎ。
The elderly man living next door passed away because of illness, and there were wreathes and paper horses left at the door.
他喜欢在粗糙的纸面上写字。
Tā xǐhuan zài cūcāo de zhǐmiàn shàng xiězì。
He likes to write on rough papers.
不知这里刚刚发生了什么事，地上到处都是小纸片。
Bùzhī zhèlǐ gānggāng fāshēng le shénme shì，dìshàng dàochù dōushì xiǎozhǐpiàn。
I wonder what has happened here. There are small pieces of paper everywhere.
有的时候，他会把字写在纸条上传给我。
Yǒu de shíhou，tā huì bǎ zì xiězài zhǐtiáo shàng chuángěi wǒ。
Sometimes, he sends me paper slips with letters written on them.
这个纸箱将成为联欢会上的抽奖箱。
Zhège zhǐxiāng jiāng chéngwéi liánhuānhuì shàng de chōujiǎngxiāng。
This paper box will be used as the lottery box at the get-together.
这款玩具小熊的纸样非常新颖。
Zhè kuǎn wánjù xiǎoxióng de zhǐyàng fēicháng xīnyǐng。
The paper mould of this toy bear is very unique.
请大家拿出一张纸，默写化学元素周期表。
Qǐng dàjiā náchū yìzhāng zhǐ，mòxiě huàxué yuánsù zhōuqībiǎo。

我不要这些皱巴巴的废纸。
Wǒ búyào zhèxiē zhòubaba de fèizhǐ。
I don\'t want this crumpled waste paper.

My eyes are moist from seeing his memorial in the newspaper.
这张图纸显示的是那座大楼的侧视图。

张老师每天都到传达室去拿报纸。

Teacher Zhang goes to the reception office every day to get newspapers.

This brand of printing paper is fine, level, and of good quality.

This official newspaper enjoys a good reputation with all people.

People used parchment to wrap greasy food in ancient times.

Let me introduce the word hypertext to mean a body of written or pictorial material interconnected in such a complex way that it could not conveniently be presented or represented on paper.

这个机器集复印、打印、扫描和碎纸机功能为一体。
The most common way to transfer a pattern is to use carbon paper.
最常用的转印图案的方式是用复写纸。

to lay siege to
[police，soldiers+] 围攻

rénshēn gōngjī
personal attack

人身攻击
rénshēn gōngjī
personal attack
他们向敌人展开了狂风暴雨似的攻击。
Tāmen xiàng dírén zhǎnkāi le kuángfēngbàoyǔ shì de gōngjī。
They launched a furious whirlwind attack on the enemy.
攻击目标
ɡōnɡjī mùbiāo
target (or objective) of attack
牵制性攻击
qiānzhìxìnɡ ɡōnɡjī
diversionary attack
刺猬一受到攻击就蜷缩成一团。
Cìwei yí shòudào gōngjī jiù quánsuō chéng yìtuán。
A hedgehog rolls itself into a ball when attacked.
试探性攻击
shìtànxìng gōngjī
probing attack
肆无忌惮地攻击
sìwújìdàn de gōngjī
make unbridled attacks
翼侧攻击
yìcè gōngjī 
flank attack
影射攻击
yǐnɡshè ɡōnɡjī 
attack by innuendo
我们向敌人猛烈攻击，打得他们站不住脚。
Wǒmen xiàng dírén měngliè gōngjī，dǎ de tāmen zhàn bu zhùjiǎo。
We attacked the enemy so fiercely that they couldn\'t hold their ground.
阵地攻击(防御)
zhèndì gōngjī（fángyù）
positional attack (defence)
指名攻击
zhǐmínɡ ɡōnɡjī 
assail sb. by name
我所在的部队向敌阵发起了一波猛烈地攻击。
Wǒ suǒ zài de bùduì xiàng dízhèn fāqǐ le yìbō měngliè de gōngjī。
My army is launching a fierce attack on the enemy position.
这简直就是人身攻击，放毒箭。
Zhè jiǎnzhí jiùshì rénshēn gōngjī，fàng dújiàn。
It\'s personal attack, vicious slander.
在野外生一个火堆就不会有野兽来攻击你了。

这种鱼雷是专门用来攻击潜水艇的。

大肆攻击
dàsì gōngjī 
wantonly vilify; launch an unbridled (or all-out) attack against
点名攻击
diǎnmíng gōngjī 
attack sb. by name
恶毒攻击
èdú gōngjī
viciously attack
恶意攻击
èyì gōngjī
malicious attacks
发起反攻
fāqǐ fǎngōng
launch a counterattack
敌人已无力反攻。
Dírén yǐ wúlì fǎngōng。
The enemy hasn\'t the strength to counterattack.
发动猛烈的反攻
fādòng měngliè de fǎngōng
launch a fierce counterattack (on sb.)
由防御转入进攻
yóu fángyù zhuǎnrù jìngōng
go over from the defensive to the offensive
拂晓前发起总攻
fúxiǎo qián fāqǐ zǒnggōng
start the general offensive before dawn
攻城
gōng chéng
attack a city
攻入敌阵
gōngrù dízhèn
storm into the enemy position
全攻型选手
quángōngxíng xuǎnshǒu
an all-out attack player
攻打一座城市
gōngdǎ yízuò chéngshì
attack a city
刻苦攻读
kèkǔ gōngdú
study assiduously
攻读法律
gōngdú fǎlǜ 
study law
攻读博士学位
gōngdú bóshì xuéwèi
study for a doctorate
攻下这一关，其他问题就好办了。
Gōngxià zhè yì guān，qítā wèntí jiù hǎo bàn le。
Once this difficulty is overcome, other problems will be easy to solve.
发起总攻击
fāqǐ zǒnggōngjī
launch a general offensive
无端的攻击
wúduān de gōngjī
groundless charges
人身攻击
rénshēn gōngjī
personal attack
攻坚部队
gōngjiān bùduì
assault troops
攻克敌军据点
gōngkè díjūn jùdiǎn
capture an enemy stronghold
攻克技术难关
gōngkè jìshù nánguān
surmount (or overcome) a technical difficulty; solve a difficult technical problem
攻破敌军防线
gōngpò díjūn fángxiàn
break through (or penetrate) the enemy defence lines
这个堡垒是攻不破的。
Zhège bǎolěi shì gōng bú pò de。
This is an impregnable fortress.
攻取据点
gōngqǔ jùdiǎn
capture a stronghold
政治攻势
zhèngzhì gōngshì
political offensive
客队攻势凌厉。
Kèduì gōngshì línglì。
The visiting team maintained a powerful offensive.
攻丝机
gōngsījī
tapping machine
战无不胜，攻无不克
Zhànwúbúshèng，gōngwúbúkè。
take every objective one attacks and win every battle one fights
政策攻心
zhèngcè gōngxīn
try to win over or obtain a confession from a person by explaining the Party\'s policy
与其强攻，何如智取。
Yǔqí qiánggōng，hérú zhì qǔ。
It would be better to use strategy than to attack by force.
击退敌军几次进攻
jītuì díjūn jǐ cì jìngōng
repulse several enemy assaults
受到两面夹攻
shòudào liǎngmiàn jiāgōng
be under a pincer attack; be caught in a two-way squeeze
前后夹攻
qiánhòu jiāgōng
attack from the front and the rear simultaneously
内外夹攻
nèiwài jiāgōng
attack from both within and without
做好进攻准备
zuòhǎo jìngōngzhǔnbèi
get ready to take the offensive
发起全面进攻
fāqǐ quánmiàn jìngōng
launch an all-out offensive
打快攻
dǎ kuàigōng
use the strategy of quick attack
他们向敌人展开了狂风暴雨似的攻击。
Tāmen xiàng dírén zhǎnkāi le kuángfēngbàoyǔ shì de gōngjī。
They launched a furious whirlwind attack on the enemy.
联合进攻
liánhé jìngōng
launch a combined (or concerted) attack
攻势凌厉
ɡōnɡshì línɡlì 
a swift and fierce attack
攻击目标
ɡōnɡjī mùbiāo
target (or objective) of attack
造成内外夹攻的形势
zàochéngnèiwài jiágōng de xíngshì
form a pincer movement from inside and out
这个队能攻能守。
Zhège duì nénggōngnéngshǒu。
The team is good at both attack and defence.
他专攻历史，旁及考古。
Tā zhuānɡōnɡ lìshǐ, pánɡ jí kǎoɡǔ。
He is an historian, but also takes an interest in archaeology.
牵制性攻击
qiānzhìxìnɡ ɡōnɡjī
diversionary attack
钳形攻势
qiánxínɡ ɡōnɡshì
a pincer movement; a two-pronged offensive
强攻敌人阵地
qiánggōngdírén zhèndì
storm the enemy position
全面进攻
quánmiàn jìngōng
an all-out attack
刺猬一受到攻击就蜷缩成一团。
Cìwei yí shòudào gōngjī jiù quánsuō chéng yìtuán。
A hedgehog rolls itself into a ball when attacked.
我军攻势迅猛，锐不可当。
Wǒ jūn gōngshì xùnměng，ruìbùkědāng。
Our attack was so swift and violent that nothing could withstand it.
锐利的攻势
ruìlì de gōngshì
a spirited attack
他们为了攻克技术难关，可真是煞费苦心。
Tāmen wèi le gōngkè jì shù nánguān，kě zhēnshi shàfèi kǔxīn。
They took great pains to solve the technical problems.
试探性攻击
shìtànxìng gōngjī
probing attack
攻势已经衰弱。
Gōngshì yǐjing shuāiruò。
The offensive is losing momentum.
俟机进攻
sìjī jìngōng
wait for an opportunity to attack
肆无忌惮地攻击
sìwújìdàn de gōngjī
make unbridled attacks
总攻的时间提前了。
Zǒnggōng de shíjiān tíqián le。
The time for the general offensive has been moved up.
停止围攻
tínɡzhǐ wéiɡōnɡ 
abandon a siege
遭到围攻
zāodào wéiɡōnɡ 
come under attack from all sides; be caught in a cross fire
协力进攻
xiélì jìnɡōnɡ
launch a joint assault
以我之长，攻敌之短
yǐ wǒ zhī cháng，gōngdí zhī duǎn 
utilize our strong points to attack the enemy\'s weak points
从左右两翼夹攻敌人
cóngzuǒyòu liǎngyì jiāgōngdírén 
attack the enemy on both flanks
翼侧攻击
yìcè gōngjī 
flank attack
影射攻击
yǐnɡshè ɡōnɡjī 
attack by innuendo
展开攻势
zhǎnkāi ɡōnɡshì 
unfold an offen-sive
我们向敌人猛烈攻击，打得他们站不住脚。
Wǒmen xiàng dírén měngliè gōngjī，dǎ de tāmen zhàn bu zhùjiǎo。
We attacked the enemy so fiercely that they couldn\'t hold their ground.
阵地攻击(防御)
zhèndì gōngjī（fángyù）
positional attack (defence)
指名攻击
zhǐmínɡ ɡōnɡjī 
assail sb. by name
只可智取，不可强攻。
Zhǐ kě zhì qǔ，bùkě qiánggōng。
The only way to take the enemy position is by strategy, not by forceful attack.
助攻部队
zhùɡōnɡ bùduì

他专攻空间技术。
Tā zhuāngōngkōngjiān jìshù 
He specializes in space technology.
群起而攻之
qúnqǐ ér gōngzhī
all rise (or turn) against sb.
专攻
zhuāngōng
specialize in; do special research on
攻坚
gōngjiān
storm fortifications; assault fortified positions
战役性的进攻
zhànyìxìng de jìngōng
offensive campaign
正面进攻
zhèngmiàn jìngōng
frontal attack
终场前一分钟，主队又攻进一球。
zhōngchǎng qián yìfēnzhōng，zhǔduì yòu gōngjìn yìqiú。
The host team scored another goal just before the final whistle.
以子之矛，攻子之盾
yǐzǐzhīmáo，gōngzǐzhīdùn
set a person\'s own spear against his own shield —refute sb. with his own argument
八国联军在进攻北京之前，曾遭到清军和义和团的有力阻击。
Bāguóliánjūn zài jìngōng Běijīng zhīqián，céng zāodào qīngjūn hé yìhétuán de yǒulì zǔjī。
The Allied Forces of Eight Powers had to deal with rigorous resistence from the Qing government\'s army, and the Boxers before they took Beijing.
敌军攻入城池，展开了丧心病狂的屠杀。
Díjūn gōngrù chéngchí，zhǎnkāi le sàngxīnbìngkuáng de túshā。
The enemy attacked the city, and started killing people without provocation.
大军长缨所向，攻无不克。
Dàjūn chángyīng suǒ xiàng，gōngwú búkè。
The army conquered all the enemies with their powerful weapons.
敌兵已经攻过城壕了。
Díbīng yǐjing gōngguò chéngháo le。
The enemy has already captured the moat.
这次战斗胜利的关键在于我们很早就获知了敌方的进攻路线。
Zhècì zhàndòu shènglì de guānjiàn zàiyú wǒmen hěnzǎo jiù huòzhī le dífāng de jìngōng lùxiàn。
The key to our success in the fight was that we knew the enemy\'s attacking routes in advance.
我所在的部队向敌阵发起了一波猛烈地攻击。
Wǒ suǒ zài de bùduì xiàng dízhèn fāqǐ le yìbō měngliè de gōngjī。
My army is launching a fierce attack on the enemy position.
主攻手突然一个吊球，令对方猝不及防。
Zhǔgōngshǒu tūrán yígè diàoqiú，lìng duìfāng cùbùjífáng。
The ace spiker suddenly dropped a shot, and took the opponents by surprise.
起义的士兵攻占了冬宫。
Qǐyì de shìbīng gōngzhàn le dōnggōng。
Revolting soldiers attacked and occupied the Winter Palace.
这简直就是人身攻击，放毒箭。
Zhè jiǎnzhí jiùshì rénshēn gōngjī，fàng dújiàn。
It\'s personal attack, vicious slander.
比赛一开始，就出现了双方对攻的场面。
Bǐsài yì kāishǐ，jiù chūxiàn le shuāngfāng duìgōng de chǎngmiàn。
At the outset of the match, the two sides were both on the offensive.
由于意见不一致，谈判双方对攻了起来。
Yóuyú yìjiàn bùyízhì，tánpàn shuāngfāng duìgōng le qǐlai。
The two negotiating parties began to attack each other because they held completely different opinions.
战场上，他们再一次成功遏阻了敌军的围攻。
Zhànchǎng shàng，tāmen zài yícì chénggōng èzǔ le díjūn de wéigōng。
They successfully resisted the onslaught of the enemy.
赛场上一旦进攻乏力，那还怎么得分啊！
Sàichǎng shàng yídàn jìngōng fálì，nà hái zěnme défēn a！
If a team is incapable of launching an attack, how can it score in the game?
由于攻防转换速度太慢，我方失去一次得分的机会。
Yóuyú gōngfáng zhuǎnhuàn sùdù tài màn，wǒ fāng shīqù yícì défēn de jīhuì。
We lost a chance of scoring due to the slow switch between attacking and defending.
我们一定要把握好时机，打场漂亮的攻歼战。
Wǒmen yídìng yào bǎwò hǎo shíjī，dǎ chǎng piàoliàng de gōngjiānzhàn。
We must take this good opportunity to fight an excellent eradication battle.
他惯于对对手漫骂攻讦。
Tā guànyú duì duìshǒu mànmà gōngjié.
He often wildly abuses his opponents and exposes their past misdeeds.
只要攻擂成功，你就是新的擂主。
Zhǐyào gōnglèi chénggōng，nǐ jiùshì xīn de lèizhǔ。
As long as you win the challenge, you will be the new king of this arena.
战场上形势巨变，双方攻守易势。
Zhànchǎng shàng xíngshì jùbiàn，shuāngfāng gōngshǒu yìshì。
The situation of the battlefield has changed dramatically and it is easier to defend than to attack for both parties.
耳听得鼓角齐名，想必我们的军队已经开始进攻了。
Ĕrtīng de gǔjiǎo qímíng，xiǎngbì wǒmen de jūnduì yǐjing kāishǐ jìngōng le。
Having heard the battle drums and horns, it is certain that our troops have started their attack.
城楼上摆满了滚木，为的是防止敌军攻城。
Chénglóu shàng bǎimǎn le gǔnmù，wèi de shì fángzhǐ díjūn gōngchéng。
Battle logs are laid over the city gate tower in order to prevent enimies from attacking the city.
为了加强攻防，我军的后备军已经出发。
Wèile jiāqiáng gōngfáng，wǒ jūn de hòubèijūn yǐjing chūfā。
In order to strengthen the attack and defense, our reserves have already started out.
我们只有选择会攻，才能取得胜利。
Wǒmen zhǐyǒu xuǎnzé huìgōng，cáinéng qǔdé shènglì。
Only when we launch a joint attack can we achieve success.
在野外生一个火堆就不会有野兽来攻击你了。
Zài yěwài shēng yígè huǒduī jiù búhuì yǒu yěshòu lái gōngjī nǐ le。
A bonfire in the wilderness can help you keep beasts away.
我军先锋击溃了敌军的一次次进攻。
Wǒ jūn xiānfēng jīkuì le díjūn de yícìcì jìngōng。
Our pioneers crushed the enemy\'s attacks time and again.
面对敌人的进攻，将军已计穷智短，无能为力。
Miànduì dírén de jìngōng，jiāngjūn yǐ jìqióng zhìduǎn，wúnéng wéilì。
The general had exhausted all his means and could do nothing to hold back the enemy\'s attack.
我军吹响了反攻的进军号。
Wǒ jūn chuīxiǎng le fǎngōng de jìnjūnhào。
The signal for our army to advance sounded.
敌人在我军的猛烈攻势下终于就歼。
Dírén zài wǒ jūn de měngliè gōngshì xià zhōng yú jiù jiān。
The enemies were finally eliminated after being faced with our army\'s fierce attacks.
那道峻岭就像天然的险关，曾经成功阻止过敌人的进攻。
Nà dào jùnlǐng jiù xiàng tiānrán de xiǎnguān，céngjīng chénggōng zǔzhǐ guò dírén de jìngōng。
That high and steep mountain is like a natural defense and has successfully hindered the enemy attacks.
擂主的实力很强，估计攻擂者要无功而返了。
Lèizhǔ de shílì hěnqiáng，gūjì gōnglèizhě yào wúgōng ér fǎn le。
The challenged is very powerful. I am afraid the challenger will end in vain.
酒后驾车害人害己，对于这种违法行为我们应当鸣鼓而攻之！
Jiǔhòu jiàchē hàirén hàijǐ，duìyú zhèzhǒng wéifǎ xíngwéi wǒmen yīngdāng mínggǔ ér gōngzhī！
The Drunk-driver bites others while getting bitten himsel.  We should make a scathing indictment of the unlawful action.
这种鱼雷是专门用来攻击潜水艇的。
Zhèzhǒng yúléi shì zhuānmén yònglái gōngjī qiánshuǐtǐng de。
The fish torpedo is specially used to attack submarines.
篮球比赛中他多次抢断对方的快速进攻。
Lánqiú bǐsài zhōng tā duōcì qiǎngduàn duìfāng de kuàisù jìngōng。
He intercepted the opposing team\'s fast breaks many times in the basketball match.
由于我们利用了最佳的时间抢攻，才赢得了这场战役。
Yóuyú wǒmen lìyòng le zuì jiā de shíjiān qiǎnggōng，cái yíngdé le zhèchǎng zhànyì。
It was because we sped up the attack at the right time that we won the battle.
她从小学唱京剧，专攻青衣行当。
Tā cóng xiǎo xué chàng jīngjù，zhuāngōng qīngyī jángdàng。
She has learned Beijing opera since her childhood, specializing in qingyi.
这个阵地的守将英勇无比，要想攻克，很不容易。
Zhège zhèndì de shǒujiàng yīngyǒng wúbǐ，yào xiǎng gōngkè，hěnbùróngyì。
The garrison general in this position is matchlessly valiant, it will be very difficult to conquer it.
司令部发出命令，各路大军一起开始总攻。
Sīlìngbùfāchū mìnglìng，gè lù dàjūn yìqǐ kāishǐ zǒnggōng。
The headquarters ordered that all the armies carry out a general attack together.
司令官下了命令，凌晨发起总攻。
Sīlìngguān xià le mìnglìng，língchén fāqǐ zǒnggōng。
The commander ordered that we make a general attack before dawn.
他以泰山压顶之势向我攻来，打得我措手不及。
Tā yǐ tàishān yādǐng zhī shì xiàng wǒ gōnglái，dǎ de wǒ cuòshǒu bùjí。
He came at me with full force, so I was caught unprepared.
这只股票盘中放出天量，发力上攻。
Zhèzhī gǔpiào pán zhōng fàngchū tiānliàng，fālì shànggōng。
This share has seen great trading volume and is now rising in value at a fantastic speed.
对方的后方防线较弱，是我们进攻的一个突破口。
Duìfāng de hòufāng fángxiàn jiàoruò，shì wǒmen jìngōng de yígè tūpòkǒu。
Our opponent\'s defensive line is comparatively loose at the back, so it is a point of attack in our offensive.
敌军攻破城池后，屠城三日。
Díjūn gōngpò chéngchí hòu,túchéng sān rì.
After conquering the city, the enemy went on a massacre of the residents for three days.
危城因为有很高的城墙，一般比较难攻。
Wēichéng yīnwèi yǒu hěngāo de chéngqiáng，yìbān bǐjiào nángōng。
Cities with high walls are often hard to conquer.
经过浴血奋战，我军终于攻占了这块险地。
Jīngguò yùxuè fènzhàn，wǒ jūn zhōng yú gōngzhàn le zhèkuài xiǎndì。
Our army finally took the dangerous area after bloody struggles.
他们正在攻打一座险固的城堡。
Tāmen zhèngzài gōngdǎ yízuò xiǎngù de chéngbǎo。
They are attacking a strategic and secure castle.
侵略者遭到了当地乡勇的攻击。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le dàngdì xiāngyǒng de gōngjī。
The invaders are attacked by local military groups.
在审讯人员强大的攻势下，嫌疑犯终于详述了实情。
Zài shěnxùn rényuán qiángdà de gōngshì xià，xiányífàn zhōng yú xiángshù le shíqíng。
The suspect finally confessed the details, faced with the attack of the interrogator.
你这是邪火攻心，需要服点降火的药。
Nǐ zhè shì xiéhuǒ gōngxīn，xūyào fú diǎn jiànghuǒ de yào。
You are suffering from excessive internal heat and need some medicine to treat it.
信号枪响了，咱们该发动进攻了。
Xìnhàoqiāng xiǎng le，zánmen gāi fādòng jìngōng le。
The signal pistol has been fired. It\'s time to launch our attack.
秦国兴兵攻打赵国。
Qínguó xīngbīng gōngdǎ Zhàoguó。
The State of Qin  launched an attack on the State of Zhao.
这里地势形胜，易守难攻，是个兵家必争之地。
Zhèlǐ dìshì xíngshèng，yìshǒu nángōng，shì gè bīngjiā bìzhēng zhī dì。
It is a crucial battle field wanted by both parties due to its advantageous geographic location, making the place easy to defend and difficult to attack.
经过七天苦战，义军终于攻下京城。
Jīngguò qī tiān kǔzhàn，yìjūn zhōng yú gōngxià jīngchéng。
After fighting for seven days, the righteous army finally captured the capital of the country.
我军用计诱使敌人攻打我们布置了埋伏的小镇。
Wǒ jūn yòng jì yòushǐ dírén gōngdǎ wǒmen bùzhì le máifú de xiǎozhèn。
We used strategy to seduce the enemy into attacking the small town that we had ambushed.
情况有变，你们可不能贸贸然发起进攻。
Qíngkuàng yǒu biàn，nǐmen kě bùnéng màomàorán fāqǐ jìngōng。
There are some changes in the present situation; you should act hastily.
张萍是天津女排的主攻手。
Zhāng Píng shì Tiānjīn nǚpái de zhǔgōngshǒu。
Zhangpin is the main attacker for the Tianjin volleyball team.
打击走私是一场攻坚战。
Dǎjī zǒusī shì yìcháng gōngjiānzhàn。

We should ensure a sufficient supply of meat during the festival.

Běn zhāng zuìhòu bùfen jiǎnyào zǒngjiéle shíròu dòngwù。
本章最后部分简要总结了食肉动物。
Terrestrial carnivores have four or five clawed digits on each limb.
Lùqī shíròu dòngwù de qiánhòuzhī shàng dōu cháng yǒu sì gè huò wǔgè dàizhuǎ de zúzhǐ。
陆栖食肉动物的前后肢上都长有四个或五个带爪的足趾。

Jùshuō húli shì yì zhǒng ròushí dòngwù，huì bǔshā yánggāo hé zìyóu fàngmùchǎng de jī，suǒyǐ bìxū yào kòngzhì。
据说狐狸是一种肉食动物，会捕杀羊羔和自由放牧场的鸡，所以必须要控制。
Tyrannosaurus rex was a large carnivore.
Bàwánglóng shì yì zhǒng dàxíng ròushídòngwù。
霸王龙是一种大型肉食动物。
Vultures usually feed on carrion or roadkill.
Wùjiù tōngcháng yǐ fǔròu hé gōnglù shàng de sǐshāng dòngwù wéi shí。
兀鹫通常以腐肉和公路上的死伤动物为食。

Carnivorous plants are capable of trapping and digesting small animals especially insects.
Shíròuxìng zhíwù nénggòu bǔhuò yóuqí shì kūnchóng zhèyàng de xiǎo dòngwù bìng xiāohuà tāmen。

Bǎ zhèxiēròu cúnzhù zài bīngxiāng lǐ ba。
Please store the meat in the fridge.
冬天，北方很多地区的人喜欢吃大肉炖酸菜。
Dōngtiān，běifāng hěnduō dìqū de rén xǐhuan chī dàròudùnsuāncài。
In North China during the winter many people eat pickle vegetables, and pork stew.
正所谓“人为刀俎，我为鱼肉”，现在只能任人摆布了。
Zhèng suǒwèi“rén wéi dāozǔ，wǒ wéi yúròu”，xiànzài zhǐnéng rèn rén bǎibù le。
Just as a Chinese saying goes, &quot;being meat or fish on another\'s chopping board&quot;, I am now at others\' mercy.
一家人围着电火锅吃涮羊肉。
Yì jiā rén wéi zhe diànhuǒguō chī shuànyángròu。
The family are eating instant-boiled mutton around an electric dish.
把冻肉化开吧，我准备炒菜了。
Bǎ dòngròu huàkāi ba，wǒ zhǔnbèi chǎocài le。
Please defrost the frozen meat for me, I am going to cook it.
二恶英污染奶粉肉类等食品的事件令人心惊。
Èr\'èyīng wūrǎn nǎifěn ròulèi děng shípǐn de shìjiàn lìngrén xīnjīng。
The reports on the contaminated milk powder and meat are really appalling.
最近他肉吃多了，胃里发腻。
Zuìjìn tā ròu chī duō le，wèi lǐ fānì。
He has had too much meat recently and feels kind of fed up with it.
小明特别馋，一看见肉就两眼放光。
Xiǎo Míng tèbié chán，yí kànjiàn ròu jiù liǎng yǎn fàngguāng。
Xiao Ming is greedy, his eyes will glow whenever he sees meat.
她要减肥，所以拒绝吃肥肉。
Tā yào jiǎnféi，suǒyǐ jùjué chī féiròu。
She wants to lose weight, so she refuses to eat fat.
他们把这个工程项目当做肥肉，争相抢夺。
Tāmen bǎ zhège gōngchéng xiàng mù dàngzuò féiròu，zhēngxiāng qiǎngduó。
They regard this project as a piece of fat meat and fight over it.
“荷叶粉蒸肉”是一道杭州名菜。
“Héyèfěnzhēngròu”shì yídào Hángzhōu míngcài。
One of the famous dishes in Hangzhou is pork steamed with ground rice flour wrapped in lotus leaves.
这把钢刀真是锋快，用它切肉一点都不费力。
Zhèbǎ gāngdāo zhēnshì fēngkuài，yòng tā qiēròu yìdiǎn dōu bú fèilì。
This steel knife is so sharp that you can cut meat with it effortlessly.
仰卧起坐是锻炼腹部肌肉的有效办法。
Yǎngwò qǐzuò shì duànliàn fùbùjīròu de yǒuxiào bànfǎ。
Doing sit-ups is an effective way to exercise abdominal muscles.
我喜欢吃京酱肉丝盖饭。
Wǒ xǐhuan chī jīngjiàngròusī gàifàn。
I like to eat sauted shredded pork with sweet-bean sauce on rice.
我们用高压锅炖肉吃吧。
Wǒmen yòng gāoyāguō dùnròu chī ba。
Let\'s stew pork with the pressure cooker.
把这些肉割切成片。
Bǎ zhèxiēròu gēqiē chéngpiàn。
Chop this meat into pieces.
这次你必须割肉，否则事情无法解决。
Zhècì nǐ bìxū gēròu，fǒuzé shìqing wúfǎ jiějué。
You have to give way this time, otherwise the problem will not be solved.
狐狸的眼睛骨碌碌地转着，想着怎么得到乌鸦嘴里的那块肉。
Húli de yǎnjīng gǔlùlù de zhuàn zhe，xiǎng zhe zěnme dédào wūyā zuǐ lǐ de nà kuài ròu。
With eyeballs rolling, the fox is thinking about how to get the piece of meat from the crow\'s mouth.
挂羊头卖狗肉是那些奸商常用的伎俩。
Guà yángtóu mài gǒuròu shì nàxiē jiānshāng chángyòng de jìliǎng。
Palming off goods inferior to what they purport to be is a common trick of unscrupulous merchants.
他总是光膀子给我们显示他发达的肌肉。
Tā zǒngshì guāngbǎngzi gěi wǒmen xiǎnshì tā fādá de jīròu。
He always strips to the waist to show us his well-developed muscles.
海蛎子的肉鲜嫩可口。
Hǎilìzi de ròu xiānnèn kěkǒu。
The oyster tastes fresh and tender.
蚝豉虽然是肉干，但味道很鲜美。
Háogǔ suīrán shì ròugān，dàn wèidào hěnxiānměi。
Though fermented oyster is dried meat, it is still quite delicious.
我们用肉眼是看不到河外星系的。
Wǒmen yòng ròuyǎn shì kànbúdào héwài xīngxì de。
Extragalactic nebula is invisible to the naked eye.
他喜欢吃猴头菌炒肉片，每次回家都吵着要吃。
Tā xǐhuan chī hóutóujūn chǎo ròupiàn，měi cì huíjiā dōu chǎo zhe yào chī。
He likes meat stir-fried with monkey-head-shaped mushrooms.  Every time he goes home, he will ask for it.
他烧得一手好菜，最拿手的是回锅肉。
Tā shāo de yì shǒu hǎocài，zuì náshǒu de shì huíguōròu。
He is very skilled cook, and he is most adept in cooking double-fried pork.
回回不吃猪肉，这是他们的习俗。
Huíhuí bùchī zhūròu，zhè shì tāmen de xísú。
The Hui people\'s religious conventions prevent them from eating pork.
炒鸡丁的时候炒得太久，肉会不嫩的。
Chǎojīdīng de shíhou chǎo de tài jiǔ，ròu huì búnèn de。
If you stir-fry the small cubes of chicken for too long, the meat won\'t stay tender.
因为经常坐在电脑前工作，我们肩胛附近的肌肉已经损伤。
Yīnwéi jīngcháng zuòzài diànnǎo qián gōngzuò，wǒmen jiānjiǎ fùjìn de jīròu yǐjing sǔnshāng。
Due to heavy work load in front of the computer, I\'ve hurt a muscle near the scapula.
昨天运动时我不小心拉伤了肩窝的肌肉。
Zuótiān yùndòng shí wǒ bùxiǎoxīn lāshāng le jiānwō de jīròu。
I strained a muscle in the shallow part of my shoulder yesterday when I was doing sports.
这些烤得焦煳了的肉就别吃了。
Zhèxiē kǎo de jiāohú le de ròu jiù biéchī le。
Don\'t eat this roast, charred meat.
这位老人的肌肉很紧实，一点也不像老年人。
Zhèwèi lǎorén de jīròu hěnjǐnshí，yìdiǎn yě bú xiàng lǎoniánrén。
This old man has very strong muscles and doesn\'t look old at all.
这碟酱牛肉可以就饭吃。
Zhè dié jiàngniúròu kěyǐ jiù fàn chī。
This plate of soysauce beef can be eaten with rice.
小狗总想把一个滚落在沙发底下的肉骨头抠搜出来。
Xiǎogǒu zǒng xiǎng bǎ yígè gǔnluò zài shāfā dǐxià de ròugǔtou kōusōu chūlái。
Dogs can always search out a bone out which rolls under the sofa.
这一捆子柴火拿到集上能换回半斤肉呢！
Zhè yì kǔnzi cháihuo nádào jí shàng néng huànhuí bàn jīn ròu ne！
This bale of firewood can be sold on the market and is worth half a kilo of meat.
总吃大鱼大肉不如吃些像莲花白这样的蔬菜对身体有益。
Zǒngchī dàyú dàròu bùrú chī xiē xiàng liánhuābái zhèyàng de shūcài duì shēntǐ yǒuyì。
It is helpful for your health to eat vegetables such as brocoli rather than meat, and fish.
依我的口味，吃羊肉莫若吃烤鸭！
Yī wǒ de kǒuwèi，chī yángròu mòruò chī kǎoyā！
In my opinion, I prefer to eat roast duck rather than mutton.
她喜欢吃木樨肉，每次在餐馆吃饭，总点这个菜。
Tā xǐhuan chī mùxīròu，měi cì zài cānguǎn chīfàn，zǒng diǎn zhège cài。
She likes scrambled eggs. Every time she goes to a restaurant, she will order this dish.
肉店里囊揣的价格当然比排骨便宜。
Ròudiàn lǐ nángchuāi de jiàgé dāngrán bǐ páigǔ piányí。
The price of fat in the shambles is of course cheaper than ribs.
医生说她有内火，不宜多吃羊肉等热性食物。
Yīshēng shuō tā yǒu nèihuǒ，bùyí duōchī yángròu děng rèxìng shíwù。
The doctor said that she had an inner fire and shouldn\'t eat too much hot food like mutton.
他只是受了些皮肉伤，并没有伤到骨头。
Tā zhǐshì shòu le xiē píròushāng，bìng méiyǒu shāngdào gǔtou。
He received only some bruises, his bones haven\'t been damaged.
我军和敌军在城市里展开了肉搏战。
Wǒ jūn hé díjūn zài chéngshì lǐ zhǎnkāi le ròubózhàn。
Our troops were engaged in hand-to-hand battle with the enemy in the city.
这是我厂新出品的肉冻儿，请您品尝。
Zhè shì wǒ chǎng xīn chūpǐn de ròudòngr，qǐng nín pǐncháng。
Pork skin jelly is our company\'s new product. Please try it.
我们老家生产的这种肉脯非常好吃。
Wǒmen lǎojiā shēngchǎn de zhèzhǒng ròupú fēicháng hǎochī。
This kind of preserved meat, which is made in my hometown, is delicious.
这种水果罐头是由肉果加工制成的。
Zhèzhǒng shuǐguǒ guàntou shì yóu ròuguǒ jiāgōng zhìchéng de。
The can of fruit was made from processed fruit pulp.
这孩子长了一个肉乎乎的小圆脸。
Zhè háizi zhǎng le yígè ròuhūhū de xiǎoyuánliǎn。
The baby has a small, round, fleshy face.
节日期间一定要保证肉类食品的充足供应。
Jiérì qījiān yídìng yào bǎozhèng ròulèi shípǐn de chōngzú gōngyìng。
We should ensure a sufficient supply of meat during the festival.
请给我的面条里多加些肉末。

Please put more minced meat into my noodle soup.
这道菜是用肉泥配以青菜制成的。
Zhè dào cài shì yòng ròuní pèiyǐ qīngcài zhìchéng de。
The dish is made of ground meat mixed with vegetables.
这家火锅店选用的都是内蒙古的上等羊肉片儿。
Zhèjiā huǒguōdiàn xuǎnyòng de dōushì Nèiménggǔ de shàngděng yángròupiànr。
This hotpot shop uses superior quality sliced beef from the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
我们解救人质时一定要谨慎，以确保肉票安全！
Wǒmen jiějiù rénzhì shí yídìng yào jǐnshèn，yǐ quèbǎo ròupiào ānquán！
We should be careful when we rescue hostages so as to ensure their safety.
我家巷子口新开了一家肉铺。
Wǒjiā xiàng zikǒu xīnkāi le yìjiā ròupù。
A new meat shop has opened in the entrance to our lane.
我最爱吃肉馅儿包子。
Wǒ zuì ài chī ròuxiànr bāozi。
I love to eat steamed buns with minced meat stuffing.
这家养鸡场饲养了大约2000只肉用鸡。
Zhèjiā yǎngjīchǎng sìyǎng le dàyuē liǎngqiānzhī ròuyòngjī。
The chicken farm has raised about 2,000 broilers.
这种植物有肉质根茎。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù yǒu ròuzhì gēnjìng。
The plant has a succulent rhizome.
肉孜节是伊斯兰教盛大的民族节日。
Ròuzījié shì yīsīlánjiào shèngdà de mínzú jiérì。
The Rozah Festival is an important festival for Muslims.
用什么办法可以去除羊肉中的膻味呢？
Yòng shénme bànfǎ kěyǐ qùchú yángròu zhōng de shānwèi ne ？
How can the smell of mutton be eliminated?
我午饭吃了十个肉馅的烧卖。
Wǒ wǔfàn chī le shí gè ròuxiàn de shāomai。
I ate ten shaomei with meat stuffing for lunch.
每次吃火锅都是她为我们几个涮肉，可见她很会照顾朋友。
Měi cì chī huǒguō dōushì tā wèi wǒmen jǐgè shuànròu，kějiàn tā hěnhuì zhàogù péngyou。
She boils meat for us every time we have eat hot pot, so it can be seen that she is good at taking care of friends.
这些鱼肉酸败了，发出很难闻的气味。
Zhèxiē yúròu suānbài le，fāchū hěnnánwén de qìwèi。
The fish has gone bad, and smells terrible.
爸爸特别爱吃蒜毫炒肉。
Bàba tèbié àichī suànháochǎoròu。
Dad particularly likes eating pork, stir-fried with young garlic.
做红烧肉时一定要炒糖色。
Zuò hóngshāoròu shí yídìng yào chǎo tángsè。
When cooking braised pork with soy sauce, it\'s better to add some sugar.
烤羊肉时加入一些辣椒面可以提味儿。
Kǎoyángròu shí jiārù yìxiē làjiāomiàn kěyǐ tíwèir。
Put some powdered spices onto the roasted mutton and it will make the mutton taste better.
运动员们正在锻炼，以便加强腿部肌肉的力量。
Yùndòngyuánmen zhèngzài duànliàn，yǐ biàn jiāqiáng tuǐbùjīròu de lìliang。
The sportsmen are exercising to improve the strength of the muscles on their legs.
婴儿们细皮嫩肉的样子真是惹人喜爱。
Yīngérmen xìpí nènròu de yàngzi zhēnshì rěrén xǐ\'ài。
Babies with their delicate skins are very lovely.
菜场新开了一家专卖冷鲜肉的店铺。
Càichǎng xīnkāi le yìjiā zhuānmài lěngxiānròu de diànpù。
A fresh meat store recently opened in the food market.
他早就把那盆洗肉的血水倒了。
Tā zǎo jiù bǎ nà pén xǐròu de xuèshuǐ dào le。
He poured out the water which was used to wash the meat.
这道菜是阉猪肉做的，你尝尝鲜。
Zhè dào cài shì yānzhūròu zuò de，nǐ chángcháng xiān。
This dish is made of hog meat, have a try!
腌肉的味道不错，就是对身体不好，最好少吃点。
Yānròu de wèidào búcuò，jiùshì duì shēntǐ bùhǎo，zuìhǎo shǎochī diǎn。
Preserved meat tastes good but it is bad for health, you\'d better eat less.
路边有很多卖烤羊肉串的人。
Lùbiān yǒu hěnduō mài kǎo yángròuchuàn de rén。
There are many people who sell pieces of roast mutton on a skewer by the roadside.
昨天我吃了新鲜的椰肉，味道很特别呢。
Zuótiān wǒ chī le xīnxiān de yēròu，wèidào hěn tèbié ne。
I ate some fresh coconut kernel yesterday, it had a special taste.
在地球上，仅通过肉眼是看不到宇宙空间的。
Zài dìqiúshàng，jǐn tōngguò ròuyǎn shì kànbúdào yǔzhòu kōngjiān de。
On  earth, people can\'t see outerspace with their bare eyes.
烤肉用的支子不见了。
Kǎoròu yòng de zhīzi bújiàn le。
The BBQ grate is missing.
黝黑的皮肤，健壮的肌肉是饰演庄稼汉的必备条件。
Yǒuhēi de pífū，jiànzhuàng de jīròu shì shìyǎn zhuāngjiàhàn de bìbèi tiáojiàn。
Dark skin and strong muscles are indispensable to farmers.
他最拿手的一道菜就是子姜炒肉丝。
Tā zuì náshǒu de yídào cài jiùshì zǐjiāng chǎo ròusī。
The dish that he cooks best is tender ginger stir fried with meat slices.
我店出售的牛肉丸绝对符合食品卫生标准。

The meatballs sold by our store are up to the food health standards.
肉眼看不见的微观世界其实也是多姿多彩的。
Ròuyǎn kàn bújiàn de wēiguān shìjiè qíshí yěshì duōzī duōcǎi de。
The microscopic world invisible to the naked eye is actually very colorful.
我们的肉眼是看不到植物的细胞壁的。
Wǒmen de ròuyǎn shì kànbúdào zhíwù de xìbāobì de。
We can not see the cell wall with our naked eye.
牛肉的香味使我馋涎欲滴。
Niúròude xiāngwèi shǐ wǒ chánxiányùdī。
