Scoop out the flesh of the pineapple halves, taking great care not to cut through the skin.
Yǎochū bōluó guǒròu shí，zhùyì búyào yǎo pò bōluó ké。
舀出菠萝果肉时，注意不要舀破菠萝壳。
Eat pulp straight from the fruit.
Zhíjiē chī shuǐguǒ de guǒròu。
直接吃水果的果肉。
He only eats the flesh of a peach.
Tā zhǐ chī táo de guǒròu bùfen。
他只吃桃的果肉部分。
Peach and plum seeds embedded in a sweet edible pulp.
Táozi hé lǐzǐ de zhǒngzi dōu nèihán zài tiánměi kě shíyòng de guǒròu zhōng。
桃子和李子的种子都内含在甜美可食用的果肉中。
The meals were simple and such foods as meat and fruit were rarely on the table.
Huǒshí hěn jiǎndān，jīhū méiyǒu shuǐguǒ hé ròu zhèyàng de shíwù。
伙食很简单，几乎没有水果和肉这样的食物。
Warts and polyps can vegetate if not removed.
Yóu hé xīròu rúguǒ bù qiēchú de huà jiāng huì bùtíng de shēngzhǎng。
疣和息肉如果不切除的话将会不停地生长。
Your muscles will firm when you exercise regularly.
Rúguǒ nǐ jīngcháng duànliàn，nǐ de jīròu jiùhuì jiēshi。
如果你经常锻炼，你的肌肉就会结实。
If you eat a bun or a cake you won\'t eat your chicken.
Rúguǒ nǐ chīle yí kuài xiǎomiànbāo huòzhě yí kuài dàngāo，nǐ jiù chī bú xià jīròu le。
如果你吃了一块小面包或者一块蛋糕，你就吃不下鸡肉了。
他爱吃肉，但只吃瘦肉。
Tā ài chī ròu，dàn zhǐ chī shòuròu。
He likes eating meat, but only lean meat.
净吃肉不行。
Jìng chī ròu bùxíng。
It\'s not good to eat only meat.
她不吃肉。
Tā bù chī ròu。
She does not eat meat.
我最爱吃肉馅儿包子。
Wǒ zuì ài chī ròuxiànr bāozi。
I love to eat steamed buns with minced meat stuffing.
依我的口味，吃羊肉莫若吃烤鸭！
Yī wǒ de kǒuwèi，chī yángròu mòruò chī kǎoyā！
In my opinion, I prefer to eat roast duck rather than mutton.
肉食比素食耐饥，你就先吃些肉食吧。
Ròushí bǐ sùshí nàijī，nǐ jiù xiān chī xiē ròushí ba。
Meat is more hunger-resistant than vegetables. Take some meat first.
我哪儿知道他不吃牛肉。
Wǒ nǎr zhīdào tā bùchī niúròu。
How was I to know he didn\'t eat beef?
冬天，北方很多地区的人喜欢吃大肉炖酸菜。
Dōngtiān，běifāng hěnduō dìqū de rén xǐhuan chī dàròudùnsuāncài。
In North China during the winter many people eat pickle vegetables, and pork stew.
她要减肥，所以拒绝吃肥肉。
Tā yào jiǎnféi，suǒyǐ jùjué chī féiròu。
She wants to lose weight, so she refuses to eat fat.
回回不吃猪肉，这是他们的习俗。
Huíhuí bùchī zhūròu，zhè shì tāmen de xísú。
The Hui people\'s religious conventions prevent them from eating pork.
医生说她有内火，不宜多吃羊肉等热性食物。
Yīshēng shuō tā yǒu nèihuǒ，bùyí duōchī yángròu děng rèxìng shíwù。
The doctor said that she had an inner fire and shouldn\'t eat too much hot food like mutton.
过去新鲜的猪肉吃不完，妈妈就腌肉保鲜。
Guòqù xīnxiān de zhūròu chībùwán，māma jiù yānròu bǎoxiān。
Last year my mother preserved the meat that we had left.
她喜欢吃木樨肉，每次在餐馆吃饭，总点这个菜。
Tā xǐhuan chī mùxīròu，měi cì zài cānguǎn chīfàn，zǒng diǎn zhège cài。
She likes scrambled eggs. Every time she goes to a restaurant, she will order this dish.
总吃大鱼大肉不如吃些像莲花白这样的蔬菜对身体有益。
Zǒngchī dàyú dàròu bùrú chī xiē xiàng liánhuābái zhèyàng de shūcài duì shēntǐ yǒuyì。
It is helpful for your health to eat vegetables such as brocoli rather than meat, and fish.
一家人围着电火锅吃涮羊肉。
Yì jiā rén wéi zhe diànhuǒguō chī shuànyángròu。
The family are eating instant-boiled mutton around an electric dish.
最近他肉吃多了，胃里发腻。
Zuìjìn tā ròu chī duō le，wèi lǐ fānì。
He has had too much meat recently and feels kind of fed up with it.
我喜欢吃京酱肉丝盖饭。
Wǒ xǐhuan chī jīngjiàngròusī gàifàn。
I like to eat sauted shredded pork with sweet-bean sauce on rice.
我们用高压锅炖肉吃吧。
Wǒmen yòng gāoyāguō dùnròu chī ba。
Let\'s stew pork with the pressure cooker.
他喜欢吃用牛肉制成的肉枣。
Tā xǐhuan chī yòng niúròu zhìchéng de ròuzǎo。
He likes to eat  beef cooked in the shape of jujubes.
他喜欢吃猴头菌炒肉片，每次回家都吵着要吃。
Tā xǐhuan chī hóutóujūn chǎo ròupiàn，měi cì huíjiā dōu chǎo zhe yào chī。
He likes meat stir-fried with monkey-head-shaped mushrooms.  Every time he goes home, he will ask for it.
我午饭吃了十个肉馅的烧卖。
Wǒ wǔfàn chī le shí gè ròuxiàn de shāomai。
I ate ten shaomei with meat stuffing for lunch.
爸爸特别爱吃蒜毫炒肉。
Bàba tèbié àichī suànháochǎoròu。
Dad particularly likes eating pork, stir-fried with young garlic.
许多动物的肉可以吃。
Xǔduō dòngwù de ròu kěyǐ chī。
The flesh of many animals is eatable.
老太太吃素，从不碰肉食。
Lǎotàitai chīsù，cóng bú pèng ròushí。
The old lady is a vegetarian and never touches meat.
这些烤得焦煳了的肉就别吃了。
Zhèxiē kǎo de jiāohú le de ròu jiù biéchī le。
Don\'t eat this roast, charred meat.
我最腻味肥肉，从来不吃。
Wǒ zuì nìwèi féiròu, cónɡlái bù chī。
I hate fatty pork and never eat any.
鸡翅子上的肉我最爱吃。
Jīchìzi shàng de ròu wǒ zuì àichī。
Chicken wing meat is my favorite.
这块猪肉肥瘦儿正合适，做红烧肉肯定好吃。
Zhèkuài zhūròu féishòur zhèng héshì，zuò hóngshāoròu kěndìng hǎochī。
This piece of pork is neither too lean nor too fat and can be braised in brown sauce to make a delicious dish.
昨天我吃了新鲜的椰肉，味道很特别呢。
Zuótiān wǒ chī le xīnxiān de yēròu，wèidào hěn tèbié ne。
I ate some fresh coconut kernel yesterday, it had a special taste.
这碟酱牛肉可以就饭吃。
Zhè dié jiàngniúròu kěyǐ jiù fàn chī。
This plate of soysauce beef can be eaten with rice.
我们老家生产的这种肉脯非常好吃。
Wǒmen lǎojiā shēngchǎn de zhèzhǒng ròupú fēicháng hǎochī。
This kind of preserved meat, which is made in my hometown, is delicious.
剩下的肉可以腌一下以后吃。
Shèngxià de ròu kěyǐ yān yíxià yǐhòu chī。
The rest of the meat can be salted down for later use.
每次吃火锅都是她为我们几个涮肉，可见她很会照顾朋友。

腌肉的味道不错，就是对身体不好，最好少吃点。

吃肉吃伤了

因为害怕口蹄疫，许多人不再吃肉而开始吃鱼。
I don\'t eat meat and Sam doesn\'t either.
我不吃肉，山姆也不吃。

For people who chose not to eat meat there are many alternatives.

我要尝试就着烤土豆吃牛肉。
Chicken will make you grow into a big strong boy.

I\'ve had plenty of beef for now.
现在我吃的牛肉已经够多了。

素食主义者不吃任何肉类。

I usually eat barbeque pork on the weekends.

我周末通常吃烤猪肉。
He will restrict his consumption of red meat to just two helpings a week.

他将把吃红色肉类的次数限制在每周两份。
They sat around the campfire eating jerk beef and talking about their day.
Tāmen wéizhe gōuhuǒ chīzhe niúròugān bìng tánlùnzhe tāmen zhè yìtiān de shēnghuó。
他们围着篝火吃着牛肉干并谈论着他们这一天的生活。
This dog doesn\'t eat certain kinds of meat.
Zhè zhī gǒu bù chī mǒuxiē ròu。
这只狗不吃某些肉。

就在几天前，我们在那家土尔其餐馆吃了羊肩肉。

你的生活怎么能离开牛肉那么好吃的东西呢？
He returns, rich, and somewhat larger having eaten lots of buffalo beef.
Tā yījǐnhuánxiāng，érqiě yóuyú chīle hěnduō yě niúròu ér tǐgé kuíwú。
他衣锦还乡，而且由于吃了很多野牛肉而体格魁梧。

你觉得我们的肉够客人们吃吗？

这道菜听起来就觉得好吃，它是把炸过的猪肉放在烤蔬菜下面。
I prefer fish over meat.
和肉相比，我更喜欢吃鱼。

在早上6点，我吃了一些比较肥的猪肉。
Yesterday\'s meat was high but he had made himself swallow it.
Zuótiān de ròu huài le dàn tā háishì chīle xiàqù。
昨天的肉坏了但他还是吃了下去。

我吃了点儿米饭和土豆烧肉。
He ate fast and heartily, but his skinny frame never gained a pound.
Tā chīfàn hěn kuài，wèikǒu yě hěn dà，dàn tā xiānshòu de shēntǐ què yìdiǎn ròu yě bù zhǎng。
他吃饭很快，胃口也很大，但他纤瘦的身体却一点肉也不长。
一身细皮白肉
yì shēn xìpíbáiròu
be delicate-skinned and fair-complexioned

汆白肉。
砂锅白肉。
煮肉的时候要把白沫撇掉。
Pear flesh is white and juicy, and grainy in texture.
梨肉雪白，多汁，肉质呈颗粒状。
Meat is an important source of proteins.
肉类是重要的蛋白质来源。
There\'s a stall selling chickens, all white and plucked with their heads cut off.

那里有一个专卖鸡肉的摊位，所有的鸡都是乳白色拔光了毛的并且已经把头砍掉了。
对他的说法提出质疑
duì tā de shuōfǎ tíchū zhìyí 
query (or question) the validity of his statement
质疑
zhìyí
call in question; query
他的性取向横遭大家质疑，他感到十分委屈。
Tā de xìngqū xiàng héngzāo dàjiā zhìyí，tā gǎndào shífēn wěiqū。
His sexual orientation was questioned unexpectedly, making  him feel wronged.
质疑
Zhìyí
cast doubt on
质疑。
质疑。
试想，没有大胆质疑的精神，能发现新的科学规律吗？
质疑问难(ｎáｎ)。
就质量问题向厂家质疑。
a challenge of premises of an argument
对论点前提的质疑
You were also at the meeting, so how can you question the truth of my words?
当时开会你也在场，现在你怎么能质疑我是否在说实话？
The fire raised doubts about the safety of the fire alarm systems.
大火引发了人们对于火灾预警系统安全性的质疑。
In the week and a half since the election, however, many more questions have been raised about this reportedly &quot;clean&quot; election.
选举已经开始了一周半了，大家都提出了很多问题，质疑这个据称“公证”的选举。
to beg the question (as to) whether
令人质疑
questioning the existing social order
质疑现行社会制度
to bring {or} call sth into question
对某事提出质疑
I reviewed the tape and challenged his interpretation of the president\'s words.
我听了磁带，对于他对总统的话的翻译有些质疑。
If what you assert is true, then we need to question the information source\'s creditability.
如果你所坚称的是真的，那么我们就必须质疑这消息来源的可信性了。
Our company\'s strategy has been questioned by some investors.
一些投资者对我们公司的策略表示了质疑。
They didn\'t question the validity of those figures.
他们没有质疑这些图表的有效性。
She doesn\'t have the face to question my loyalty.
Tā méiliǎn zhìyí wǒ de zhōngchéng。
她没脸质疑我的忠诚。
By the same token, some heroes are also regarded with suspicion.
Tóngyàng de，yǒuxiē yīngxióng yìhuì zāodào zhìyí。
同样的，有些英雄亦会遭到质疑。
In his book he presents a challenge to the liberal view of economics.
Zài tā de shūzhōng，tā duì jīngjìxuéjiā de zìyóuzhǔyì guāndiǎn tíchūle zhìyí。
在他的书中，他对经济学家的自由主义观点提出了质疑。
She challenged the decision of her employers and won the case.
Tā duì tā de gùzhǔ de juédìng tíchūle zhìyí，bìngqiě yíngdéle sùsòng。
她对她的雇主的决定提出了质疑，并且赢得了诉讼。
No one has criticised my choice of those three experts, or challenged their conclusions.
Méiyǒu rén pīpíng wǒ xuǎnzé zhè sān míng zhuānjiā，yě méiyǒu rén zhìyí tāmen de jiélùn。
没有人批评我选择这三名专家，也没有人质疑他们的结论。
I won\'t be contesting your claim for custody.
Wǒ búhuì zhìyí nǐ yāoqiú jiānhù de qǐngqiú。
我不会质疑你要求监护的请求。
The manager doesn\'t want anybody to query his decisions.
Jīnglǐ bù xīwàng yǒu rènhé rén zhìyí tā de juédìng。
经理不希望有任何人质疑他的决定。
The author argues against the two polar views of value.
Zuòzhě duì zhè liǎng zhǒng jiérán xiāngfǎn de jiàzhíguān tíchūle zhìyí。
作者对这两种截然相反的价值观提出了质疑。
They Representatives questioned the role companies could play in improving the environment.
Zhòngyìyuán men zhìyí gōngsī zài gǎishàn huánjìng zhōng de zuòyòng。
众议员们质疑公司在改善环境中的作用。
Your past will be brought up in the questioning.
Nǐ de guòqù huì bèi tíchū zhìyí。
你的过去会被提出质疑。
They don\'t readily question authority or complain in public.
Tāmen búhuì qīngyì zhìyí quánwēi huòzhě dāngzhòng bàoyuàn。
他们不会轻易质疑权威或者当众抱怨。
They question about its value.
Tāmen zhìyí tā de jiàzhí。
他们质疑它的价值。
Personal letters between heads of state were long regarded with suspicion.
Guójiā yuánshǒu zhī jiān de gèrén shūxìn chángqī bǎoshòuzhìyí。
国家元首之间的个人书信长期饱受质疑。
Her father had questioned the lack of gaiety in their pretty daughter.
Tā fùqīn céng zhìyí tāmen de piàoliang nǚer shìfǒu zhēn de yùyùguǎhuān。
她父亲曾质疑他们的漂亮女儿是否真的郁郁寡欢。
They may be used to throw doubt on an adverse decision.
Tāmen kěnéng yǐqián jīngcháng zhìyí yí gè búlì de juédìng。
他们可能以前经常质疑一个不利的决定。
After that mistake he was under a cloud.
Fànle nà cì cuòwù zhīhòu，tā kāishǐ shòudào zhìyí。
犯了那次错误之后，他开始受到质疑。
We must question your judgment in this matter.
Wǒmen bìxū zhìyí nín duì zhè jiàn shì de pànduàn。
我们必须质疑您对这件事的判断。
She challenged his claims.
Tā duì tā de sùqiú tíchū zhìyí。
她对他的诉求提出质疑。
The lawyer questioned the truth of my account.
Nà wèi lǜshī zhìyí wǒ de xùshù de zhēnshíxìng。
那位律师质疑我的叙述的真实性。
Acceptance of newtonian mechanics was unquestioned for 200 years.
Duì niúdùn lìxué de rèntóng zài 200 nián jiān méiyǒu bèi zhìyí guò。
对牛顿力学的认同在200年间没有被质疑过。
The dominions of both rulers passed away to their spurious or doubtful offspring.
Zhè liǎng gè tǒngzhìzhě de tǒngzhìquán dōu chuángěile tāmen sīshēng de huò lìngrénzhìyí de hòudài。
这两个统治者的统治权都传给了他们私生的或令人质疑的后代。
Why do politicians always develop selective amnesia when questioned about their transgressions?
Wèihé zhèngkèmen zài bèi zhìyí yǒu wéifǎ xíngwéi shí zǒngshì biǎoxiànchū yǒu xuǎnzé de jiànwàngzhèng？
为何政客们在被质疑有违法行为时总是表现出有选择的健忘症？
The authentication was counterchallenged.
Qí zhēnshíxìng shòudào zhìyí。
其真实性受到质疑。
Darwin challenged the fixity of species.
Dá\'ěrwén duì shēngwù wùzhǒng de wěndìngxìng tíchūle zhìyí。

The lawyers tried to impeach the credibility of the witnesses.
Lǜshīmen shìtú zhìyí zhèngrén de kěxìndù。
律师们试图质疑证人的可信度。
He questioned the adequacy of the usual sentimental interpretation of the golden rule.

He questioned the tenability of my claims.
Tā zhìyí wǒ de zhǔzhāng de hélǐxìng。

He questioned the sufficiency of human intelligence.
Tā zhìyí rénlèi yǒu zúgòu de zhìlì。

他因强迫自己儿子参加性质可疑的联盟而遭受到良心的谴责。

我们在他的夹克上发现一些白色的物质，我怀疑是可卡因。

The transmission of the substance went through as suspected.

疑阵。
布下疑阵，只等对方上钩。

qǐ yíxīn 
become suspicious

qǐyíxīn
become suspicious
她疑心邻居偷了她的手表。

She suspected that her neighbour (英) {或} neighbor (美) stole her watch.

毫无疑问
háo wú yí wèn 
doubtless; without a doubt; without question
对于这段经文我还有很多疑问，请上人指教。
Duìyú zhè duàn jīngwén wǒ háiyǒu hěnduō yíwèn，qǐng shàngrén zhǐjiào。

yíwèn
doubt
解答疑难问题

answer difficult questions
警察正在查问嫌疑犯。

重点阐释了一些疑难问题

用升调表示一个疑问句

疑点
yídiǎn
a doubtful (or questionable) point; an uncertain (or unclear) point
专家在考证今文《尚书》，因为其中有很多疑点。
Zhuānjiā zài kǎozhèng jīnwén《Shàngshū》，yīnwèi qí zhōng yǒu hěnduō yídiǎn。
The experts are researching the modern script version of shangshu, as there are many doubtful points.

Xià yì fēng xìn bǐjiào kěyí，cúnzài xǔduō yòng mòshuǐ quāndiǎnle de dìfang。
下一封信比较可疑，存在许多用墨水圈点了的地方。

他们承认我的论点有说服力，但依然持怀疑态度。
The nearer the finish came, the more certain his victory seemed to be.

越接近终点，他的胜利似乎越是确定无疑。
I\'m always wary of having Frank keep score of the game, I think he has the tendency to cheat.

你还是把事情的原委跟他说开了，免得他猜疑。

这件事情毫无疑义，可以下结论了。

Undoubtedly, a conclusion can be drawn regarding this matter.

活劳动是价值的唯一源泉，这是不容置疑的。

Undoubtedly, living labor is the only resource of value.
为了方便抓捕和寄押犯罪嫌疑人，警方采取了有效的措施。

老师正在给学生们解疑。
Lǎoshī zhèngzài gěi xuéshengmen jiěyí。
The teacher is answering the students\' questions.
专家在考证今文《尚书》，因为其中有很多疑点。

我一直怀疑自己有梦游的习惯。

对于这段经文我还有很多疑问，请上人指教。

这个新的发现推翻了以往科学家们深信不疑的理论。
Zhège xīn de fāxiàn tuīfān le yíwǎng kēxuéjiāmen shēnxìnbùyí de lǐlùn。
This new discovery overthrew the old theory that was completely believed by scientists before.

The suspect finally confessed the details, faced with the attack of the interrogator.

You have already arrested and detained the suspect. What else do you want?
朋友之间应该互相信任，不能互相疑忌。
Péngyou zhījiān yīnggāi hùxiāng xìnrèn，bùnéng hùxiāng yíjì。
Friends should trust each and not be jealous of each other.
这个老中医能治愈各种疑难杂症。
Zhège lǎo zhōng yī néng zhìyù gèzhǒng yínán zázhèng。
The old doctor of traditional Chinese medicine is able to cure all kinds of difficult and complicated diseases.
你的疑心病实在太重了，连自己亲哥哥都信不过。

小张隐约其词的回答引起所有人的怀疑。
Xiǎo Zhāng yǐnyuē qící de huídá yǐnqǐ suǒyǒurén de huáiyí。
Xiaozhang\'s equivocal answer aroused everybody\'s suspicion.
老中医专治各种疑难杂病。
Lǎo zhōng yī zhuānzhì gèzhǒng yínán zábìng。
The old traditional Chinese medicine doctor specializes in treating various kinds of complicated diseases.
他的病又不是疑难杂症，吃点药就会好的。
Tā de bìng yòu búshì yínán zázhèng，chī diǎn yào jiùhuì hǎo de。
His disease isn\'t very serious. After taking some pills, he will be fine.
看他言之凿凿的样子，没有人会怀疑他。
Kàn tā yánzhī záozáo de yàngzi，méiyǒu rén huì huáiyí tā。
Looking at the way he talks, no one would doubt him.
那个人十分可疑，瞪着贼眼左顾右盼的。
Nàge rén shífēn kěyí，dèng zhe zéiyǎn zuǒgù yòupàn de。
That guy is very suspicious, his shifty eyes move constantly.
大家都怀疑这条新闻的真实性。
Dàjiā dōu huáiyí zhètiáo xīnwén de zhēnshíxìng。
Everybody doubted the authenticity of this piece of news.
这个噩耗无疑于一颗重磅炸弹，让他一时无法接受。
Zhège èhào wúyí yú yì kē zhòngpàng zhàdàn，ràng tā yìshí wúfǎ jiēshòu。
This sad news is undoubtedly like a heavy bomb he can\'t possibly accept within a short period of time.
对于这个现象，许多知名专家都曾著文表示怀疑。
Duìyú zhège xiàn xiàng，xǔduō zhīmíng zhuānjiā dōu céng zhùwén biǎoshì huáiyí。
Many famous specialists have expressed their doubts about this phenomenon in articles.
县政府出台了新的土地审批的政策，这无疑是筑巢引凤之举。

The county government has released a new policy for land examination and approval, which is undoubtedly for the purpose of attracting outside investment and talent.
最近他感觉自己胸骨后灼痛，医生怀疑他患有食管癌。
Zuìjìn tā gǎnjué zìjǐ xiōnggǔ hòu zhuótòng，yīshēng huáiyí tā huànyǒu shíguǎnái。

这个疑问句有严重的语法错误，请你改一改。

The interrogative sentence has serious grammatical errors, please correct them.

由于找不到嫌疑人，这个案件只能不了了之了。

Since the suspect hasn\'t been found, the case simply had to be left unresolved.

qǐ yíxīn 
become suspicious
消除心中的疑虑
xiāochú xīn zhōng de yílǜ

你的疑心病实在太重了，连自己亲哥哥都信不过。

qǐyíxīn
become suspicious

indisputable; irrefutable; unquestionable

Zhèjiàn shìqing háowú yíyì，kěyǐ xià jiélùn le。
Undoubtedly, a conclusion can be drawn regarding this matter.
县政府出台了新的土地审批的政策，这无疑是筑巢引凤之举。
Xiàn zhèngfǔ chūtái le xīn de tǔdì shěnpī de zhèngcè，zhè wúyí shì zhùcháo yǐnfèng zhī jǔ。
The county government has released a new policy for land examination and approval, which is undoubtedly for the purpose of attracting outside investment and talent.
在2月14日这天，字频最高的无疑是“爱”。
Zài èryuè shísìrì zhètiān，zìpín zuìgāo de wúyí shì“ài”。
On February 14th, the most frequently used word is definitely &quot;love&quot;.

Shānchóngshuǐfù yí wú lù，liǔ\'àn huāmíngyòu yì cūn。
Mountains multiply, streams double back—I doubt there\'s even a road; Willows cluster darkly, blossoms shine—another village ahead!
证据充分，无可置疑。
Zhèngjù chōngfèn，wúkězhìyí。
The evidence is strong and admits of no doubt.
他们夺冠的实力无可置疑。
Tāmen duóguàn de shílì wúkězhìyí。
Their ability to win the championship was beyond doubt.
丈夫无疑是妻子的好保镖。
他以为自己必胜无疑，不料输得这么惨

必胜无疑。
毫无疑问。
这本书由我社出版，已无疑义。
遭受疑忌和冷落|无端疑忌|顿生疑忌。
无所疑惧。
无可疑虑。
This proves beyond peradventure that he is innocent.
Zhèxiē háowúyíwèn de zhèngmíng tā shì wúgū de。
这些毫无疑问地证明他是无辜的。

easily the best of the lot
无疑是全部中最好的
beyond peradventure

那是毫无疑问的！

毫无疑问，我会去的。

深信不疑
shēnxìn bù yí 
unquestioningly believe; not have the slightest doubt
这个新的发现推翻了以往科学家们深信不疑的理论。
Zhège xīn de fāxiàn tuīfān le yíwǎng kēxuéjiāmen shēnxìnbùyí de lǐlùn。
This new discovery overthrew the old theory that was completely believed by scientists before.
深信不疑
shēnxìnbùyí
firmly believe
深信不疑。
He believed all the marxist dogma.
Tā duì suǒyǒu mǎkèsī zhǔyì jiàotiáo dōu shēnxìnbùyí。
他对所有马克思主义教条都深信不疑。
His mouth grinned trustfully.
Tā shēnxìnbùyí de liězuǐyíxiào。
他深信不疑地咧嘴一笑。
发现可疑动静
fāxiàn kěyí dòngjìng
spot something suspicious
侦察兵在雪地上发现了可疑的脚印。
Zhēnchábīngzài xuědì shàngfāxiàn le kěyí de jiǎoyìn。
The scouts discovered suspicious footprints in the snow.
可疑分子
kěyífènzǐ
a suspect; a suspicious character
这案子有些可疑之处。
Zhè ànzi yǒuxiē kěyí zhī chù。
There are some questionable points in this case.
把可疑分子扣起来
bǎ kěyífènzǐ kòuqǐlái
detain a suspect
他发现一个形迹可疑的人向屋内窥视。
Tā fāxiàn yígè xíngjì kěyí de rén xiàng wū nèi kuīshì。
He spotted a suspicious character peeping into the house.
盘诘行迹可疑的人
pánjié xíngjì kěyí de rén
interrogate suspicious-looking persons
你进大楼时看到什么形迹可疑的人没有？
Nǐ jìn dàlóu shí kàndào shénme xíngjì kěyí de rén méiyǒu?
Did you notice anyone suspicious-looking when you came into the building?

多疑
duōyí
oversensitive; oversuspicious; given to suspicion
爷爷上了年纪，有点儿多疑。
Yéye shàng le niánjì，yǒudiǎnr duōyí。
Grandpa is getting on in years, and has a lot of doubts and misgivings.
她太多疑了。
Tā tài duōyí le。
She is too suspicious.
专家在考证今文《尚书》，因为其中有很多疑点。
Zhuānjiā zài kǎozhèng jīnwén《Shàngshū》，yīnwèi qí zhōng yǒu hěnduō yídiǎn。
The experts are researching the modern script version of shangshu, as there are many doubtful points.
对于这段经文我还有很多疑问，请上人指教。
Duìyú zhè duàn jīngwén wǒ háiyǒu hěnduō yíwèn，qǐng shàngrén zhǐjiào。
I have many problems with this paragraph from the transcript. Please give me some advice.
我在阅读这本古籍时还有很多疑问，希望老师能够通解一下。
Wǒ zài yuèdú zhèběn gǔjí shí háiyǒu hěnduō yíwèn，xīwàng lǎoshī nénggòu tōngjiě yíxià。
I have a lot of questions concerning this ancient book, I hope you can explain them to me to help me understand the book fully.
多疑
duōyí
over-suspicious
中国海军驱逐舰成功驱离了多艘疑似海盗船只。
zhōng guó hǎi jūn qū zhú jiàn chéng gōng qū lí le duō sōu yí sì hǎi dào chuán zhī。
The Chinese navy destroyer has driven suspected pirates vessels away.
对于这个现象，许多知名专家都曾著文表示怀疑。
Duìyú zhège xiàn xiàng，xǔduō zhīmíng zhuānjiā dōu céng zhùwén biǎoshì huáiyí。
Many famous specialists have expressed their doubts about this phenomenon in articles.
多疑
用人切勿多疑。
多疑、孤僻的性格
多疑症。
治愈许多疑难病症。
狡诈多疑。
就你心眼儿多，疑神疑鬼的。
We had a couple of suspicious characters but their alibis are watertight.
Wǒmen zhōng yǒu jǐwèi duōyí de rén，dànshì tāmen de yīnmóu wúxièkějī。
我们中有几位多疑的人，但是他们的阴谋无懈可击。
He has a highly suspicious character and never believes anyone.
Tā shì yí gè yìcháng duōyí de rén，cóngbù xiāngxìn rènhé rén。
他是一个异常多疑的人，从不相信任何人。
In the week and a half since the election, however, many more questions have been raised about this reportedly &quot;clean&quot; election.
选举已经开始了一周半了，大家都提出了很多问题，质疑这个据称“公证”的选举。
There is no doubt that the growth area has had distinct achievements in many countries.
Wúyōngzhìyí，hěn duō guójiā de jīngjì fāzhǎnqū dōu qǔdéle xiǎnzhù de chéngjiù。
毋庸置疑，很多国家的经济发展区都取得了显著的成就。
No one doubts the professionalism of the vast majority of public servants.
Méiyǒu rén huáiyí juédàduōshù gōngwùyuán shì zhuānyè de。
没有人怀疑绝大多数公务员是专业的。
The next letters were written with suspiciously blotted ink.
Xià yì fēng xìn bǐjiào kěyí，cúnzài xǔduō yòng mòshuǐ quāndiǎnle de dìfang。
下一封信比较可疑，存在许多用墨水圈点了的地方。
They were mostly used to discriminate between doubtful grammar school entrants.
Tāmen dàduō yònglái zhēnbié kěyí de wénfǎ xuéxiào de xīnrùxuézhě。
他们大多用来甄别可疑的文法学校的新入学者。
It cannot be questioned that most of the leading scholars were included among them.
Háowú yíwèn ，tāmen zhōng jué dà duō shù shì dǐngjiān xuézhě。
毫无疑问，他们中绝大多数是顶尖学者。
There is undoubtedly a demand for more golf courses.
Wúyōngzhìyí de，duì gāo\'ěrfū chǎngdì yǒu gèng duō de xūqiú。
毋庸置疑地，对高尔夫场地有更多的需求。
留下半小时答疑
liúxià bàn xiǎoshí dáyí 
set aside half an hour for questions and answers (or for answering questions)
解答疑难问题
jiědá yínàn wèntí 
answer difficult questions
读者提出的几个疑问，现在一并答复如下。
Dúzhě tíchū de jǐgè yíwèn，xiànzài yíbìngdáfù rúxià。
What follows is an answer to all the questions raised by the readers.
小张隐约其词的回答引起所有人的怀疑。
Xiǎo Zhāng yǐnyuē qící de huídá yǐnqǐ suǒyǒurén de huáiyí。
Xiaozhang\'s equivocal answer aroused everybody\'s suspicion.
答疑。
老师耐心地答疑解难。
答疑解惑
用事实回答了人们的疑问。
两份试卷答案完全雷同，怀疑有抄袭现象。
The Hospital Help Desk is situated in the Outpatient Department and can help with any enquiries.
医院服务台在门诊部，那里可以帮您解答疑问。
Administrators respond to the users\' questions and concerns.
管理员会对用户的疑问和关注的话题作出答复。
The internees were enemy aliens and suspected terrorists.
Bèijūliúzhě shì díguó gōngmín hé yísì kǒngbùfènzǐ。
被拘留者是敌国公民和疑似恐怖分子。
他抱着半信半疑的态度去试一试。
Tā bào zhe bànxìnbànyí de tàidu qù shìyishì。
Not quite convinced, he went to try it himself.
她半信半疑地摇摇头。
Tā bànxìnbànyí de yáoyao tóu。
Still a little sceptical, she shook her head.
半信半疑。
to be dubious about sth
对某事半信半疑
to take sth with a pinch {or} grain of salt
对某事半信半疑
I always took the rumors with a grain of salt.
Wǒ zǒngshì duì yáoyán chí bànxìnbànyí de tàidù。
我总是对谣言持半信半疑地态度。
瓯绣(温州出产的刺绣)。
他一口的温州话。
标准大气压受空气流动和温度影响。
Biāozhǔn dàqìyā shòu kōngqì liúdòng hé wēndù yǐngxiǎng。
The standard atmosphere is influenced by the flow of the air, and the temperature.
加压、降温可使气体液化
A thermobaric bomb can create overpressures equal to an atomic bomb.
Wēnyātán nénggòu chǎnshēng hé yuánzǐdàn yíyàng de chāoyālì。
温压弹能够产生和原子弹一样的超压力。
Arsine is a toxic, colorless gas with a garlic-like odor at room temperature and atmospheric pressure.
胂是一种无色有毒气体，在室温和大气压力下会发出类似大蒜的气味。
pressure/temperature gauge
压力/温度仪
The sensitivity of his skin to pressure and temperature was normal.
Tā de pífū duì yālì hé wēndù de mǐngǎndù shì zhèngcháng de。
他的皮肤对压力和温度的敏感度是正常的。
Solar gravity creates extreme pressures and temperatures.
Tàiyáng yǐnlì zhìzàole jí qiáng de yālì hé jí gāo de wēndù。
太阳引力制造了极强的压力和极高的温度。
Physical effects of coke use include constricted blood vessels, dilated pupils, and increased temperature, heart rate, and blood pressure.
使用可卡因后身体会出现很多症状，如血管收缩、瞳孔放大、体温上升、心率加快和血压升高。
The minimum pressure required to liquefy a gas at its critical temperature is its critical pressure.
Shǐ qìtǐ línjiè wēndù shí yèhuà suǒ xūyào de zuì xiǎo yālì jiùshì gāi qìtǐ de línjiè yālì。
使气体临界温度时液化所需要的最小压力就是该气体的临界压力。
A critical temperature of water is 100 degrees C--its boiling point at standard atmospheric pressure.
Shuǐ de línjiè wēndù shì 100 shèshìdù——í zài biāozhǔn dī qìyā xià de fèidiǎn。
水的临界温度是100摄氏度——即在标准低气压下的沸点。
早晨空腹喝一杯温水，可以降低血液黏稠度。
Zǎochén kōngfù hē yì bēi wēnshuǐ，kěyǐ jiàngdī xuèyè niánchóudù。
Drinking a cup of lukewarm water on an empty stomach will bring down blood viscosity.
hot-blooded
温血(马)；神经质的，有恶癖的
mammals and birds are warmblooded animals
哺乳动物和鸟类是温血动物
Physical effects of coke use include constricted blood vessels, dilated pupils, and increased temperature, heart rate, and blood pressure.
使用可卡因后身体会出现很多症状，如血管收缩、瞳孔放大、体温上升、心率加快和血压升高。
温习功课
wēnxí ɡōnɡkè 
review one\'s lessons
小张有每天晚上坐在屋角温习功课的习惯。
Xiǎo Zhāng yǒu měitiān wǎnshàng zuòzài wūjiǎo wēnxí gōngkè de xíguàn。
Xiao Zhang always revises his lessons at the corner of the house every evening.
好好温习功课，否则考试通不过。
Hǎohǎo wēnxígōngkè，fǒuzé kǎoshì tōngbúguò。

Shuìqián wēnshū yǐ chéngwéi tā duōniánlái de yígè xíguàn。
He usually takes a long time to revise his lessons before he goes to sleep.
You can brush up on subjects via the internet.
Nǐ kěyǐ tōngguò yīntèwǎng wánshàn gè gè fāngmiàn。
你可以通过因特网温习课程。
He has been running over the information all night trying memorize it.
Tā zhěngyè wēnxí zhège xìnxī，shìtú jìzhù tā。
他整夜温习这个信息，试图记住它。

Wǒ xūyào wēnxí wǒ de Lādīngwén。

You\'d be best to warm up the leftovers before eating them again.
增高温室的温度
zēnggāo wēnshì de wēndù
raise the temperature of a hothouse
科学上所说的绝对温度，与我们日常所说的“温度”不同。
Kēxuéshàng suǒshuō de juéduì wēndù，yǔ wǒmen rìcháng suǒshuō de“wēndù”bùtóng。
The scientific term of absolute temperature is different from the &quot;temperature&quot; we speak of in our daily life.
由于温控设施到位，这个房间的温度总保持在28度。
Yóuyú wēnkòng shèshī dàowèi，zhège fángjiān de wēndù zǒng bǎochí zài èrshíbādù。
Using the temperature control system, the temperature of this room stays at 28 degrees.
冷泉的温度应该是取决于地下的水温。
Lěngquán de wēndù yīnggāi shì qǔjuéyú dìxià de shuǐwēn。
The temperatue of a cold fountain is determined by underground water temperature.
炉长让我们再将温度提高1度，以保证楼内的温度。
Lúzhǎng ràng wǒmen zài jiāng wēndù tígāo yídù，yǐ bǎozhèng lóunèi de wēndù。
The leader of the furnace men told us to increase the temperature by one Celsius in order to maintain the temperature in the building.
自动温度监控及调温装置
two temperate (或variable) zones
两个温带，北温带和南温带
The temperature did not register on the thermometer.
Qìwēn zài wēndùjì shàng yě kàn bù qīngchǔ。
气温在温度计上也看不清楚。
The temperature is thermostatically controlled.
Wēndù shòudào wēndù tiáojiéqì de kòngzhì。
温度受到温度调节器的控制。
A thermometer records temperatures.
温度计标明温度的变化。
A thermometer registers temperature.
温度计标示温度。
The coastal region has a pleasant climate, with average temperatures ranging from 24° to 26°C.
沿海区域气候温和，平均气温在24°C到26°C之间。
A black body maintained at a constant temperature is a full radiator at that temperature because the radiation reaching and leaving it must be in equilibrium.
Hēisè wùtǐ zài héngwēn tiáojiàn xià shì wēndù de wánquán fúshèqì，yīnwèi dàodá hé líkāi gāi wùtǐ de fúshèliàng bìxū bǎochí pínghéng。
黑色物体在恒温条件下是温度的完全辐射器，因为到达和离开该物体的辐射量必须保持平衡。
The predicted temperature and the actual temperature were markedly different.
Yùbào de wēndù hé shíjì de wēndù xiāngchà hěn dà。
预报的温度和实际的温度相差很大。
The seavents breathe hot water into cold seawater.
Yángliú bǎ wēndù gāo de hǎishuǐ sòng rù wēndù dī de hǎishuǐ zhōng。
洋流把温度高的海水送入温度低的海水中。
The thermometer recorded high temperatures today.
温度计显示了今天的高温天气。
Cryobiology has allowed unborn fetuses be kept under cryopreservation for years.
低温生物技术能让胎儿在低温条件下存活数年。
The height of the mercury column in a thermometer indicates the temperature.
温度计中水银柱的高度指示温度。
Then set the cooker to a temperature that will keep the food at a simmer.
Jiēzhe shèdìng zhǔ guō de wēndù bǎochí shíwù zài jiējìn fèidiǎn de wēndù shàng áozhǔ。
接着设定煮锅的温度保持食物在接近沸点的温度上熬煮。
The fervent heat merely communicated a genial warmth to their half-torpid systems.
Chìrè de wēndù duì tāmen bàn mábì de xìtǒng éryán zhǐnéng chuándá chū yì zhǒng qīnqiè hé wēnnuǎn éryǐ。
炽热的温度对他们半麻痹的系统而言只能传达出一种亲切和温暖而已。

Nǐ kěyǐ tōngguò yīntèwǎng wánshàn gè gè fāngmiàn。
你可以通过因特网温习课程。

温室效应
wēnshìxiàoyìng
the greenhouse effect
二氧化碳形成温室效应。
Èryǎnghuàtàn xíngchéng wēnshìxiàoyìng。
Carbon dioxide has caused the greenhouse effect.
The effects of greenhouse are not easy to discern.
Wēnshìxiàoyìng bú tài róngyì kàn qīngchu。
温室效应不太容易看清楚。
The rise in greenhouse gases is partially the result deforestation.
森林的过度砍伐是造成温室气体增加的部分原因。
With the sanction of the treaty, the country will cut down its greenhouse gas discharge.
条约被批准后，这个国家会减少其温室气体排放量。
Greenhouse gases trap heat and prevent its escape from the atmosphere into space.
Wēnshìqìtǐ huì xùrè bìng zǔzhǐ rèliàng cóng dàqì xiàng tàikōng sǎn yì。
温室气体会蓄热并阻止热量从大气向太空散逸。
Carbon dioxide is the main greenhouse gas.
Èryǎnghuàtàn shì zhǔyào de wēnshìqìtǐ。
二氧化碳是主要的温室气体。

wēndùjì
thermometer

the scale of a thermometer
温度计的标度
A temperature gauge was installed in the freezer so the ice cream wouldn\'t melt.
冰箱里装有一个温度计，用来防止冰淇淋融化。
The temperature did not register on the thermometer.
Qìwēn zài wēndùjì shàng yě kàn bù qīngchǔ。
气温在温度计上也看不清楚。
The thermometer hit 100 degrees.
Wēndùjì dào yìbǎi dù le。
温度计到100度了。
The thermometer showed thirteen degrees below zero.
Wēndùjì zhǐshì língxià sānshí dù。
温度计指示零下三十度。
The thermometer needed calibration.
Nàgè wēndùjì xūyào jiàozhǔn。
那个温度计需要校准。
The thermometer is inaccurate.
Zhège wēndùjì bù zhǔn。
这个温度计不准。
He calibrated the thermometer for the celsius scale.
Tā duì wēndùjì de shèshì kèdù jìnxíngle jiàozhǔn。
他对温度计的摄氏刻度进行了校准。

centigrade (or Celsius) thermometer

路上结冰了，表示温度是零下。
Lùshàng jiébīngle，biǎoshì wēndù shì língxià。
The road is iced up, which indicates that the temperature is below zero.
这块电子表还有显示温度的功能。
Zhèkuài diànzǐbiǎo háiyǒu xiǎnshì wēndù de gōngnéng。
This electronic watch can also display temperatures.
a celsius thermometer
摄氏温度表
Humidity expressed as dewpoint temperature can explain and clarify the differences.
Dāng shīdù yòng lùdiǎn wēndù lái biǎoshì shí，jiù néng jiěshì hé qūfēn qízhōng de bùtóng le。
当湿度用露点温度来表示时，就能解释和区分其中的不同了。
科学上所说的绝对温度，与我们日常所说的“温度”不同。
Kēxuéshàng suǒshuō de juéduì wēndù，yǔ wǒmen rìcháng suǒshuō de“wēndù”bùtóng。
The scientific term of absolute temperature is different from the &quot;temperature&quot; we speak of in our daily life.
炉长让我们再将温度提高1度，以保证楼内的温度。
Lúzhǎng ràng wǒmen zài jiāng wēndù tígāo yídù，yǐ bǎozhèng lóunèi de wēndù。
The leader of the furnace men told us to increase the temperature by one Celsius in order to maintain the temperature in the building.
冷泉的温度应该是取决于地下的水温。
Lěngquán de wēndù yīnggāi shì qǔjuéyú dìxià de shuǐwēn。
The temperatue of a cold fountain is determined by underground water temperature.

cè wēndù

温度降到摄氏零下十度。
Wēndù jiàngdào shèshì língxià shí dù。
The temperature dropped to minus ten degrees centigrade.
今天的温度是零度。
Jīntiān de wēndù shì língdù。
Today\'s temperature is zero.

wēndù lùdiǎn chā

Shèshì wēndùbiǎo 
centigrade (or Celsius) thermometer

zēnggāo wēnshì de wēndù
raise the temperature of a hothouse
标准大气压受空气流动和温度影响。
Biāozhǔn dàqìyā shòu kōngqì liúdòng hé wēndù yǐngxiǎng。
The standard atmosphere is influenced by the flow of the air, and the temperature.
这间蚕房的温度太高了。
Zhè jiān cánfáng de wēndù tài gāo le。
The temperature in the silkworm room is too high.
一定要保证蚕室的温度稳定，不能太高也不能太低。
Yídìng yào bǎozhèng cánshì de wēndù wěndìng，bùnéng tài gāo yě bùnéng tài dī。
The tempreture in a silkworm rooms should be kept stable, neither too high or too low.
这块电子表还有显示温度的功能。
Zhèkuài diànzǐbiǎo háiyǒu xiǎnshì wēndù de gōngnéng。
This electronic watch can also display temperatures.
这里温度高是因为旁边有间烘房。
Zhèlǐ wēndù gāo shì yīnwèi pángbiān yǒu jiān hōngfáng。
The temperature is here because there is baking house right beside it .
天气转暖了，明天的温度将会在零上。
Tiānqì zhuǎnnuǎn le，míngtiān de wēndù jiāng huì zài língshàng。
It is turning warm. The temperature will be above zero tomorrow.
热力学温度常用的标识符号是“k”。
Rèlìxué wēndù chángyòng de biāozhì fúhào shì“K”。
&quot;K&quot; is the commonly used symbol for temperature in thermodynamics.
我家的温度计上还带有湿度计，能够随时掌握室内的湿度。
Wǒjiā de wēndùjì shàng hái dàiyǒu shīdùjì，nénggòu suíshí zhǎngwò shìnèi de shīdù。
Attached to the thermometer at my home is a hygrometer, which can show the humidity in the room at any time.
由于温控设施到位，这个房间的温度总保持在28度。
Yóuyú wēnkòng shèshī dàowèi，zhège fángjiān de wēndù zǒng bǎochí zài èrshíbādù。
Using the temperature control system, the temperature of this room stays at 28 degrees.
有的时候我们可以根据物态判决温度。
Yǒu de shíhou wǒmen kěyǐ gēnjù wùtài pànjué wēndù。
Sometimes we can determine the weather by referring to the state of matter.
一百摄氏度是水从液态转变为气态的临界温度。
Yìbǎi shèshìdù shì shuǐ cóng yètài zhuǎnbiànwéi qìtài de línjiè wēndù。
100℃ is the critical temperature for water to change from liquid state to gas state.
热水器有自动控制功能，当水达到设定温度的时候就自动断电了。
Rèshuǐqì yǒu zìdòng kòngzhì gōngnéng，dāng shuǐ dádào shèdìng wēndù de shíhou jiù zìdòng duàndiàn le。
The water heater has self-control functions and cuts off power after the water temperature reaches the setting.
路上结冰了，表示温度是零下。
Lùshàng jiébīngle，biǎoshì wēndù shì língxià。
The road is iced up, which indicates that the temperature is below zero.
把温度计含在嘴巴里。
Bǎ wēndùjì hánzài zuǐbālǐ。
Hold the thermometer in your mouth.
温度计
wēndùjì
thermometer
气温降到了零度。
Qìwēn jiàngdào le língdù。
The (atmospheric) temperature has fallen to zero.
这里的气温常年在20度以下。
Zhèlǐ de qìwēn chángnián zài èrshídù yǐxià。
The temperature here is below twenty degrees all year round.
这个国家处于低纬度，四季气温都很高。
Zhège guójiā chǔyú dī wěidù，sìjì qìwēn dōu hěngāo。
This country is located between 0 and 30 degrees longitude, where the temperature is high all the year round.
这年头儿气候太反常了，冬天里气温竟然高达20度！
Zhè niántóur qìhou tài fǎncháng le，dōngtiān lǐ qìwēn jìngrán gāodá èrshí dù！
The climate in recent years has been so abnormal, the temperature in winter even sometimes gets up to 20 Centigrade!
冬季供暖的标准是：室温不得低于16度。
Dōngjì gōngnuǎn de biāozhǔn shì：shìwēn bùdé dīyú shíliùdù。
The standard for heating in winter: the room temperature should not be lower than 16 degrees centigrade.
今年冬天是个典型的暖冬，平均气温比往年同期高出18度呢！
Jīnnián dōngtiān shì gè diǎnxíng de nuǎndōng，píngjūn qìwēn bǐ wǎngnián tóngqī gāochū yībādù ne！
This winter is a typical warm winter, its average temperature is 18 degrees higher than last year.
早晨空腹喝一杯温水，可以降低血液黏稠度。
Zǎochén kōngfù hē yì bēi wēnshuǐ，kěyǐ jiàngdī xuèyè niánchóudù。
Drinking a cup of lukewarm water on an empty stomach will bring down blood viscosity.
体温计显示你现在发烧四十度。
Tǐwēnjì xiǎnshì nǐ xiànzài fāshāo sìshí dù。
The thermometer shows that you are running a fever: your body temperature has reached 40°.

The predicted temperature and the actual temperature were markedly different.

The temperature is thermostatically controlled.
Wēndù shòudào wēndù tiáojiéqì de kòngzhì。
温度受到温度调节器的控制。
The thermometer recorded high temperatures today.
温度计显示了今天的高温天气。

炽热的温度对他们半麻痹的系统而言只能传达出一种亲切和温暖而已。

把烤箱温度调低。

There are some liquids such as nitrogen which boil at very low temperatures.
有些液体，例如氮，在很低的温度下就会沸腾。

心理因素可以影响身体的温度调节。

很多人对恶劣温度的忍耐是有限度的。

Wàimiàn de wēndù jiàngzhì língxià 20 zhì 30 shèshìdù。
外面的温度降至零下20至30摄氏度。
Wherever the beer is kept, the temperature must be carefully controlled.
Wúlùn bǎ píjiǔ zhùcún zài nǎlǐ，dōu yào fēicháng zhùyì wēndù kòngzhì。
无论把啤酒贮存在哪里，都要非常注意温度控制。
The temperature dived to ten below zero.
Wēndù zhòujiàng dào le língxià shí dù。
温度骤降到了零下十度。

它在英国并没有被大范围种植，因为它比其它谷物需要更高的温度。

种植的时候，你必须记住温度和湿度条件。
Soil temperature was not controlled in our study.
Wǒmen de yánjiū lǐ méiyǒu duì tǔrǎng wēndù zuò duìzhào shìyàn。
我们的研究里没有对土壤温度做对照试验。
The minimum pressure required to liquefy a gas at its critical temperature is its critical pressure.
Shǐ qìtǐ línjiè wēndù shí yèhuà suǒ xūyào de zuì xiǎo yālì jiùshì gāi qìtǐ de línjiè yālì。
使气体临界温度时液化所需要的最小压力就是该气体的临界压力。
Temperature is the most critical factor in successful storage.
Wēndù shì chǔcáng néngfǒu chénggōng de zuì guānjiàn yīnsù。
温度是储藏能否成功的最关键因素。
The heating was turned up high to dull his audience\'s senses.
Nuǎnqì wēndù bèi tiáo dào hěn gāo，yǐzhìyú tīngzhòng de yìshí biàn de chídùn。
暖气温度被调到很高，以至于听众的意识变得迟钝。
The day progressed and temperatures and humidity rose.
Wēndù hé shīdù suízhe rìtóu shàngshēng le。
温度和湿度随着日头上升了。
Temperature has a large effect on the growth rate of plants.
Wēndù duì zhíwù de shēngzhǎngsùdù qǐzhe hěn dà de zuòyòng。
温度对植物的生长速度起着很大的作用。
When the core temperature of the star reaches 1.3 billion degrees neon reacts to form oxygen.
Dāng héngxīng de héxīn wēndù dádào shísān yì shèshìdù de shíhou，nǎi jiù huì tōngguò huàxuéfǎnyìng biànchéng yǎng。
当恒星的核心温度达到13亿摄氏度的时候，氖就会通过化学反应变成氧。
The strength of cast iron also decreases less rapidly with temperature.

生铁的强度随着温度的减弱有微小的降低。
The apparatus was operated remotely in a vacuum and in a temperature-controlled chamber.
Gāi zhuāngzhì zài yí gè zhēnkōng jí y gè wēndù kòngzhìshì lǐ jìnxíng yáokòng cāozuò。
该装置在一个真空及一个温度控制室里进行遥控操作。
Sludge can block the inlet or outlet to the radiator and prevent it from heating up.
Yūní kěyǐ zǔzhǐ rèqì jìnchū sànrèqì，cóng\'ér fángzhǐ tā wēndù shēnggāo。
淤泥可以阻止热气进出散热器，从而防止它温度升高。
Wherever the beer is kept, the temperature must be carefully controlled.
Wúlùn píjiǔ fàngzài nǎer，bìxū xiǎoxīn de kòngzhì hǎo wēndù。
无论啤酒放在哪儿，必须小心地控制好温度。

Mùbiāo jiùshì huòdé jiējìn wǔshí dào liùshí shèshìdù de wēndù。
目标就是获得接近50-60摄氏度的温度。
The eggs should be maintained at the optimum storage temperature.
Jīdàn yīng bǎocún zài zuì shìyí de chǔcáng wēndù xià。
鸡蛋应保存在最适宜的储藏温度下。
Temperatures can fluctuate a great deal during this time of year.
Měi nián zhège shíhou wēndù de qǐfú dōu fēicháng dà。
每年这个时候温度的起伏都非常大。
The historical temperature record derived from a variety of sources.
Lìshǐ wēndù jìlù yuányú yíxìliè xìnxī láiyuán。
历史温度记录源于一系列信息来源。
The temperature dipped to minus 4 degrees.
Wēndù jiàngdàole língxià sì dù。
温度降到了零下4度。

他的皮肤对压力和温度的敏感度是正常的。

Nǐmen zài kòngzhì wēndù ma？
你们在控制温度吗？
The mercury was falling rapidly.
Wēndù zài kuàisù xiàjiàng。
温度在快速下降。

Huǒjiàn zài chóngfǎn dàqìcéng shí qiánduān de wēndù shēnggāo。
火箭在重返大气层时前端的温度升高。
A critical temperature of water is 100 degrees C--its boiling point at standard atmospheric pressure.
Shuǐ de línjiè wēndù shì 100 shèshìdù——í zài biāozhǔn dī qìyā xià de fèidiǎn。
水的临界温度是100摄氏度——即在标准低气压下的沸点。

Rúguǒ wēndù dádào língshàng，kěnéng huì xià dòngyǔ。
如果温度达到零上，可能会下冻雨。
A black body maintained at a constant temperature is a full radiator at that temperature because the radiation reaching and leaving it must be in equilibrium.
Hēisè wùtǐ zài héngwēn tiáojiàn xià shì wēndù de wánquán fúshèqì，yīnwèi dàodá hé líkāi gāi wùtǐ de fúshèliàng bìxū bǎochí pínghéng。
黑色物体在恒温条件下是温度的完全辐射器，因为到达和离开该物体的辐射量必须保持平衡。
The temperature decreases correspondingly.
Wēndù xiāngyìng de jiàngle xiàlái。
温度相应地降了下来。
The thermometer needed calibration.
Nàgè wēndùjì xūyào jiàozhǔn。
那个温度计需要校准。
The thermometer is inaccurate.
Zhège wēndùjì bù zhǔn。
这个温度计不准。
They believe that fluidity increases as the water gets warmer.
Tāmen rènwéi shuǐ de liúdòngxìng huì suí wēndù de shēnggāo ér zēngjiā。
他们认为水的流动性会随温度的升高而增加。
He calibrated the thermometer for the celsius scale.
Tā duì wēndùjì de shèshì kèdù jìnxíngle jiàozhǔn。
他对温度计的摄氏刻度进行了校准。
Top fermentation uses a yeast that ferments at higher temperatures than that used for bottom fermentation.
Dǐngbù fājiào shǐyòng de jiàosù wēndù gāoyú dǐcéng fājiào。
顶部发酵使用的酵素温度高于底层发酵。
Solar gravity creates extreme pressures and temperatures.
Tàiyáng yǐnlì zhìzàole jí qiáng de yālì hé jí gāo de wēndù。
太阳引力制造了极强的压力和极高的温度。
The acid distills at a specific temperature.
Suān zài tèdìng de wēndù xià búduàn shènchū。
酸在特定的温度下不断渗出。
John got a cold and his temperature now is 39℃.
约翰感冒了，他现在体温是39度。
Put the mashed potatoes in a tin and bake them at 200° for about 15 minutes.
土豆泥装罐儿后，用200度高温烘烤15分钟。
Even in the pulpit there are moments when mildness of manner is not enough.
Jíshǐ zài bùdàotán shàng，yě yǒu tàidù búgòu wēnhé de shíhou。
即使在布道坛上，也有态度不够温和的时候。

有些海兽的性情很温顺。
Yǒuxiē hǎishòu de xìngqíng hěnwēnshùn。
Some marine animals are very tame.
这里温度高是因为旁边有间烘房。
Zhèlǐ wēndù gāo shì yīnwèi pángbiān yǒu jiān hōngfáng。
The temperature is here because there is baking house right beside it .
他的画堂让来访者觉得很温馨。
Tā de huàtáng ràng láifǎngzhě juédé hěnwēnxīn。
His well decorated hall makes visitors feel very warm.
工人们在对这些煤进行高温结焦。
Gōngrénmen zài duì zhèxiē méi jìnxíng gāowēn jiéjiāo。
The workers are coking the coals at elevated temperatures.
他既有温文尔雅的一面也有金刚怒目的一面。
Tā jìyǒu wēnwén ěryǎ de yí miàn yěyǒu jīngāng nùmù de yí miàn。
He can be gentle, but also tough sometimes.
本市的气温已超过警戒线。
Běnshì de qìwēn yǐ chāoguò jǐngjièxiàn。
The temperature of our city exceeds the warning point.
这次降温来得突然，厚衣服都还没有准备呢！
Zhècì jiàngwēn lái de tūrán，hòu yīfu dōu hái méiyǒu zhǔnbèi ne！
The temperature dropped suddenly, and we hadn\'t prepared warm clothes.
由于农民们没有准备，突然的降温使果树遭受了冷害。
Yóuyú nóngmínmen méiyǒu zhǔnbèi，tūrán de jiàngwēn shǐ guǒshù zāoshòu le lěnghài。
Due to lack of preparation by the farmers, the sudden temperature drop made the fruit trees suffer from the disaster of sudden cold.
天气转暖了，明天的温度将会在零上。
Tiānqì zhuǎnnuǎn le，míngtiān de wēndù jiāng huì zài língshàng。
It is turning warm. The temperature will be above zero tomorrow.
明天气温将降到零下，请市民们注意防寒。
Míngtiān qìwēn jiāng jiàngdào língxià，qǐng shìmínmen zhùyì fánghán。
The temperature will be below zero tomorrow. Tell citizens to be aware of the bitter cold.
炉瓦可以起到保温的作用。
Lúwǎ kěyǐ qǐdào bǎowēn de zuòyòng。
Stove tiles can have the function of preserving heat.
用句“洋泾浜”英语来说，他是这个港口的那摩温。
Yòng jù“yángjīngbāng”yīngyǔ láishuō，tā shì zhège gǎngkǒu de nàmówēn。
In pidgin English, he is the namowen (number one) on the port.
他言语温和斯文，一看就是很有内包的人。
Tā yányǔ wēnhé sīwén，yíkàn jiùshì hěnyǒu nèibāo de rén。
He speaks tenderly, giving us an impression of self-possession.
这年头儿气候太反常了，冬天里气温竟然高达20度！
Zhè niántóur qìhou tài fǎncháng le，dōngtiān lǐ qìwēn jìngrán gāodá èrshí dù！
The climate in recent years has been so abnormal, the temperature in winter even sometimes gets up to 20 Centigrade!
早晨空腹喝一杯温水，可以降低血液黏稠度。
Zǎochén kōngfù hē yì bēi wēnshuǐ，kěyǐ jiàngdī xuèyè niánchóudù。
Drinking a cup of lukewarm water on an empty stomach will bring down blood viscosity.
今年冬天是个典型的暖冬，平均气温比往年同期高出18度呢！
Jīnnián dōngtiān shì gè diǎnxíng de nuǎndōng，píngjūn qìwēn bǐ wǎngnián tóngqī gāochū yībādù ne！
This winter is a typical warm winter, its average temperature is 18 degrees higher than last year.
喷涌而出的温泉水暗示人们：这地下有热能。
Pēnyǒng érchū de wēnquánshuǐ ànshì rénmen：zhè dexià yǒu rènéng。
The gushing hot spring water suggests that there might be heat energy underground.
秋日普照大地，温暖而不炎热。
Qiūrì pǔzhào dàdì，wēnnuǎn ér bùyánrè。
The autumn sun illuminates every corner of the land, it\'s warm but not torrid.
热力学温度常用的标识符号是“k”。
Rèlìxué wēndù chángyòng de biāozhì fúhào shì“K”。
&quot;K&quot; is the commonly used symbol for temperature in thermodynamics.
我家的温度计上还带有湿度计，能够随时掌握室内的湿度。
Wǒjiā de wēndùjì shàng hái dàiyǒu shīdùjì，nénggòu suíshí zhǎngwò shìnèi de shīdù。
Attached to the thermometer at my home is a hygrometer, which can show the humidity in the room at any time.
冬季供暖的标准是：室温不得低于16度。
Dōngjì gōngnuǎn de biāozhǔn shì：shìwēn bùdé dīyú shíliùdù。
The standard for heating in winter: the room temperature should not be lower than 16 degrees centigrade.
这些珍贵的热带观赏鱼对水温的的变化十分敏感。
Zhèxiē zhēnguì de rèdài guānshǎngyú duì shuǐwēn de de biànhuà shífēn mǐngǎn。
These precious tropical fish are very sensitive to the changes of water temperature.
体温计显示你现在发烧四十度。
Tǐwēnjì xiǎnshì nǐ xiànzài fāshāo sìshí dù。
The thermometer shows that you are running a fever: your body temperature has reached 40°.
这个国家还有好多老百姓在温饱线以下挣扎。
Zhège guójiā háiyǒu hǎoduō lǎobǎixìng zài wēnbǎoxiàn yǐxià zhēngzhá。
Many people live under the poverty line in this country.
温和派在这次的地方选举中获得了胜利。
Wēnhépài zài zhècì de dìfāng xuǎnjǔ zhōng huòdé le shènglì。
The moderate party won the local election.
据说皇宫里有专门的厨师给皇帝温酒。

It is said there were cooks who specialized in warming wines for the emperor.
天气冷了，你的胃不好，还是喝点温酒吧！

Lily misses the warm embrace of her mother whenever she feels hurt.
他躺在温软的床上，忘记了旅途的劳累。

Lying in his warm bed, he forgets his tiredness from  his travels.
这间老宅子一年四季都是温湿的。
Zhè jiān lǎozháizi yìnián sìjì dōushì wēnshī de。
It is wild, and humid all year around in this old house.

He usually takes a long time to revise his lessons before he goes to sleep.
常年使用温吞水洗脸使他脸上皱纹减少。

小玉生性温婉，班上同学都很喜欢她。

温煦的春风吹在脸上感觉真是舒服。

他温煦的笑容融化了她那颗冰冷的心。

His warm smile warms her cold heart.
小张有每天晚上坐在屋角温习功课的习惯。

Xiao Zhang always revises his lessons at the corner of the house every evening.

表妹是个温柔闲静的女孩，到哪都不爱多说话。

tǐwēnjì
(clinical) thermometer
体温计显示你现在发烧四十度。
Tǐwēnjì xiǎnshì nǐ xiànzài fāshāo sìshí dù。
The thermometer shows that you are running a fever: your body temperature has reached 40°.
我的体温正常，不必试表。

体温

体温。

我的体温正常，不必试表。

体温正常。
体温有所下降。

to take one\'s temperature
量出(某人的)体温
The doctor took my temperature, and than gave me some medicine.
大夫测了我的体温，又给我吃了些药。

使用可卡因后身体会出现很多症状，如血管收缩、瞳孔放大、体温上升、心率加快和血压升高。
Hypothermia is an extremely complex condition.
体温过低是种非常复杂的疾病。
to take sb\'s temperature
测某人的体温

吃姜能够促进排汗，所以有助于降低体温。

约翰感冒了，他现在体温是39度。

那份报告介绍了哺乳动物的体温调节。

The minimum pressure required to liquefy a gas at its critical temperature is its critical pressure.
Shǐ qìtǐ línjiè wēndù shí yèhuà suǒ xūyào de zuì xiǎo yālì jiùshì gāi qìtǐ de línjiè yālì。
使气体临界温度时液化所需要的最小压力就是该气体的临界压力。
A black body maintained at a constant temperature is a full radiator at that temperature because the radiation reaching and leaving it must be in equilibrium.
Hēisè wùtǐ zài héngwēn tiáojiàn xià shì wēndù de wánquán fúshèqì，yīnwèi dàodá hé líkāi gāi wùtǐ de fúshèliàng bìxū bǎochí pínghéng。
黑色物体在恒温条件下是温度的完全辐射器，因为到达和离开该物体的辐射量必须保持平衡。
Arsine is a toxic, colorless gas with a garlic-like odor at room temperature and atmospheric pressure.
胂是一种无色有毒气体，在室温和大气压力下会发出类似大蒜的气味。

zēnggāo wēnshì de wēndù
raise the temperature of a hothouse

shìnèi（wài）wēndù

wēnshìxiàoyìng

他家卧室中壁布的色彩很温馨，一看就知道是精心选择的。

The color of the wall cloth looks very cozy, which must be chosen with great care.
我家的温度计上还带有湿度计，能够随时掌握室内的湿度。

Chocolate should be stored at room temperature.
巧克力可以在室温下存放。

卧室升温了。

条约被批准后，这个国家会减少其温室气体排放量。

variations (or fluctuations) of temperature

qìwēn huíshēnɡ
The temperature has gone up again.

There was a sudden drop in the temperature.
气温降低了。

气温降到了零度。

There was a marked drop in the temperature.

本市的气温已超过警戒线。

明天气温将降到零下，请市民们注意防寒。

Hēisè wùtǐ zài héngwēn tiáojiàn xià shì wēndù de wánquán fúshèqì，yīnwèi dàodá hé líkāi gāi wùtǐ de fúshèliàng bìxū bǎochí pínghéng。

Greenhouse gases trap heat and prevent its escape from the atmosphere into space.

温室气体会蓄热并阻止热量从大气向太空散逸。
科学上所说的绝对温度，与我们日常所说的“温度”不同。

yì fēng xìn
a letter

中央集权的封建帝国
zhōngyāngjíquán de fēngjiàn dìguó 
a centralized feudal empire
封建、家长式的领导
fēngjiàn、jiāzhǎngshì de lǐngdǎo 
leadership characterized by feudal, patriarchal practices
历代封建统治阶级都力图用礼教把妇女禁锢起来。
Lìdài fēngjiàn tǒngzhì jiējí dōu lìtú yònglǐjiào bǎ fùnǚ jìngù qǐlái。
All through the feudal ages the ruling class did their best to shackle women with Confucian ethics.

lìdài fēngjiàn wángcháo

fēngjiàn lǐjiào de pànnì

fēngjiàn wángcháo 
feudal dynasties

封建余孽
fēnɡjiàn yúniè 
dregs of feudalism
封建婚姻制度葬送了她一生的幸福。
Fēngjiàn hūnyīn zhìdù zàngsòng le tā yìshēng de xìngfú。
The feudal marriage system condemned her an unhappy married life.
封建政府长期横征暴敛激起百姓的反抗。
Fēngjiàn zhèngfǔ chángqī héngzhēng bàoliǎn jīqǐ bǎixìng de fǎnkàng。
The collection of illegal fees on the part of the feudal government let to fierce objections from the public.
鲁迅先生在很多文章中都笔伐了封建传统。
Lǔxùn xiānshēng zài hěnduō wénzhāng zhōng dōu bǐfá le fēngjiàn chuántǒng。
Luxun attacked feudal traditions in many of his articles.
他这封建议书可以说是句句昌言呀！
Tā zhè fēng jiànyìshū kěyǐ shuō shì jùjù chāngyán ya！
His recommendation letter is full of justified statements.
有些封建卫道士侈言仁义礼志信，但却无恶不作。
Yǒuxiē fēngjiàn wèdàoshì chǐyán rényìlǐzhìxìn，dàn què wúè búzuò。
Some apologists of feudalism glibly talk about the feudalist tenet of being benevolent, righteous , courteous, consistent and trustworthy, yet they committed all sorts of crimes.
封建时代，后宫的妃子都以得到皇上的宠幸为荣耀。
Fēngjiàn shídài，hòugōng de fēizǐ dōu yǐ dédào huángshàng de chǒngxìng wéi róngyào。
In feudal society, imperial concubines took grate pride in winning the emperors favor.
封建社会中官员对百姓和皇亲的态度截然不同。
Fēngjiàn shèhuì zhōng guānyuán duì bǎixìng hé huángqīn de tàidu jiéránbùtóng。
In feudal society officials had entirely different attitudes towards common people, and imperial relatives.
封建社会贫民是被禁止进入皇庄的。
Fēngjiàn shèhuì pínmín shì bèi jìnzhǐ jìnrù huángzhuāng de。
In feudal society poor people were forbidden to enter the imperial country estate.
叫魂怎么能治孩子的病！？这根本就是封建迷信。
Jiàohún zěnme néng zhì háizi de bìng！？Zhè gēnběn jiùshì fēngjiàn míxìn。
How can one cure the sick by calling back his spirit? It\'s sheer feudalistic superstition.
封建官府拉丁其实就是抓人去做苦力！
Fēngjiàn guānfǔ lādīng qíshí jiùshì zhuārén qù zuò kǔlì！
&quot;Impressment&quot; refers to feudal officials forcing civilians to serve as coolies.
他是个老封建，对于新事物新形势总是持有抵触的心理。
Tā shì gè lǎofēngjiàn，duìyú xīnshìwù xīnxíngshì zǒngshì chíyǒu dǐchù de xīnlǐ。
Being feudal, he always has an antipathy towards emerging things and situations.
封建礼教对人的毒害不只是当时当地，对后代也贻害无穷。
Fēngjiàn lǐjiào duì rén de dúhài bùzhǐshì dāngshí dāngdì，duì hòudài yě yíhài wúqióng。
Feudal ethical codes did not poison people of that time, but also brought endless harm to generations to come.
封建时代皇家立嗣处理不好往往会引发宫廷内乱。
Fēngjiàn shídài huángjiā lìsì chǔlǐ bùhǎo wǎngwǎng huì yǐnfā gōngtíng nèiluàn。
In feudal times, the inappropriate decisions of the successor to the throne often lead to civil strife in the court.
男尊女卑是封建社会遗留下来的思想观念，它错误地认为男人比女人高贵。
Nánzūn nǚbēi shì fēngjiànshèhuì yíliú xiàlái de sīxiǎng guānniàn，tā cuòwù de rènwéi nánrén bǐ nǚrén gāoguì。
The ideology of male domination, and female subordination is handed down from feudal society. It wrongly holds that males are nobler than females.
在封建时代的大户人家的院门外都耸立着两座威武的石狮。
Zài fēngjiàn shídài de dàhù rénjiā de yuànmén wài dōu sǒnglì zhe liǎng zuò wēiwǔ de shíshī。
In feudal times, there were two majestic stone lions standing in front of the gates of all rich families.
对封建迷信可不能盲目信从。
Duì fēngjiàn míxìn kě bùnéng mángmù xìncóng。
We shouldn\'t blindly believe in superstition.
秦王朝以还，我国确立了大一统的封建政权。

Since the establishment of the Qin Dynasty, our country established a unified feudal regime.

In feudal society, the Roman church regarded scientific theories as heretical beliefs.

封建社会，某些奴隶主用枝解等残忍手段迫害百姓。

这种封建思想一直蛀蚀着她那颗原本脆弱的心。

fēngjiànshèhuì

When the game was adjourned at noon, both players had taken 40 moves.

这是封密报，读后请尽快付丙。
Zhè shì fēng mìbào，dú hòu qǐng jìnkuài fùbǐng。

An introduction of the author is attached in the appendix.
在这封信的结尾她画了一个大大的感叹号。
Zài zhèfēngxìn de jiéwěi tā huà le yígè dàdà de gǎntànhào。
She added a big exclamation mark at the end of this letter.

大家一齐用劲，把大石头搬开了。
Dàjiā yìqí yòngjìn，bǎ dà shítou bānkāi le。
We all heaved together and removed the boulder.
各家各户一齐出动清扫路上的积雪。
Gè jiā gè hù yìqí chūdòng qīngsǎo lùshàng de jīxuě。
Every family turned out to clear up built-up snow on the field.
公司刚重建，百废待兴，我们一定要齐心合力。
Gōngsī gāng chóngjiàn，bǎifèidàixīng，wǒmen yídìng yào qíxīnhélì。
The company has just been reestablished. Everything is waiting to be improved, so it is extremely important that we work hard together.
在出发之前咱们先聚齐一下，点一下名！
Zài chūfā zhīqián zánmen xiān jùqí yíxià，diǎn yíxià míng！
Before starting off, let\'s get together and call the roll.
人都到齐了，一个不缺。
Rén dōu dàoqí le，yígè bùquē。
No one is absent. Everybody\'s here.
成一路纵队齐步走
chéngyílù zòngduì qíbùzǒu 
march (in) single file
群众齐心了，一切事情就好办了。
Qúnzhòngqíxīn le，yíqiè shìqingjiù hǎo bàn le。
When the masses are of one heart, everything becomes easy (or is easily accomplished).
拉纤的船夫在河岸上一步步挣扎着前进，一面有节奏地齐声哼着“杭育！杭育！”
Lāqiàn de chuánfū zài hé\'àn shàngyíbù bùzhēngzhá zhe qiánjìn，yí miàn yǒu jiézòu de qíshēngheng zhe “hángyù！hángyù！”
As they inched forward, step by step, on the banks of the river, the boat-pullers kept up a constant rhythmical &quot;Heave ho! Heave ho!&quot;
齐刷刷的一片麦子
qíshuāshuā de yípiàn màizi
an even expanse of wheat
我们大家齐心协力，一定能打败他们！
Wǒmen dàjiā qíxīnxiélì，yídìngnéngdǎbài tāmen！
If we all pull together, there\'s no doubt we can beat them!
齐着边儿画一道线
qí zhe biānr huà yídào xiàn
draw a line along the edge
一应工具均已备齐。
Yíyìnggōngjù jūn yǐ bèiqí。
All the tools are ready.
我把故宫的历史大概齐地了解了一下。
Wǒ bǎ gùgōng de lìshǐ dàgài qí de liǎojiě le yíxià。
I have got a general idea about the history of the Forbidden City.
这行没排齐，中间错进去了一点儿。
Zhè háng méi páiqí，zhōng jiān cuò jìnqù le yìdiǎnr。
This line is not straight. It\'s a little crooked in the middle.
检点一下行李，看是不是都齐了。
Jiǎndiǎn yíxià xíngli，kàn shì bu shì dōu qí le。
Check the luggage and see if everything is there.
先付一部分，差多少交货时找齐。
Xiān fù yíbù fen，chà duōshǎo jiāohuò shí zhǎoqí。
We\'ll pay you part of the sum now. The balance will be paid on delivery of the goods.
齐王对待寓公也像对待真正的贵族一样。
Qíwáng duìdài yùgōng yě xiàng duìdài zhēnzhèng de guìzú yíyàng。
The Qi emperor treated the bureaucrat in exile as if he were a real aristocrat.
咱们打伙儿一齐走吧！
天灾人祸一齐压到他头上，这次他不死也得脱层皮。
一齐动手。
精神文明和物质文明一齐抓。
一垄垄齐整的麦苗
所有檩条都跟这一根取齐。
一沓一沓码整齐
钱都收齐了，一分不少
企业界群雄齐集一堂。
队伍的服装要整齐划一。
各地代表齐集一堂。
队伍整齐，步调一致
下午三点在学校门口取齐，然后一同去车站。
大家齐上手，一会儿就把雪扫干净了。
一切手续都已齐全。
沿岸整齐地栽上了一排排柳树。
落霞与孤鹜齐飞，秋水共长天一色。
in chorus
一齐
Let\'s say &quot;yes!&quot; All at once.
Ràng wǒmen yìqí shuō“shì de！”。
让我们一齐说“是的！”。
The whole nation is united as one man.
Zhěnggè guójiā tuánjié-yìxīn， qíxīn-xiélì。
整个国家团结一心，齐心协力。
The picture is even with the window.
Zhè fú huà yǔ chuānghu yíyàng qí。
这幅画与窗户一样齐。
Everything was neat and tidied away.
Yíqiè dōu hěn zhěngqíhuàyī。
一切都很整齐化一。
The trees were lined deep into the street.
Shùmù páilièzhěngqí，yìzhí yánshēnzhì jiēdào shēnchù。
树木排列整齐，一直延伸至街道深处。
He decided to cut his long hair and get a trim haircut.
Tā juédìng jiǎndiào chángfà，liú yì tóu zhěngqí de fàxíng。
他决定剪掉长发，留一头整齐的发型。
We stacked up everything to make the room tidy for Christmas.
Wǒmen bǎ suǒyǒu dōngxi dōu tuǒshàn duījī qǐláile，yǐbiàn shèngdànjié de shíhou fángjiān néng zhěngqí yìxiē。
我们把所有东西都妥善堆积起来了，以便圣诞节的时候房间能整齐一些。
There are indoor and outdoor tennis courts and a very well equipped fitness centre.
Nàlǐ yǒu shìnèi hé shìwài wǎngqiúchǎng，háiyǒu yí gè shèshī qíbèi de jiànshēn zhōngxīn。
那里有室内和室外网球场，还有一个设施齐备的健身中心。
She was in a large room which was well furnished.
Tā zài yí gè pèibèi qíquán de dà fángjiān lǐ。
她在一个配备齐全的大房间里。
One more volume will complete this series.
再有一本即可凑齐这套丛书。
Working-class people need a party to stand shoulder to shoulder with them.
Gōngrén jiējí xūyào yí gè hé tāmen qíxīnxiélì de dǎng。
工人阶级需要一个和他们齐心协力的党。
There was a salvo of approval.
Tūrán bàochū yí zhèn zàntóng de qíshēnghècǎi。
突然爆出一阵赞同的齐声喝彩。
He had a small black moustache which was neatly trimmed.
Tā liúzhe yì xiǎo cuō xiūjiǎn zhěngqí de hēisè xiǎo húzǐ。
他留着一小撮修剪整齐的黑色小胡子。
They were still neck and neck in the last round.
Tāmen zài zuìhòu yì huíhé háishì bìngjiàqíqū。
他们在最后一回合还是并驾齐驱。
a handsome man with a clipped moustache
Yí gè húzǐ xiūjiǎn zhěngqí de yīngjùn nánrén
一个胡子修剪整齐的英俊男人
The girls were well turned out and smart.
Gūniángmen yí gè gè dǎban de zhěngqí、piàoliang。
姑娘们一个个打扮得整齐、漂亮。
He was met with a chorus of applause from the audience.
Guānzhòng qíshēng duì tā bàoyǐ yí zhèn rèliè de zhǎngshēng。
观众齐声对他报以一阵热烈的掌声。
She tried to emulate you right from the start.
Tā cóng yìkāishǐ jiù nǔlì xiàng nǐ kànqí。
她从一开始就努力向你看齐。
She took along a brush to keep the hair tidy.
Tā suíshēn dàizhe yì bǎ shūzi，yǐ bǎochí tóufa zhěngqí。
她随身带着一把梳子，以保持头发整齐。
The boy was trimmed up for his first day at school.
Zhège nánhái yīnwèi dì-yī tiān shàngxué ér dǎban de zhěngzhěng-qíqí。
这个男孩因为第一天上学而打扮得整整齐齐。
There have been good and mediocre and bad artists.
Nàlǐ yǒu hǎo de、yìbān de、chà de yìshùjiā，liángyǒubùqí。
那里有好的、一般的、差的艺术家，良莠不齐。
The branches should be cut off in a trimly manner.
Yīng jiāng zhèxiē zhīyā xiūjiǎn zhěngqí。
应将这些枝丫修剪整齐。
He had a small black moustache which was neatly trimmed.
Tā liúzhe yì xiǎo cuō xiūjiǎn zhěngqí de hēisè xiǎo húzǐ。
他留着一小撮修剪整齐的黑色小胡子。
Grass edges should be evenly dressed.
Cǎopíng shàngfāng yīng xiūjiǎn zhěngqí。
草坪上方应修剪整齐。
a handsome man with a clipped moustache
Yí gè húzǐ xiūjiǎn zhěngqí de yīngjùn nánrén
一个胡子修剪整齐的英俊男人
Not only can they operate the machines with safety, but they can also repair them.
他们不仅能够安全地操作这些集齐，而且还会修理他们。
治疗和锻炼双管齐下，他很快就会恢复健康。
Zhìliáo hé duànliàn shuāngguǎnqíxià，tā hěnkuài jiù huì huīfù jiànkāng。
With medical treatment and exercise working in parallel, he will quickly recover.
双管齐下

qíxīn
be of one mind (or heart)

效法
xiàofǎ
follow the example of; model oneself on; learn from
效法
xiàofǎ
follow an example
我们应该效法先进的教育制度。
Wǒmen yīnggāi xiàofǎ xiānjìn de jiàoyù zhìdù。
We ought to learn from advanced educational systems.

Doing sit-ups is an effective way to exercise abdominal muscles.
加快商品流通是获得经济利益的有效方法。
Jiākuài shāngpǐn liútōng shì huòdé jīngjì lìyì de yǒuxiàofāngfǎ。
Accelerating commodity circulation is an effective way to gain economic interest.
切实有效的办法
qièshí yǒuxiào de bànfǎ
practical and effective measures
这种方法效果差，费用高。
Zhè zhǒnɡ fānɡfǎ xiàoguǒ chà，fèiyòng gāo。
This method will get fewer and poorer results, and progress will be slower and costs higher. or That\'s an inefficient and expensive method.
行之有效的办法
xíngzhīyǒuxiào de bànfǎ
effective measures
这个工程队在筑路方面有一套行之有效的办法。
Zhège gōngchéngduì zài zhùlù fāngmiàn yǒu yítào xíngzhī yǒuxiào de bànfǎ。
This construction team has a set of effective methods for road construction.
他靠非法生意发财后，很多人都如蝇逐臭，仿效他的做法。
Tā kào fēifǎ shēngyì fācái hòu，hěnduōrén dōu rúyíng zhúchòu，fǎngxiào tā de zuòfǎ。
After he got rich through an illegal business, many people followed him, like flies going after a rank smell.
采用有效的工作方法
cǎiyòng yǒuxiào de gōngzuò fāngfǎ 
use effective work methods
方法对头，效率就高。
Fāngfǎ duìtóu，xiàolǜ jiù gāo。
When the method is correct, efficiency is high. or Good methods make for high efficiency.
想出一个有效的挽救办法
xiǎngchū yígè yǒuxiào de wǎnjiù bànfǎ 
think out an effective remedy
这个办法能奏效吗？
Zhège bànfǎ néngzòuxiào ma? 
Will this method work?
睡眠疗法对于他的病很有效，医生决定继续用这种方法对他进行治疗。
Shuìmián liáofǎ duìyú tā de bìng hěnyǒuxiào，yīshēng juédìng jìxù yòng zhèzhǒng fāngfǎ duì tā jìnxíng zhìliáo。
Sleep treatment is very effective for his disease, so the doctor decided to go on using it to treat him.
这办法确乎有效。
Zhè bànfǎ quèhū yǒuxiào。
This method is really effective.
在新的法规没有公布之前，成法依然有效。
Zài xīn de fǎguī méiyǒu gōngbùzhīqián，chéngfǎ yīrán yǒuxiào。
The established laws and decrees are still in effect until the promulgation of the new ones.
如果找到了消除藻类的方法，就能有效地防止水华。
Rúguǒ zhǎodào le xiāochú zǎolèi de fāngfǎ，jiù néng yǒuxiào de fángzhǐ shuǐhuá。
If we can find a method to eliminate algae, we can effectively prevent the algae bloom.
这种教学方法很有实效。
Zhèzhǒng jiàoxuéfāngfǎ hěn yǒu shíxiào。
This kind of teaching method is very effective.
由此及彼、由表及理是一种有效的归纳演绎方法。
Yóucǐjíbǐ 、 yóubiǎojílǐ shì yìzhǒng yǒuxiào de guīnà yǎnyì fāngfǎ。
From one to the other and from outside to inside is an effective method of induction and deduction.
用这种方法减肥有速效。
Yòng zhèzhǒng fāngfǎ jiǎnféi yǒu sùxiào。
You will see quick results with this diet.
这种方法具有明显的效验。
Zhèzhǒng fāngfǎ jùyǒu míngxiǎn de xiàoyàn。
This method produces tangible results.
他仿效那位名歌唱家的唱法，已经达到无懈可击的地步。
Tā fǎngxiào nà wèi mínggēchàngjiā de chàngfǎ，yǐjing dádào wúxièkějī de dìbù。
His imitation of that famous singer is perfect.
这位官长的审案方法很特别也很有效。
Zhèwèi guānzhǎng de shěnàn fāngfǎ hěntèbié yě hěnyǒuxiào。
The government official\'s way of trying cases is very unique and effective.
在一定的历史时期，使用严刑峻法比宽松政策更有效。
Zài yídìng de lìshǐ shíqī，shǐyòng yánxíng jùnfǎ bǐ kuānsōng zhèngcè gèng yǒuxiào。
During a certain period of time in history, severe punishments were much more effective that lax policies.
针对这种病症，体育疗法会取得更好的疗效。
Zhēnduì zhèzhǒng bìngzhèng，tǐyù liáofǎ huì qǔdé gèng hǎo de liáoxiào。
Exercise therapy can better cure the disease.
法官裁定他的证词有效。
Fǎguān cáidìngtā de zhèngcí yǒuxiào。
The judge ruled that his testimony was valid.
大队长被调离执法岗位，进行反省学习，以观后效。
Dàduìzhǎng bèi diàolí zhífǎ gǎngwèi，jìnxíng fǎnxǐng xuéxí，yǐguān hòuxiào。
The captain was removed from his position of executing the law to undertake self-reflection, and study. His future behaviour will be observed.
效法前辈，报效祖国。
效法
效法。
减少中转环节是降低销售成本的有效办法之一。
这份合同经公证处认证，具有法律效力
这种办法显效较慢，但省钱。
针刺同一个穴位，捻针指法不同，效果就会不同。
无效的合同没有法律约束力。
这个办法果然奏效。
采取这种做法，管保有特效|
单用一种方法，有时难以奏效。
我仍然主张动手术，虽则保守疗法也有一定疗效。
an active law
生效的法律
He discoursed on his understanding of the new laws that would take effect.
Tā chǎnshùle tā duì zhège jíjiāng shēngxiào de fǎlìng de lǐjiě kànfǎ。
他阐述了他对这个即将生效的法令的理解看法。
Proximity to the eye is one effective way of magnifying visual material.
Mùguāng jiējìn shì zēngjiā wùtǐ shìjué xiàoguǒ de yì zhǒng yǒuxiào fāngfǎ。
目光接近是增加物体视觉效果的一种有效方法。
Ring containment is a proven method of halting a smallpox epidemic.
Zài zǔzhǐ tiānhuā chuánrǎn fāngmiàn，yuánxíng dìqū gélí shì yì zhǒng dédào yànzhèng de yǒuxiào fāngfǎ。
在阻止天花传染方面，圆形地区隔离是一种得到验证的有效方法。
an ex post facto law
有追溯效力的法令
The efficiency of a computer cannot be compared with a human being.
Jìsuànjī de xiàolǜ wúfǎ yǔ rén xiāngtíbìnglùn。
计算机的效率无法与人相提并论。
It determines once and for all which reading methods worked best.
Tā jiānghuì yìláoyǒngyì de juédìng nǎ zhǒng yuèdú fāngfǎ xiàoguǒ zuì hǎo。
它将会一劳永逸地决定哪种阅读方法效果最好。
a law of little effect
收效甚微的法律

仍然生效的一条法律

电子邮件或者传真文件上出现这样的指控具有法律效力吗？
to become effective
[法] 生效
This assessment can help you to understand your memory pattern and to develop your own efficient way of learning.
这个评估可以帮你了解自己的记忆模式，并有助于形成适合你的有效学习方法。
We needed a federal warrant, which is valid all over America.
Wǒmen xūyào yí gè zài quán měiguó dōu yǒuxiào de liánbāng fǎlìng。
我们需要一个在全美国都有效的联邦法令。
I can\'t balance work and home duties effectively.
Wǒ wúfǎ yǒuxiào de pínghéng gōngzuò hé jiāwù。
我无法有效地平衡工作和家务。
The governors\' decisions were invalid.
Zhōuzhǎngmen de juédìng shì méiyǒu fǎlǜ xiàolì de。
州长们的决定是没有法律效力的。
He introduced more efficient methods of production.
Tā yǐnrùle gèng duō de gāoxiào shēngchǎn fāngfǎ。
他引入了更多的高效生产方法。

to follow sb\'s lead

It\'s quite clear that this won\'t work.
十分清楚的是，这方法不奏效。
He is clerk of method and dispatch.
他是个办事有方法又有效率的职员。
You could kill two birds with one stone by following our example.
Fǎngxiào wǒmen de zuòfǎ，nǐ jiù kěyǐ yìjǔliǎngdé。

许多人效仿了他的做法。

It is not easy to estimate whether this method will work or not.
判断这个方法是否奏效并不容易。

She was still clinging to the hope that the treatment would work.

她仍然保有希望，希望这种疗法能够起效。
The plan did not work and the emphasis switched from stage set to soapbox.

这条法律仍然有效。

yīzhì wúxiào 
fail to respond to medical treatment
宣布合同无效
xuānbùhétongwúxiào 
declare a contract invalid (or null and void); invalidate (or nullify) a contract
宣布选举无效
xuānbùxuǎnjǔ wúxiào 
nullify an election
舞台效果
wǔtái xiàoguǒ 
stage effect
药的效果还不显。
Yào de xiàoguǒ hái bùxiǎn。
The effect of the medicine is not yet noticeable.
这种药显效快。
Zhèzhǒng yào xiǎnxiào kuài。
This medicine produces quick results.
他治学严谨，值得效法。
Tā zhìxué yánjǐn，zhídé xiàofǎ。
His meticulous scholarship is worthy of emulation. or We have much to learn form his meticulous scholarship.
效果不大
xiàoguǒ bú dà
not be very effective; produce little effect
取得良好的效果
qǔdé liánghǎo de xiàoguǒ
achieve good results
乐于为您效劳。
Lèyú wèi nín xiàoláo。
I\'m only too glad to offer you my services.
为国效力
wèi guó xiàolì
serve one\'s country
这药很有效力。
Zhè yào hěn yǒu xiàolì。
The medicine is efficacious.
效率高
xiàolǜ gāo
efficient
效率低
xiàolǜ dī
inefficient
这项革新使工作效率提高五倍。
Zhè xiàng géxīn shǐ gōngzuò xiàolǜ tígāo wǔ bèi。
The innovation raised (or increased) efficiency fivefold.
充分发挥水、肥的效能
chōngfèn fāhuī shuǐ、féi de xiàonéng
make the best possible use of irrigation and fertilizer
没有效验
méiyǒu xiàoyàn
prove ineffective; fall flat
这种方法具有明显的效验。
Zhèzhǒng fāngfǎ jùyǒu míngxiǎn de xiàoyàn。
This method produces tangible results.
灌溉效益
ɡuànɡài xiàyì

经济效益
jīngjì xiàoyì

社会效益
shèhuì xiàoyì

投资效益
tóuzī xiàoyì
investment results
热效应
rèxiàoyìng
fuel factor; heat effect; thermal results
光电效应
guāngdiàn xiàoyìng
photoelectric effect; electro-optic effect
发挥明显的效用
fāhuī míngxiǎn de xiàoyòng

行之有效的办法
xíngzhīyǒuxiào de bànfǎ

宣布无效
xuānbùwúxiào
declare sth. invalid (or null and void)
宣告无效
xuāngào wúxiào
declare sth. null and void
迅速取得成效
xùnsù qǔdé chéngxiào

盐析效应
yánxī xiàoyìng

安全、有效、简便、经济的避孕药具
ānquán、yǒuxiào、jiǎnbiàn、jīngjì de bìyùn yàojù

依然有效
yīrán yǒuxiào 
still hold good; remain valid
意想不到的效果
yìxiǎngbúdào de xiàoguǒ
unexpected results
疗效因人而异。
Liáoxiào yīnrénéryì。
The effect of the treatment varies with the individual.
音响效果
yīnxiǎnɡ xiàoɡuǒ 
sound effects; acoustics
这张车票三日内有效。
Zhè zhāngchēpiào sān rì nèi yǒuxiào。
This train ticket is good (or valid) for three days.
这个指示仍然有效。
Zhège zhǐshì réngrán yǒuxiào。
The directive still holds good.
达到预期的效果
dádào yùqī de xiàoguǒ 
achieve the desired (or hoped-for) results
裁判判进球无效，因为有个球员处在越位位置。
Cáipàn pàn jìnqiú wúxiào，yīnwèi yǒu gè qiúyuán chǔzài yuèwèi wèizhi。
The referee disallowed the goal because one of the players was offside.
参观改期，入场券照旧有效。
Cānguān gǎiqī，rùchǎngquàn zhàojiù yǒuxiào。

镇痛效果
zhèntònɡ xiàoɡuǒ

zhìliáo xiàoɡuǒ

zhìhòu xiàoyìng

颇著成效
pō zhù chéngxiào

进行了卓有成效的努力
jìnxíng le zhuóyǒuchéngxiào de nǔlì

该省农业机械化的工作成效卓著。
Gāi shěngnóngyè jīxièhuà de gōngzuò chéngxiào zhuózhù。
That province has achieved outstanding results in farm mechanization.
自即日起生效
zì jírì qǐ shēnɡxiào 
become effective (as) from this date; with effect from (w.e.f.)
这药服了马上奏效。
Zhè yào fú le mǎshàngzòuxiào。
This medicine will have immediate efficacy.
这个办法能奏效吗？
Zhège bànfǎ néngzòuxiào ma? 
Will this method work?
做事不能只凭动机，不问效果。
Zuòshì bùnéng zhǐ píngdòngjī，bú wèn xiàoguǒ。
Actions shouldn\'t be guided solely by motive without any attention to effect.
长效磺胺
chángxiào huáng\'àn
sulphamethoxypyridazine (SMP)
效法
xiàofǎ
follow the example of; model oneself on; learn from
见效
jiànxiào

上行下效
shàngxíngxiàxiào
subordinates follow the example of their superiors; those below follow the (usu. bad) example of those above; if a leader sets a bad example, it will be followed by his subordinates
报效
bàoxiào
render service to repay sb\'s kindness
效命疆场
xiàomìng jiāngchǎng

xiàozhōng xuānshì

效验
xiàoyàn

效尤
xiàoyóu

奏效
zòuxiào
prove effective; be successful; get the desired result
妈妈苦苦哀劝他不要再吸毒了，但没有效果。
Māmā kǔkǔ āiquàn tā búyào zài xīdú le，dàn méiyǒu xiàoguǒ。
Mother said everything she could trying to talk him into quitting drugs, but it was no good.
这种制度效率低、暗耗大，一定要改进。
Zhèzhǒng zhìdù xiàolǜ dī、ànhào dà，yídìng yào gǎijìn。
The system is inefficient and wasteful. We must do something about it.
现在我们也实现了办公自动化，工作效率比过去高多了。

Now we have achieved office automation, work efficiency is much higher than before.
使用保险套能够有效防止性病及艾滋病的传播。
Shǐyòng bǎoxiǎntào nénggòu yǒuxiào fángzhǐ xìngbìng jí àizībìng de chuánbō。
Condoms can protect against AIDS and other sexually-transmitted diseases.
有人说，服用避孕药还具有美容的功效。
Yǒu rén shuō，fúyòng bìyùnyào hái jùyǒu měiróng de gōngxiào。
It is said that taking birth pills can make one more beautiful.
这家公司效益不好，需要进行编遣。
Zhèjiā gōngsī xiàoyì bùhǎo，xūyào jìnxíng biānqiǎn。

这个企业因为效益不好，被一家大企业并转。

This company was acquired by a large enterprise because of its poor performance.
他手术后依然昏昏沉沉，估计是麻醉药的残效还没有完全消失。
Tā shǒushù hòu yīrán hūnhūnchénchén，gūjì shì mázuìyào de cánxiào hái méiyǒu wánquán xiāoshī。
He still felt dazed after the operation. The narcotic must still be effecting him.
在新的法规没有公布之前，成法依然有效。
Zài xīn de fǎguī méiyǒu gōngbùzhīqián，chéngfǎ yīrán yǒuxiào。
The established laws and decrees are still in effect until the promulgation of the new ones.
随着城市的发展，城市热岛效应越来越严重了。

With the city development, &quot;urban heat island&quot; effect becomes more and more severe.
医生说这种药比较迟效，让我坚持服用。
Yīshēng shuō zhèzhǒng yào bǐjiào chíxiào，ràng wǒ jiānchí fúyòng。
The doctor said the medicine was slow-acting and suggested that I take it persistently.
这种药剂具有持效期长等优点。
Zhèzhǒng yàojì jùyǒu chíxiàoqī cháng děng yōudiǎn。
This medicine has advantages such as a persistent effect.
国家对于沙尘暴的治理已经初见成效。
Guójiā duìyú shāchénbào de zhìlǐ yǐjing chūjiàn chéngxiào。
The country\'s measures to prevent sandstorms have begun to show their effects.
这次的演出效果次于上次，可能是舞台布景的原因。
Zhècì de yǎnchū xiàoguǒ cìyú shàngcì，kěnéng shì wǔtái bùjǐng de yuányīn。
The effect of this performance is not as good as last time. Maybe it is because of the stage setting.
我们最好还是错休，这样能提高工作效率。
Wǒmen zuìhǎo háishì cuòxiū，zhèyàng néng tígāo gōngzuò xiàolǜ。
We had better take staggered leave so as to increase working efficiency.
这事儿最好分头协作，搭班干反而效率不高。

Xīnlái de zhèwèi dǎzìyuán，gōngzuò xiàolǜ hěngāo。
The new typist works with high efficiency.
做导引运动具有健身功效。
Zuò dǎoyǐn yùndòng jùyǒu jiànshēn gōngxiào。
Guide exercises can build our body.
我们必须对已夺的登陆场进行有效控制。
Wǒmen bìxū duì yǐ duó de dēnglùchǎng jìnxíng yǒuxiào kòngzhì。
We must have effective control over the conquered landing place.
他工作效率太低了，根本不抵事。
Tā gōngzuò xiàolǜ tài dī le，gēnběn bùdǐshì。
He is too inefficient in working, he\'s not worth his salt.

这样拍摄效果会很模糊，你应该先对焦。
Zhèyàng pāishè xiàoguǒ huì hěn móhu，nǐ yīnggāi xiān duìjiāo。

这么快就干完那些活儿了，你可真是高效！

You\'ve finished your work so soon, you\'re so efficient!

Zhè pī gāo xiàonéng shèbèi shì xīn yǐnjìn de。
The set of high performance equipments is newly brought in.

Guǎnrdēng de zhàomíng xiàoguǒ shì zuìhǎo de。
我们要努力实现规模化的生产，不断提高经济效益。
Wǒmen yào nǔlì shíxiàn guīmóhuà de shēngchǎn，búduàn tígāo jīngjì xiàoyì。

此药对于治理黄病有很好的疗效。

这台机器的机械效率很低，每个月都完不成任务。

用激光打印机打印出来的字体效果特别棒。

Laser printers can produce wonderful type.

为了获得更好的效果，编导们在精编节目。
Wèile huòdé gènghǎo de xiàoguǒ，biāndǎomen zài jīngbiān jiémù。
The directors arrange the programs carefully to have a better effect.

shīqù shíxiào

他手术后依然昏昏沉沉，估计是麻醉药的残效还没有完全消失。
Tā shǒushù hòu yīrán hūnhūnchénchén，gūjì shì mázuìyào de cánxiào hái méiyǒu wánquán xiāoshī。
He still felt dazed after the operation. The narcotic must still be effecting him.
药品失效
合同失效。
肥效流失。
All functions of the machine stayed when the power was switched off.
电源关掉后，所有功能都失效了。
A rocket motor failed and the spacecraft did not reach its intended orbit
Yì tái huǒjiàn fādòngjī shīxiàole，yǔzhòufēichuán wèinéng jìnrù yùdìngguǐdào。
一台火箭发动机失效了，宇宙飞船未能进入预定轨道。
The correspondence lapsed.
Hánjiàn shīxiào le。
函件失效了。
He lapsed his membership.
Tā de chéngyuán zīgé yǐjīng shīxiào le。
他的成员资格已经失效了。
These effects disappear as the drug is eliminated from the body.
Yàowù cóng réntǐ nèi páichū hòu，zhèxiē liáoxiào jiù xiāoshī le。
药物从人体内排出后，这些疗效就消失了。
The effects of the medicine was wearing off.
Yàoxiào zhújiàn xiāoshī。
药效逐渐消失。
The effect vanished when day broke.
Tiān yí pòxiǎo，zhè zhǒng xiàoguǒ jiù xiāoshīle。
天一破晓，这种效果就消失了。
It worked, but wore off in a few days.
gāi chǎnpǐn yǒuxiào，dàn xiàolì huì zài jǐtiān zhīhòu xiāoshī。
该产品有效，但效力会在几天之后消失。
开始生效
kāishǐ shēnɡxiào
take effect; come into effect (or force)
本条约在签字后立即生效。
Běn tiáoyuē zài qiānzì hòu lìjí shēngxiào。
This treaty shall come into force upon signature.
自签字之日起生效
zì qiānzì zhī rì qǐ shēngxiào
go into effect from the date of signature
在互换批准书以后立即生效
zài hù huàn pīzhǔnshū yǐhòu lìjí shēngxiào
come into force immediately on exchange of the instruments of ratification
生效条款
shēngxiào tiáokuǎn
entry-into-force clause
自即日起生效
zì jírì qǐ shēnɡxiào 
become effective (as) from this date; with effect from (w.e.f.)
经双方协商，这条界约今日生效。
Jīng shuāngfāng xiéshāng，zhè tiáo jièyuē jīnrì shēngxiào。
It has been agreed by both sides that this borderline treaty come into effect today.
生产效率大大提高。
Shēngchǎn xiàolǜ dàdà tígāo。
Productivity has risen greatly.
工业链的建成使生产效率大大提高。
Gōngyèliàn de jiànchéng shǐ shēngchǎn xiàolǜ dàdà tígāo。
The establishment of the industrial chain has greatly increased production efficiency.
我们要改进技术，以提高生产效率。
Wǒmen yào gǎijìn jìshù，yǐ tígāo shēngchǎn xiàolǜ。
We should improve the technology so as to increase production.
由于引进了先进技术，生产效率因此大大提高。
Yóuyú yǐnjìnle xiānjìn jìshù，shēngchǎn xiàolǜ yīncǐ dàdà tígāo。
The production rate has increased hugely due to imported advanced technology.
艺人们的炒作，就是为了产生轰动效应。
Yìrénmen de chǎozuò，jiùshì wèi le chǎnshēng hōngdòng xiàoyìng。
Deliberate news-making of celebrities aims to create strong public interest.
这片速生林有效地起到了防风固沙的作用。
Zhè piàn sùshēnglín yǒuxiào de qǐdào le fángfēng gùshā de zuòyòng。
This fast-growing forest effectively prevents windstorms and fastens sand in the land.
医生正在采取有效措施防止发生危象。
Yīshēng zhèngzài cǎiqǔ yǒuxiào cuòshī fángzhǐ fāshēng wēi xiàng。
The doctors are taking effective measures to prevent medical crises.
睡眠疗法对于他的病很有效，医生决定继续用这种方法对他进行治疗。
Shuìmián liáofǎ duìyú tā de bìng hěnyǒuxiào，yīshēng juédìng jìxù yòng zhèzhǒng fāngfǎ duì tā jìnxíng zhìliáo。
Sleep treatment is very effective for his disease, so the doctor decided to go on using it to treat him.
神话里的蟠桃具有长生不死的功效。
Shénhuà lǐ de pántáo jùyǒu chángshēng bùsǐ de gōngxiào。
Immortal peaches in fables can make people perpetually young.
医生说这种药比较迟效，让我坚持服用。
Yīshēng shuō zhèzhǒng yào bǐjiào chíxiào，ràng wǒ jiānchí fúyòng。
The doctor said the medicine was slow-acting and suggested that I take it persistently.
我们要努力实现规模化的生产，不断提高经济效益。
Wǒmen yào nǔlì shíxiàn guīmóhuà de shēngchǎn，búduàn tígāo jīngjì xiàoyì。
We should work hard to realize large-scale production so as to constantly increase economic benefits.
我们国家正在采取有效措施保护原生林。
Wǒmen guójiā zhèngzài cǎiqǔ yǒuxiào cuòshī bǎohù yuánshēnglín。
Our country is taking effective measures to protect the primeval forest.
用了这种特效的牙膏，小孩蛀牙发生率可能会下降。
Yòng le zhèzhǒng tèxiào de yágāo，xiǎohái zhùyá fāshēnglǜ kěnéng huì xiàjiàng。
By using this kind of special toothpaste, children may decrease the rate of tooth decay.
我们要采取有效措施保护原始林，防止生态遭到破坏。
Wǒmen yào cǎiqǔ yǒuxiào cuòshī bǎohù yuánshǐlín，fángzhǐ shēngtài zāodào pòhuài。
We should take effective measures to protect the primitive forest and prevent the ecology from damage.
只有实行规模生产和规模经营才能实现规模效益。
Zhǐyǒu shíxíng guīmó shēngchǎn hé guīmó jīngyíng cáinéng shíxiàn guīmó xiàoyì。
Large-scale benefits can only be achieved through large-scale production and operations.
他靠非法生意发财后，很多人都如蝇逐臭，仿效他的做法。
Tā kào fēifǎ shēngyì fācái hòu，hěnduōrén dōu rúyíng zhúchòu，fǎngxiào tā de zuòfǎ。
After he got rich through an illegal business, many people followed him, like flies going after a rank smell.
学生应该学会抓空儿，合理分配时间提高效率。
Xuésheng yīnggāi xuéhuì zhuākòngr，hélǐ fēnpèi shíjiān tígāo xiàolǜ。
Students should learn to find time and use time properly so as to increase efficiency.
须有关部门打印才能生效
材料没有盖章，不能生效

只消半小时就生效。

an active law
生效的法律
The law goes into effect today.
该项法律今日起生效。
the efficient cause
直接生效的原因
to put teeth into a law
使法律生效
a law that is still in vigor
仍然生效的一条法律
You have to wait a couple minutes so the stain remover can take effect.
这些除锈剂必须等几分钟才能生效。
to come into {or} take effect
[law+] 生效
to become effective
[法] 生效
to come into force
[law，system+] 生效
to come into operation
生效
This contract will be executed after both parties sign it.
这个合同在双方签署后生效。
There is a period of grace before the ban comes into effect.
这个禁令生效前有一段宽限期。
All hostile activities must conclude after the treaty comes into effect.
所有敌对活动在合约生效后，必须终止。
He discoursed on his understanding of the new laws that would take effect.
Tā chǎnshùle tā duì zhège jíjiāng shēngxiào de fǎlìng de lǐjiě kànfǎ。
他阐述了他对这个即将生效的法令的理解看法。
The new rules did not act quickly enough.
Xīn guīdìng shēngxiào búgòu jíshí。
新规定生效不够及时。
The regulation came into force early in 1995.
Gāi guīzé zǎozài yījiǔwǔwǔ nián jiù shēngxiào le。
该规则早在1955年就生效了。
The act came into operation on April 6th, 1975.
Zhè xiàng fǎ\'àn yījiǔqīwǔ nián sì yuè liù rì shēngxiào。
这项法案1975年4月6日生效。
Where the matter in question is urgent, the decision will come into force immediately.
Zhēngzhí zhōng de shìqing yídàn jǐnjí， juédìng huì lìjí shēngxiào。
争执中的事情一旦紧急，决定会立即生效。
This decree was put into force in Norway.
Zhè xiàng pànjué zài Nuówēi shēngxiào。
这项判决在挪威生效。
The contract took effect on 1 May.
Hétong cóng wǔ yuè yī rì qǐ shēngxiào。
合同从五月一日起生效。
Emission rules won\'t take effect until next year.
Páifàng zhǔnzé huì cóng míngnián kāishǐ shēngxiào。
排放准则会从明年开始生效。
The statute is solely prospective in operation.
Zhè xiàng fǎlǜ jǐnjǐn shì yùqī huì shēngxiào。
这项法律仅仅是预期会生效。
The president executed the treaty.
Zǒngtǒng zài zhè bù tiáoyuē shàng qiānzì shǐ qí shēngxiào。
总统在这部条约上签字使其生效。
The law is effective immediately.
Zhè bù fǎlǜ lìjí shēngxiào。
这部法律立即生效。
The law is already in effect (or in force).
Zhè bù fǎlǜ yǐjīng shēngxiào（ huòzhě yǐjīng shíshī）。
这部法律已经生效（或者已经实施）。
The new law will take effect next month.
Xīn fǎlǜ xiàyuè shēngxiào。
新法律下月生效。

为此，自分拆生效以来，他一直在四处奔走。

使劲清洗对污渍没产生多大效果

见效
jiànxiào
become effective; produce the desired result
他头痛发烧，吃了几回平熄内风的中药汤，很见效果。
Tā tóutòng fāshāo，chī le jǐ huí píngxī nèifēng de zhōng yàotāng，hěnjiàn xiàoguǒ。
He had a headache and a fever. After taking some traditional Chinese medicinal soup several times, which is used to cure disease caused by pathological changes of internal organs, he is now better.
见效
jiànxiào
take effect
初见成效
chūjiànchéngxiào 
win initial success
立见功效
lì jiàn gōngxiào

The country\'s measures to prevent sandstorms have begun to show their effects.
这个项目我们投劳不少，却没有见到成效。

We put a great deal of labor into this project, but haven\'t seen any results.

挥手告别

他挥手叫我们前进。

That man is so rich, he\'s practically rolling in money.

挥发性
huīfāxìng
volatility
实践中，我们要尽量发挥主观能动性。
Shíjiàn zhōng，wǒmen yào jìnliàng fāhuī zhǔguān néngdòngxìng。
In practice, we should try our best to bring our subjective initiative into play.
供给制不利于发挥劳动者的劳动积极性。
Gōnggěizhì búlìyú fāhuī láodòngzhě de láodòng jījíxìng。
The supply system is not good at giving play to worker\'s enthusiasm.
我们要最大限度地发挥生产者的主观能动性。
Wǒmen yào zuì dà xiàndù de fāhuī shēngchǎnzhě de zhǔguān néngdòngxìng。
We should give the fullest play to producers\' subjective initiatives.
充分发挥中央和地方两个积极性
chōngfèn fāhuī zhōngyāng hé dìfāng liǎnggè jījíxìng 
give full play to the initiative of both central and local authorities

Both central and local initiative should be brought into play.

挥发性
huīfāxìng
volatility
此物质的主要成分是挥发油，具有很强的保健功效。
Cǐ wùzhì de zhǔyào chéngfèn shì huīfāyóu，jùyǒu hěnqiáng de bǎojiàn gōngxiào。
This is made from naphtha which is very good for health.

zài duìwàikāifàng zhōng fāhuī chuāngkǒu zuòyòng
serve as a window open to the outside world

chōngfèn fāhuī zhōngyāng hé dìfāng liǎnggè jījíxìng 
give full play to the initiative of both central and local authorities
发挥想像力
fāhuī xiǎng xiàng lì
give free rein to one\'s imagination

Wǒmen méiyǒu chōngfèn fāhuī tā de cáigàn。

This point needs further elaboration.
发挥龙头作用
fāhuī lóngtóu zuòyòng
play a leading role; serve as a powerhouse
充分发挥潜力
chōngfèn fāhuī qiánlì
fully bring out latent potentialities; bring the potential into full play
要想办法使每个人的潜在力量充分发挥出来。
Yào xiǎngbànfǎ shǐ měigèrén de qiánzài lìliangchōngfèn fāhuī chūlái。
We must find a way to allow everyone to realize their potential.
如果发挥正常，他的胜面比较大。
Rúguǒ fāhuī zhèngcháng，tā de shèngmiàn bǐjiào dà。
If he plays normally, he stands a good chance of winning

chōngfèn fāhuī xiǎngxiànglì
give full play to one\'s imagination

chōngfèn fāhuī shuǐ、féi de xiàonéng
make the best possible use of irrigation and fertilizer

fāhuī míngxiǎn de xiàoyòng
show obvious effectiveness
发挥它应有的作用
fāhuī tā yīngyǒu de zuòyòng
play its proper role
发挥余热
fāhuī yúrè 
do what one can in one\'s old age
发挥越来越大的作用
fāhuī yuèláiyuèdà de zuòyòng
play an increasingly important role

Fāhuī zhōng yānghé dìfāngliǎnggè jījíxìng。
Both central and local initiative should be brought into play.
发挥
fāhuī
bring into play; give play to; give free rein to
在今天的比赛中，中国足球队超水平发挥了。

chōngfèn fāhuī rénmínqúnzhòng de cōngmíngcáizhì
give full play to the wisdom and creativity of the people
在对外开放中发挥窗口作用
zài duìwàikāifàng zhōng fāhuī chuāngkǒu zuòyòng
serve as a window open to the outside world
充分发挥中央和地方两个积极性
chōngfèn fāhuī zhōngyāng hé dìfāng liǎnggè jījíxìng 
give full play to the initiative of both central and local authorities
发挥想像力
fāhuī xiǎng xiàng lì
give free rein to one\'s imagination
我们没有充分发挥他的才干。
Wǒmen méiyǒu chōngfèn fāhuī tā de cáigàn。
We\'re not doing justice to his talents.
这一论点有待进一步发挥。
Zhè yí lùndiǎn yǒu dài jìnyíbùfāhuī。
This point needs further elaboration.
防汛指挥部
fángxùn zhǐhuībù
flood-control headquarters
挥手告别
huīshǒu gàobié
wave farewell
他把手一挥，上马驰骋而去。
Tā bǎ shǒu yì huī，shàngmǎ chíchěngér qù。
With a wave of his hand, he mounted the horse and galloped away.
挥刀
huī dāo 
wield a sword
挥笔
huībǐ

huīdòngdàbàng

huīdòngqízi

挥动拳头
huīdònɡ quántóu

瓶盖没拧紧，里面的酒精都挥发光了。
Pínggài méi nǐngjǐn，lǐmiàn de jiǔjīngdū huīfā guāng le。
Because the top is loose, the alcohol inside has volatilized.
挥发性
huīfāxìng
volatility

huīɡē dōnɡjìn

挥霍浪费
huīhuò lànɡfèi

挥霍无度
huīhuò wúdù

挥泪而别
huīlèi érbié

huīshǒu zhìyì

挥舞花束表示欢迎
huīwǔ huāshù biǎoshì huānyínɡ
