jí zhōng zhīhuī 
centralized direction (or command)
发挥龙头作用
fāhuī lóngtóu zuòyòng
play a leading role; serve as a powerhouse
指挥病倒，这场演出恐怕没想儿了。
Zhǐhuī bìngdǎo，zhè chǎngyǎnchū kǒngpà méixiǎngr le。
I\'m afraid the performance\'s off because the conductor\'s ill.
歌唱演员们目不转睛地望着指挥。
Gēchàngyǎnyuánmen mùbùzhuǎnjīng de wàng zhe zhǐhuī。
The singers kept their eyes fixed on the conductor.
有人在前台表演，有人在幕后指挥。
Yǒu rén zài qiántái biǎoyǎn，yǒu rén zài mùhòu zhǐhuī。
Some appeared on the stage, while others pulled strings behind the scenes.
前沿指挥所
qiányán zhǐhuīsuǒ
forward command post
充分发挥潜力
chōngfèn fāhuī qiánlì
fully bring out latent potentialities; bring the potential into full play
要想办法使每个人的潜在力量充分发挥出来。
Yào xiǎngbànfǎ shǐ měigèrén de qiánzài lìliangchōngfèn fāhuī chūlái。
We must find a way to allow everyone to realize their potential.
将军亲临前线指挥。
Jiāngjūn qīnlín qiánxiàn zhǐhuī。
The general directed the battle personally at the front.

huī quán

指挥所设在前沿阵地上。
Zhǐhuīsuǒ shè zài qiányán zhèndì shàng。
the command post was set up in a forward position.
如果发挥正常，他的胜面比较大。
Rúguǒ fāhuī zhèngcháng，tā de shèngmiàn bǐjiào dà。

他指挥有方，捭阖有度。
Tā zhǐhuī yǒufāng，bǎihé yǒudù。
He is a great commander.
在今天的比赛中，中国足球队超水平发挥了。
Zài jīntiān de bǐsài zhōng，Zhōngguó zúqiúduì chāoshuǐpíng fāhuī le。
In this match, the Chinese football team performed better than normal.
只要您大笔一挥，这件事儿准能解决。
Zhǐyào nín dàbǐ yìhuī，zhèjiàn shìr zhǔnnéng jiějué。
You can do it with a stroke of the pen.
科技创新政策给科技工作者提供了发挥才智的大舞台。
Kējì chuàngxīn zhèngcè gěi kējì gōngzuòzhě tígōng le fāhuī cáizhì de dàwǔtái。
The policy of innovation through science and technology provides a stage for scientists, and technicians to put their full talents to use.
广大党团员要发挥好模范带头作用。
Guǎngdà dǎngtuányuán yào fāhuī hǎo mófàn dàitóu zuòyòng。
Members of the Communist party should serve as role models to others.
能够来这里发挥余热，这些退休老人也得其所哉。
Nénggòu lái zhèlǐ fāhuī yúrè，zhèxiē tuìxiū lǎorén yě déqí suǒzāi。
These retired men are content to devote their remaining energy here.
由于临场发挥失利，他没能拿到金牌，令人扼腕叹息。
Yóuyú línchǎng fāhuī shīlì，tā méi néng ná dào jīnpái，lìngrén èwàn tànxī。
What a pity that, due to underperforming, he failed to win the gold medal.
再富实的家底儿，也经不住你这么挥霍。
Zài fùshí de jiādǐr，yě jīngbúzhù nǐ zhème huīhuò。
No matter how much wealth your family has, it can\'t continue being squandered by you like this.
供给制不利于发挥劳动者的劳动积极性。
Gōnggěizhì búlìyú fāhuī láodòngzhě de láodòng jījíxìng。
The supply system is not good at giving play to worker\'s enthusiasm.
刷墙的时候，他手里拿个辊子，挥舞着胳膊。
Shuāqiáng de shíhou，tā shǒulǐ ná gè gǔnzi，huīwǔ zhe gēbo。
When whitewashing the wall, he painted with a roller in his hand.
他是出了名的好脾气，一直呼之即来，挥之即去。
Tā shì chū le míng de hǎo píqi，yìzhí hūzhī jílái，huīzhī jíqù。
He is famous for his good temper. He always shows up at one\'s beckon, and leaves when asked to.
他是这艘护航舰的总指挥，权利很大。
Tā shì zhè sōu hùhángjiàn de zǒngzhǐhuī，quánlì hěndà。
He is the commander in chief of this escort ,and he holds great power.
大军挥鞭北上，势如破竹，捷战频传。
Dàjūn huībiān běishàng，shìrú pòzhú，jiézhàn pínchuán。
The main army moved forward towards the north. It carried everything before it and news about the victory   came too.
他因违反公司的规章制度遭到上级的挥斥。
Tā yīn wéifǎn gōngsī de guīzhāngzhìdù zāodào shàngjí de huīchì。
He was chided by the superior because he had violated the company\'s bylaws.
他正值少年，意气挥斥，才华横溢。
Tā zhèngzhí shàonián，yìqì huīchì，cáihuá héngyì。
He was just in his youth; high-spirited, vigorous and full of literary talent.
此物质的主要成分是挥发油，具有很强的保健功效。
Cǐ wùzhì de zhǔyào chéngfèn shì huīfāyóu，jùyǒu hěnqiáng de bǎojiàn gōngxiào。
This is made from naphtha which is very good for health.
这样热的天气，人们都不禁挥汗。
Zhèyàng rè de tiānqì，rénmen dōu bùjīn huīhàn。
It was so hot that people couldn\'t help sweating heavily.
炎炎夏日，爱出汗的他挥汗成雨。
Yányán xiàrì，ài chūhàn de tā huīhàn chéngyǔ。
On the scorching summer day, he who is apt to sweat will perspire heavily.
挥霍无度的他将所有财产花尽。
Huīhuò wúdù de tā jiāng suǒyǒu cáichǎn huājìn。
He who wasted money at wil,l had spent all his property.
因为被影片触动，他当场挥洒热泪。
Yīnwéi bèi yǐngpiàn chùdòng，tā dāngchǎng huīsǎ rèlèi。
Touched by the film, he wept on the spot.
此画虽是他随意挥洒之作，但却独具韵味。
Cǐ huà suī shì tā suíyì huīsǎ zhī zuò，dàn què dújù yùnwèi。
Though the painting was casually painted by him, it had a unique lingering charm.
他举起笔来挥洒自如的写了三个字。
Tā jǔqǐ bǐ lái huīsǎzìrú de xiě le sāngè zì。
He lifted the brush pen, and wrote three words smoothly.
李将军挥师南下，乘胜追击。
Lǐ jiāngjūn huīshī nánxià，chéngshèng zhuījī。
General Li led the army towards the south, chasing the enemy by exploiting a victory.
他看准部下的特长，及锋而试，让部下最大限度地发挥自己的能力。
Tā kànzhǔn bùxià de tècháng，jífēng ér shì，ràng bùxià zuì dà xiàndù de fāhuī zìjǐ de nénglì。
He observed his followers\' advantages and granted them appropriate opportunities to give good play to their abilities.
大家要推举一位将才出来指挥战斗。
Dàjiā yào tuījǔ yíwèi jiàngcái chūlái zhǐhuī zhàndòu。
We are selecting a man with military talent to command the battle.
交通岛上的警察正在指挥交通。
Jiāotōngdǎo shàng de jǐngchá zhèngzài zhǐhuī jiāotōng。
The policeman is commanding traffic on the traffic island.
110指挥台接警后立刻派民警赶赴出事地点。
Yāoyāolíng zhǐhuītái jiējǐng hòu lìkè pài mínjǐng gǎnfù chūshì dìdiǎn。
The 110 command center sent policemen to the site as soon as they received the crime report.
将军挥舞着金瓜，一下就把那人打死了。
Jiāngjūn huīwǔ zhe jīnguā，yíxià jiù bǎ nà rén dǎsǐ le。
The general beat the man to death with a hammer.
他指挥的军队屡战屡胜，立下了赫赫战功。
Tā zhǐhuī de jūnduì lǚzhàn lǚshèng，lìxià le hèhè zhàngōng。
He led the troops and scored one victory after another, having glorious achievements in war.
比赛中国家女篮发挥正常，顺利夺冠。
Bǐsài zhōng guójiā nǚlán fāhuī zhèngcháng，shùnlì duóguàn。
The women\'s basketball team played as normal and won the championship.
我空军采取强击策略，将目标定在了敌军指挥部。
Wǒ kōngjūn cǎiqǔ qiángjī cèlüè，jiāng mùbiāo dìngzài le díjūn zhǐhuībù。
Our air force adopted a forceful attacking strategy, and fixed our targets on the enemy\'s headquarters.
我们不得不听从强力部门的指挥。
Wǒmen bùdébùtīngcóng qiánglì bùmén de zhǐhuī。
We can not but listen to the command of the powerful department.
我们要最大限度地发挥生产者的主观能动性。
Wǒmen yào zuì dà xiàndù de fāhuī shēngchǎnzhě de zhǔguān néngdòngxìng。
We should give the fullest play to producers\' subjective initiatives.
宗族的团练发挥了组织联络、筹措经费、制定章程三大作用。
Zōngzú de tuánliàn fāhuī le zǔzhī liánluò、chóucuò jīngfèi、zhìdìng zhāngchéng sān dà zuòyòng。
The leader of a local army acted as an organizer, communicator, fund-raiser, and rule-maker.
敌后武工队在战争中发挥了极大的作用。
Díhòu wǔgōngduì zài zhànzhēng zhōng fāhuī le jídà de zuòyòng。
The secret military workers who worked in the enemy\'s rear made great contributions to the victory of the war.
先遣队在战斗中发挥了突出的作用。
Xiānqiǎnduì zài zhàndòu zhōng fāhuī le tūchū de zuòyòng。
The advanced groups made significant contributions to the battle victory.
挥别乡井二十余载，我今天总算得以重回故里了。
Huībié xiāngjǐng èrshí yúzǎi，wǒ jīntiān zǒngsuàn déyǐ chónghuí gùlǐ le。
After more than 20 years, I was able to go back to my hometown today.
打仗的时候，小钢炮也可以发挥大作用。
Dǎzhàng de shíhou，Xiǎogāngpào yě kěyǐ fāhuī dàzuòyòng。
Small modern steel cannon are very useful in battles.
效应器在神经系统中发挥重要的作用。
Xiàoyìngqì zài shénjīng xìtǒng zhōng fāhuī zhòngyào de zuòyòng。
The effector plays an important role in the nervous system.
杂牌军在战斗中也能发挥重要作用。
Zápáijūn zài zhàndòu zhōng yě néng fāhuī zhòngyào zuòyòng。
Inferior troops can play an equally important part in battles.
此次任务中，指挥部的作用尤为突出。
Cǐcì rènwù zhōng，zhǐhuībù de zuòyòng yóuwéi tūchū。
During this mission, the command post is functioning prominently.
大家一致要求指挥官为我们唱首歌。
Dàjiā yízhì yāoqiú zhǐhuīguān wèi wǒmen chàngshǒugē。
Everybody unanimously asked the commanding officer to sing a song.
别看他其貌不扬，他可是著名的指挥家哦！
Biékàn tā qímào bùyáng，tā kěshì zhùmíng de zhǐhuījiā o！
Though looking quite ordinary, he is actually a famous conductor.
他指挥若定的样子真帅气！
Tā zhǐhuī ruòdìng de yàngzi zhēn shuàiqì！
He looks very graceful while directing with perfect ease.
指挥员坐在主席台前，等待着检阅部队。
Zhǐhuīyuán zuòzài zhǔxítái qián，děngdài zhe jiǎnyuè bùduì。
The commander is sitting in front of the rostrum, waiting to review the troops.
实践中，我们要尽量发挥主观能动性。
Shíjiàn zhōng，wǒmen yào jìnliàng fāhuī zhǔguān néngdòngxìng。
In practice, we should try our best to bring our subjective initiative into play.
他恣肆挥洒着自己艺术的灵感。
Tā zìsì huīsǎ zhe zìjǐ yìshù de línggǎn。
He released his artisitic inspirations freely and naturally.
完全不听从上级的指挥，这里简直成了一个独立王国。
Wánquán bùtīngcóng shàngjí de zhǐhuī，zhèlǐ jiǎnzhí chéng le yígè dúlì wángguó。
The place has become like an independent kingdom. None of the people here heed directions from their superiors.
学习和工作中要充分发挥群众组织的作用。
Xuéxí hé gōngzuò zhōng yào chōngfèn fāhuī qúnzhòng zǔzhī de zuòyòng。
We shall give full play to the functions of non-governmental organizations in studying and working.
鱼雷艇在第二次世界大战中发挥了重要作用。
Yúléitǐngzàidìèr cì shìjiè dàzhàn zhōng fāhuī le zhòngyào zuòyòng。
Torpedo boats played an important role during World War Two.
八路军在抗日战争中充分发挥了运动战的作用。
Bālùjūn zài kàngrì zhànzhēng zhōng chōngfèn fāhuī le yùndòngzhàn de zuòyòng。
The Eighth Route Army fully engaged in mobile battles during the anti-Japanese war.

fāhuī xiǎngxiànglì

fāhuī diànnǎode zuòyòng

Zhèyìlǐlùn xūyào jìnyíbù fāhuī。
This theory needs further elaboration.
这支部队归他指挥。
Zhèzhī bùduì guī tā zhǐhuī。
This team is under his charge.
我们要尽量发挥出自己的优势。
Wǒmen yào jǐnliàng fāhuīchū zìjǐ de yōushì。

为了便于指挥，指挥部搬移到工地现场。

fāhuī xiǎng xiàng lì

chōngfèn fāhuī shuǐ、féi de xiàonéng

fāhuī míngxiǎn de xiàoyòng

fāhuī tā yīngyǒu de zuòyòng

发挥余热
fāhuī yúrè

fāhuī yuèláiyuèdà de zuòyòng

发挥
fāhuī
bring into play; give play to; give free rein to

fāhuī
bring into play
这份工作使我充分发挥了专长。
Zhèfèn gōngzuò shǐ wǒ chōngfènfāhuīle zhuāncháng。
This job enabled me to make full use of my special skills.
发挥想象力
fāhuī xiǎngxiànglì
give one\'s imagination free rein
发挥电脑的作用
fāhuī diànnǎode zuòyòng
make the most of a computer
这一理论需要进一步发挥。
Zhèyìlǐlùn xūyào jìnyíbù fāhuī。
This theory needs further elaboration.
我们要尽量发挥出自己的优势。
Wǒmen yào jǐnliàng fāhuīchū zìjǐ de yōushì。
We have to do our best to give play to our own advantages.
瓶盖没拧紧，里面的酒精都挥发光了。
Pínggài méi nǐngjǐn，lǐmiàn de jiǔjīngdū huīfā guāng le。
Because the top is loose, the alcohol inside has volatilized.
挥发性
huīfāxìng
volatility
此物质的主要成分是挥发油，具有很强的保健功效。
Cǐ wùzhì de zhǔyào chéngfèn shì huīfāyóu，jùyǒu hěnqiáng de bǎojiàn gōngxiào。
This is made from naphtha which is very good for health.
指挥员在观察所里指挥军队，发号施令。
Zhǐhuīyuán zài guānchásuǒ lǐ zhǐhuī jūnduì，fāhào shīlìng。
The commander is directing the army forces and giving them orders from the observation post.
他们从前有碴儿，今天是借题发挥
敷衍(叙述并发挥)。
这场球我们赢了，一则是斗志旺盛，再则是临场发挥出色。
发挥国有大中型企业的技术辐射力。
充分发挥社会主义市场经济的优越性。
发挥全体员工的主动性和创造性。
发挥自己的本领
比赛中超常发挥，夺得冠军
因地制宜，充分发挥地利
临场发挥得很好
借题发挥
他的论文发挥了导师的见解
要充分发挥税收的杠杆调节作用
有幸结识了一位大人物
yǒuxìngjiéshí le yíwèi dàrénwù 
have the honour of making the acquaintance of a VIP
他有幸为梅兰芳配过戏。
Tā yǒuxìngwèi Méilánfāngpèiguò xì。
He had the hon-our of playing a supporting role in an opera starring Mei Lanfang.
我们有幸再次相会。
Wǒmen yǒuxìngzàicì xiānghuì。
We are happy to meet again.
今天我有幸拜认了一位名师。
Jīntiān wǒ yǒuxìng bàirèn le yíwèi míngshī。
I\'m fortunate enough today to have made the acquaintance of a well-known teacher.
婚外孕出生的孩子大多没有幸福的童年。
Hūnwàiyùn chūshēng de háizi dàduō méiyǒu xìngfú de tóngnián。
Generally speaking, illegitimate children don\'t have happy childhoods.
他有幸观测到了本世纪的第一次日全食。
Tā yǒuxìng guāncè dào le běn shìjì de dìyīcì rìquánshí。
He is lucky to have observed the first full solar eclipse of the century.
能够进天阙朝拜天子，真是三生有幸呀！
Nénggòu jìn tiānquè cháobài tiānzǐ，zhēnshì sānshēng yǒuxìng ya！
I\'m so fortunately to be able to make obeisance to the emperor.
感谢你能来枉顾小店，小弟真是三生有幸！
Gǎnxiè nǐ néng lái wǎnggù xiǎodiàn，xiǎodì zhēnshì sānshēng yǒuxìng！
Thank you for visiting my shop, it makes me feel very honored!
文人汇聚，雅言不绝于耳，我真是三生有幸。
Wénrén huìjù，yǎyán bùjué yúěr，wǒ zhēnshì sānshēng yǒuxìng。
I am so happy to participate in refined conversations between men of letters.
我可是久仰尊夫人的芳名，今天才有幸见到。
Wǒ kěshì jiǔyǎng zūnfūrén de fāngmíng，jīntiān cái yǒuxìng jiàndào。
I have heard of your wife for a long time. Today, I finally have the honor of meeting her.
她有幸获得了世界名牌大学的奖学金。
Tā yǒuxìng huòdéle shìjiè míngpái dàxué de jiǎngxuéjīn。
She was fortunate enough to receive a scholarship from a world-class university.
他还是怀有侥幸心理，不想认错。
Tā háishi huáiyǒu jiǎoxìng xīnlǐ，bùxiǎng rèncuò。
He is still expecting a fluke, and doesn\'t want to admit his mistake.
幸亏有录音遗嘱，他才能胜诉。
Xìngkuī yǒu lùyīn yízhǔ，tā cáinéng shèngsù。
Thanks to the recorded will or won the lawsuit.
他不幸患有直肠癌。
Tā búxìng huànyǒu zhíchángái。
Unfortunately, he has carcinoma of the rectum.
他不幸患有轻度职业病。
Tā búxìng huànyǒu qīngdù zhíyèbìng。
Unfortunately, he has mild occupational disease.
幸喜你有事回家，要不然小偷要把你家东西偷光了。

Luckily, you returned home on some matter, otherwise the thief would have stolen all your belongings.
在侦破这起毒案的过程中，有几名战士不幸牺牲。
Zài zhēnpò zhè qǐ dú\'àn de guòchéng zhōng，yǒu jǐ míng zhànshì búxìng xīshēng。
In the investigation of the drug-related crime, some policemen sacrificed their lives.

你有这样一位贤内助，可算得幸福的了。

You can well count yourself fortunate in having such a good wife.
有你这么一位肝胆照人的朋友我真是幸运！
Yǒu nǐ zhème yíwèi gāndǎn zhàorén de péngyou wǒ zhēnshì xìngyùn！

一个五岁的孩子能有这种凄惶的表情，想必他经历过太多的不幸。

今得拜识尊颜，三生有幸。

幸运
xìngyùn
good fortune; good luck
能遇到这样爱才的老师真是幸运。
Néng yùdào zhèyàng àicái de lǎoshī zhēnshì xìngyùn。

他很幸运，总是能够遇难呈祥。

He is so lucky that he can always avoid misfortunes.
他穷途得济，算是幸运的了。
Tā qióngtú déjì，suàn shì xìngyùn de le。
He is lucky to have financial help in such poor conditions.
有你这么一位肝胆照人的朋友我真是幸运！
Yǒu nǐ zhème yíwèi gāndǎn zhàorén de péngyou wǒ zhēnshì xìngyùn！
How lucky I am to have a friend who is exceedingly loyal like you!
他意外获致了一份家产，真是幸运。
Tā yìwài huòzhì le yífèn jiāchǎn，zhēnshì xìngyùn。

真幸运他未被杀死

祝(某人)幸运

幸运的是，掉进河里时我没带着相机。

看自己有多幸运
it was lucky you came along
真幸运你来了

你应该感到幸运

如果幸运的话

幸亏得到了这次机会，才使得他的才华不至于沦没。

Tā bǎ tā de zhuāngyuán liúgěile tā de xìngcúnzhě。
他把他的庄园留给了他的幸存者。
The survivors used jury-rigged fishing gear.
Xìngcúnzhě shǐyòngle yìngjí pèibèi de diàoyú gōngjù。
幸存者使用了应急配备的钓鱼工具。
The survivors of the fire were taken to a hospital.
Zhè chǎng dàhuǒ de xìngcúnzhě bèi sòngwǎngle yīyuàn。
这场大火的幸存者被送往了医院。
The embryonic government was staffed by survivors of the massacre.
Zǎoqī zhèngfǔ yóu dàtúshā de xìngcúnzhě zǔchéng。
早期政府由大屠杀的幸存者组成。
At least he survived.
Zhìshǎo tā xìngcúnle xiàlái。
至少他幸存了下来。
Luckily our cellar was still full of potatoes，so we lived on potatoes with salt.
Xìnghǎo dìjiào lǐ cúnmǎnle mǎlíngshǔ，yúshì wǒmen yǐ yánjútǔdòu wéishí。
幸好地窖里存满了马铃薯，于是我们以盐焗土豆为食。
Happiness and joy go together.
Xìngfú hé kuàilè bìngcún。
幸福和快乐并存。
All men will be guaranteed the unalienable rights of life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness.
不论所有人都享有不可让渡的生存权、自由权和追求幸福权。
You should thank your lucky stars that you survived the earthquake.
Nǐ hái néng zài dìqiú shàng shēngcún，nǐ yīnggāi wèi cǐ gǎndào xìngyùn。
你还能在地球上生存，你应该为此感到幸运。
This unfortunate man exemplifies many of the problems of mentally disordered offenders.
Zhège búxìng de rén zhǎnxiànle jīngshen yìcháng de gōngjīzhě suǒ cúnzài de zhòngduō wèntí。
这个不幸的人展现了精神异常的攻击者所存在的众多问题。

chénjìn zài xìngfú de huíyì zhōng

这一不幸的消息给了她很大的刺激。

zhídé qìngxìng de shì

幸亏我让得快，要不早给那辆自行车撞倒了。

xìngfú de shíkè

此生能与你在一起真是幸福。

我们会发现，电影中的情节一到幸福的端点就戛然而止。

Many movies have plots that finish with happy endings.

有你这么一位肝胆照人的朋友我真是幸运！

我们祝贺老师龟鹤延年，健康幸福！

Shōudào nín de huáhàn，wǒ hěnróngxìng。
I feel very honored to receive your letter.

Tā tèbié huáixiǎng dāngnián de xìngfú shēnghuó。

他还是怀有侥幸心理，不想认错。
Tā háishi huáiyǒu jiǎoxìng xīnlǐ，bùxiǎng rèncuò。
He is still expecting a fluke, and doesn\'t want to admit his mistake.

Chuānzhe hūnshā de nǚrén zuì xìngfú。
A woman feels happiest wearing a wedding dress.

Generally speaking, illegitimate children don\'t have happy childhoods.

Tā yìwài huòzhì le yífèn jiāchǎn，zhēnshì xìngyùn。
It\'s really lucky for him to inherit family property.
幸亏是请的家政，要是我们自己这些积垢是很难清理的。
Xìngkuī shì qǐng de jiāzhèng，yàoshì wǒmen zìjǐ zhèxiē jīgòu shì hěnnán qīnglǐ de。
Luckily, we have employed a housemaid. It would have been very difficulty for us to clean these scales.

The aircraft carrier accidentally hit a little fishing boat. Luckily, no one was hurt.
这个不幸的孩子，因为患脊髓灰质炎而留下了条瘸腿。

This poor child was left with two paralyzed legs due to polio.
三瓣心形小叶聚生在一起的那种三叶草，还有个昵称，叫做“幸运草”。
Sān bàn xīnxíng xiǎoyè jùshēngzài yìqǐ de nàzhǒng sānyècǎo，hái yǒu gè nìchēng，jiàozuò“xìngyùncǎo”。
That kind of clover, with three heart-shaped small leaves growing together, has the nickname &quot;lucky grass&quot;.
这位老媪体弱，百病缠身，幸好她的儿女都很孝顺。
Zhèwèi lǎoǎo tǐruò，bǎibìng chánshēn，xìnghǎo tā de érnǚ dōu hěnxiàoshùn。
The aged woman is sick with all kinds of diseases, but fortunately her children are filial.
我已功成名就，一定要让乡下的老父过上幸福的生活。
Wǒ yǐ gōngchéng míngjiù，yídìng yào ràng xiāngxià de lǎofù guòshàng xìngfú de shēnghuó。
Having achieved both success and fame, I will provide a happy life for my father, who lives in the countryside.
死去老伴的老人，老境难熬，如果儿女们不孝就更不幸了。
Sǐqù lǎobàn de lǎorén，lǎojìng nán\'áo，rúguǒ érnǚmen búxiào jiù gèng búxìng le。
Old people who have lost their husbands or wives will have a neglected old age, and will be more miserable if their children are disobedient.
这个老妪体弱，百病缠身，幸好她的儿女都很孝顺。
Zhège lǎoyù tǐruò，bǎibìng chánshēn，xìnghǎo tā de érnǚ dōu hěnxiàoshùn。
The old woman was very weak, and illness-stricken. Luckily her children were very filial.
他泪涟涟地向我们诉说她的不幸遭遇。
Tā lèiliánlián de xiàng wǒmen sùshuō tā de búxìng zāoyù。
He told us his unfortunate experiences with tears in his eyes.
这个不幸的婚姻早该被了断了。
Zhège búxìng de hūnyīn zǎo gāi bèi liǎoduàn le。
This unfortunate marriage should have finished long ago.
他不幸中了流矢，不治身亡。
Tā búxìng zhòng le liúshǐ，búzhì shēnwáng。
Unfortunately he was hit by a stray arrow, and died of an incurable wound.
幸亏有录音遗嘱，他才能胜诉。
Xìngkuī yǒu lùyīn yízhǔ，tā cáinéng shèngsù。
Thanks to the recorded will or won the lawsuit.
幸亏得到了这次机会，才使得他的才华不至于沦没。
Xìngkuī dédào le zhècì jīhuì，cái shǐdé tā de cáihuá bùzhìyú lúnmò。
It\'s thanks to this opportunity that his talent wasn\'t buried.
他很幸运地采到了这个罕见的极品梅花参。
Tā hěnxìngyùn de cǎidào le zhège hǎnjiàn de jípǐn méihuāsēn。
Fortunately, he plucked a rare top-grade thelenota ananas.
能够在老师门下学习，真是我的荣幸。

他和她相爱了，他们觉得这幸福是命中注定的。

He and she love each other, and they think it is their destiny.

看自己有多幸运
it was lucky you came along
真幸运你来了

你应该感到幸运
very few survive
极少幸存
to be flattered (that...)
(对于…)感到荣幸
he was fortunate to survive
他幸运地活了下来
it is fortunate that...
幸亏…
to gloat over {or} about sth
对某事幸灾乐祸
it\'s a good thing you were there, it\'s a good job you were there
[BRIT] 幸亏你在那儿
happily married
婚姻幸福
and they all lived happily ever after
他们永远幸福地生活下去
I would be honoured to accept
我将非常荣幸地接受
he\'s had a good innings
[fig] 他一生幸福而长寿
it\'s a good job that...
幸好…
Luckily the rain kept off.
幸好没有下雨。
with (any) luck
如果幸运的话
I\'m lucky to be alive
我很庆幸我活着
to be lucky enough to do sth
有幸做某事
it is lucky that...
侥幸的是…
to have a lucky escape
侥幸逃脱
Your happiness is the only thing that matters.
你的幸福是惟一要紧的事。
He was the only survivor.
他是唯一的幸存者。
(to go through) a bad/rough patch
经受不幸/困难时期
we are pleased to inform you that...
我们荣幸地告诉你…
to be/feel privileged to do sth
有幸做某事
the only survivor from the 1990 team
1990年队伍的惟一幸存者
to be thankful that/to be...
庆幸…
thankfully, there were few victims
幸亏受害者不多
you lucky/silly thing

it is unfortunate that...
不幸的是…
it\'s just as well
幸好

从韵律上说，这些诗是很协调的。

A Library Assistant has been seconded to the project to assist with its general activities.

In 1992 a peace accord was signed, and the country\'s first democratic elections were held peacefully in 1994.
1992 nián，hépíng xiéyì déyǐ qiānshǔ，1994 nián，zhège guójiā hépíng jǔxíngle dì-yī cì mínzhǔ xuǎnjǔ。

The five countries in the region signed a peace agreement to end the war.
Zhège dìqū yǒu wǔ gè guójiā qiānshǔle tíngzhàn hépíng xiéyì。
这个地区有五个国家签署了停战和平协议。
The leaders of the various middle eastern countries are trying to hammer out a peace agreement.
Zhōngdōng guójiā de lǐngdǎorén shìtú gǎochū yí fèn hépíng xiéyì。
中东国家的领导人试图搞出一份和平协议。
There is a multilateral agreement to keep the peace between the two countries.
两国达成了一项和平共处的多边协议。
